1b1(rgyud): / rgyug skad du/ Ar+ya 'i bu'i drang na/ 
1b2(rgyud):
1b3(rgyud): du/ 
2a1(rgyud): // byang chub sems dpa'athams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad
2a2(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'angs 'dam bu'i khrod na/ 
2a3(rgyud): gzings pa'i 'dug/ gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
2a4(rgyud): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i
2b1(rgyud): grong khyer gal bar 'dong ngo do// btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
2b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzir rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i
2b3(rgyud): grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a sma srung ba'i tshal/ na bzhug so// de nas bcom
2b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la
2b5(rgyud): phyi nas ske'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
3a1(rgyud): smros shig/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can
3a2(rgyud): gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcu
3a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa
3a4(rgyud): bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa tha mas cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bas mas pa/ tshangs pas bsams
3a5(rgyud): pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ 
3a6(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsam
3b1(rgyud): pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa rata/ bi sa ra t+na/ bi sa rata/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can
3b2(rgyud): gyis bka' stsal pa/ muny+dza ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug shig yams kyi nang rnam par zhi bar gyur cig/ nirga ts+tshata/ nin ts+tsha ta/ nirka tsA ta/ nin
3b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / 
3b4(rgyud): dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye// dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jigarten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum
3b5(rgyud): phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i
3b6(rgyud): 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ nirga
3b7(rgyud): ta nir+hats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur byer cig/ khyed cag las gang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i
4a1(rgyud): // sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs
4a2(rgyud): rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mr-i su mu su mu su mU/ sum+b+ha ru/ su su ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su su ru/ su mu ru/ suma?/ 
4a3(rgyud): rAHsu su ru/ mu ru/ su ru/ mur+ya/ mu ru/ ur+ra/ su ru/ su ru/ sur+ra/ mu ru/ r-i me ri mau/ ri mi/ rI mau/ ri mau r-i mi/ ri mi ri mo/ ro mi/ rugyu / 
4a4(rgyud): ri mi/ su ru mi/ mu ru ri mi/ su ru mi/ mUr+Ya ro mi/ mu ru ri mi/ su ru ri mi/ su ra? ts+tsha si/ su ru ri mi/ mu ru ri mi/ mu ru ri mi/ su rU rIti/ r-i
4a5(rgyud): ri ri/ ri rI r-I rI rI R+Ya/ ti mi ri/ mi ri mi ri ma ri mi ri mi ri mi ri/ mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri ti/ mI rI te/ mi ti/ saM sI/ si mI/ ka ka ra/ kiM ka ra ta/ kakar
4a6(rgyud): ka ka ra tsa/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ ka ka rA/ ka ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ ka ka rA/ ka ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ ka ka rA/ ka ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ ka ka rA/ ka ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM kA rA/ ka ka ro tI ti/ ku ri
4a7(rgyud): sho ka ka rA/ ka ka ri she/ kaka rI shi/ ri ri ri re re ri/ ti ti pu sA/ ri pu ri pu/ ra~M pu ri pu/ ri pu ri ru/ ri pu ri pu/ nA thA/ na nA thAH/ ri bu ri pu/ nA ShI ga ninan+ya ti/ ri pu/ 
4b1(rgyud): phuH nirkats+tsha te/ pA la ya ta/ ri pu ri pu/ ba la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs
4b2(rgyud): rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis/ k+Shi phran ni ragats+tsha ta swA hA// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis/ lha thams cad dang 'byung ba thams
4b3(rgyud): cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags bzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnams chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs zhi gnod
4b4(rgyud): pa mi mnga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa de// khyed la bde legs
4b5(rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mangs // khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa
4b6(rgyud): yi/  thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang / 
4b7(rgyud): dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad
4b8(rgyud): par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang gis skyes pas sa rnams ni// 
5a1(rgyud): nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dag 'de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa ga rnam
5a2(rgyud): drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa
5a3(rgyud): gang byung ste// khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur// yid 'phrogs gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de// khyed la bde
5a4(rgyud): legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde leg das mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyod la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ 
5a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bstan pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang
5a6(rgyud): bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing // khyed cag
5a7(rgyud): kun tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdas/ 
5a8(rgyud): nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni stongs gyur cig/ sems can kun
5b1(rgyud): dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma/ 
5b2(rgyud): gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de nang / 
5b3(rgyud): ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas/ btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ ske'i them pa la
5b4(rgyud): rkang pa bzhag nas/ gsang sngags kyi gni 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// bis dar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig
5b5(rgyud): rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bas/ 
5b6(rgyud): pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyi bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ 
5b7(rgyud): tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams
5b8(rgyud): pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka'
6a1(rgyud): stsal to// mun+tata/ mur+ya ta/ yams kyi na thams cad ni bar gyur cig/ ninan+da ta/ nin tsA ta/ nin tsA t+ya/ nirmA ts+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lho'i ma lnga/ lha'i bram gshe
6a2(rgyud): shing dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong
6a3(rgyud): ba ni po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma ngag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams sam/ lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong // bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dang ba'i 'byung po brgya stong/ 
6a4(rgyud): mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste/ de da/ khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ ninatra/ ninatsA ta/ nin ts+tsha ta/ nin ts+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig/ 
6a5(rgyud): khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phu bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang / ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dong la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod
6a6(rgyud): pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu ru/ su mu ru/ 
6a7(rgyud): su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru me ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru
6a8(rgyud): mo ri/ mu ru mi ra~M/ su ru mi ra~M/ mu ru dzi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mo ra~M/ mu ru bi ri/ su ru ma ri/ mu drA ti/ ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI/ di hr-i / mi ri mi ri/ mir mo ro/ mi ri mi r-i tau/ ha si mo ri ti/ ma rosi/ 
6b1(rgyud): kr-i kAShA/ kA t+ma/ kA / kA/ !kAH/ krA/ k+Shuy+YAk+thaSh+TakyA y+YA// kUl+lA kar+b+hu/ k+Sha / kyA Sha/ kAm+ma/ y+YA/ Sh+Ta/ kA smA/ y+YA[ऽ]
6b2(rgyud): ka rA/ ka ka rA/ ka ka ro/ ti ti ku ri sho ka ka rA/ ka ka ri shi/ ra ra ra ri/ rir ti/ ri pu swA/ ri pu/ ri bu/ ri pu/ ri phu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri phu/ nA nA tha/ na nA tha/ ri pu ri pu/ nAnA bA/ 
6b3(rgyud): nin n+da ta/ ri bu ri bu/ nin n+ya te/ bi la ya ta/ ri pu ri bu/ pa la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams
6b4(rgyud): pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis/ k+Shi phran ni dar gats+tsha ta swA hA// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / 
6b5(rgyud): chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka'/ stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub bo// gang la ser sna
6b6(rgyud): rnam chags pa// rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad
6b7(rgyud): cing ta ha chos rnams thams cad ston pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de // 
6b8(rgyud): khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yis// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par yu
7a1(rgyud): gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum
7a2(rgyud): 'gyur// gtsang zhing srub mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // 
7a3(rgyud): don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad
7a4(rgyud): rab dga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gang zhig gis// sa dag rnam dag g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ 
7a5(rgyud): khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor ma bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung du// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de// khyed la bde legs mdzad
7a6(rgyud): par 'gyur// yid 'phrogs gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs
7a7(rgyud): rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // 
7a8(rgyud): lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyis don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag
7b1(rgyud): las 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo de legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gud la'ang bde legs shing // khyed cag drug tu bde legs shog// khyed/ 
7b2(rgyud): cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad cing // sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams
7b3(rgyud): 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten ma pan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chag
7b4(rgyud): kun tuN 'thung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig lnga na gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ dkun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma
7b5(rgyud): gyur cig/ 'byung ba gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa dang pa de snang dag la gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rta gau tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur
7b6(rgyud): cag da 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug dri mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
7b7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsau ribi d+han sA nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
7b8(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das zham 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs gcig tu lus 'phags ri la gshegs pa'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 
8a1(rgyud): mi rgod phal po che zhig rgyang ma nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang skrag ste/ spu zing zhes byed na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi rgod dag
8a2(rgyud): gcig go// bde bar gshegs pa mi rgod dag gcig go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs sam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs
8a3(rgyud): lags so// bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo margod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ gti
8a4(rgyud): mug chen po'i tshogs rab tu gzhom pa 'di bka' stsa la to//  tad+ya thA/ a nu lo me pra ti lo me/ a nu lo ma pra ti lo ma/ a ra ti ke/ pra ta ke/ pa ke/ a ti pa ke/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ 
8a5(rgyud): ma ti gi/ pUk+ka si/ ri mi ri mi/ rid+d+hi/ ma tse biSh+Ta ti tse ra pra dan+tu/ bi s+tha hAn+ta/ b+ha man+ta/ mA mi yar+d+ha ya bdagran thin muny+tsa miswA/ hA// kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kun tu srung ba dang / 
8a6(rgyud): mi rgod thams cad dang / ri sul gyi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang / gseb lam srung ba thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa thams cad kyi rkang pa bcing bar byas so// rmugs par byas so// rengs par byas
8a7(rgyud): ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am/ ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar/ mi rgod rnams 'dar bar gyur cig/ rengs par gyur cig/ mgo rmongs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan
8a8(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// cho ga ni shing kun dang / bong bu'i spu bregs te/ bu ma
8b1(rgyud): gtsang mas bkal ba'i srang dbul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod ba'o// yang nagos kyi mtha' mal mdu pa bor te/ bde bar sbyin na dkrol bar bya'o// 'di grub pa'o// 'phags pa mi nang
8b2(rgyud): rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an+ta ra sa gr-I sa d+hA ra Ni man+ta/ bo skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i
8b3(rgyud): gzungs sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ 
8b4(rgyud): phyagan rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni drug dang / mtshon gyis 'tsho ba dang / lcogs pa dang / mtshon chub pa dang / gcan zan ma rungs pas
8b5(rgyud): za ba dang / mes tshigs pa dang / chur 'chi ba dang / 'go ba'i rim sa gzhan yang ba dang / mdze'i nang dang / gsor mi rung ba'i na de yang ba dang / g.yang la ltung ba dang / gzhan gyi byad dang
8b6(rgyud): zas kyis mnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de ltar ga shis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
8b7(rgyud): dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni sa dang na mkha' la gnas pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje gsungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang
8b8(rgyud): 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da
9a1(rgyud): ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+na an+ta rA ya bi nA sha ka ra mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na 'grub pa'o// nges par 'grub bo zhes gsungs so// 
9a2(rgyud): 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon
9a3(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa ni
9a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang /  sa'i snying po dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na
9a5(rgyud): rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu pa 'ba' zhig dang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa stan las lang / sa te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i
9a6(rgyud): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / sha za ma rungs pa dag gis mi nad dang / phyugs/ 
9a7(rgyud): nad dang / yams nad dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / ser ba dang / sa g.yos pa la sogs pa byung ste/ de dag zhi bar
9a8(rgyud): mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sku'i ba spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer me lha rab tu 'bar ba
9b1(rgyud): byung ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la thugs pa me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur to// de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lham me dang / lhan ne dang / lhang nge ma yin te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyang / 
9b2(rgyud): lham me dang / lhan ne dang / lhang nge ma yin no// klu dang gnod sbyin dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams ni rlung drag pos bdas pa'i shing bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par
9b3(rgyud): mi rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ mnyam pa'i phyag rgya bshig nas zhabs kyi pus mo la brdabs pas thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang bskum du
9b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa dag byung ste/ thabs las byung ba'i khro bo'i sprul pa dang / ga tu med pa dang bcas nas na mkhara' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gro dras pa'o// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag na bzhugs pa tshangs pa dang / 
9b5(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / drag po chen po bzhi po dag ha hUM hI/ zhes bya bas skrag par byed pa/ 'dod chag/ sa dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang ser sna dag 'joms pa/ 
9b6(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za yi dgas la sogs pa haM maM zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to// gsung gi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can zhabs phyed sa la pus mo dong mthe bong btsugs
9b7(rgyud): pa/ zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs pa'i khro bo brtan pa'i sku can/ shes rab kyi bdag nyid ral gri mi 'od dang bcas pas 'od kyis 'gengs pa dag sprul to// de'i tshe bcom ldan
9b8(rgyud): 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra traM/ a tsa la kan na tsaN+Da ma hA ro daH/ s+pho Ta ya hA badz+ra d+hika khaD+ga hUM maM hUM maM zhes brjod de// phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas
10a1(rgyud): pa khu tshur bcangs te/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrengs pa ni/ ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas bskor du mtshams bcad do// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra dzA/ a tsa la kanan
10a2(rgyud): tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ a mr-i ta hUM hUM zhes brjod do// phyag rgya ni lag pa sor mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas nas bskor la bgegs
10a3(rgyud): bskrad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung ba bsrungs pa ni dmar po'i yi ge raM spyi bor bsam ste/ rnam par dag pa'i yi ge 'dis brtan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris
10a4(rgyud): lus me 'od dang bcas par sgom ste/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ a na la kan tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Naka te b+h+ya/ sarba bi ga te b+h+yo/ bi shra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta hA maM rak+Sha zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni rdo rje thal
10a5(rgyud): mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar smin mtshamasu bca' bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyis mas rig pa chen po'i srung ba bsrungs pa ni hU~M dang bzhi'i rnam
10a6(rgyud): pas bltas te/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NA/ a tsa la ka na tsat+ta ma hA ro Sha Na ka te b+h+yaHsarba bi ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yoHsarba ta thA ga ta hA maM/ rak+Sha ma hA ba le sarba ta thA ga ta pra me nirga rdza hUM hUM phaT Ta tha TA tha/ a
10a7(rgyud): pra tiha te sAhA zhes brjod/ phyag rgyan rdo rje'i thal mo sbyor la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la gung mo rtsa sprad de/ srin lag gnyis brkyang nas mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bkug la snying kar bcas
10a8(rgyud): srung ba ni yum gyi ste/ bgegs dang log 'dren dang ma rungs pa thams cad dran pa tsam gyi 'byor bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs bte/ 
10b1(rgyud): kha zas kyi bye brag bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bzhib pa dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa la sogs pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang dri ngang ro'i bye brag la byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad de/ oM sarba d+harmA tA
10b2(rgyud): si ti hUM zhes byas pas dag par byas te/ oM a mr-i ta oM hUM hrIHzhes bya bas ni 'dod pa'i don du'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te sam+b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya bas lan bdun bdun btab ste bsngos pas tshim par
10b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ ldang bar 'dod na sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA
10b4(rgyud): ya daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ a si mu sa la ba ra shu pA shA hasta ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi kha hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha ne/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gardza gardza/ ba s+pho Ta ya/ sarba/ 
10b5(rgyud): big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA nA ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra na swA hA/ zhes bya/ ba brjod do// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la kha nang du stan te mdzub mo sgreng la brang du stsol la phyag rgya bcings te/ 
10b6(rgyud): gtor ma btang zhing 'chags pa'i dus su yang de bzhin no// nye reg bya ba dang khrus bya ba ni rin po che'i bum par dri zhim po'i chu la/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NI/ a tsa la ka na ya a mri ta zhes lan bdun
10b7(rgyud): bdun btab ste/ lag pa g.yon pas bum pa bzung nas g.yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la/ rimo can gyi nang du a bsams la chu blugs te/ oM shud+d+ha dun+te sho d+ha na ye swA hA/ 
10b8(rgyud): zhes bya bas khrus bya'o// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' byams pa la'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sum cu rtsa
11a1(rgyud): gsum gyi lha dang / 'bab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang / dza dang / bdug spos dang / lha'i nal zas dang / lha'i bu po dang / bum
11a2(rgyud): dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shing rta dpag tu med pa dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang bskor ba rgya chen po dag byas te byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
11a3(rgyud): dang thabs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spro ba dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bsam gtan dang po
11a4(rgyud): la mnyam par gzhag ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te dga' ba dar rtogs pa tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan dang po nas gnyi ngas pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtse gcig pa'i rtog spyod spang/ 
11a5(rgyud): te/ dga' ba de tsam mo// bsam gtan gnyis pa nas gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs te/ bde ba tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan gsum pa nas bzhi
11a6(rgyud): pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ tshor ba nye bar zhi bzhi pa'i bde ba tsam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan na rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa dang snying rje dang
11a7(rgyud): dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud spel ba'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar mtha' ba ni las rnam par grol ba'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA twAM/ d+harma d+hA tA swa b+hAH
11a8(rgyud): At+ma ko ho/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni 'di'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis sgreng ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las gleng gzhi ri le'u
11b1(rgyud): ste dang pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdornga'i skyil mo dkrung bcas te/ snying khar nyi ma dkyil 'khor la thugs kyis bon 'od kyis namakha' kun khengs par bsams
11b2(rgyud): te sa bon de las chos thams cad tshig gis lam dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i sgra 'od zer 'phro bsdu dang bcas pa'o// de nas sna tshogs pa'i gdan 'das nas
11b3(rgyud): skyes pa'i dri ma med cing yongasu rgyas par tshogs kyi bdag pa'i steng du rta bdun pa kun nas 'od 'phro ba/ 'dam skyes dang ldan pa dag gi steng du na mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyi sa bon dang bdag nyid gcig
11b4(rgyud): pa'o// tan mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par 'od kyis 'gengs pa shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur te de dag las bdud dang ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po/ rnam rtog/ 
11b5(rgyud): thams cad yongasu bcom pa/ dri ma med cing gzhon nu'i sku'o// de yang gzhon ning sku'i sha rgyas pa ni dper na bus pa gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa'i lus lta bu ste/ de'i sku mdog ni mthing nag
11b6(rgyud): tu gnas te/ dper na dbyar gyi char sprin nag po'i mdog bzhin du gnas pa'o// na mkha' ma lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pa ni/ dper na rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no// dbu skra
11b7(rgyud): gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni dper na shing a la ka'i 'bras bu bzhin no// sku cung zhig 'gying ba dang g.yo ba ni dper na dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'dus rtol bzhin no// zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa
11b8(rgyud): ni dper na gyad kyi 'gros bzhin no// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ni dper na pa la sha'i me tog bzhin no// spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni steng 'og gi bgegs sreg pa ste/ dper na lha ma yin gyi bya gtor ma za ba bzhin no// mche ba gtsigs
12a1(rgyud): pa ni/ dper na zla ba phyed pa bzhin no// ljags shin tu 'khrug pa ni dper na na mkha'i klog pa no// smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa ni dper na shing 'breg sha'i lom bzhin no// phyag g.yas na
12a2(rgyud): ral gri bsnams pa ni dper na gza' chen po'i 'od ltung ba bzhin no// sbrul gyi zhags pa g.yon na bsnams pa ni dper na rgya mtsho'i 'ching bzhin no// de lta bu'i sku des ni tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang rgyal po
12a3(rgyud): chen po bzhi po dag dang / phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa rnams dbang du sdud pa lha dang klu ma rungs pa dang srin mo dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dag go// de'i
12a4(rgyud): sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rANAM/ traT/ a ma g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro laNas+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ma ya tra ma ya hUM/ tra ta tsa maM zhes brjod par bya'o// des ni 'tshe ba dang / rnam par 'tshe
12a5(rgyud): ba dang / sdang ba dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / log 'dren dang / rnam ra log 'dren dang / srin po dang / lha dang / klu dang / grul bum dang/ sha za la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung las
12a6(rgyud): gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / 
12a7(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa dang / ljang bub pa dang / yud tsam pa'i rims dang / rtag pa'i rims las thar par 'gyur ro// seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dri dang / spyang ki dang / sbrul dug can dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang nga
12a8(rgyud): bung ba'i gnod pa las thar ro// rgyal po'i chad pa dang / dmag dpung gi 'jigs pa las thar ro// rkun po dang / bran dang / bza' mi 'thab cing rtsod pa las thar ro// chu yis 'jigs pa dang / me yis 'jigs
12b1(rgyud): pa dang ta sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa las thar ro// ral gri dang / shak+ti dang / dgra sta dang / mdudu dang / mda' dang / mnga' bo tsho dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa las thar/ 
12b2(rgyud): 'chi ba dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar ro// mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa kun dag par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yul mtha' 'khob dang / 
12b3(rgyud): dbang po ma tshang ba dang / lha tshe ring po dang / log par lta bar 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba las mnyes pa med pa dag tu mi 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
12b4(rgyud): gsungs te/ lan gcig brjod pas kyang sdig pa thams cad 'ang dag par 'gyur ro// 'di brjod pa'i gang zag des ni chos nyid kyiladam rdo rje lta bu myur ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rta bdun 'i
12b5(rgyud): steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi ge na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'dre ngas pa bsam te/ byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir ha ser po mig tu'o// srog gi lam du ni ma nag po bsam par bya'o// 
12b6(rgyud): spyi bor chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yi ge bsams te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra pA Ni tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaNahUM zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar te/ gung mo sgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo cung zad bku
12b7(rgyud): lata srin lag kyang de bzhin byas te/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gser la sogs pa'i snod du kha zas kyi bye brag
12b8(rgyud): nas dang / 'bras dang / gro dang / so bo dang / til la sogs pa dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dag blugs te/ 'bru gsum pa'i sngags
13a1(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// namaHsa man+ta ta thAg te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA la sung ga te/ s+pha ra/ i ma ga gan kha zhes brjod par bya'o// phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi
13a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM sa~M b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya ba las 'byung po kun la mchod par bya'o// de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a sa
13a3(rgyud): ma tri sa me ma hA sa ma ya/ sarba pA paM swA hA// phyag rgya thal mo sbyar ba la gsol ba gdab ste/ dam tshig gso ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas dam tshig ni 'di
13a4(rgyud): yin te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun ni 'bras bu dang / la/ ma dang / sgrub pa'i khyad par te/ gang nas brtsams te khyad pa/ dar gyis mchod cing nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya'o// tshad med pa'i
13a5(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tu sgom zhing smon lam rgya chen po gdab par bya'o// sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang bya ga rgya'i rten rgyun tu bcang zhing bral mi bya'o// lha dang / bla ma dang / 
13a6(rgyud): byang chub kyi grogs la khong nas 'khrug pa'i sems spang ngo // srog gis btus pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje sngon du song bas gnod pa dang / rnam par 'che ba spangs te nam yang dor
13a7(rgyud): mi bya'o// ser sna spangs te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// sems can la gnod pa dang / rnam par 'che ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims brten pa'o// rang la rnam par 'tshe ba la bzod par bya'o// rang dang
13a8(rgyud): gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o// rnam par g.yeng ba spangs te bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go// nyal ba dang ldang ba kun tu rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i don la ma yengs par bya'o// 
13b1(rgyud): dam tshig med cing mi gnas pa la bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa kun bstan cing bshad par mi bya'o// srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la phyin
13b2(rgyud): ci log pa dang / brdzun du smra ba ni tshangs par spyod pa dang / spyad par 'dod pas spangs par bya'o// dge slong rnams dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dam tshig dang ldan pa la gus par bya zhing brnyas par mi bya'o// 
13b3(rgyud): thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o// khro ba dang bab tshol du smra ba dang / lad lud dang / bshang gci 'dor ba dang / dri ma 'khru ba dang / skra dang sen mo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang / dring ba dang / 
13b4(rgyud): drim zhim pa bku zhing mnam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// khang pa ni spos kyi khang pa yid du 'ong ba gtsang zhing dram med pa dag bkra shis pa'i sgo shar du bstan pa/ gseng skar dang
13b5(rgyud): bcas pa'i khang pa 'am/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/ lha khang ngam/ ri bo'i rtsi 'am/ bya skad sgro gas pa'i sa 'am/ dgon pa'am/ bas mtha' 'am/ spang ldong
13b6(rgyud): dag tu dri zhim po'i chus bskyang nul byas la/ rtswa'i stan btings te gnas par bya'o// khri la 'dug pa spang bar bya'o// zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / la du dang / la ban dang / snum 'khur dang / 'khur skya
13b7(rgyud): dang ta 'bras dang / 'bras zan la sogs pa dag bsnyung ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o// sha dang chang dang / sgog pa la sogs pa dgu pa'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o// zla ba dang / skar ma dang / tshes grang
13b8(rgyud): la sogs pa ni yar gyi ngo ngag la dkon mchog la gsol ba btab la bsgrub par bya'o// re ba dang / rnga ma dang / rtsub pa dag ni ma yin no// 'dod pa'i don du 'jam zhing gnas pa la ni 'gal ba med do// dus
14a1(rgyud): rtag tu yi dam la dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o// sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni kha dog shin tu gnag pa ste/ ngadang nga yir 'dzin pa'i
14a2(rgyud): bdag nyid gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// rdo rje chags chen ni mdog dmar po chags pa dang chags par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mnga' gzhu'o// rdo rje rnon po ni ljang ku ste/ 'dzin cing yongasu 'dzin pa'i
14a3(rgyud): bdag nyid lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba ni mdog dmar po ste/ mi shes pa dang mi shes pa 'joms pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje'i brag 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje khro bo ni ser po ste/ khro ba dang khro ba'i bdag nyid kyi
14a4(rgyud): ral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa'o// rdo rje gtum chen ni mdog ldang nag ste/ btang snyoms dang btang snyomasu gyur pa'i bdag nyid da kyi sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje thabs bdag ni du bu'i
14a5(rgyud): mdog can bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdza rnga bsnams pa'o// rje stobs chen ni mthing ka ste/ dman pa dang dman pa'i rang / bzhin can gyi gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// 
14a6(rgyud): rgyu'i stobs ni dmar nag ste/ rten 'brel dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung yi dag nyid kyi be con 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rab 'byed ni sna tshogs phrin las kyi mdog can mtha' dang mtha' las grol ba'i bdag nyid can
14a7(rgyud): gyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o// de dag ni sa bcu'i bdag nyid can me 'bar ba'i sku las rab tu 'phro ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
14a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang 'byams pa la thun mong du de dag pa'i phyir de'i cho ga gsungs pa/ gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la maN+Dal mda' gang ba byas te/ nga'i
14b1(rgyud): rnam lnga'i bskyang nul byas la/ me tog sngon po dkram par bya'o// de nas bum pa gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs las byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi tshad du byas te/ der rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / byi ru
14b2(rgyud): dang / mu tig dang / rnam pa lnga gzhug par bya'o// sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dang / kha ra dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar rnams gzhug par bya'o// nas dang / 'bras dang / so ba dang / til dang / gro dang / cu rtse rnam
14b3(rgyud): gzhug par bya'o// cu gang dang / gur gum dang / dza ti dang / sug mel dang / ka ko la dang / li shi rnams gzhug par bya'o// tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos dang / ga pur la sogs
14b4(rgyud): pa'i dri rnams kyang gzhug par bya'o// mtsho dang / rdzing dang / stengaka dang / 'bab chu dang / lu ma bkod pa rnams kyi chu yang dablugs la ba la 'am ras la dri'i chus bsang bas mgul
14b5(rgyud): pa bcings te gzhag par bya'o// dri dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing la kha rgyan byas te/ dri dang / spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / 
14b6(rgyud): lha bshos dang / rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bsham par bya'o// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma yang cha bdun nam lnga la sogs par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ a tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA/ 
14b7(rgyud): ro Sha Na/ sarba big+h+na s+pho Ta ya/ badz+ra d+h+rika khaD+ga hUM zhes bya bas mtshams rnams bcings par bya'o// de bzhin du srung ba'i cho ga rdzogs par bya ste/ bum pa la gzungs
14b8(rgyud): kyi thag pa btags nis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgyur ba'i bum pa la bram zhes bya ba'i sa bon las kha dog dang / tshad dang ldan pa'i bum pa'o// thugs kyis
15a1(rgyud): bon las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das don de kho na nyid las mnyam par bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa'i gang
15a2(rgyud): zag dang bcas pa gdan seng ge'i steng na sna tshogs pa'i gdan pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o// chos nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam pa drug gis bcom ldan 'das sam par bya'o// 
15a3(rgyud): chos nyid dang / sems dang / sems kyi rnam pa dang / sgra dang / sgra brnyan dang / gzugs dang / gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa'i skur nyi ma'i gdan pad+ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po glang sna'i stong
15a4(rgyud): du bsam ste/ thugs kyi sa bon las ral gri me 'od dang ba/ cas pas na mkha' kun khebs pa'o// de las bdu deng tshar gcod pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsams te/ 
15a5(rgyud): mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o// na ma/ sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ pra ba ra sata kA rA pra tIts+tshany+dza zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ 
15a6(rgyud): sarba de ba tA a tsin t+ya a mr-i ta d+ha rA ya swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM ha ra b+ha ga bAn/ sarba bid+ya d+ha ra pU dze te swA hA/ zhes brjed par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AH
15a7(rgyud): hUM d+harma d+ha tu a nu ga te d+hA be hUM swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA mai tri b+h+yo ga te puSh+pe hUM zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM AHhUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta a/ 
15a8(rgyud): tsi prA Na a b+hA ba ga ga ni b+hi ni b+h+ye nor+ya A lo ki hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ ga ga ne sa ma ya gan+d+he hU~M swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ A hA ra/ 
15b1(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te mai rbi d+yai pA dza na s+pha ra Na ye hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a b+hisma ra ye/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga ma ge d+harma d+hA tu A kA shA ya sa man+t+ra ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri
15b2(rgyud): shud+d+ha maN+Da le/ ma ma pra Ni d+ho pU dza na ma l-in d+harma d+ha tu/ a d+hiSh+ThAn pa tsa hU swA hA zhes brjod do// rdo rje dang dril bu bsil bar bya'o// thal mo bkren la/ mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyub tu cung zhig
15b3(rgyud): bkug la sbyar/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnol la mthe bong cung zhig bkug pa ni yon chab kyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams gung mo la brten te cung zad bkug nas gung mo sgreng ba ni
15b4(rgyud): bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te nang du bcug nas/ mdzub mo mthe bos mnan pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dang gung mo'i sor mo rtse sprad/ 
15b5(rgyud): lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// mi 'arji gas pa'i phyag lag na g.yon pas 'khrig ma bteg pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo bkan pa'i zur sbyar te/ mtha'u
15b6(rgyud): chung gnyis ba shibs nas sgreng ba ni lha bai shos kyi phyag rgya'o// spyi bor lag pa bkor te/ thal mo khong stong sbyar nas dkrol ba ni rgya chen po'i mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i/ 
15b7(rgyud): lha mos rdzas sbyangs pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a b+hA ba swa b+ha ba mu ga tA naM/ na ma pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha Ar+ya shra ba kA nAM/ na mo bo d+hi sa twa nAM/ da sha b+hA mi pra tiSh+Thi ti sha ra NAM/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twa nAM/ 
15b8(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM kha~M ba khA hi khA hi duSh+Ta swA hA/ kA ma kr-i a si mu sa laM pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ tsa tur+N+Na dza/ tsa tur+m+ma khe ShaT tsa ra Na/ gats+tsha ye/ gats+tsha yai/ sarba big+h+nAM/ g+hA ta bi kr-i tA nAM/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM kar
16a1(rgyud): aT+TA hA sa ni nI tai b+hag+h+na tsarma bas ni/ ku ru ku ru sarba d+harmA NA/ tsIn+da ts+tshin+da sarba man+ta/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ pa ra man+ta/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba b+hU ta/ nirma tha ni rmaH/ sarba duSh+TAn/ khra be sha
16a2(rgyud): ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye b+haM ba sa t+ya dzI bi ta na/ ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAR+ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma bi laM ba/ sa ma yaM/ a nu sma ra hUM hUM/ s+pho Ta ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sarba ShaT+TA ri pU ra ka/ he b+ha ga ban/ 
16a3(rgyud): kiny+tsi rA ya si/ ma ma sarba tha sA d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha/ tsat+tA ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ma tra ma ha maM/ zhes bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
16a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bar dmigs la las dang rnam par smin pa dang / jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / nad la sogs pa zhi bar dmigs te bzlas par bya'o// de nas
16a5(rgyud): gtong bar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshe gdams pa'i tshul gyis/ dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
16a6(rgyud): 'das kyis ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ shing bal shin tu dri ma med pa la bram ze 'am gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'i khrus byas te/ dkon mchog gsum la gsol ba btab la brtag par bya'o// rigs
16a7(rgyud): ngan dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i ras dag ni spring bar bya'o// ras de gur gum dang gla rtsi dang a ka ru la sogs pa'i chus bkrus te dag par bya'o// de nas sngags 'di grog 'am ras la bris nas gangag
16a8(rgyud): par bya'o// a A i I u U ri rI li l-i e o o o a a kaM khag g+hang / tsa chang d+hanya/ ku rba Da d+ha Na/ ta tha d+ha na/ pa pa ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa haHk+ShaHzhes bya ba bris / 
16b1(rgyud): dgod par bya'o// de nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaNaH/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tA tha ha maM/ oM bkye na ma/ zhes bya ba las thams cad 'grub pa ste/ gur gum dang tsam
16b2(rgyud): dngar gla rtsi'i tshul bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o// de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag par byas te/ bram ze'i rigs kyis bri bar bya'o// tshon ni gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / lcags rang gis bri
16b3(rgyud): bar bya ba 'am/ yang na kar rtsi dang / mtshal dang / ldong ros dang / bap+pa dang / spang ma dang / mthing shun dang / rgya skyegs dang / rdo so la dang / snag tsha dang / de la sogs pa'i tshon rnams la a ga
16b4(rgyud): ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos la sogs dpa rnams dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan bdun brjod de bri bar bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra thA
16b5(rgyud): maHbAkye hUM/ oM AHbi ra hUM/ khe tsa ra maM zhes brjod la bri bar bya/ ste/ khyad par bzang po 'dzem pa'i dus su tshul khrims dang / ldan zhing dag pa la kha zis byin te spyan dbye bar bya'o// bri ba yA/ 
16b6(rgyud): de bzhin te/ spyan 'byed pa'i dus su sngags 'di brjod do// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hA/ tra thA ha maM/ ga ga na ba rak+She Na/ ku ru Na ma ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsak+khaHoM AHhUM swA hA zhes sbrang rtsi
16b7(rgyud): gser gyi thur ma la byugs la lan gsum du byugs par bya'o// bris sku tshad dang ldan pa yongs su zin pa dang / 'dri mkhan la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par bya ste/ gser ram/ dngul la ma/ zangs
16b8(rgyud): sa ma ta ra 'am/ rdo ba dag las byed na yang de bzhin du bya'o// gzugs dang sku'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin dang rang bzhin ma yin pas khyad par tha dad pa dag tu bya ste/ rang bzhin dang ldan pa la bar chad zhi
17a1(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni yongs su bsgyur nas byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// de nas khyad par bzang po'i dus su khang pa ba'i rnam lngas byug par byas te/ ras
17a2(rgyud): ris dang / thang ka dang / po ti dang / glegs bam la sogs pa maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhugasu gsol to// spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / dri dang / lha bshos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par
17a3(rgyud): dpag tu med pa bshams te/ gtor ma yang de bzhin du'o// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang bla re la sogs pa yang bri bar bya'o// de nas khro bo'i sku dang ldan pas sngags brjod par bya/ 
17a4(rgyud): ste na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a mo g+ha e hi/ a pra ti ha ta a tsadal tse ta e naM tu ka NaM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThA tsu ru tsu ru/ ta di ta di/ ta Ta ta/ TaM/ big+h+nAM g+hA ta ya/ ma ra ya/ khA da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa taM tsa me/ a nu/ 
17a5(rgyud): ban+d+ha ya/ a dz+nyA ku ru/ a d+ha ha d+ha ha na kra/ ka tA ka ta/ ma ta ma tA/ ha ha ma ma/ e te ba la e hi ma hA nu ni bi sha na/ naT+Ta nuH/ a be shaM ya a be sha ya/ a tsa le tse ha/ ta Ta ta kud mad
17a6(rgyud): maHphaT phaTaM/ zhes 'bum brjod par bya ste/ lha'i sku gnyis la ni bye ba'o// zhi ba ni sprul pa'i sku ste/ sngon du ni de bzhin shes par bya'o// a ga ru dang du ru ka dang / tsan dang / ga pur dang / gla
17a7(rgyud): dang tar+g+ha spos kyi chu la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsa myaMk+saM bud+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ mu ne mu ne ma hA mu ne/ e dza ya dza yai/ bAkye she swA hA/ oM bAkye baM dza ya/ o
17a8(rgyud): bAkre niSh+Tha ye/ oM bAkye na ma/ oM bAkye da~M na maHoM AHhUM ha maM zhes bya bas sku khrus bya'o// de nas rol mo bsgrags par bya'o// rdzas le sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ 
17b1(rgyud): haM maM ta.oM Ad+ya nuta pa nan trata ba b+ha swa ra su bi shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+ha tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o// de nas mchod pa dpag tu med pas mchod de/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
17b2(rgyud): kyi dam tshig tu brjod pa'i gzungs sngagaso// na mas+t+rai ya d+hi ka nAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA na tsaN+Da tsaN+Da ba la ba la/ ba tra ba tra/ shAn+ti/ shAn+te/ ha la ha la/ ba ra ba la/ ma rA Na ma rA Na badz+ra da la s+pho Ta ma/ li ti ta shi
17b3(rgyud): kha raHsa man+ta badz+ra Ni dz+wa la dz+wA la/ na mo stu te/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sa sa ra Na ra Na ha hUM la badz+ra s+pho Ta/ maM swA hA/ na mas+t+rai ya d+hi ka nA~M ta thA ga tA nAM sarba tra a pra ti ha ta bAp+ta d+harma tA ba lI nAM/ aM a
17b4(rgyud): sa ma sa man+ta to a nAM ta tra bAp+ti shA sa ni/ ha ra ha ra/ sma ra sma ra Na/ bi ka ta rA g+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ba lI/  hi sa hA se/ tra ya tra ya/ ga ga na ma hA ba ra lik+Sha Ne dz+wa la dz+wa lan
17b5(rgyud): sA gA re swA hA/ na maHse man+ta bud+d+hA ye/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+has tA nAM/ oM a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ ma hA bi ra dze/ ma hA bi ra dze/ swa ra te swa ra te/ tra yi tra yi/ bi d+ha ma ne/ saM b+haM dza ni ra ma ti sid+d+ha
17b6(rgyud): e tre traM swA hA/ zhes brjod do// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs te/ lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang lha dang sngags dang / phyag rgya
17b7(rgyud): thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'dis lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya bcings pa rnams nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha
17b8(rgyud): dang rta sngags dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis ltas dang mtshan ma bar chad med par 'gyur ro// srod dang tho rangs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gzungs 'di rjes su brjod par bya'o// 
18a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i khrus 'di la brtson par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM i ho shud+d+he shud+d+he ma ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ riH
18a2(rgyud): oM shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a shu maM bi shud+d+he shud+d+he shud+d+he sa ma ya swA hA zhes brjod do// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i gzungs te/ chu la sngags bzlas nas khrus byas/ 
18a3(rgyud): na sdig pa kun 'dag par 'gyur ro// rmi lamo ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rims dang 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / 
18a4(rgyud): 'bras dang / shu ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'tshe ba las thar par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
18a5(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am cingang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'a khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa gsungs pa/ dang po chos kyi dbying
18a6(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin gyi e'i rnam pa can gyi na mkha'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu ba dan can yaM las byung ba'o// chu'i dkyil 'khor gangs ltar dkar ba'i zlum po bum pa can bam las so// sa'i
18a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gser gyi mdog can gru bzhi rdo rje can lam las byung ngo // de'i steng ri rab rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i tshad dang ldan pa oM las byung ba'o// me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa
18a8(rgyud): 'bar ba dang bcas par las so// de'i nang du bum kha dog sna tshogs byung ba'i khang bu brtsegs pa/ gru bzhi pa sgra bani dang bcas pa'i rin po che sna lnga las grub pa ni shel dang / bai DUr+ya dang / byi ru dang / 
18b1(rgyud): in+d+ra nI la dang / gser las grub pa'o// de'i nang sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa'i gdan no// shar gyi mdab ma ni shel las grub pa'o// lho'i mngab ma ni bai DUr+ya las grub pa'o// nub kyi mngab
18b2(rgyud): ma ni byi ru las grub pa'o// byang gi mdab ma ni in+d+ra nI las grub pa'o// mtshams rnams kyang shel dang / bai DUr+ya dang / byi ru dang / in+d+ra nI la las grub pa'o// dbus su ni tshegs bdag glang sna'i steng du sna
18b3(rgyud): tshogs pa'i 'donaT skyes dang / nyi ma'i gdan no// shar du brgya byin/ lhor lha chen po/ nub tu khyab 'jug byung du thag bzangs ris so// shar lho mtsham su tshangs pa/ lho nub mtsham su gzhon nu/ nub byang du dga'
18b4(rgyud): byed byang shar du kun rgyal ba ste/ lha chen po brgyad kyi steng du/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan no// yi ge raM las byung ba'i nyi ma dang / las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma ma dang ldan pa las bcom
18b5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi g.yo ba naH/ mkha'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bcu gas pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam lnga
18b6(rgyud): ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs yi ge tsam la
18b7(rgyud): byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma tsam dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba/ shes rab kyi mdog can nyi ma'i snying po las pus mos reg cing bzhugs pa rin po
18b8(rgyud): che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na klu nor rgyas bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// lhor/ 
19a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs yi ge d+he las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma d+he dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag nyid mi g.yo ba/ bai DUr+ya'i mdog can
19a2(rgyud): nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i
19a3(rgyud): zhags pa bsnams pa'o// phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa/ nub tu bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs yi ge maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma ma dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs kyi
19a4(rgyud): bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba byi ru'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po dal pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan ba'i bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa
19a5(rgyud): g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu chu lha bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// byang du bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs yi ge haM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan
19a6(rgyud): ma he dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la dbus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom
19a7(rgyud): ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu rigs ldan bsnams pa/ phu pu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa/ shar lho mtsham su raM las byung ba'i
19a8(rgyud): tri shU la ra gyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba g.yas kyi dang po ni tri shU la/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu mtha' yas kyi bu/ g.yas g.yon gyi 'og/ 
19b1(rgyud): man rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// lho nub mtsham su ShaM las byung ba'i dbyug thoShe gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i gshin rje'i gshed po bai DUr+ya'i mdog can g.yas
19b2(rgyud): kyi dang po na rdo rje'i dbyug tho/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu dga' bo bsnam so// g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma gnyis na mtho ba pur bu bsnams pa/ nub byang mtsham su Na las byung ba'i kha T+wAM ga Na'i mtshan pa
19b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i rta mgrin byi ru'i mdog cin/ g.yas kyi dang po na kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon gyi dang pon klu pad+ma chen po bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na lcags sgrogs bsnams
19b4(rgyud): pa'o// byang shar mtsham su hUM las byung ba'i be con hU~M gis ma tshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i bdud rtsil khyil pa in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can/ g.yas dang po na be con// ga
19b5(rgyud): gyi dang po na klu stobs kyi bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi tha ma gnyis bsnol nas bsdigs pa'o// shar lho'i gru chad la lha mo bdug pa ma mdog mthing ka spos por 'dzin pa dang ldan pa// 
19b6(rgyud): lho nub tu lha mo me tog ma mdog dkar mo me tog 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'o// nub byang du lha mo mar me dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa/ byang shar du lha mo dri cheb ma ljang ku dri chu bsnams pa'o// de dag ni gzhon nu lang tsho la/ 
19b7(rgyud): bab pa/ mdzes pa'i tshul can hUM las bskyed par bya'o// shar phyogasu lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar po lcags kyu bsnams pa ste/ lho phyogasu lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// nub phyogasu
19b8(rgyud): lha mo dmar mo lcags sgrogs 'dzin pa'o// byang phyogasu lha mo ljang ku dril bu 'dzin pa'o// de dag ni cung zhig khros pa'i tshul can gyi phaT las bskyed par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las yongs su
20a1(rgyud): gnas par bsgom par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par brjod pa'i gzungs 'di gsung so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA po daHswA Ta/ namaHsa man+ta badz+ran/ 
20a2(rgyud): trai kyo bi dza ya hU~M phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NA~M a kro d+hi ka ya mAM ta ka hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nA~M/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta ba dz+nyA nI/ tra tha a mog+na a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M phaT/ na maH
20a3(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ tra tha badz+ra/ a tsa la tse ta da he da ha hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha rat+na a tsa la pa tsa hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha pad+ma a tsa la tsa la ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha a mo
20a4(rgyud): g+ha karma a tsa la ha na han/ hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba gsungs te/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / lce dang klu dang / ma rungs bi dang / sdang ba rnams zhi bar byed cing sdin/ 
20a5(rgyud): ba dman pa'i las rnams 'dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rmi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du gzungs sngags
20a6(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a tsa la ka na/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ na tan ta/ ma ta Ta ma ta Ta/ mo Ta ta mo Ta ta/ sha ta sha ta/ Ta ta Ta ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mau ha sarba pA paM ka
20a7(rgyud): ha sa ha sa/ badz+ra ha sa a mo g+ha ku ru ha sa he sa/ marta marta/ gardza gardza/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a bi sha ya a bi sha ya/ ma hA man+ta ba la ka/ dun dun/ ti ni ti ni/ khang khang sarba big+h+nAM/ mA ra ya nA ra ya
20a8(rgyud): sarba duSh+TA rab+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba big+h+nAM/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA bi shwa/ sarba pA paM/ ma hU~M badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hrI ba li ta ra g+han ta ka/ hUM hUM ma ma ha ho/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ma hA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NA ya/ a mo g+ha
20b1(rgyud): haM a pra ti ha ta e hi/ a tsa le tse ta anan+ta ka nA/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThA/ tsa ru tsa ru/ tang tsita/ ta Ta ta ta/ bir+dz+dza g+hA ta ya/ mA ra ya/ khA dA ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa tsa me/ a nu ban+d+ha/ A R+tha kA ru ku ru/ a ha sa/ ang na/ tra
20b2(rgyud): ka ta ma Ta/ ma Ta maT/ ha haM/ a ti pa la i ti ma hA gu Na ba shi na/ nan+t+ra nan+tatA/ A bi sha ya a tsa la tsi ta/ sarba tra/ a nut+ta re/ ka tse/ ta ta Ta ta Ta/ Da mu Da ma/ hi ha/ mr-i moM/ phaT phaT hUM/ na maHsa man+ta ngar+m+ma
20b3(rgyud): dzAHtra a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM trA ma ya tri ma ya hUM tra Ta haM maM/ oM ba lin+te te dze ba li swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsauN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a tsa la tse ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM/ a sa man+ti ka tra te/ 
20b4(rgyud): ma hA ba la/ Shan+d+ha ra man+ta/ e aM/ ha haM/ shud+d+he trai lok+Sha tu sh+yo tu badz+re/ u pra ti ha te bi li b+h+yaHna ma~M dza la ya tra ta/ an+ta ha~M se na me hA swAh+NaHzhes gsungs ma thag tu 'dzam+bu gling na gnas pa'i lha dang / lha ma
20b5(rgyud): yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye la sogs pa thams cad sreg cings la 'gyel ba/ ra gyur to// de nas cho ga gsung so// lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i
20b6(rgyud): ral gri khru chang gsum pa byas te/ sngags kyi phreng ba ma haM zhes bya ba bkod la/ khru do dang ldan pa'i spos kyis maN+Dal byas te/ mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i dri bzhag ste/ gzungs sngags 'di khri phrag tu brjod cing / 
20b7(rgyud): bzlas na ral gri nam mkha' lo 'phags par 'gyur ro// de nas g.yul du zhugs na dpag bsam gyi shing yang dum bu dum bur gcod par 'gyur te/ g.yul las rgyal bar byed do// lcags sna lnga las byas
20b8(rgyud): nga'i lhung bzed byas te/ maM haM zhes bya ba'i yi ge bkod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / zangs las byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / me tog dang / 'khor lo dang / nya dang / 
21a1(rgyud): dung g.ya su 'khyil ba rnams dang / byi ru bcug pa'am/ yang na zangs la byi ru bcug la byas la gzungs sngags 'di gro ga 'am ras la bris te/ khong pa 'am mgul du btags nas gzung
21a2(rgyud): sngags bye ba bzlas na lhung bzed na mkha' la 'phags te/ gsol ba btab na 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste/ ljon pa'i shing bzhin no// na mkha'i tri ta'i lce dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang / gnyis cha
21a3(rgyud): mnyam pa dang / lcags sna gsum gyi phye ma la khA ta'i khrag gis ril bu bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags ha ma zhes bya bas pad+ma la bskor te/ gzungs
21a4(rgyud): sngags bye ba bzlas na pad+ma na mkha' la 'phags te/ de mi dbug sa dang bral ma thag tu snying gi khrag rlangs dang sbyar te/ mig ni sa da byed du bsam zhing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na
21a5(rgyud): thams cad mthong zhing thos la/ khar bcug na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+hA nAM/ sarba ta/ thA ga ta bya ba lo ki tai/ dza ya dza~M ya/ bAkye dam na wa ni tsuk+Shu ri bi sho d+ha
21a6(rgyud): ya swA hA/ rnga lpags la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas mnyes te/ lham byas la/ ha dang ma rang gi rkang 'thil la bris te/ gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lham na mkha' la 'phags te/ rkang pa la bya rgod kyi
21a7(rgyud): tshil bu thugs nas gon na gar 'dod par phyin no// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM bruM ma hA ye gr-i ta swA hA/ zhes bya bas na mkha' la 'gro ning 'phags te/ bya nod bzhin du'o// skye ba bdun pa'i sha dang / bya rgod kyi sha
21a8(rgyud): dang / grangs pa'i sha dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la 'dregu byas te/ gsungs sngags bye ba brjid de lus la drugs nas ram nye ba dge'u shing ba dang / bra ma ga ra'i mar dang sbyar ba'i 'dagu rnams nang rel srang / 
21b1(rgyud): re cha sbrang rtsi dang / ba ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btang ste/ zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na nam mkha' la thogs pa med do// rta nag po'i mig gnyis dkar po 'am/ byi ba nag po rna ba gnyis dkar po 'am/ pha bang dkar/ 
21b2(rgyud): po rnams mi mngal nas skra dkar po'i srog chags la rma bya'i chu 'khar phor du blugs pa la gzungs sngags bya ba bzlas te blung la/ de'i mig gnyis ma nor bar gton pa grib ma la bskams nas ma
21b3(rgyud): rul ba'i phye ma la sngags 'di btab ste/ g.yas g.yon ma nor bar byugs na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mon spos dang / gi bang dang / stag ma'i
21b4(rgyud): shun pa dang / nya khris dang / ru ta dang / phug ron gyi mig dang / lce dang / go ro tsan dang / rtug pa rnams la ril bu byas te/ dmas pa'i ga'u ra ril bu re re la gzungs sngags ha ma zhes bya ba
21b5(rgyud): brjod de/ ga'u na mkha' la 'phags nas/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ na maHya na ma hA ri bi ni nit+ti hrIHzhes lan bdun btab na/ sa byin na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bya rgod dang / bya gag dang
21b6(rgyud): khra dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / wa dang / de rnams kyi mche ba dang / sder mo dang / bram ze'i rus pa'i thal ba la gzungs sngags bzlas te// sgrub pa byas na dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / ser ba dag la gtor na
21b7(rgyud): sprin rnams 'thor zhing ser ba dang / 'brug dang thog la sogs bzhi par 'gyur ro// gcan zan thams cad dang / sha za thams cad dang / khyi dang / phag dang / rnga mo'i rtug pa dang / gu gul dang sbyar te/ dung pas
21b8(rgyud): bdugs na dom kun 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u bdun pa'o// // oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ gzungs sngags 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste/ lan
22a1(rgyud): cig brjod pas kyang 'dzam du'i gling gi lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa kun zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / ldang dub pa dang / 
22a2(rgyud): rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa las thar ro// 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / shu ba dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dag zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan cig brjod pas kyang / mtshams med pa
22a3(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// rig byed tshig gi dang po dang // gnyis pa'i dang por bcas pa ni// gsum pa dag ni lnga par ldan// bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa dag gi lnga pa'o// 
22a4(rgyud): uSh+ma'i rnams kyi bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa ning // o yis mtshan pa bri bya ste// uSh+ma rnams kyi gnyis pa ra drang // bzhi pa'i yi ge lnga pa dang // uSh+ma yi ge bzhi pa la/ 
22a5(rgyud): u yis rgyan cing thig ler bcas pa'o// sde tshan lnga pa dag gi ni// dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang // bzhi pa dang po bcas pa ni snying po'i yi ge bcu pa dag go// 'khor lo rtsibs
22a6(rgyud): bcub bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te/ khyi nag po'i thod pa'i nang du bcug la/ gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyungs kar gyis brabs par bya'o// de nas klu yod pa'i gan
22a7(rgyud): su khyo ba 'i gi lus la gra cis byugs te/ nu mig tu thod pa bcug la gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo hA tra mA ya/ nam shA ma por/ lbu Ta/ na ma b+ha ga te bud+ha bA rA sa/ 
22a8(rgyud): bA bu pun/ b+ha gyur/ mi la ma la/ hUM hUM \u0f7f phaT/ phyag tu ni ser mo rnams babyed ste/ mthe'u chung po// gal mthebs minan te pa rko bar bya'o// nam hrI tra yA ya nas shA ji
22b1(rgyud): ya grI ba na mi mi li tsi la d+hi/ ban+d+ha ya/ kro d+ha ya/ badz+ra la ma ya/ ma kan ya/ yo dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pradz+wa la/ sUT s+phuT/ sarba na ga ban d+ha ban+d+ha/ nAg ni sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra sarba dun+d+hA ts+tshi ya/ sho Sha N+Da/ 
22b2(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ phyag rgya ni lag pa'i zur gnyis gshibs te/ srin lag gnyis rgyab tu bsnol la 'dzub mo gnyis kyis mnan nas mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs sgreng la gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis gshi
22b3(rgyud): te spyi bor bzhag nas/ sngags lan bdun brjod de ldang bar bya'o// gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / dri chen dang / nya'i khris pa dang / sgo skya dang / shu dag rnams sbyar te lus la byugs
22b4(rgyud): nas rdzas kyis srung ba'o// rgya sol gyi me la bsregs te bdug sa na ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams zhi bar 'gyur zhing gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyu ro// zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar
22b5(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dang / kha ra dang / 'bras yos dang / dung dang / mtshal dang / rgya mtsho'i sbu ba la sogs pa dag/ 'khar gzhong du blugs te/ yungs kar la gzungs sngags
22b6(rgyud): 'di brjod cing / klu mchod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra kr-i d+hA hUM hUM tad+ya thA/ oM a nan+ta ka/ tak+Sha ka/ shaM kha pA la/ bA su ka ma hA pad+ma/ oM ga ta pa la wa ta/ karko Ta pu swA hA/ zhes brjod
22b7(rgyud): bas klu rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// char dbab par 'dod na dri zhim po'i chus maN+Dal byas te/ spra tshil la klu'i gzugs sor mo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa byas nas maN+Dal gyi steng du me tog gtor la
22b8(rgyud): gzungs thag btags te bzhag par bya'o// snying khar gong gi gro gal gi'u thang gis bris lo bzhugs par byas/ nyon mtshan du mchod cing bal po se ru yi lcug mas khyab par byas nas gzungs 'di/ 
23a1(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// oM su su pra ti badz+ra du ne mi li mi li ba ri sha ya/ ba ri sha ya swA hA/ zhes brjod de/ rang bsnyung bar gnas par bya'o// gal te klu rnams kyis char mi 'bebs na klurnam/ 
23a2(rgyud): kyi mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro// spos kyi maN+Dal byas te/ rgya spos kyi me la gzugs bsro zhing gzungs sngags brjod pa ni spogs pa'i cho ga'o// dri zhim po'i me la bu ram dang / 
23a3(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / til la sogs pa'i dgang blugs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ste/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NahUM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA zhes bya bas mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzung
23a4(rgyud): le'u brgyang pa'o// // de nas 'dam skyes pad+ma sna tshogs pa 'i 'dab ma can gyi steng du a las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor dri'i steng du muM gi sa bon las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma ma/ 
23a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal mgon po'i sku byis pa/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu/ gser btse ma 'am gur ga/ ma gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems
23a6(rgyud): dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs pa la phyag g.yas po na ral gri na mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pas po ti thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// sher gyi pad+ma'i mdab ma la/ 'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog kha ba la
23a7(rgyud): gur gum gyis gtor ba 'dra ba'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gi bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral grin mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa na ut+pa la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs
23a8(rgyud): kha na 'dzin pa'o// lho'i pad+ma la 'jam dpal gsung gi dbang phyug sku mdog mthing ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba sams dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri na mkha' la 'phyar ba
23b1(rgyud): g.yon pa na 'khor lo thugs kha na 'dzin pa'o// nub kyi pad+ma la 'jam dpal rnon po sku mdog byi ru bcag pa lta bu/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bya gnyis na/ 
23b2(rgyud): ud pa la gnyis bsnams pa'o// byang gi pad+ma'i mdab ma la 'jam dpal shes rab ral gri/ sku mdog ljang ku la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag
23b3(rgyud): g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri na mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon gyi dang po na ud pa la sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// g.yas kyi 'og ma na mnga' 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyi 'og ma na rin po che'i
23b4(rgyud): gzhu 'dzin pa'o// sku de dag ni ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i nam mkha' ma lus pa'i 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i sku'o// oM d+harma d+hA tu bA gi shwa ri mu zhes brjod pas shes rab ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa
23b5(rgyud): dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i bum bcu gang dang / gur gum dang / a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi/ la sogs pa dri zhim po'i chu blugs te/ na maHsa man+ta ta thA/ 
23b6(rgyud): ga te/ b+h+yaHar+tha b+h+yaHsamyak+Sha bud+d+he b+h+yaHtad+ya thA/ o ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ d+hA ra Ni/ bi shwa saM b+ha ba/ A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya/ hu lu hu lu/ bru bruM brA/ hU hUM/ dzi na dzi na/ many+dzu shra ye/ su shri ye/ ta ra ya ma
23b7(rgyud): haMHsarba duHkhe b+h+yoHphaT/ a mr-i tod b+ha be/ sa ma ya se ma ya/ ud b+ha be/ sarba pA paM me nA sha ya swA hA/ zhes gzungs sngags 'di bum pa'i chu la lan pa dun brjod de/ khrus byas na sdig
23b8(rgyud): pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur/ dbang po rno zhing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na mo many+dzu shri ye/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM many+dza
24a1(rgyud): la ma sa byu ma su sa pas / banas/  lak+ShamA Sh+mA/  sha/ sa ba shA/  / u )/ snru sa smra sa/ ngas sa
24a2(rgyud): niHna maHsa bo d+ha ni/ pra be sha ya/ l-i hu ta lo hu ta/ kr-i te kr-i te/ pra ban+d+ha pra ban+d+ha/ a be sha a be sha ya/ haM maM sarba big+h+na/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya bas nang pa la 'bras kyi snye ma 'am/ til btab ste khrus
24a3(rgyud): bya'o// gzungs bzlas pa'i khrus byas pas/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro// ka rari shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na yang zhi bar 'gyur ro// ral gri
24a4(rgyud): la btab g.yul du zhugs na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// / smyung ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya zhing 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// gro ga'am
24a5(rgyud): ras la bris te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa la btags par bya'o// / skud pa la gzungs sngags btab ste mdud pa byas la/ srid kyis gdungs pa la btags te/ 'phags pa la gsol
24a6(rgyud): ba gdab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ bu mo dag smyung bas 'dug ste/ yi dam du 'don na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / lce 'bab pa dang / 
24a7(rgyud): dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dag las grol bar 'gyur/ stag dang / dom dang / dred la sogs pa'i dud 'gro dag gi gnod pa dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sa g.yo ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
24a8(rgyud): yid gzhungs shing thos pa 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i sku thams cad thogs pa med pa'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
24b1(rgyud): bu dang bu mo dag gis 'di lan gcig gam/ lan gsum mam/ bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par byed na de'i lus la mdze dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan
24b2(rgyud): pa dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na pa dang / mig dang rna ba dang / son pa la sogs pa dag mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rnam par thar pa'i
24b3(rgyud): sgo kunas 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro dang / gling bzhi'i mi'i 'jig rten du 'od kyis khyab par
24b4(rgyud): mdzad do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsu ma dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i gnas man chad
24b5(rgyud): khyab par mdzad do// bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la/ mnyam par gzhag go// bsam gtan dang po nas/ langs te/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag/ 
24b6(rgyud): gnyis pa las langs te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs
24b7(rgyud): nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// rnam shes mtha'
24b8(rgyud): yas skye mched las langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas yod min med min skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// de las/ 
25a1(rgyud): langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / nam/ 
25a2(rgyud): mkha'i snying po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang phyag na rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga'o// lha dang / 
25a3(rgyud): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i
25a4(rgyud): gzungs las le'u dgu po'o// / 'phags pa mig yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong
25a5(rgyud): chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra kro d+ha ra dzA kalpa la g+hu tan+t+ra na/ ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa bsdus pa
25a6(rgyud): rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi na mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo
25a7(rgyud): snying por byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du rin po che sna bdun las grub pa lnga'i gzhal mang khang bye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor ba'i dbus su dpag chad 'bum phrag khyab pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma shin
25a8(rgyud): mthob/ kun kyang rin po tshe du ma'i khri pad+ma dang seng gis mtho ba dbu rtse rin po tshe du ma'i khri pad+ma dang sing ges mtho ba dbu rtse rin po tshe zur mangs kyi mchod rten pad+ma/ 'khor lo dang / gdugs mtho bar drangs pa la/ 
25b1(rgyud): dar gyi sbyangs lding ba/ de'i grib me sa gzhi la bkod pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams lha'i gzhon pa las babs nas nang du gshegs pa/ sna tshogs dril bu dang / ba dan dang rin po che'i me tog
25b2(rgyud): gi phreng ba dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / rnga yab dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / rdo rje phyed pa dang / chu 'phyang shar bu la sogs pa du mas mdzes pa/ sgo khyud khyams dang / sgo glegs dang / rin po che'i me log
25b3(rgyud): dang ta gdugs la sogs pa du mas khyab pa/ rin po che'i pha gu brtsegs te mdzes par byas pa du ma de thams cad dbus su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// de yang 'di lta ste/ byang
25b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i tshogs ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / dbyams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / zhi
25b5(rgyud): ba'i blo gros dang / sna tshogs bkram pa dang / mkha' 'dod me te ga 'chad pa dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / gzugs mdzes dag pa dang / sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang
25b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag bdun dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dag la dang / rta thul dang / 'od srung la sogs pa bye ba phrag bzhi dang / grags chen snyan pa chen po brgya byin dang / tshangs
25b7(rgyud): pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / lus ngan pa dang / gshin rje dang / dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i rigs sum brgya dang lhan cig tu chos kyi rnam grangs gsang sngags zhes bya ba la
25b8(rgyud): 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la dgongs pa tha dad kyi bsam pa dang 'thun pa'i bkod pa chen po
26a1(rgyud): bskyed pa dang / cho 'phrul du ma bsgyur ba dang / 'od zer du ma 'gyed cing thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum bzhin du 'khor la gzigs nas ldag
26a2(rgyud): kyi dbang po bkram te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsa la ga/ yi ge ming tshig dag gi sgoso// sngags dbyibs chos su byin rlams kyis// yi ge sgra tsam phyed
26a3(rgyud): dam gcig/ mngon sum rjes 'jug ring thung dang // dbyangs dang gsal byeng mtshan mas mtshan// sa bcu pha rol phyin bcu bdag/ dbang bcu don bcu rnam pa bcu// mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dres tshos// 
26a4(rgyud): byams dang thugs rje chen po dag/ dbyangs gcig gis ni sdug sra su gyis// sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab zhi dang // yid 'phrog/ drapal 'byor dbang phyug dang // mthu stobs du ma bskyed pa dang / 
26a5(rgyud): rtag gnas thob dang don nges thob// rdo rje bla na med sems pa/ skyed// mdor ni gang gis gang 'dod pa// bsam pas sem sa rnams rdzogs pa'i phyir// rdo rje bla na med pa gsor// chos su
26a6(rgyud): bla na med pa sgrogs// 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor// ral gri bla na med pa bzung // pad+ma bla na med pa chongs// rin chen bla med gsal bar gyis// dkyil 'khor tshul du spros nas kyang // mchod rten tshul/ 
26a7(rgyud): du bsdu bar bgyis// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci// srin po sha za brjed byed tshogs// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs gyur pa'i// rnam 'phrul du ma 'di bsgyur cig/ 
26a8(rgyud): gsung mchog de skad thos ma thag/ lag na rdo rje mthu bo ches// dga' mgu thal mi rab sbyar te// snyan pa'i tshig gis 'di gsol to// gser dang rin chen lnga po las// rab mchog ri bor gyur pa
26b1(rgyud): 'gro rnams kun gyi rten gnas dang // rtag su yang dag 'dzin pa ltar// rnam par shes dang phung po pa ni// 'byung ba rnam par dag bsgrubs pas/ lha dang phyag rgya phrin la su// sngags shes rnams kyis/ 
26b2(rgyud): bzung byas nas// btul ba'i ye shes byang chub rim// khyad par de la ldan par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa che// kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches// sku las sna tshogs mdangs 'od can// 
26b3(rgyud): 'od zer du ma byung nas kyang // gzhi dang snying po me tog gis// rgyan pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas tshe// sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// 'jig rten skyong dang bdun gyi tshogs// ma lus pa rnams rgyal bar
26b4(rgyud): 'gyur// nyan thos rang rgyal 'dar bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// tshogs rnams shin tu skrag par gyur// dri tshe phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdze
26b5(rgyud): pubu nas// khro bo chen po'i tshogs byung ba// 'od zer rtse mos dra/ ngas na su// zhing dbus dkyil 'khor 'di ru lhags// 'od zer tshogs kyang rab 'dus nas// dpal be'u nyid du thim
26b6(rgyud): par gyur// de tshe 'od de'i byin rlabs las// mkha' la sgra 'di grags par gyur// shAkya'i mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang du gzi brjid che bzhugs slad// chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi// rgyal
26b7(rgyud): ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs// dri ma med pa'i dam chos mchog/ gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba// thos nas byang chub 'dus ma byas// 'jig rten mgon po brnyes par gyur// de nas lag na
