26b8(rgyud): rdo rje tshogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang // snyim pa me tog bkang byas te// gtor nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas// dang zhing gus pa'i tshul gyis su// dbus btsugs thal sbyar gsol
27a1(rgyud): ba 'debs// mi gnas ye shes che ba'i mchog/ yon tan rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gtso// mtshan nyid thams cad rab rgyan pa// mtshan min spangs pa'i thub pa che// dri med dge ba ji ltar lags// gsang
27a2(rgyud): sngags tshul du spyod pa ci// 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub gang // 'jig rten mgon po ji ltar 'gyur// bdag cag rnams la sman rab dang // 'gro la thugs rje che mdzad phyir// mgon po bcom ldan thub pa che// 5
27a3(rgyud): dang yang du bshing du gsol// de nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bos bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin// shes rab chen po'i spyan ldan pas// bdag gzhan pan don la
27a4(rgyud): brtson phyir// legs par nyon la yid la zung // yang dag yang dag mtha' min tshul// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// srog gtso dam byin len brdzun 'khrig/ tshig rtsub dbyen dang ngag kyal smra// 
27a5(rgyud): brnab sems gnod sems log lta chang // dri ro ngan pa'i zas skom/ dang // srog can sha khrag log 'tshor bcas// slob dpond de/ 'dun mchod rten sogs// khyad par yul can yo byad dang // dman
27a6(rgyud): zhing nyams thag phrog dgu pa// glegs bam 'tshong dang chos kyi zong // g.yangs ral gri so dgu sogs// me 'obs ltar mthong spangs nas kyang // rnam par dkar la sogs par bya// yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin rtsol dang // 
27a7(rgyud): nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang // mchod pa dang ni kha ton dang // de dag sems dang sgom pa ste// dkar bcu lam la yun rings dang // nub bcus rgyun mi 'chad du 'bad// gtan pa med pa'i byang chub sems// shes
27a8(rgyud): / ltar dri ma med pa'o// mchog 'di spyad pas sdug bsngal tshogs// myur du gcod pas dge ba'o// chos bdag med dang mnyam nyid dang // rang sems gdong nas dag pa gang // sgyu 'dra 'du byed med pa dang // 
27b1(rgyud): zag bcas de dang bral ba las// byang chub phyogs mos ma lus pa// chos nyid bdag med stong pa ni// chos dbyings ye shes mngon byas nas// ma 'dres chos rnams rdzogs gsal ba// 'dus ma byas
27b2(rgyud): byang chub ste// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi lus so// 'dod pa'i khams sogs yon tan la// shin tu bde rol spyad pa spyod// sangs rgyas mu stegs can rnams kyi// lkog tu gyur pa gsang ba ste// bskal pa
27b3(rgyud): bsam yas dpag med du// brlabs dka' yangs zab rgya chen rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin du// lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa// dbyer med tshul du skyob pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis
27b4(rgyud): sngagasu brjod// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku// yon tan mtha' ngag rdzogs pa ni// bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgon// la la 'khor los bsgyur
27b5(rgyud): ba'i gzugs// la lar dge sbyong chen po'i gzugs// la lar sri na po srin mo'i gzugs// la lar gro ba bzang po'i gzugs/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // seng ge ltar gzigs mdzad
27b6(rgyud): la sogs// sna tshogs du ma mdzad pa ni// rkang gnyis lha min rnams gnyis sogs// 'gro ba'i mgon por gyur pa'o// rtag dang 'dra dang nges med pa'i// gtso bo bsam pas gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten phal pa'i
27b7(rgyud): mgon po ste// gzugs byang kha dog tha dad pa// yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gis// grangs ma byung ba mchod 'os so// thub pas gsungs pa'i de ma thag/ rdo rje can gyis bzhengs nas kyang // phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas
27b8(rgyud): nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsol// 'dren pa gtso bos bcom ldan 'das// sngags zhes pa ni gang gang yin// phyag rgya zhes ni ci lta bu// ting 'dzin zhes ni ji ltar bshad// lus ngag yid la ji ltar
28a1(rgyud): // gnas te dbyer med tshul du ji ltar skyobs// bdag la phan pa'i don phyir dang // gzhan la brtse phyir bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal ba gtso mchog ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas te/ 
28a2(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po'i gsung snyan gyis// rnam rtogs zad phyir 'di gsung so// snying po nya snying rtsa ba'i sngags// las kyi sngagasu gyur pa ste// snying po brjod par sa bon no// nye snying ye shes mchog dang ni// gsang bI
28a3(rgyud): snying po zhes grag so// las kyi sngags ni gnyis yin te// bdag nyid brtan byed las sngags dang // sbyor tshogs grub par byed pa'o// phyag rgya lag pa'i 'du byed dang // rkang pa stabs kyi 'gyur ba'o// rtag
28a4(rgyud): su mtshon dang 'debs pa dang // 'gyur ba med par byed pas na // phyag rgya zhesu bshad pa'o// rang gi rtse gcig sems bsdu/ ngas na// sems la lhag pa'i chos 'bebs pa// de na ting nge 'dzin
28a5(rgyud): zhes bya// da ltar de dag la brten nas// snga ma'i gnas de yod sa gyur nas// sgo nga bral ba'i 'dab bzang ltar// lus la// dri mkha' la cher song nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad
28a6(rgyud): durgyal ba dam chos mnyan nas kyang // rgyal sras kun la bshad pa dang // skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes pas kyang // shes bya mo lus phyogs khyab pa// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o// sems
28a7(rgyud): dang yid ni 'dres pa'i tshe// ye shes bde bar shar ba ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dbyer med tshul du skyob ces gsungs// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i
28a8(rgyud): rgyud las lhag par gnas pa'i don yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // zhibs btul dka' bgegs chen dang // log 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sems kyi bye brag thugs chungan
28b1(rgyud): de dang gzugs 'dral gzhom pa'i phyir// rtog med na mkha'i lam gnas te// rdzogs sangs gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sku// rab 'phags khro bo stobs chen dpal// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras kyi
28b2(rgyud): sras ta mi g.yo'i mtshan grags de la 'dir// rgyal dang rgyal sras rtag phyag 'tshal// tshangs sogs lha dang lus can kun// de la rtag tu mchod par byed// rgyal bas byas bzo rgyal sras kyi// smon
28b3(rgyud): rdzogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// ye shes rdzogs nas mi g.yo'i sa// thob pas mi g.yo ba zhes bya// pas kyi rgol 'joms dpa' bo ste// tshar gtsad pa ni khro bo yin// sngags kyi bden tshig mi slu
28b4(rgyud): bas ta nyan thos bdud tshogs kyis mi g.yo// rtog med bdud rtsi khro bas rgyal// rdzu 'phrul bskyod med mi g.yo ba// de bzhi na nyid kyi snying po mchog/ stong nyid las byung rgyal ba'i sku// chos
28b5(rgyud): dbyings bdag nyid la bzhugs nas// sprul 'dis srid pa'ikhams sbyong mdzad// mkha' ltor dri med spros bral bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung // spros med na mkha'i
28b6(rgyud): rang bzhin la// tha dad tsam du gsang sngags zhes// brjod kyang ngag gi spyod yul 'das// skyob pas tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs// sems med rang bzhin stong pa nyid// sgyu 'drar yid kyis sgom pa yin// 
28b7(rgyud): dngos med mnyam mdzes 'dod don rnams// gsang sngags mgon 'das brjod pas stsol// mu stegs bdag dang srog gang zag/ gtso bo skyes bu khyab gnas pra// 'khor ba rtag rtog nga rgyal rmongs// log
28b8(rgyud): pa'i zhags bcings sdug bsngal skyed// bdag med srog med sems can med// byed po med cing gtso bo med// khyab gnas med cing dngos po med// rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med// log rtog srid 'chin
29a1(rgyud): zhags bcad phyir// dngos med sna tshogs gzugs bsgoms pas// dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang thob// phyi nang khyad par goms pa'o// dbu ba chu bur sgyu 'drar sgrom// stong nyid las
29a2(rgyud): ldang ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog sdig bcings las grol nas// 'chi med ye shes go 'phang thob// phung po khams dang skye mched med// kun gzhi med de gang zag med// gzung 'dzin med de bcings
29a3(rgyud): med par// rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshad// kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i// stong nyid byang sems sgyu 'dra bar// bag yod pas ni rtag bsgoms na// byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char// yid bzhin
29a4(rgyud): nor 'dra rdzu 'phrul che// mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i sku// sdug sa spyod byang chub sems dpa' yi// byang chub sems kyi sgo dam pa thob// ngo mtshar gsungs te thos ma thag/ khro bo rnams
29a5(rgyud): kyis gtse la bstod// rtag tu dag cing dri med pa// rnam rtag rgyun 'gogs kun rtog med// rtag rtog med la zhugs pa yis// dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos kun g.yo ba med
29a6(rgyud): pa khyod// spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas// kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa rtog/ rang bzhin spros bral khyod phyag 'tshal// sems can sna tshogs phan don du// mdzad spyod sna tshogs gsungs pa'o// 
29a7(rgyud): dag pa'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung // rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// mun pa phra rab rdul spangs pa'i// sprin bral na mkha' dag pa ltar// mgon po khyod skra shel sgo ltar// kun rtog
29a8(rgyud): spangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// spros med na mkha' lta bu la// dngos po thams cad dang bral bas// dung khams skye mched shin tu dag/ ye shes rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod// mkha' la 'ja' sha
29b1(rgyud): sna tshogs ltar// gso myong dag pa'i sems can gzigs// ngan 'gro kun sgrol dpa' chen 'khrungs// go cha chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos nyid las byung snying po ni// yi ge gcig pa gzi brjid che// sems/ 
29b2(rgyud): can sdug bsngal sa gzhi la// mun 'khrigs sel la phyag 'tshal bstod// sngags mchog gtso bo'i gsang ba 'dis// rgyal sras chos 'phel shes rab bskyed// bla med go 'phang myur 'gro gsungs// 
29b3(rgyud): gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos kun gyur dang bcas pa yi// las dang skye las rnam par grol// rgyal ba rgyu med bdag nyid 'khrungs// gtso mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos med ye
29b4(rgyud): me lce yis// 'dus byas ri bo kun bsregs nas// chos da dngas rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal// bla med sku la phyag 'tshal ba stod// bstod pa'i don de thugs chud nas// 'gro la phan phyir
29b5(rgyud): cho ga gsungs// gsang sngags log par spyod pa dang // se log par goms pa las// 'dod pas non pa'i sems rto/ gis// sngags pa yi dgas gnas su ste// dang pos mar ma
29b6(rgyud): me tog dang // zhal zas gtor ma phreng ba sogs// mchod pa'i rdzas dang yo byad dang // mi yi lus dang kha zas la// 'tshe zhing sgrub pa'i bar du gcod // mi sdug nang skyeng lo tog 'tsho// gnyis pa gnod
29b7(rgyud): sprin 'dra gyur nas// sha khrag chang la snom zhing rgyug/ thos bsam sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing // nad skye tshe len log lta skyed// rigs sngags 'chang gi gdon gzhom phyir// sgrub pos 'bar de sngags
29b8(rgyud): brjod bya// sngags mthu bskyed pa gtor mi dang // sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bcas dang // mnan pa'i las kyis nags mi ltar// thogs pa med par 'joms par 'gyur // de dag rten byed rje yin
30a1(rgyud): / teHdegasal byed pa ras ris yin// de kun rnam dag gsal byed pa// byang chub sems mchog zhi ba ni// log rtog 'khor ba'i zo chun la// ral gri rnon po'i ste re ltar// 'phags/ 
30a2(rgyud): pa khro bo'i rgya le po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ 'byung bar rab tu bshad par bya// na maHsarbAs
30a3(rgyud): pa ri b+hu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba rbata thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA hU~M/ snying po dam pa'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaNas+phoT+Ta ya hU/ Ta taha maM/ snying po'o// na maHsarbAs
30a4(rgyud): pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA hr-i ta a mo g+ha/ da tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra sa ma ya hUM/ Ta Ta haM maM nyi depe'i snying po'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba tathA
30a5(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaHsarbA thA a tsa lA rka na/ naT+TA nan+tu/ mon+na moT+Ta/ san+nasaT+Ta/ ten+na taT+Ta/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha A be sha aHmaT/ ma la ka/ d+ha Na d+ha Na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ bi g+hAn/ mA ra mA ra
30a6(rgyud): duSh+TA na rak+Sha rak+Sha sa traM/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi dza ya badz+ra phaT/ hUM hAM hAM/ tri bi la ta ra ga/ nan+ta ka/ haM haM haM/ a tsa la/ te tse phaT phaT/ a hUM/ a sa man+ta ka/ Ta Ta/ ma hA ba
30a7(rgyud): la sa ta a ma na ye/ tA maM haM/ shud+d+ha tu lo ka/ tu Sh+yen tu lo ka/ badz+ri na maHsaM pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yo/ dza la ma tra ta/ a sa ta/ na maHswA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// de nas phyag rgya stangs
30a8(rgyud): stabs kyis brjod pa 'dir gsungs so// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM ha na ha na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ dz+nyA na/ kha T+wAM ga hU~M phaT/ ral gri'i phyag rgya'i sngagaso// 
30b1(rgyud): na maHsarbA swa pa ri pU ke b+h+yaHsarba rba thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ khAng khAd/ pA shAn/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ma hA Ar+ya te/ d+harma he swA hA/ zhags pa'o// na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba taH/ 
30b2(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM kA rak+Sha/ ha na ha na/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ mA ra ya duSh+Ta bi na ya keH/ hA dze go cha'i'o// na maHsarbA sA be ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarbe ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM d+hA re d+ha ra badz+re na l-i/ kha T+wAM ga
30b3(rgyud): pA sha d+ha ra swA hA/ gtsug tor gyi'o// na maHsarbA sI pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM b+hany+dza ban+na da ha pa tsi b+hAsmiM ku ru ku ru ha na ha na badz+ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT/ tho ba'i'o// na meH
30b4(rgyud): sarbA sA pa ri pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oSh+Tangan ta murti/ da he da ha/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi dza ya bidzAyaM/ bi dza ya kIn+ti swA hA/ mgo bo'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsar+b+ba
30b5(rgyud): sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM b+hu d+ha re/ d+ha ra/ a tsin d+ya ba la bi kra ma NaM/ bu ra bu sa la ya/ rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba swAhA/ rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarbA sA pa
30b6(rgyud): ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM badz+ra hri da ya/ badz+ra ma taM gi swA hA/ snying kha'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM hUM da ha da ha/ kiny+tsi rA ya/ 
30b7(rgyud): sita A na ya shI g+h+raM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ duSh+Tan/ dam da ma swA hA/ phyogs bcing ba'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra kaM b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM dun du na ma hA pA sha kha T+wAM ga
30b8(rgyud): d+ha raHpa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHbka' rtags kyi'o// na maHsarba sA pa ri pA re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ga ga na gan d+hod b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya/ pa ri pA ra kaM swA hA/ dri'i phyag rgya'o/ 
31a1(rgyud): namaHsarbAsA pa pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba d+ha thAg te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ a ba shud+d+ha dAn dwadris b+ha be ga ga nA nAn hAHswAhA/ ma mo phyag d+hA'o// na maHsa rnas pa ri d+hA ra ke b+h+yas na
31a2(rgyud): tathAthA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM shud+d+ha d+harma te/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yoHswe hA/ gtor ma'i phyage rgya'o// ni maHsarbA sa~M pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsarba thA/ 
31a3(rgyud): oM shud+d+ha ma hA dz+nyA na swa b+hA be/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA na yai swAhA// bdug pa'i'o// na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ra~M pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM gai gI ni bi krIn ta gA mi ni mahA shud+d+hA na ye stohA/ 
31a4(rgyud): me tog gi'o// na maHsarba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba tathAngag te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ha ni han/ ba ra ma bi shud+d+he/  d+harmen ya pa ri pU ra ki b+h+yaHswA hA/ zhal zos kyi'o// namaH
31a5(rgyud): sarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ o a pra ti hi ho na d+ya tad ma dam/ sarba thA/ sa pa ri pU ra/ b+h+yaHswA hA/ dpa' bo spyan drang ba'i'o// na maHsarbA sA
31a6(rgyud): pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi shud+d+ha bi shud+d+ha/ sakra swa b+hA be A na ya/ ma hA na ye swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarba sA pa ri pU re/ 
31a7(rgyud): b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi shud+d+ha swAhA/ han hAn/ dam dam/ mahA ne ye swA hA/ nyan thos spyan drang ba'o'o// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba / 
31a8(rgyud): oM dzA kar+tha ye/  g+h+ra/ dbyed / bcoMb tsaM/ ma hA pa ri n+da ra swA hA/ lo nya ma mo spyan dri ba'o// namaH sarbAs pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarbe ta thA ga ti b+h+ya sarba thA/ e ma tha maM tha A nas/ 
31b1(rgyud): A na ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba de baM/ ta ma tam/ ma hAn ya/ pa ri wa re swAhA/ 'jig rten pa rnams spyan drang ba'i'o// na maHsarbA swA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH
31b2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM sa t+ya sat+ya/ ma hA sa dA ya/ dam da ma/ ma hA da ma/ A kaR+Sha yA/ A keR+Sha ya/ a d+ya ba ma hA na ya shud+d+he swA hA/ drang srong spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarbA sA pa/ 
31b3(rgyud): ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM dzi ya dze ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ye/ ma hA sat+ya ba de ni/ sarba hi ti swA hA/ srin mo rnams sbyin drang ba'o// no maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH
31b4(rgyud): sarba te thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM hr-i hA dA/ ma thA ma thA/ dad ma ngam/ ha na ha na/ ma hA na ye/ ma ra ma ra/ da swA hA/ ma mo rnams spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarbA swa pa/ 
31b5(rgyud): ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ha na badz+dza hUM phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta gra haM/ ma tha ma tha/ b+hany+dza b+hAny+dza/ sarba big+h+nA na dam dam/ sarba duSh+TAn oM hUM phaT swAhUM/ 
31b6(rgyud): rkang stabs tsham ngam gyi sngags so// na maHsarba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA gau ti b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM AHhU~M/ A kA shA ga ga na s+pha ra Na khaM swA hA/ 'o thugs khur ba 'bru sno tsheg
31b7(rgyud): spos dang me tog la sogs pa// ci 'byor 'byor pa'i gtor ma ni// sngags des spro zhing spel bar bya// na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ki b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM swa b+hA ba sarba thA
31b8(rgyud): b+h+yo bi swA hA/ na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM lab+h+yAM sarba ga ga na lab+d+ha ya swA hA/ na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM sarba sa~Mr+b+ba
32a1(rgyud): dA d+ha mi haM swA hA/ byin rlabs bzhin du bsgyur ba dang // kun gyis thim par bya ba dang // 'dod pa'i las rnams gang dang gang // grub par bya ba'i sngags yin no// gza' chen brgya
32a2(rgyud): dang rgyu skar yang // nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams kyi sngags// ni maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ A did+yaHsoHaM gi raHbud+d+haHbr-i ha swa ti/ shukraHsha ne shwa raHrA
32a3(rgyud): ke tuHkr-it+ti kA/ ro tsir+t+ti/ mrig shi rA/ ar+tha pu narba su/ pu Sh+ya a sh+leShAM/ ma g+hA purba bal+lu nI ut+ta ra palgu nI/ hastA/ tsi tra sAstI/ bi shA khA a nu rA d+hA dz+reSh+Ta mu lA/ pur+thaSh+TAn+tha/ ut+ma
32a4(rgyud): rASh+Tan+na shra ba Na a b+hi dzita/ sha ta b+h+r-iShA d+ha niSh+Ta/ pUrbab+hUHpra dA ut+ta ra b+ha dra/ pra dA baM bi tAM/ a shri nI/ b+hA ra Ni/ aM dang sAhA re bcas pa ni// rang rang snying po'i sdigs
32a5(rgyud): yin te// gang 'dod las kyang sbyar bar bya// ma chod pa'i rig sa kyang tha dad bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAklit+ta badz+ra/ NAM/ au a tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya tra ka kha ha maM/ 
32a6(rgyud): namaHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+Shit+ta badz+re NAM/ oM badz+ra ka pa tsa duba~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yaHbi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM rak+Sha/ ma hA ba li/ sarba ta thA ga te pu d+h+ya miH
32a7(rgyud): tete/ hU~M d+hA tra thA/ a pra ti ha te swA hA// khro bo spyan gcig drag shul can// srung dang bcas par mchod pa dang // sngags bzlas dngos grub blangs pas 'grub// ci 'dod las la tsho
32a8(rgyud): gas sbyor// lag g.yas gung mdzub bzhibs te brkyang // srin lag mthe'u chung mtheb mos mnan// shugs drangs tshul phyung mkha' la 'phyar// ral gri phyag rgyas bdud tshogs
32b1(rgyud): 'joms// g.yon pa khu tshur bsdigs mdzub sgreng // slar sbyar byed bzhags pa'i rgya// gung mo mthe'u chung so sor sprad // mdzub mo mong med nang du dgug/ mthe bong gzhibs pa gung 'gram sbyar// snying la/ 
32b2(rgyud): bkod de go cha'i rgyan// ser 'khyud khu tshur nang du bsdam// mthob gnyis cung bsgyur mgo thong rgya// g.yon pa'i khu tshur nang bcug nas// mthe bong g.yas sgreng tho ba'i rgya// phyogs bcur brdung ba
32b3(rgyud): ltar bya'o// g.yas pa khu tshur gung mo sbrang // spyi gtsug phyag rgya gtsug tu bzhag/ g.yon pa khu tshur gung mdzub sgreng // bka' rtags phyag rgya rtag tu 'phyar// khu tshur gnyis bzhi bas lto sbyar ba// 
32b4(rgyud): rdob lta bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa khu tshur snying khar bzhag/ snying kha rgyan pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis sor mo so sor brkyang // phyogs bcu bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o// lago sbyar
32b5(rgyud): gung gnyis nang bcug pa// dri yi phyag rgyar bshad pa'o// khu tshur rgyab sbrang gung mthe bong // mthe bong gung mdzub/ sprad dang 'khyud// gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo
32b6(rgyud): khang stong shugs ltar gdon// bdug spos 'bul ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis so sor gung srin bkug/ mtheb mnan bzhag brkyang me tog rgya// thal sbyar gung srin mdzub mo bkug/ mthe'u
32b7(rgyud): chung mtheb brkyang zhal zas rgya// skyil krung 'dug ste snyim pa zed// mthe bong gnyis ni nang du bkug/ so gzhibs nas g.yab byed pa ni// dpa' bo gtso bo spyan drang rgya// thal sbyar mdzub bkug ma/ 
32b8(rgyud): bos mnan// byang chub sems tshogs 'gugs pa'i rgya// snyim bkyed mthe chung gshibs te brkyang // lhag ma brgyad po so sor dgug/ nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can// ma lus thams cad
33a1(rgyud): 'gugs pa'i rgyu// khu tshur g.yas pa g.yon steng bzhag/ mdzub gnyis brkyang ste so sor dgugs// cung zad skyod par byed pa ni// pho nya pho mo 'gugs pa'i rgya// khu tshur rgyab
33a2(rgyud): sprang gung mdzub ni// so sor drang por gshibs te brkyang // mthab gnyis cung zad sprad de dgugs// 'jig rten pa rnams 'gugs pa'i rgya// g.yon min g.yas pas de ltar bya// brtul
33a3(rgyud): zhugs drang srong dgug pa'i rgya// g.yon pa khu tshur gung mo sbrang // dngos grub srin mo 'gugs pa'i rgya// lag g.yas bkan te brkyang nas kyang // mthe bos mdzub mnan gsum po g.yab// 
33a4(rgyud): ma bdun la sogs ma mo rnams// las kyi dus su 'gugs par gyur// res kyis bteb cing drang po yis// pus mo dA gra la rkang 'thil sbyar// spyi bor me tog thal sbyar yang / 
33a5(rgyud): phyogs der g.yob cing 'bru tshugs blta// zlum pa'i stob sa kyis 'di kun gyis// bgegs tshogs 'joms shing rnal 'byor srung // lag pa g.yas ni gyen du brkyang / 
33a6(rgyud): g.yon pa snying khar bsdigs mdzub ste// rkang gnyis sprad nas rting pardebs// hUM brjod drag skad bdun du lta// sa gsum g.yo byed zla gam stabs// rkang g.yon brkyang ba'i stabs dang
33a7(rgyud): niHha ha brjod cing zhabs rgya bcings// phan tshun bsnol nas bgegs la bsnun// 'khor lo phyag rgya phye mar bya// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni// rdo rje thal mo mkha' la bsnun
33a8(rgyud): khro gnyer mig can ma mchu mnan/ yan lag gnyis gnyis me ltar sprad// rkang pa mnyam stabs hUM sgra can// log gnyis bsdigs mdzub phyag rgya'o// rkang gnyis mnyam du gzhag pa la sa// 
33b1(rgyud): g.yas kyis g.yon bskor lte ba yin// mdun du g.yas te rgyab tu g.yon// rgya chom gsum gsum mnan pa ni// rtse gsum yin te rtse gsum rgya// lag pa steng brkyang dbyigs sgreng ltar// bges/ 
33b2(rgyud): la bsnun zhing 'bru tshugs bltar// g.yas su tho ba hUM brjod brdeg/ g.yon pa snying kha'i bsdigs mdzub ste// gnyis ka bkrang ba 'khor lo bya// nub bltas rkang pa mnyam gzhag nas// mdun
33b3(rgyud): g.yas rgyab dang g.yon phyogasu// g.yon pas bgegs gsum mnan bya zhing // rim pas me dang ral gri dang // bsdigs mdzub zhags pas phyogs bzhir bcing // ha hUM drag brjod brjid gnod rgya// 
33b4(rgyud): rkang gnyis pus 'bur lag pa gnyis// gru mo bsgyur na thig gis mnan// bgegs bskrang phyir ni 'bru tshugs blta// rtse gcig rdo rje stabs su bcad // rkang pa g.yas g.yon res
33b5(rgyud): kyis bskor// lho byang g.yon te shar nub g.yas// brkyang zhing / drag tu brdab par bya// rgyab nas drang dang tho ba dang // rdo rje dang / ni zhags pa'i rgya// phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs// 
33b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dang ni stangs stabs kyis// phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na// 'byung po'i tshogs 'joms smos ci dgos// thams cad dbang du sdung bar byed// de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yis// rkang stabs khyab
33b7(rgyud): bar bshad par bya// shar du rkang pa mnyam pa yis// rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg/ lhor ni rkang ting sprad de gdang // hUM sgrogs thal mo mdun rgyab sbyar// nub tu rkang sprad lag pa gnyis// so sor bsdigs
33b8(rgyud): mdzub gyen du brkyang // byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang // rkang pa ya gtsig sa la sgreng // khu tshur mdzub sbyar dpral bar bzlog/ rkang gnyis mnyam byas ras kyis phyar// mche gtsigs hUM sgrogs khro gnyer
34a1(rgyud): lta byang shar thig ler grags pa'i rgya// khu tshur mthe'u chung mche ba'i rgya// rkang pa res bteg shar lhor phye// lho nub rkang gnyis res kyi brdab// zhags pas 'debs dang ral gris gcod// nug
34a2(rgyud): byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang // lag gnyis mtheb sprad 'khor lo bskor// yang na tshe gcig phyag rgyas gdab// stang stabs thams cad ha hUM sgrogs// de nas rig sngags bzlog pa yis// phyag rgya cho ga ba
34a3(rgyud): par bya// khu tshur gung mo brkyang rtse sprad// mdzub gnyis nga yi 'gram du bcang // sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad kyis// lha klu srin po gnod sbyin dang // mkha' 'gro 'byung po mi ma yin// gsod dang skrod de me ltar/ 
34a4(rgyud): mdzad// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtogs pa bsdus pa'i rgyu dang las/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / bla na med pa'i ras ris sku// cho ga de nas bshad par bya
34a5(rgyud): bris sku 'dod pas thams cad du// dge ba'i ras bzang btsang nas kyang // bkrus te sngags kyi srung byas la// ngur smig du ni bsgyur bar bya// rgyud bzang ngal zhing dul bag yod// chos thos
34a6(rgyud): ri mo mkha' la sbyin// sred chung yid gzhungs khro med pas// sen rtsi shun kan tshal sbyar// spangs dang mu zi kan tar ljang // ba p+la kra ni bla na ser// li khri sgo nga 'tshal lpags dmar// ram dang 'thing shun
34a7(rgyud): bru nir sngo// smyig dang a dza nag po ste// shaM tA dag kyang dkar por 'gyur// sa snod so btang skags snyig byug/ pir 'jam rab 'bring tha ma bri// rgyal dang sa rinam gru dang // snron snrubs smin drug lha 'tshams
34a8(rgyud): shis / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// thub pa'i dge ba ras ris la// dbus su byang chub shing mchog drung // gser mdog 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i chas// chos 'chang phyag rtsi ngur smrig bsnams/ 
34b1(rgyud): logs su 'dab bzang rgyal po gnyis// snyim pa me tog bkang ba'i gzugs// g.yas su 'jig rten dbang po bkar// ngur smrig gon pas thal mo sbyar// de yi zhabs su mi g.yo ba// spyan gsum khros
34b2(rgyud): paklu yis rgyan// na ra'i snod g.yogs stag smad dkris// rin chen rgyan can do kar can// rdo ba dmar po'i khri stengs na// ral gri dang ni zhags pa dang // g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs// gtso bo'i gan
34b3(rgyud): gyi phyogs cha la// rdo rje 'dzin sngo ngur smrig can// rdo rje dang ni zhags pa 'chang // de yi 'og tu sgrub po ni// dbus btsugs spos kyi khang bu 'dzin// gtso bo zhabasu khro bo che// nag po khams gsum bstan
34b4(rgyud): pa yita lag gnyis rin chen khri la bteg/ gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste// 'jig rten dbang dang khro bo yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang sgrub ba'i sngo// yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig klu yi bu mo mdzes ma/ 
34b5(rgyud): gnyis// bang gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang gi phyir// de nas bris sku yang dag bshad// dbus su shAkya thub pa dang // g.yas su 'phags pa 'jam dpal
34b6(rgyud): te/ g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o// bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni// shin tu blta dka' gsus po che// zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yis rgyun// kha nas khrag 'dzag lce 'dril ba// mche gtsigs hrIHsgra
34b7(rgyud): cher sgrogs pa// spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'od// ngur smrig bsnams pa char sprin mdog/ sku la thod rlon phreng ba can// dbu la thod pa tshar bzhis rgyan// g.yon du rin chen zur phud 'phyang // 
34b8(rgyud): bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar ba yis// phyogs kyi bgegs tshogs sreg par mdzad// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// gnyis pas ral gri 'od 'bar 'chang // g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags// gnyis pa
35a1(rgyud): bsdigs mdzub brkyang ste mdzad// rin chen rdo yi khri stengs su// bgegs kyi rgyal po mnan nas kyang // g.yon brkyang ba yi gar gyis gnas// de yi mdun du zhi ba'i byang / 
35a2(rgyud): spos khang bzung ba'i sgrub po bri// ci 'byor rgyun du mchod par bya// mngon spyod sgrub pa'i ras ris ni// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// dur khrod ras la mi g.yo ba// mdog nag spyan gsum zur smig lta// ngur
35a3(rgyud): smig gos gon khro gnyer ldan// ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'chang // bris nas bdag gi khrag gi ni// spyan phye gsol ba btab par bya// ri mo 'dis ni rigs 'dzin kyang // sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci
35a4(rgyud): dgos// yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir// mthing ka na ra'i rgyan can ni// brkyang bskum rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs bri// dmag dpung rangs pa'i ras ris ni// gser
35a5(rgyud): mdog khri'o mi g.yo ba// mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku// 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// zhal bzhi phyag kyang bzhi pa ste// ral gri zhags pa dang po 'dzin// ri bo che dang
35a6(rgyud): bsdigs mdzub 'og zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying kha ro// de nas rigs 'dzin dngos grub kyi// ras ris bri ba yang dag bshad// mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa// mdangs bzangs zar ma'i me tog
35a7(rgyud): mdog/ ral gri zhags pa sdig mdzub can// dbus mo g.yas bteg g.yon pa ni// sa la cung zad btsugs par mdzad// mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis// dbugs 'byin mdzad pa nyams dga'i
35a8(rgyud): gzugs// g.yas su rnam snang mdzad bris te// g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o// de mdun sgrub po nyid kyang bri// gang yang ris ma thams cad la// mchod de me tog gtor nas kyang // spyan phye na bza' gas
35b1(rgyud): byas te// rten 'brel sngags kyi rab gnas bya// de rjes smon lam btab pa ni// oM ldan bdag gis bsags pa yi// bsod nams grangs med gzhal mi lang // des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa// bla med ge/ 
35b2(rgyud): 'phangs thob par shog/ sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro dang // yi dgas gang dag grangs med rnams// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig/ gang yang lha mi
35b3(rgyud): dbul pongs dang // mi nad mu ge dgra chom sogs// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// de dag thams cad bral gyur shog/ ji snyed sems can thams cad rnams// de snyed sdug bsngal rgya
35b4(rgyud): mtsho kun// sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas// 'ga' yang sdug pa sngal med par shog/ sems can gang dag lus ngag yi dra// mi dge sbyong pa bral gyur nas// dge ba phun tshegs spyod
35b5(rgyud): gyur te// kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog/ de nas rgyal sras kun btud de// lag na dri dang me tog sogs// mchod/ pa'i yo byad kun thogs nas// bla 'og tha dad gsal bya'i
35b6(rgyud): phyir tata bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod// oM bde gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// skyob pa dngos su bzhugs pa rnams// bdag la slar yang brtse ba'i phyir// rgyal ba sras bcas
35b7(rgyud): la mi mnga'// bdag don grub par 'gro ba la// brtse phyir slar yang byon par mdzod// de nas gtor ma me tog dri// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul chen rnams// dngos grub dam tshig gnod spangs phyir// lag
35b8(rgyud): pas reg par mi bya ste// gos kyi phur ma la sogs pa// ci bde bas ni phyags nas kyang // skye 'gag med pa'i sngags brjod nas// chu bo la na dor bar bya// 'bras dang 'o ma sha ka dang // mar dang bcas pa
36a1(rgyud): bskol byas te// 'bras zan dang ni lhan cig tu// dga' skyed phyir na dge 'dun dang // bram ze la ni ston mo bya// de nas bris sku brtan par ni// gsang ba'i gnas su mchod par bya// 
36a2(rgyud): khyad par tshes brgyad dus su mchod// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing // rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang // mnyes par bya zhing khros pa min// sems can ma mos spang bar bya// dkon mchog sum
36a3(rgyud): la nges bskyed de// the tsom le lo spang bar bya// rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir// khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas// gos bkra dri ma med pa bgo// zas kyang 'bras rtsog dri med la// nyung ngu bza'
36a4(rgyud): zhing btung bar bya// mangs pas gnyid dang le lo dang // dri dang po ni bskyed par 'gyur// tho rangs dang por langs nas ni// srod thal bar du brtson par bya// nam gyi gung la gnyid pa'i
36a5(rgyud): che/ 'gro la phan bya'i sems kyi nyal// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las bris sku'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ste/ 
36a6(rgyud): lha sgom pa yi rim pa yi ni// rang gzugs stong par byas nas su// yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo las// sgra grags pa ni rig pa che// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang // der son pa ni rdo rje sogs// rang
36a7(rgyud): gi phyag rgya nyid yin no// de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni// 'ja' tshen shar ba ji lta bar// mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag ldan// brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang ldan// sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni/ 
36a8(rgyud): byis pa gzhon nu 'i lang tshe 'dra// rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni// gzugs mdzes lha yi ci lta ba// khros pa'i srin po lta bu ste// skra dang kha spu la sogs pa// spu sogs ser zhing rtsub la 'khyil/ 
36b1(rgyud): sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan rnams ni// rtsub cing blo ldan rab tu khros// na bza' rlon pa khrag can ni// steng gi khams su yod par mdzad// ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT kyi// ngar skad 'brug sgra spyugs glu ni// ri rab 'bum/ 
36b2(rgyud): rnyil tshal chom ltar// lus rab ltos 'gros rgyan pa ni// gzi ldan 'khyud cing phu sgra 'don// 'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi 'bum dus me'i bskal pa 'dra// rab gdug mtshon cha du ma ni// lha min
36b3(rgyud): dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs 'byung ba// thams cad yi ge hUM s+tha can// ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro rnams// b+h+yo yig drag po'i bdag nyid can// thub pa yi ge mu las bskyed// rgyal sras
36b4(rgyud): rig mnyan thos dang // 'jig rten skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed// na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaHsa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA oM sarba sa ska ra ba ri shud+d+he d+harmA te ga ga na/ sa mud ga tes
36b5(rgyud): ha pa ri shud+d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ rang gi lus la sa mas bcug nas// sdig pa thams cad rab tu ni// nga tshul bzang por yang dag byung // rig par gyur pa'i sems ldan na/ 
36b6(rgyud): drang srong rdzu 'phrul can du 'gyur// gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nus na// rang gi bde thob smos ci dgos// rang rang rigs kyi lha rnams kyi// gzugs brnyan phyag mtshan kha dog ni// dkyil 'khor ram
36b7(rgyud): ni ris ma las// gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya// de nas mi g.yo khro bo ches// rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas// dag cing gsal la snyan pa yis// tshig gi yang ni 'di gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom
36b8(rgyud): ldan 'das// gtum mo mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// nga yi mtshan nyid khyed bshad nas// de tshe rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gtum mo'i tshe byad ldan byas nas// rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis// 
37a1(rgyud): gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to// dag pa'i sems nyid hUM rdo ni// mthing ka'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin// mthing ka brkyang bskum khro sems can// na ra'i rgyan bcas 'jigs
37a2(rgyud): byed skra// gyen ska kha spu gyon ser dmar// pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ni// me yi nang bzhugs rdo dril 'ching // rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po// bzhi pa'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa// lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i
37a3(rgyud): bzhite te me yis sa bon dgugs pas mnan// bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yi ni// gsum pas bteg go hUM phaT bcas// gsang sngags rgyal po bla med 'dis// dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa
37a4(rgyud): dang / khyad par du ni 'byung po sel// klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che// nam mkha' lding gi cha byad che// grub pa'i gter gyi don du ni// ser po 'od dang ldan pa yi// dmar po dang ni ljang nag dag
37a5(rgyud): drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang // cha ring ba la shis pa 'o// lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku mchog ni// 'byung por gyur/ pa'i de ma thag/ sa stengs thams cad mun nag 'khris// bdud
37a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad rab tu tshig/ ye shes me 'od chen po 'di// bzod par bla la gcig ma mchis// bgegs chen log par 'dron pa rnams// dog pa'i sems kyis thag rings 'bros// gsang / 
37a7(rgyud): sngags yi ge hUM sgra can// glog 'khrug pa yi 'od zer 'dra// klad par yi ge hUM gi gzugs// gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can// 'od dmar tshal pa rab 'thor bas// bgegs tshogs sreg cing
37a8(rgyud): 'bros par byed// bong bu rnga mo khyi spre'u gzugs// ro langs ma lus thams cad kun// ha hUM brjod cing 'bros par byed// rlung gis g.yengs pa'i rdul dang mtshungs// gyen thur haM gi 'phro 'du dang // khro bcu
37b1(rgyud): sa bon yi ge hUM// me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar// mngon sum rtsal me bzhin du// snying gi thugs 'das nas kyang // klang ba'i hUM gis sreg par byed// 'dod dang phyag rgya lha yi sku// bsgrad dang bcing dang myas/ 
37b2(rgyud): byed bsam// seng ge dang ni glang chen 'brug/ drug por sgra skad ci 'dra bar// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlos pa ni// bgegs dang log 'dren ma lus pa// sreg cing phye ma rdul du rlog/ snying nang snyi
37b3(rgyud): bstan pa ni// 'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tshogs// du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad// lus ngag ying brtan 'khor lo sngags// oM dang AHdang hUM phyir gyis// dpal 'phel dbang phyug bskyed pa dang
37b4(rgyud): go che chen po bskon par byed// na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tAn+ta tsa go cha chen po'i gsang sngags 'dis// rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar gyur na// bgegs rnams sreg pa smos ci dgos// 
37b5(rgyud): sa ma ya s+t+waM aM haM gis// ye shes lce dang 'brel par bya// rgyal bas dbang bskur sbyor bas ni// ye shes dbu rgyan pa rtags par bya// gcol mi bskyod dbu rgyun can// 'khor kun
37b6(rgyud): mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya// bdag nyid yi ger byas nas su// me gzugs shin tu phra bas ni// mtshan mo dus su nyams par bya// sdang ba hUM gi sgra las so// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i
37b7(rgyud): rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga nyon// dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing // byang chub sems
37b8(rgyud): las ma bskyed de// dbang skur rjes gnang ma thob la// sdom tshul dam tshig bral ba'i mi// gsang sngags rang nyid len pa ni// byis pa lcags sreg med pa 'dra// thog ma med sgrib bkru ba'i phyir// 
38a1(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon 'di skad brjod// oM sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag chu// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sem/ 
38a2(rgyud): su byed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ad+hiSh+ThA na kA ya bAka bi sho d+ha na a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ oM sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi// rin chen sngags las byung ba yi// dbu rgyan lha rdzas cod pan 'dis
38a3(rgyud): dbang bskur rin chen mchog tu gyur// oM badz+ra d+ha ra shrI badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM// rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM// rdo rje chen po bla na med// gzung bas phyogs las rgyal gyur te// rdo rje lta bur brtan
38a4(rgyud): byed pas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // oM sarba badz+ra a b+hiShIny+tsa hUM// dril bu dbyangs snyan bla na med// sku yi rdo rjer rab tu bskyed// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // khams gsum
38a5(rgyud): srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// oM sa ma ya g+haN+Da badz+ra a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM// oM snying rje shes rab dbyer med rgya// gang gis thos pa nang gi su// de yi ming mtshan bdag por 'gyur// rtag/ 
38a6(rgyud): pa'i ngang gnas blang bar mdzod// oM badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems bdag bdag
38a7(rgyud): mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu rgya// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// rtag tu khyod kyis gzung byas nas// byang chub mchog thob rgyal bas gsungs// oM shes rab ral
38a8(rgyud): bla med// gang gis 'tshong brgyal 'gyur te// bdu kying dru ni pa shegs nas kyang // mkha' la ye shes 'di' bar 'gyur/ oM sa rba thA ga ta badz+ra dun la rnam b+h+ya tsu hUM/ a
38b1(rgyud): zhags thugs rdo rje can// nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong po rnams// thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang // srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzad// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra pA she na a b+hiSh+ThAny+tsa hUM// 
38b2(rgyud): dbang dang rjes gnang ma thob cing // dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la// bla ma mnyes par mi byed na// sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gro/ log lta can gang bla ma 'tshe// dmyal ba'i gnasu 'gro bar nges// 
38b3(rgyud): 'dir nyams pas ni nang yams dang // dag po mu ges rtag tu 'tshe// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// chu klung mtsho 'gram ri ljongs dang // 'bras bu me tog bskyed mos tshal// kun dga'
38b4(rgyud): ra ba khang bzang mchog/ bzhi mdo ri sul shing gcig drung // phyugs lhas khang brtsegs glang chen bres// gtsug da lag khang dang dgon pa dang // chu gling mtshe'u 'gram ne'u gsi
38b5(rgyud): duHbsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang // dur khrod sogasu las rnams sgrub// las kyi dkyil 'khor khru gang ste// dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po la// thub pa'i dkyil 'a
38b6(rgyud): khru bzhi pa// yang na drug gam brgyad kyang bya// gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du bya// yang na lnga 'am bdun du bya// gza'i dkyil 'khor khru gnyis te// yang na phye dang gsum par bya// kun tu bzhi cha
38b7(rgyud): po drang ste// khang pas tshad kyi phyed yin te// khang pa gnyis pa cha gsum pa// rta babs rdo rje pad+ma'o// lha snam bzhi cha dag tu 'gyur// thub pa'i sgo ni bzhi yin te// gzhan du sgo gcig pa nyid shis// 
38b8(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byeng go sgo// chos ni nubasgo rdo rje 'o// gapa 'ding 'jig rted skyong sogs shar// dbang bsgyur lha ya~M gnas rnam su// bum pa phyag rgyar bcas pa'am// sku 'am rang rang phyag/ 
39a1(rgyud): rgya bzhag/ thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni pad dkar steng du lhung bzed do// gtso bo yis ni sor drug ste// lhag ma rnams ni sor bzhi'o// rigs kyi mtshan mas yang yang
39a2(rgyud): bskor// byang du 'jig rten dbang sdud ni// pad dkar rdo rje gdengs por bcas// dbang ldan spyi blugs byams pa'i'o// shar du 'jam dpal ud pal sngo// mer ni kun bzang yid bzhin no// lhan
39a3(rgyud): ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// bden bral mkha' snying pad dkar te// nub tu pad ser rdo rje chos// nub byings snying pad+ma dmar// gtsug tir gnod mdzes stong 'og char// gtsug tor dang ni gtun shing ngo // 
39a4(rgyud): shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste// mer ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsum ma// rdo rje rtse gcig gshin rje lhor// bden bral ral gri stobs po che// nub tu rta mgrin pad+ma ste// byang du bgegs/ 
39a5(rgyud): dgra rdo rje rgya// nub tu dbyug pa sngon po ste// dbang ldan du na mi/ g.yo ba// de yi rgyab tu nyan thos ni// shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang // mo'u dag la bu dang 'od srung dang // rgyal mchog
39a6(rgyud): dang ni sa stengs skyong // rta thul dang ni ba glang bdag/ drag shul dbang tshon tshangs bu can// b+ha ra d+h+wa dza steng rgyas dang // dga' bo nyer dga' sgro gcan no// de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i steng du lhung bzed do// 
39a7(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor bzang po yi// dbus su ral gri mi 'od can// rin chen rdo brag steng du bri// byang du rdo rjes mtshan ma yi// bum pa bri ba byams pa'o// shar du kun tu
39a8(rgyud): bzang po yi// rdo rje dkar po bri bar bya// lhor ni me 'od ldan pa yi// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri// nub tu 'jig rten dbang po ste// pad dkar 'od dang ldan pa bri// yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes gzugs can// rin chen
39b1(rgyud): rdo steng dbang ldan bri// mer ni rab 'bar rdo rje yi// bgrang phreng pad+ma la gnas bri// bden bral du ni rab brjid pa'i// go cha 'bar ba bri bar bya// rlung du mdzes pa gzhon nu'i lnga// rin chen sgron ni bri bar bya// steng
39b2(rgyud): durtul po ces khro ba'o// pad+ma'i steng du khro bo yi// 'og tu khro rgyal mngag gzhug gi/ rdo rje brag stengs zhags pa bri// khro bo lhag ma sngon gyi no// tshul gyis rgyal por dgod par bya// brtan pa zhes pa'i
39b3(rgyud): mo'i / chu gri byang du bri bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi// mkhar sor ma ni shar du'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi// rnam 'jigs ma ni lha ru'o// nub kyi phyogasu bri bar bya// mdzod spu ma
39b4(rgyud): zhes rin phreng 'dzin// rin chen rdo steng shar lho bri// shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa// 'khor lo me 'bar rdo rje bri// da'abar ba'i gtun shing bden bral tu// 'joms pa'i tho ba rlung
39b5(rgyud): du bri ta thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug/ pad+ma mdzod kyi phyag rgyad/  // sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab// na ma \u0f7fsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHhUM hUM/ ba ba/ maM maM swA hAH
39b6(rgyud): spyan drangs gshegasu gsol ba dang // srung ba mchog gi sngags yon no// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHhe he he A dz+nyA ba ra ma ra ga ga na/ A gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn shI g+h+r-i swA hA// bsnyen pa
39b7(rgyud): 'bum la byin brlabs dang // lha sgrub pa dang mchod pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje sngon gyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid// pad+ma dmar po 'chang ba'o// shar du don yod zhags
39b8(rgyud): pa nita/ bgrang phreng sngon po 'chang ba'o// lhor ni na mkha' dri med de// rdo rje sngon po 'chang ba'o// nub tu gar gyi dbang pad+ma// byang du thugs rjes shugs po che// rdo rje nag po 'dzin pa bri// sgrol ma khro gnyer ral
40a1(rgyud): / gcig dang // yid bzang ma ni mtsham su bri// khro bo dang ni pho nya mo// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rim pas dgod// de nas phyag na rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad par bya// dbus su phyag na
40a2(rgyud): rdo rje nyid// rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o// shar du sangs rgyas spyan ma yin// lhor ni pad 'dzin mA ma ki/ nub tu gos 'chang na bza' dkar// byang du sgrol ma ud pal 'chang // phyogs bzhir na mkha' dri med
40a3(rgyud): dang / shugs po che dang rdo rje rtog/ bsnyems tshul chen po zhes pa rnams// rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o// der yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams// rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya// de yi cha rgyab dkyil 'khor
40a4(rgyud): latadrag po lha rnams bkod pa ni// dpung bzang la sogs rdo rje can// brgyad po byang gi phyogasu bri// tshogs 'chang ba shes dganyen 'gro skyong dang // mthong dka' rigs byed bden bral sde
40a5(rgyud): / ngan spong brgyad de drang srong shar// lhor ni rdo rje dgra sta ma// rdo rje tho ba drag shul ma// rta rnam dang khro gnyer ma// ro langs ma dang / lcags sgrog ma// mthong dka' ma ste brgyad po bri// dug sem
40a6(rgyud): rma bya 'od zer can// nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma// dbyangs ldan dril sgrol brgyad nub phyogs// kun kyang rang rig phyag rgya can// sgo yi phyogasu dgod bya ba// thub pa'i 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi// brgya byin
40a7(rgyud): khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor la'o// rgyal dang rnam rgyal mi thub pa// gzhan mi thub pa spyan ras gzigs// nag mo tsho dang uts+tshaSh+ma// gzhon nu 'phrog mo gter 'dzin
40a8(rgyud): gyi ta khro bo mi g.yo sgo bzhi la// nag po che dang dga' byed dang // ngan spong dang ni tshogs bdag go// mi g.yo dbang bskur dgyes pa yi// dbus su khro bo mi g.yo ba'o// ral gri me 'od 'bar ba'o// phyogs
40b1(rgyud): bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byang can// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rgyu gram g.yas pa'i phyag tu 'chang // g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang // rin chen blag la
40b2(rgyud): sku bzhugs nas// zhabs gnyis pad+ma'i steng du'o// mtsham su khro mo bzhi po yang // gtso bo dang mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams// de rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu// sku 'am phyag rgya'i phreng ba bri// dkyil
40b3(rgyud): 'khor cha yi rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten skyong bcu drag shul can// khros pas rang rigs 'khor bcas bri// bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri/ dri bzang chus bkang lha grangs sam// bcu gnyis sa
40b4(rgyud): ni drug kyang rung // kha rgyan dang bcas bzhag par bya// bla re ba dadan gdugs rgyal mtshan// yon chab bdug spos me tog dang / sgron me byug chab zhal zas dang // gling bu sil snyan na ba
40b5(rgyud): tshogs// gtor ma dri bzang sman dang bcas// yid 'ong dri zhim zas skom tshogs// dkyil 'khor spras nas mchod par bya// / sa la dbus mo tshad brkos nas// 'bru srin shing rdo
40b6(rgyud): dum bu sogs// skyon mang 'bral nas sa yis dgang // ba'i rnam lngas byugs pa'i sar// me tog bcal bkram mchod sogs bkod// lha ni spyan drangs mchod nas kyang // dge dang mi dge'i rmi
40b7(rgyud): lam brtag/ rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas// sa bdag mo la gsol ba gdab// khyad par du yang gtor mas mchod// bu tshur shog ces theg chen gyi// tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas// gsang sngag
40b8(rgyud): spyod tshul cho ga rnams// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams// mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mtshungs pa med pa bsnyes// skyob pa shAkya
41a1(rgyud): / seng ges kyang // gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med 'dis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzang ba// dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom// 'jig rten 'dul phyir chos rnams kyi// 'khor
41a2(rgyud): lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu khyod blo gros 'di gyis shig/ u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar// rgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ste// 
41a3(rgyud): skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che// rnyed dka' rnyed par gyur na yang // gsang sngags skyob pa'i tshul 'byung ba// shin tu dka' ste rmad byung phyir// sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzang ba// 'khor ba'i rgya
41a4(rgyud): mtsho cher 'jigs las// myur du sgrol ba gsang sngags las// sa stengs gsang sngags nor bu 'dra// rgan nad 'chi la dajigs spong ba dang // nyes mdzad grogs bcugs 'thun
41a5(rgyud): 'dod dang // mu ge dgra choms bral bde dang // zas skom pa/ sa rgyan longs spyod brtag/ bde bskyed dpal 'byor thob/ pa dang // myur du sangs rgyas 'dod pa yi// gsang sngags
41a6(rgyud): thabs la myur brtson bsgrubs// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni ngas mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bya// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrim
41a7(rgyud): dang ta dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// deng nas mchog tu brtan par gzung // 'gro la lhag pa'i sems bskyed nas// bla ma la ni yon phul zhu// yid bzhin
41a8(rgyud): nor 'dra bla med sku// zhi ba sangs rgyas go 'phangs thob// srog gcod rkun brdzun mi tshangs spyod// myos byed mthung dang glu gar rol// rgyan byugs mal chen mtho ba dang // phyi dro kha zas spang ba ste
41b1(rgyud): brgyad dang bcu gcig bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni gnam stong la// dal 'byor thob pa shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon// sdom pa rlangs nas srog bzhin du// g.yengs med
41b2(rgyud): bsdams te bsrung bar bya// gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'gro bya// lha mi bde ldan lus thob nas// dmyal bdud 'gro yi dgas gnas// thob gnas spang dka' de dag ni// nam yang thob pa mi bya'o// bdag ni
41b3(rgyud): dpa' bo ral gri 'chang // gsang po'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas// bka' las 'das pa'i gdugs can rnams// dum bu phye mar 'gas par 'gyur// slob ma gzung phyir thog mar ni// bsnyen pas sngags kyi
41b4(rgyud): mthu bskyed pa// longs spyod 'phel phyir gtor ma btang //  bsod nams 'dod phyir mchod pa brtson// bla ma thos bsam sgom la gnas// gtong phong dul zhing chos spyod mkhas/ 
41b5(rgyud): nad med bzod des snying rje che// sngags sgrub brtson dpal she/ sa rab can// brtags nas slob ma lnga 'am bdun// dad brtse na zhi dul bla ma bkur// sdig 'jigs nad mod dbang po
41b6(rgyud): tshang ta dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa bzung // 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag ba
41b7(rgyud): bya ba ta rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub che// gzhan du med pa phul byung ba// rgyud 'dir bshad pa mnyan par byos// mi ni rin chen dang po ste// gang gang sgrub pa de dang de// 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du
41b8(rgyud): mon tar ma gri lcags sam shing la byas// sor bzhi pa'am sor brgyad byi// yu bar rigs kyi rgya lnga bri/ ba yi rnam lnga drizhim chus// bkrus te dri nga nga me tog mchod// bla drug sngags bzlas khri rje/ 
42a1(rgyud): / sgom/  ral gri dung 'thul 'od du 'bar// blangs pas mkha' spyod yul 'gro 'gyur// tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa ste// lha yi bzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs// sangs rgyas zhing rnam
42a2(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur// gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa 'am// shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grub// rgyal mtshan nor bu gi wang gdugs// lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin sgrub// lha rnams sgrub na tha
42a3(rgyud): shing la// gang 'dod lha yi gzugs byas te// sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong // ci 'dod gsol 'debs 'dod pa smra// klu la nA ga ge sar shing // gnod sbyin la ni gse ra las gzugs// dri za
42a4(rgyud): la ni 'o ma'i shing // mkha' lding 'jim pa'i gzugs kyiso// srin po la ni dur khrod shing // gang yang gzugs byas rkang pa ni// g.yon pas de yi ske mnan te// sum 'bum bzlas na mdun
42a5(rgyud): du'ong // ci 'dod sgra tshe dgos pa blang // shar du ras ris kha/ sbrad drung // dus gsum khrus byas gos rlom gyon// sum 'bru/ ma bzlas na mar ngo yi// brgyad la 'byung po gtor ma sbyin// 
42a6(rgyud): maN+Dal steng du ro bzhag nas// rang nyid rin chen khri steng du// snying po khri brjod ro 'gul 'gyur// mi skrag kha yi nang du lce// pad+ma kha phye lte can mthong // bcad na ral gri rig 'dzin 'gyur// lha yi gzug
42a7(rgyud): kyi tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten khams kyi gnas rnams rgyu// gi wang bdun bzlas thig les ni// skye bo kun gyis mi mthong ngo // mi g.yo dbus mo bcugs pa 'am// 'jam dpal ris ma'i drung du ni/ 
42a8(rgyud): 'jam dpal sngags 'dis ya bzlas// nya la khyad par mchod pa byas// mtshan rangs bzlas pa'i tho rangs nas// dang po rtags sa g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed// phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra
42b1(rgyud): chen po// ha ha 'brug skad dgrag par 'gyur// gsum par mkha' la rig 'dzin rnams// me tog char 'bebs chun 'phyar sgreng // de rjes rig 'dzin ma lus dang // 'jig rten skyong bas rab bskor nas// khro rgyal byon nas/ 
42b2(rgyud): gsung snyan gyis// ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur// rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs// ci 'dod par ni smra bar bya// 'grub nas brgyad gnyis cha byad can// brgyan bzangs lag na ral gri thogs// lha yi
42b3(rgyud): bzhon pa la bcibs nas// rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas zhing mang phyin pa'i tshe// rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas nas/ mchod pa chen po thob 'gyur te// bskal pa du mar
42b4(rgyud): tshe gnas 'gyur// ud pal sngon po lig bu mig/ ru rta zangs snod ril bu bzhag/ zla ba gzas zin par bzlas nas// mig bsku das 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyur// bdag ni sus kyang mi
42b5(rgyud): mthong ngo // gnam lcags rdo rje sor bcu drug/ ngos gnyis hUMgasum dbyibs can te// tsan dan dmar dang dri bzang phyug/ tsho'o/ phrul tshes gnyis nya yi bar// mchod cing bzlas na tha mar ni// 
42b6(rgyud): mar me brgya sogs kyis mchod de// ku sha khres kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje lag gnyis gzung ma thag/ dud 'thul 'od du 'bar nas kyang // 'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi// 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par
42b7(rgyud): 'gyur// 'khor lo bdun brtsegs mtshon cha dang // gser dang mal lham tshangs skud sogs// dgos pa thams cad de ltar sgrub// sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung // tshes gcig nyin par sku gzugs
42b8(rgyud): kyi mthe bor dza ti sngags brjod brdeg/ stong phrag brgyad kyis mthe bong las// 'od zer phyung nas reg ma thag/ dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil gyur nas// 'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyal po thob// sus kyang
43a1(rgyud): mi thub lus grub 'gyur// tshe ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas// sa la pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa bri/ bum pa skud pa nag pos bkri tsan+dan gyis byug dris kyang dgang // pad+ma'i steng bzhag
43a2(rgyud): pad stengs 'dug/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas sa gzhi gas// pad+mar snang zhing sa bzhir snang // chu des gtor la khru gang bskor// blangs pas bskal pa'i tshe tshad thob// grog mkhar sa la seng ge bya// gi wa
43a3(rgyud): gis byugs dkyil 'khor bzhag/ g.yon 'gul bar du mchod cing bzlas// seng ger gyur nas rgyabazhon nas// 'dod gzugs lha gnas kun tu 'gro/ sangs rgyas zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur// tshe lo
43a4(rgyud): khri phrag gcig bskor nas// rig 'dzin chen po'i gnasu 'gro/ da'adir gsungs pa 'am ma gsungs pa// sngags dang lha 'a dadis sgrub pa yis// rig 'dzin grub par grags pa rnams// 
43a5(rgyud): ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las// rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// 
43a6(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phran tshegs las kyi sbyor ba gtso// gza' yi cho ga 'di yin te/ gnod pa sel dang phan skyed mdzad// ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa yi// dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma ni/ 
43a7(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs nyis brtseg gi/ dbusu sangs rgyas de bzhin lhor// chos ni rdo rje chos dkar po// shar du dge 'dun ljang ku'o// nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar// byang du phyag na rdo rje ste// byang
43a8(rgyud): shar du ni 'jam dpal ser// mer nig shin rje gshed po gnag/ dbyugs 'chang ma he zhon pa'o// mi g.yo mgon po srin po phyogs// rta mgrin rlung gi phyog su'o// dkon mchog gsum po chos 'chang
43b1(rgyud): sems dpa' khro bo rang rtagaso// kun kyang rin chen khri la bzhugs// de rgyab cha la gza' rnams te// shar du nyi ma dkar ser ni// rta la zhon te pad+ma 'chang // nub tu zla ba dkar po ni// ku mu nga 'chang ba
43b2(rgyud): zhon ta lhor ni mig dmar kha dog dmar// ril ba'i steng bzhugs me sgron bsnams// lhag pa mdog ser ud pal 'chang // byang du pad stengs bzhugs pa yi// phur bu mdog sngon glegs bam thog/ 
43b3(rgyud): shar lho phyogasu klu la bcibs// pa wa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang // lho nub gser gyi khri la bzhugs// byang shar spen pa mdog nag ni// tshangs pa'i steng na dbyug pa thogs// nub byang sgra
43b4(rgyud): gcan dud ka ni// sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin// rnon po ldang ku ral gri 'chang // gtso bo drung du bang stengs bzhugs// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ 
43b5(rgyud): oM b+ha ki nAM swA hA/ nyi ma'i snying po'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM sarba tra yaM a swA hA/ zla ba'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sA pa ri pU ra ka
43b6(rgyud): b+h+yaHsarba thA oM a bI rA ya swA hA// rnon po'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsarba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM su bi shud+d+ha swA hA/ mig dmar gyi'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sA pe ri pU ra ka b+h+ya/ 
43b7(rgyud): sarba thA/ oM bi su Ta pe ka ya swA hA// gza' lhag gi'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA oM b+hi ka mya d+hA ya swA hA/ pur bu'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sA
43b8(rgyud): pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA oM su d+harmA d+ha ra ho swA hA/ pa wa sangs kyi'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM kroSh+Na bar+Na pa ka swA hA/ spen pa'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te
44a1(rgyud): b+h+yaHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM bi kr-i da la ku ru tsi swA hA// sgra gcan gyi'o// sngags re brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas// ci 'byor mchod de gsol ba gdab// longs
44a2(rgyud): spyod sbal cig 'jigs pa sel// nad med bgegs rims 'joms par 'gyur// rims sogs gzas zin nad la yang // sku yi drung du gsol btab sa la// zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba// 
44a3(rgyud): de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// mi dang bya rgod sbrul rus pa// skabs btums nas dgra khyim sba// dgra bo nad skyed nor rnams brlag/ rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar nges// stag pu thod rus
44a4(rgyud): 'ug pa'i spu// dgra bo'i sgor sbas skrod par byed// ne'u le nag po wal rba rus// rang khrag gtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams// gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor sba// dgra bo 'khor bcas shi bA
44a5(rgyud): 'gyur te mi tshil dur thal rgya skyegs ni// thod pa so can nang bla/ gas nas// gang gi sgor bzhag khang pa 'jig/ ku shi'i/ gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan// dbang byar 'dod pa'i sngags/ 
44a6(rgyud): bzlas na// rgyal po che yang dbang 'gyur na// 'byung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bud med skyes phyugs la sogs la// rang ming ldan pa'i gzugs byas te// rkang pa g.yon mnan ming bcas bzla/ 
44a7(rgyud): gang dang gang yang nges par 'grub// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te// sngags kyis brdungs na brlag par 'gyur// 'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te// gdab cing brdungs na sel bar nges/ 
44a8(rgyud): phur bus gdab dang mtshon chas brab// rdo rje ri rab cog brgyad ldan// sa la byas pa'i thems bar du// gzugs brnyan bcug ste rkang pas mnan/ gzas zin nub mo'i maN+Dal// dri zangs me tog
44b1(rgyud): sil ma bkram// pha rol phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs// dngas ma'i snod du mar bzhag ste// seng ldeng mes ni bskol bar bya// dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang // gter mthong bar yang 'dis
44b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// khros pas staran gyi phyag rgya bya// hU mthar gsang sngags drag tu brjod// dur khrod thal ba gang byin pa// gdon gyi 'dzin na ma bran du 'gyur// de nas mi g.yo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags
44b3(rgyud): kyi cho ga bshad par bya// ris ma'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum// brjod pas 'di yi bsnyen pa rdzogs// dben par zan gyi chang bu sbyin// des ni rtag tu 'brel par 'gyur// mdzub mo'i rtse la hUM bkod na/ 
44b4(rgyud): brjod pas sprin rnams 'dral bar byed// dgra bo lhar bcas ga dazugs brnyan la// rkang g.yon mnan bzlas lcags phur gdab// bka' nyan 'gyur rog tu bas na shing // skung
44b5(rgyud): ba ser po bcings nang ngag/ spang leb mnan na mnan paragyur// ra lpags brabs na bka' nyan 'gyur// srang du yungs kar la bzlas te// 'chang na gang 'dod srung bar byed
44b6(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM tsin+da la ma hA ro ShaN hUM tra thA ma hA maN+Da/ a tsa la ka na hA hA hUM a pra ti ha ta ta thA ga ta dz+nyA/ sma ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu
44b7(rgyud): klung du// tsan+dan sbags pa'i pad+ma ni// sngags bcas ci tsam bsgyur ba'i grangs// gser gyi dong tshe rnyed par 'gyur// bram za 'am ni dge 'dun ras// rgyal po ras sam gro ga la// pad+ma mu khyud
44b8(rgyud): gnyis ldan bri// lte bar oM hUM ming dang bcas// tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na// phaT dang bcas pa mdab mar bkod// mu khyud dang por rtsa sngags te// gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid bri// dri dang me tog
45a1(rgyud): sogs mchod nas// skabs kyi dril nas lus la bcang // gdon dang nang dang mu ge sel// g.yul du phyin pa rgyal bar 'gyur// yang na ral gri sor bzhir bri// 'od kyi ri mo nang chu/ 
45a2(rgyud): pata ye d+harma la sogs kyis bskor// dbus su ming dang bcas pa yi// snying po sngags ni khrigasu bri// 'dris kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyur// mtho lngas 'khor ba'i bar du ni// mtho gang 'phang du
45a3(rgyud): / yod pa bya// nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal sngags// mgo ni gyen du bltas pa bri// kha la nye bar rten 'brel sngags// spra tshil las byas dgra yi gzugs// dug dang gri khrag gis bris nas// 
45a4(rgyud): ming yig bsad par bcas pa ni// ling kha'i snying khar bcu dag byas te// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po yi// nga/ dbus su mtho gang brus byas te// nang bzhag steng du spar bu sgrub
45a5(rgyud): ji srid mar gyis tshes gcig nas// zla ba mi snang zhag bar du// nyin mo rten 'brel sngags bzlas te// mtshan dus khro bo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags ni drag tu brjod par bya// mtsham
45a6(rgyud): dang ci srid mtshams bar du// g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangasu brjod// 'jam dpal sngags kyis chos gos srung // bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas ni// mchod rten
45a7(rgyud): la ni bseg bshang bsil// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang // sngags la 'phya zhing sems can 'tshe// log lta log par spyod byed cing // sems can la 'tshe byed pa ni// rgyal po khro bo che bcu
45a8(rgyud): dang 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen pa'o// mchogs gapa' dang rgyuskar tshogs// bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du spel// rgyud gzhon dag la grags pa yi// bden pa'i mthu yang du ma brjod// dur/ 
45b1(rgyud): khrongs la mchod rten ni// nag po gru gsum khru gang ba'i// srog shing nag po gsum pa la// bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas dkri/ gur gum li khris bris pa'o// mya ngan med shing gru gsum la// rgya gram
45b2(rgyud): dbang chen rim par bca'// laM staM b+ha ya nan pa brgyad// phyogs brgyad bri ba'i rwa dbus la// nye snying ming dang bcas pa bri// de yi lte bar snying po ni// bsad pa'i ming bcas bri ba'o// tshogs kyi bdag po/ 
45b3(rgyud): gtor mas mchod// ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras// sha khrag me tog nag pos mchod// ci srid gsum dang bdun par du// le lo med par byas gyur na// dge slong dge tshul bsnyen ldan gang / 
45b4(rgyud): sdom brtson de ni ldan gyur te// sdig ldan myur du shi bar 'gyur// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sna tshogs las rnams thun meng ste// khyad par sbyor ba
45b5(rgyud): cung zad bshang // yungs kar bsnun pas 'byung po 'bros// ser ba srung na 'khor lo 'am// rnga dang dung la bri bar bya// g.yul du 'jug na ral gri sogs// nad la 'khor la chu yungs
45b6(rgyud): karatathod lo kor gyis sa phor la// bris te skor sbas spre'u srung // spra tshol gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa// dur khrod thal bzlas sgo stengs bzhag/ nang pa gdan las srung bar nges// snying khar ming sngags sbal
45b7(rgyud): bcug nas// tshe mkhar btsugs ngag rengs byed// snying la gtsugs nas khros pa ni// nan tan sems kyis gsod par nges// ling gas brtags kyi nus pa med// yang na rabs chad thod pa la// ming sngag/ 
45b8(rgyud): bris te mi khrag bkang // rabs chad dur sbas rigs rgyud 'chang // khyi na ga thod par ming sngags bcas// dug bkang klu gnas stas mdzes 'dzin/ dgra yi sgor sbas 'byed par byed// zhing du sbas na/ 
46a1(rgyud): lo nyes byed// phyugs gnas gong 'byung zla dang 'byed// chu dong sbas na chu skems 'gyur// me dur sbas na rims kyis 'dzin// yang na dgra ming khrag gis bris// spra tshil gzug
46a2(rgyud): kyi snying khar bcug/ mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'i// nang bcug dong bzhag lhung bzed sbub// bram ze rigs bzhis sngags brjod cing // nag po ches nas phyis bskor zhing // bden pa'i mthu brjod
46a3(rgyud): gzugs brnyan sreg/ dgra bo shi 'gyur the tsom med// gri khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag/ ka tra tra yi lte ba ma la// ka ro ki yi dus su ni// gzugs la ming dang sngags bcas bri// / rkang pas mnyes na rdul
46a4(rgyud): du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin no// mtshon gyis bas dad pa'i thod pa la// sngags dang yul lha'i ming sbal bri// lha yi gnas bcug de steng du// sngags bzlas phur pa snyid
46a5(rgyud): khar gad ba// gdug pa'i tsher ma'i hom sbar te// mi rta ba glang khyim he// sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod// lha khyod yul 'dir thog ser po'o// med na bskal par khyod
46a6(rgyud): nyid sreg/ de rjes dkar dang mngar mchod do// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas sbyin
46a7(rgyud): sreg las rnams kun// myur 'grub thabs ni bshad par bya// mngar gsum dur ba bsregs pa yi si// gnod rigs thams cad sel bar byed// yam shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing // 
46a8(rgyud): gdon nad thams cad zhi bar byed// 'o ma can gyi yam shing la// 'o ma dur ba til dang 'bras// snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs na// gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// ga pur mngar gsum
46b1(rgyud): 'bru thams cad// durab dkar po'i lam shing rnams// 'o ma can gyi shing la sreg/ nang dang gdon rnams thams cad ni/ 'o ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad// phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar
46b2(rgyud): 'gyur// dur ba mngar gsum ming bcas pas// bsregs pas rta phyugs nad zhi byed// shar lho nub byang phyogs kyi ni// dkar nag dmar ser kha dog 'grub// khru gang khru gnyis
46b3(rgyud): tshad kyi thab// sor bzhir kha khyer rim pas btang // sems dpa' pad+ma'i rdo rje dang // gcig pus zhi rgyas dbang drag 'grub// de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni// ci 'dod thob pa bshad par bya// 
46b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i chu la 'bum phrag gcig/ rgyal po thob ste blon po ni/ dku mu da la 'bum phrag gsum// zho dang mngar gsum dang bcas pa'o// a ba marga'i 'bras bu dang // mngar ga
46b5(rgyud): 'bum gyis yul bdag 'thob// ri bzang 'bum phrag bdun gyis ni// yid la ci 'dod thob par 'gyur// dur ba ti dang 'bras sogs sreg/ bud med bu bzang thob par 'grur
46b6(rgyud): nor 'dod pas ni rkun po yi// lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas// mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni// nor rnams myur du thob par 'gyur// yang na rgya yi lpags pa la// gur gum gi wang
46b7(rgyud): yung bas ni// byi baM che brjid ser po bri// shar na mdzod phugs bltas par bzhag/ zas kyi lhag mas mchod bya zhing // gsol ba btab pas nor rnyed 'gyur// pad+ma'i ze ba kA li ka/ pri yang kun
46b8(rgyud): no nor rnyed do// 'bras bsregs pas kyang nor chen thob// ku mu nga yi 'bras sogs sreg// longs spyod che dang sa gzhi 'thob// pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi mar// sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol pa// 
47a1(rgyud): gsum bdag kyang mthong bar gyur// bil ba'i 'bras bu mang ra gsum bcas// 'bus phrag gsum du bsregs pas na// rang cid rgyal ba chen por 'gyur// marang
47a2(rgyud): nyung kar dkar pos ni// nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsregs na// snying po snying ba rgyas par 'gyur// nas la sogs pa'i 'bru rigs rnams// gang bsregs gsol btab de rgyas 'gyur/ 
47a3(rgyud): gang 'ad gos kyi kha dog can// me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur// spos shing bsregs na 'khor g.yog 'phel// nomar seng ldeng me la stong // bsregs na nor rnams rnyeng
47a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de nas dbang gi sreg lugs be shad/ til dang 'bras sogs phub ma bsregs// bud med dbang du byed pa'o// pr-i yang ku yi sbyin sreg gis// byis pa
47a5(rgyud): rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// 'o ma snang rtsi a ru ra li// la bsregs na lda dab byeng // gsum pa de dang gun/ la sreg// gnod sbyin rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// mya ngan med
47a6(rgyud): yam shing gis// gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du 'gyur// rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas// bsregs pas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur// de nas drag po'i las grub pa'i// sbyin sreg yang dag
47a7(rgyud): bshad par bya// ming bcos tshad dang nim pa bsregs// bstan sdang dgra bo myur du 'chi// dgra ming dug gis nim pa la// bris te dug dang lhan cig tu// sbrul shun thum po lnga byas nas// thod pa lnga yi nang / 
47a8(rgyud): bzhag ste// lnga po yungs mar gyis bkang nas// gsum ni skyed po gnyis brtsegs la// khros pas gcig tu skra grol bas// sngags brjod thal bar gyur par du// nyin phyed bsreg na dag 'chings// 
47b1(rgyud): 'chi ltas 'dab ma rtsa ba shun// ra khrag nyung mar tshwa rgya skyegs// tsha ba'i bung shing yam shing la// bdun phrag ming dang bcas pa sreg/ stong phrag gnyis kyis rta phyugs 'chi// bzhis ni bu dang chung
47b2(rgyud): ma 'chi// drug gis nye du gnyen 'dun brlag/ brgyad kyis dgra yi rang srog 'chang // gal te skyabasu 'ong gyur na// 'o ma stong bsregs rnal du sa so// khrag dang dug phye nim pa'i 'bras// yungs
47b3(rgyud): mar la spyugs brgya rtsa brgyad// myos byed la bsregs dgra bo 'chi// yang na rus phye nim po'i lnga// rang gi khrag gam yungs mar sbag/ yang na ske tshe dug dang ni// nom pa'i 'bras bu bsad par
47b4(rgyud): yang na gri khrag gis bsregs pas// byad ma myur du gso dad par 'gyur// nom pa'i lnga dngar khrag drug/ dri ma lnga pa cas gzugs snying khar// ming yig bcug nas phur bus
47b5(rgyud): gdab rig sngags byang ma nyid log 'gyur// rgya skyugs ma rus phye ma yis// mi lpags rlon pa dgra gzugs bri/ dug dang ska tshe cung zad drug/ nim pa'i me la khros pas bsro// 
47b6(rgyud): bsregs pas tsha ba'i rims kyis 'chi// ngur ba 'oms sos par 'gyur// dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang // mi rus phye bsregs phyogs rnams brlag/ tsha gsum lan tshang rang sbyar// yungs mar
47b7(rgyud): ro sku sbrul shun dang // nim pa'i lnga dang mi rus phye// skye tshe dug phye sgo cing dang // sgog skya tsher ma'i me la sreg/ dgra bo khrag tu skyugs te 'chi// rgya skyegs lan tsha ba glang mkhris// bsregs na
47b8(rgyud): mchin gas nad kyis 'chi// sge'u gsher lan tshwa tsha ba gsum// gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la// mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du sreg/ thig nag gis ni gsod par 'gyur// 'o ma can
48a1(rgyud): / gyi yam shing la// dkar gsum bsregs na sos par 'gyur// dri chus spangs pa'i sa las ni// thab khung byas te dug gis byug/ nim pa'i 'dab mar dgra bo'i ming // ra khrag gis bris
48a2(rgyud): rgyus pa dkris// tsha gsum shing gi mer bsregs pas// rgyal po myur du 'chi bar nges// dug khrag lan tshwa tsha ba gsum// ming bcas gzugs brnyan nim pa'i mer// bsregs na dgra bo dmu
48a3(rgyud): rdzing ngam// mdze nad kyis ni gsod par 'gyur// tsha gsum nim pa dug dang dur// khrag dang lan tshwa'i gzugs brnyan ni// lan tshwa nim pa tsha ba'i mar// byugs nas argi'i shing la
48a4(rgyud): bsregs// mdze nad chen pos gzung nas 'chi// ra khrag tshwa gsum nyungs mar spos// nim pa'i lo ma na le sham// 8 nyungs mar dug bsregs tsha bas 'chi// ne'u sha 'am dug
48a5(rgyud): dang tshwa/ da ru ra lnga tsha ba gsum// sol ba la ni dgra gzugs bya// nyungs mar byugs te bsregs na'/ chi// tsha gsum pa yi 'bras bu yi// nim pa'i 'dab ma
48a6(rgyud): dgra ming bri// thod par dug nyungs lhan cig bzhag/ da ru ra lnga btsos na 'ching // ris ma byang du bltas nas kyang // rang nyid lho phyogs blta bar bya// tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs
48a7(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can// ma mo mkha' gro sha za sogs// sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems// rig 'dzin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams
48a8(rgyud): gsono// sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro// chang lta sngags 'phya dkon mchog bcom// bstan la sdang zhing sems can 'tshe// mtshams med can 'di bsgral du gsol// rlung gis 'dar zhing char gyis
48b1(rgyud): gsher mes gdung rdul tshub skabs 'dir skye// seng ge mkha' lding stag khro bos// bcom zhing 'bru sbrang bung rgod kyis// khrag 'jib bya tshogs mkha' la khyer// mngon spyod las kyi bsam gtan no// 
48b2(rgyud): de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa// mi rus phye ma tshe skye tshe// gnod sbyin 'khrig pa dug shing la// tha dad ming bcas bsregs pas ni// bskrad dang dbye dang smyo bar byed// dur ba 'o mar bcas pas so so// da
48b3(rgyud): dur yan lag lnga 'bras bu// tshar ma'i mes bsregs smyo bar byed// tsha gsum lan tshwas tsha rims bskyed// yang na shing bskams lta bur bskams// dzam pa'i ra dang rang sgyur bcas// dgra ba
48b4(rgyud): grang ba'i rims kyi 'debs// khA'i sgro e raN+Da yi mar khus// / byugs pa da dur me la sreg/ lag stobs khA ta lta bur ni// dgra bos mtha' kun tu 'khyam// skye tshe mi rus lan tshwa
48b5(rgyud): dgyad nyungs mar nim pa'i me la sreg/ dgra bo rtag tu 'thab pa dang // nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par 'gyur// dur/ khrod thal ba sol bar bcas// dgra bo'i gzugs byas dus
48b6(rgyud): bur mnan// tsham ngam phur bus 'debs pa ni// phol mig nang ngan skyed par byed// bya rgod 'ug pa byi la sha/ ne'u le'i bu rnams khyer ba'i mer// drug cu rtsa brgyad bsregs pa yis// mthun
48b7(rgyud): gnyis myur du 'byed par ngas// khrag can ras la gzugs bris nas// rkang g.yon sker mnan tsham dam bcas// 'dod bcas sngags ni drag po yis// brgyal dang rims nad mcher nad bskyed// 
48b8(rgyud): dgra yi skra dang rkang rjes sa// dgra gzugs dug dang ske chos byug/ chos mes bsregs na rengs par 'gyur// dgra yi pha rus dug rang sgyur// gzugs byang nim pa'i mer bsregs na// dgra bo gdon
49a1(rgyud): // chen na gyis 'debs// phag tug sU ha ana'i shing // tsher mes sregs na mgo 'khor 'gyur// ne'u le byil byi cher sru// bsregs na bung bu brlag par 'gyur// ming ce
49a2(rgyud): le khwa rus pa// yung mar nim pa'i me la sreg/ grong dang grong khyer bskrad par byed// stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu// sa ha me tog na le sham// nim pa'i lo ma dug bsregs byed// nim pa'i
49a3(rgyud): 'bras bu dug lan tshwa// da dur 'bru bsregs nad bskyed byed// dug khrag da du ra yi 'bras bu yis// nim pa'i shing la dgra ming bri// tsha gsum lan tshwa khrag gis byugs// lcags snod yungs/ 
49a4(rgyud): mar nang bzhag nas// nim pa'i shing gis me yis gtso// dgra po lha dang 'byed par 'gyur// mi khyi bya rgod rus phye drug/ ske tshe yungs mar sbrul shun dang // nim pa'i lnga dang skags lan tshwa
49a5(rgyud): tsher mes bsreg na nad kyis 'debs// ske tshe du sbrul tsha ba'i mar// gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung // char ches pa dang thog 'bab 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa
49a6(rgyud): bsdus pa'i rgyud las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas tshangs pa khyab 'jug sogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// bzhengs te thal
49a7(rgyud): mo sbyar nas kyang // snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad la// thabs dang shes rab bsam du med// thugs rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni// mtshungs med rgya che dam chos
49a8(rgyud): gsungs// dug gi 'jigs pas sa stengs 'khrigs// nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi// bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'di gus na// ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stong par 'gyur// de nas tshangs sogs 'jig rten
49b1(rgyud): skyong // rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas// ngam ning ched du brjod pa 'di// snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu gsol// em sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ sems can kun la sman par dgyes// skyeb
49b2(rgyud): chen 'jig rten mgon po yis// mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab thabs// gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sbyong // 'gro la sman mthong bsgrubs pas ni// 
49b3(rgyud): lhag pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ngo mtshar spyan ni gdangs nas su// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma
49b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// gdod nas thugs su 'gro don chud// rtog med rang bzhin las grol nas// bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phangs gsungs// 'chang byed dang po ngan 'gro
49b5(rgyud): gcod // gnyis pa mthong chos dngos grub byed// de rjes 'dzi gas med nga yi med// dogs pa spangs na zad par gyis// sa la bzhugs nas sems can don// ma bsams
49b6(rgyud): thogs pa med par byed// gsang sngags rgyal po skyobs kun la// sbyangs nas 'dod don kun grub ste// nam mkha' chu ser drag pa ltar// sgom pa bla med yid rgyas byed// de nas rig pa 'dzin
49b7(rgyud): pa'i tshogs// ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang // gtsol me tog gtor byas te// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam/ 
49b8(rgyud): mi khyab// 'gro la phan dang don byed pa'i// cho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang // snying rje'i dbye bas rgyas gyur nas// mnar med la sogs ngan 'gro yi// 'jigs rnams las rgal pad+ma
50a1(rgyud): ltar / rnal 'byor can 'byor can de mdzes par spyod// de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i// phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus nas// shin tu dam pas snyan tshig gis/ 
50a2(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog bsam mi khyab// 'khor ba'i mun pa chen por ni// bying bas blta dka' rtogs pa yis// sngags
50a3(rgyud): dang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang // blta dka' 'byung po drag po rnams// lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur// de nas rig pa'i lha mo che// spyan la sogs pa rgya chen
50a4(rgyud): rnams// ngo mtshar gyur nas spyan gdangs te// snyan pas che dad du 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas rmad du byung // e ma sangs rgyas dpa' bo che// oM ma sangs rgyas rab tu
50a5(rgyud): zab ta ta chos rnams skye med 'gag pa med// sgyu 'phrul sna tsho/ gas rol pa ltar// sgyu ma gdul bya tshim mdzad pa// spros pa dang bral spros pa ltar// sgyu ma rab tu 'phel bar
50a6(rgyud): mdzad// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// stong gsum mi mjed 'jig rten khams// gdul ba dag la rab gzigs nas// 'dul mdzad rdo rje 'chang ba la// ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsung gis
50a7(rgyud): ni/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// oM zhes dang po phyag 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa// ser sna rnam par dag nas yo byad dbang thob dang // gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni
50a8(rgyud): rab dga' ye shes khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dud// tsan+da yig dri bzang tsan+dan byugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs// tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshe la dbang ba dang // las dang rnam par smin pa
50b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// dri med ye shes khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tshal lo// Da yig nyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i ni gnas dang // bzod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang // mos pa sna tshog/ 
50b2(rgyud): mkhyen pa zhes bya'i stobs dang ni// 'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 'tshal lo// ma yig sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag mthong che ba'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang
50b3(rgyud): thob dang // khams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// 'od byed ye shes gshin rje gshed po phyag 'tshal lo// hA yig ma chags shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs pa che// bsam gtan dag
50b4(rgyud): pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob dang // thams cad dag tu 'gro ba'i lam dag stobs dang ni// sbyang dka' ye shes rta mgrin khro bo phyag 'tshalo// ro yig 'khor 'das nad bral shes dag las dbang
50b5(rgyud): thob tata bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin dang ni snyoms zhug/ sa pa'i// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang lta ba kun mkhyen/ stobs// mngon gyur ye shes 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal
50b6(rgyud): Sha yig mnyam nyid sdom chen dbang phyug chen po rgyal// stobs che na dag las mos pa la ni dbang thob dang // sngon gyi gnas rnams rjesu dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// ring du song ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi
50b7(rgyud): 'khyil la 'dud// Na yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gtso// smon lam dag pas smon lam che la dbang thob dang // dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// mi g.yo ye shes khro
50b8(rgyud): stobs chen phyag 'tshal lo// hu~M yig hu lu sprin gdengs 'brug sgra gang rgyangs can// thabs dag pas ni ye shes che la dbang thob dang // 'chi 'pho dang ni gang zhig skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs// legs pa'i
51a1(rgyud): blo gros ye shes khra ba d+hA mdza la du// phaT sgras bag chags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mtshungs// ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang // zag pa thams cad yang / 
51a2(rgyud): dag zad pas mkhyen pa'i stobs// chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod mdzes 'dud// de nas chos rje thub pas ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas nas// 'dzum pa mdzad pas rab gzigs
51a3(rgyud): te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus// lag na rdo rje mthu chen la// snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mchog tu brtan par rab bsngags pa/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// mi gang bsod
51a4(rgyud): nams dman pa 'am// mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang // rgyud 'dir zhugs pa'i de ma thag/ gser 'gyur/ gyi ni rtsi bzhin du// log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang // 
51a5(rgyud): rtog med bde ba'i skur byung ste// rmi lam bzang po'i sim/ sa bzhin du// rnam 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang sna/ nga // mu mtha' med pa 'khor ba'i mtsho// bskal pa'i
