51a6(rgyud): gzings chen bla med 'di// chags gsang med pa'i tshul du ni// khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya// lag na rdo rje stobs po ches// ston pa la ni 'di gsol to// rgyud 'di phyung ma thag tu ni// gdul
51a7(rgyud): dka' ba ni rab tu zhi// sa stengs nad dang gdon mu ge/ bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral// slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir// brtan por bdag gis gzung bar bgyi// dpa'o mkha' 'gro
51a8(rgyud): drag po rnams// yid kyis brtul zhugs phyug nas kyang // rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang // lha dang 'jig rten pa dang ni// ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro ma// sha za gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ 
51b1(rgyud): rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed// rgyud 'dzin longs spyad spel bar byed// ston pas gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin// legs shin tu cher legaso// rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor can chen de// rgyun du spyang zhing
51b2(rgyud): 'phel mdzod// de skad kyi ni gsung thos nas// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // mkha' 'gro ma mo 'jig rten skyong // lha klu gnod sbyin dri zar bcas// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de
51b3(rgyud): rnams/ dgyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'i// mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor ba'i gcon nas// lha klu 'bum phrag 'tshe bral dkar po dge ba 'i kun spyong sems// skyes
51b4(rgyud): nas byang chub rin chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad byung mtshar/ rgyas pa'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shin tu gsang // 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa
51b5(rgyud): bsdus pa las/ mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu pa // 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal bo'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs so// 
51b6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kAts+tsha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
51b7(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu na/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
51b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ 
52a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag yul ngor mchis te/ g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags
52a2(rgyud): dang sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgra dang / rig sngags/ 
52a3(rgyud): dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rab tu gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du/ rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
52a4(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka/ dade de bzhin no// lha ma yin dang / g.yul sprad pa na/ rigs snga dgas rnams dang / gsang sngags rnams dang / sman rnams kyis pham
52a5(rgyud): pa de de bzhin te/ ko ru shi ka/ snying brtse ba'i phyir/ 'dir rigasngags brjod par bya ste/ sgyu thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams
52a6(rgyud): cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par
52a7(rgyud): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/ gang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa rnams
52a8(rgyud): kyis ngan du bsams shing / bar chad du byas pa las/ ngas de tshun chad sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi/ rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ gzhan mu stegs can
52b1(rgyud): spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshe ba rnams kyi rgyu dang / rig sngags dang / sman dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen po dngos bshad par byas/ ko ru shi ka
52b2(rgyud): khyod kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags chen po rnam par rgyal ba chen po zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
52b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ oM hi ni hi ni/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ 
52b4(rgyud): ma/ ti nA/ n+dan pa/ k+Shan te/ Sh+TA.an+tu/ ya~Md+b+ha kr-iti pa ba ge sa/ na tan/ has pas// b+ha
52b5(rgyud): dza ye bi dza ye/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ne ban+d+he ni/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+h+ra shak+Shi d+ha re Ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ka Da ma mA ne si/ dzam+b+ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha
52b6(rgyud): mo ha ya mo ha ya/ lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / srin po'i sgyu dang / na mkha' lding gi sgyu dang / dri za'i sgyu dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / mi 'am ci'i sgyu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgyu dang / 
52b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi sgra dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i skye dang / drang srong gi sgyu dang / sems can dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi sgyu dang / 'byung po'i sgyu dang / sgyu thams cad ra la ra la/ radz+dza
52b8(rgyud): radz+dza/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu d+hu ma/ rA ba rA bA rA bA na/ tsakrA na tan/ grAn tha ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba bid+h+we/ sha trA NAn/ swam+b+ha ya/ b+ha yun stam+b+ha ya/ sUr+yanastam+b+ha ya/ so nan stam+b+ha ya/ ba ru Na na/ stam+b+ha ya/ ag+nin stam+b+ha
53a1(rgyud): / yaHu danan d+hi ti d+hi ti/ d+hA Ni/ pA sha ha ste/ beThA ya pA she na/ gang dag bdag la phyir rgol pa rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnam/ 
53a2(rgyud): dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa dang / mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+dza ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ dzam+b+ha ye dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo
53a3(rgyud): ha yatam hA mo ha ni/ b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las bsrungs shig bsrungs shig/ phaT swA hA/ ko'u shi ka/ rigs kyi bu rma
53a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen dpo gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes su dran par byed na/ de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // 
53a5(rgyud): de'i sdel pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs so// lhas ma yin/ klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pas ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis ma yin/ na mkha'
53a6(rgyud): lding gis ma yin/ mi 'am cis ma yin/ rig sngags 'chang gis ma yin/ mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / 
53a7(rgyud): sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang / chu dang / 
53a8(rgyud): dug dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so// gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba de nyid la slar 'bab par 'gyur/ de nyid du slar
53b1(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na/ dad pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chutshu la lan bdun
53b2(rgyud): bzlas te/ bdag gi lus la blugs na/ bdag gi lus srung bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nang 'gro ba thams cad dang / rig
53b3(rgyud): sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad dang / byad thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'dod pas/ gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o// rgyal po 'am/ 
53b4(rgyud): rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom pa dang / pha da rol gyi dmag tshogs 'dul bar 'dod pas/ gseran gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o// lan bdun bzlas te/ 
53b5(rgyud): mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba 'am/ tshul lan bdun bzlas pas bdag srung bar bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gzugs yi ger bris te
53b6(rgyud): 'chang bar bya/ mgul du gdags par bya'o// yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ g.yul du zhugs na dge ba dang bde bar thar par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'di'i stobs
53b7(rgyud): kyis nang mi dang / g.yog 'khor dang / sde dang bcas te dag pa dang / bde bar rgal bar 'gyur ro// ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas/ 
53b8(rgyud): srang bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te/ mdud pa bdun bor na/ bcings pa dang / rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// skya rengs par byed par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sa la lan bdun bzlas te/ gtor
54a1(rgyud): na spu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa'i che ba lkugs par byed pas/ zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te/ 'chos na smra ba thams cad kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro// 6
54a2(rgyud): par bya/ kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang gis byas par gyur pa dang / gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la sgrar 'gror/ 
54a3(rgyud): srang bu btags som/ chus bdag srung bar byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro// de'i don thams
54a4(rgyud): cad kyang 'thun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
54a5(rgyud): 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dan shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur
54a6(rgyud): cing / zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems
54a7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// na maHsarba bud+d+ha// bi d+hi satwA nAn/ sa man+ta a mo g+ha/ a pra ti hata/ shA sa nA nAn/ na ma Ar+yA pA lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ 
54a8(rgyud): mahA bo d+hi sa twA ya/ badz+ra satwA ya/ badz+ra bi pu lA ya/ pad+ma sa b+ha bA ya/ pad+ma yon ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHka ra/ shA~M ka ra pra b+ha ka ra badz+ra satwa/ bad+das b+hag bad+ha b+hag/ pad+ma sA ga ra/ pad+ma ga tsa ra/ ba rangad / ma hA kA ru
54b1(rgyud): Nikata kA ru Na sa b+ha ba hA hUM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shud+d+ha satwa swA hA// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems
54b2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs te/ bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas/ sems can rnams la
54b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa leg so legs so// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang / sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa'o// gang la la nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 
54b4(rgyud): kun chub par byed pa des ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbadag po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing // 
54b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams gsum po kun tu rgyas ko lta ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas 'a
54b6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug la sI dbang phyug dbang po rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa/ sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba// srid gsum ma lus yon
54b7(rgyud): tan chen po'i bdag/ dri med skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba// rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa'o// bskal pa bzang po rnam par zhi ba'i
54b8(rgyud): mchoshin tu rnam ngag yon tan chen po'i bdag/ rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thong // rab mchog srid gsum ngag gi mig gcig pa// mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes// dpag med
55a1(rgyud): pas kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung // skyabs dang yid 'phrogang gtsang sel bar mdzad// nor bu'i thong can rdo rje las byung ba// srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan/ 
55a2(rgyud): thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems can kun pas dpa'// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog/ snyan cha 'gul zhing pad+ma dag pa bsnams// dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tshugs can
55a3(rgyud): tshul bzang yon tan skyen du mtshams pa'i gzugs// 'jigs pa'i rlung chen 'chub pa'i mtshon cha can// dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu// tshul gyi longs spyod bde can mchog gi rgyu// dkyil
55a4(rgyud): 'khor mchog gi spyod yul rgyu gcig pa// srid gsum sgrol/ pa'i zam pa gcig pu lags// dkyil 'khor mchog dgi rgyan te sdig med pa// gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste/ 
55a5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'byung // sa brnyes 'od zer rgyas pa rgyan phreng mnga'// chen po'i che ba thogs pa me da pa ste// snga ma mun pa kun bsal nyon mongs med// dge ba
55a6(rgyud): dag pas spyod yul rnam par dag/ tshul gyi dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag/ srid gsum dbang phyug pad+ma las byung ba// srid gsum bde chen yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste// dbang phyug mi g.yo
55a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor mkhas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rab mchog yangs// nor bu'i rgyan te rdo rje'i rgyan du thogs// pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba// dge slong yon tan chen po'i snod gci
55a8(rgyud): patata bde la longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag/ smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste// 'gro ba srid par lhung ba grol mdzad pa// sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad// skal bza
55b1(rgyud): bskal pa stong gis gnang ba po// rdo rje mchog gis bsgegs pa'i dkyil 'khor can// yon tan rnam grangs khyad par dkyil 'khor ba// dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba// de bzhin nyid chos ro
55b2(rgyud): mkhyen spyod yul can// cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan// lha chen brgya mnga' sum cu gsum bdag dbang // lha dang lha min dbang bcas rnams kyis btung // brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan
55b3(rgyud): zhing rtsal stong mnga'// bsod nams brgya mnga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba// pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung // dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste// chos brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po// 
55b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa// bskal pa rab 'byam mang por mkhas pa ste// dkyil 'khor mang po dag ngan dpa' ba'i sku// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po/ 
55b5(rgyud): rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// rab dga' ba sgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thong // na bza' dar dkar/ la banabs 'od mdzad pa// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs
55b6(rgyud): rjes rgyan pa lags// cha phrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mo shes// dpa' bo'i nyi ma 'od zer rgyan mnga' ba// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing // nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa/ 
55b7(rgyud): me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i lha zhes grags// gtsug phud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag/ btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes// rang gi rigs gsal dbang chen dkyil 'khor ba// 
55b8(rgyud): pad+ma bzang po'i rigs mchog thig le'i mtshan// spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa// gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po// tshogs chen 'dun ma 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags/ 
56a1(rgyud): spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa// ka la bing ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul// mnga' dang rus gzhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams// stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang
56a2(rgyud): brtson pas 'dul// rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste// rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod// tshogs mchog dga' byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa// chu srin 'dzin khri 'jigs
56a3(rgyud): las rab grol mdzad// gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skyed rab sbyin pa// lha yul grol ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can// mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'// stabs
56a4(rgyud): gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan// 'jig rten na na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs// sa gzhi'i dkyil 'kho dar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can// 'od zer mang po stong phrag zad
56a5(rgyud): mi shes// nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa// mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste// rab ni kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can// don dam tshul la sems
56a6(rgyud): can gcig dpa' ba// theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags// dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes// skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom// blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po// bde
56a7(rgyud): ldan gos rgyan yang ba sna tshogs can// bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzad// rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa'o// rgyal bas gsung ba'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo// bde la long/ 
56a8(rgyud): spyod che 'byung dri ma med// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa// ming dang sring med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po// stobs dang rigs dang
56b1(rgyud): mthu stobs che ba lags// sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs// dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dkar// khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshung/ 
56b2(rgyud): khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba'i// rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa// thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs// spyi bo
56b3(rgyud): 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba// rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa// mchog chen rdo rje'i glu la bstod pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs
56b4(rgyud): pa mnga'// ci ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod// spyan ras pa/ dazigs dbang la ni bstod byed pa// des ni ring po mi thogs yon tan gyi// longs spyod mchog chen chos ni thob par 'gyur// 
56b5(rgyud): mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la// spyan ras gzigs dang dam pa sbyin par byed// sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur// 'dod pa gang yin bde blags de yis 'thob// de ni
56b6(rgyud): sdig pa'i dri mas ma gos te// lam srang bzang por dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur// srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad+ma skyes// de 'dra'i chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur// de ltar ming gi
56b7(rgyud): khyad par grub 'dod cing // gang zhig rtag tu bde bar 'dod pa yis// 'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis// bcom ldan 'das bla ma/ 'phags/ 
56b8(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogaso// / 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs
57a1(rgyud): sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas rang gi snying po gsungs pa/ 
57a2(rgyud): na mastaM ya d+hi kA nAn/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA b+ha ra/ kam+ba kam+ba/ ma hA kam+ba hUM/ ma hA s+pha ra Na/ 
57a3(rgyud): d+harma e gra sA ga ra swA hA// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma gzungs chen po ni yon tan che ba ste/ mtha' yas par khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag
57a4(rgyud): mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba tha/ rnams cad ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis snyen bkur mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang / 
57a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar par byed pa'o// sems na gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongs su thar par byed pa ste/ 
57a6(rgyud): shin tu dkon pa'o// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas/ nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/ rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub seMs
57a7(rgyud): dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa// rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste// 'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal// dar ba chen
57a8(rgyud): po mngon par rgyas// tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste// de bzhin gshegs shing rdul dang bral// dbang chen brtse ldan 'od ldan pa// sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon// rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya ba ste/ 
57b1(rgyud): mngon na chen brdu mchom// yan tan 'od d+has bsgyings pa ste// nor du nama'i rgyan thogs pa// srid gsum ngagan dpa' ba'i su// rgyamatsho lta bu'i spong yul can// lhung ba 'byin tes/ 
57b2(rgyud): yi// rtse nas pa la 'khor 'char ba bo// dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa// rab tu dga' ba de bzhin des// yongs su dga' ldan chen po'o lnga// che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchogs sa
57b3(rgyud): rgyas gdung brgyud rgyas mdzad cing // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// ti sa zla 'byin bzhin du gnas/ 
57b4(rgyud): sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa// rdo rje'i pad+ma legs par skyes// / chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod// sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'// snang bar mdzes pa 'byung ba'o// srid
57b5(rgyud): gsum ye shes nyi ma lags// gtso bo chen po cher grags pa// / seng ge chen po stobs po che// cha lugs chen po zham che ba// skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul// rdo rje byi ru bai DUr+ya// 
57b6(rgyud): nor bu'i dbu thong rgyan du thogs// byi ru gser gyi gcal bkram la// sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs// zhal gdangs nyi ma du ma'i gzi// lcang lo cong pan dbu thong can// rig sngag
57b7(rgyud): 'chang brgyas zhabs la gtugs// brjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod// nor bu rgyan 'gul 'od zer gyis// brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas// cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba// nyi ma bye ba brgya
57b8(rgyud): 'od ldan// rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing // dri med dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro// rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi// 'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can// 'od zer mang pos phog pa yi// phan pa'i
58a1(rgyud): thabs ni rab ston pa// brjid pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa yi// 'od kyi zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod// dpung rgyan 'od zer spel bar bkod// tshon bris shin tu mdzes par
58a2(rgyud): 'tsher// lhun po phrad cing 'khrug pa ltar// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs// rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo can// shin tu dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos// btsan pa
58a3(rgyud): kun las rnam par rgyal// snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste// mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar// byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can// kun nas dpa' ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// ma pham thub med
58a4(rgyud): dag pa ste// sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che// byams dra'i snying po snying po che// byams pa'i pad+ma las byung ba// rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can// rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// 
58a5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btung // de bzhin bsten gying bstod pa'o// grub pa chen po'i rig sngags grub/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad// thams cad grub mdzad
58a6(rgyud): grub pa'o// sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags// gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges// mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa// nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi// sdang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad// 'bar ba
58a7(rgyud): rtse mar 'od snang ba// dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste// gzhung dang 'thun pa'i chos dbyings dang // nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges// swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog/ 'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad// 
58a8(rgyud): stobs che 'chang ba bkra shis pa// nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags// stobs byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan// mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can// dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa/ 
58b1(rgyud): sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med// dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston// rlung chen shugs kyis bskyod ba yi// g.yod 'drug sgrogs sna ldan pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste// de bzhin nyid kyi mtsholas/ 
58b2(rgyud): skyes ta ta mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes// khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nas sa yi dbang phyug po// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la// bstod nas kun mkhyen gnod// 
58b3(rgyud): bral ba// thub pa'i nyi mas bka' stsal pa// kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ ming gi yon tan 'od ldan la// bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa// thabs chen bla na med pa ste// ming brgya rtsa brgyad
58b4(rgyud): 'di dag ni// 'jig rten kun gyis bde byed pa// 'di ni gton pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi// byams pa bstod pa'i gnas pa
58b5(rgyud): la/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis// ming ni la la gang / bstod pa// de la lha la sogs kun dang // lag na rdoH/ stobs chen rnams// rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun// gtan du
58b6(rgyud): bsal phyir brtson par byed// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni// sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te// 'di la the tsom yong med do// nang par mal nas langs nas ni// gang
58b7(rgyud): zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod// de la byams par rtogs pa yi// byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur// de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing // sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad bskyed
58b8(rgyud): pa dang tata de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs// 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzog so// 
59a1(rgyud): / oM AHmai tri ma~M swA hA// 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bas namakhan
59a2(rgyud): dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// oM swasti ka mA la k+Shi bi pu la sam+b+ha ba/ d+harma d+hA tu go tsau ra swA hA// gzungs
59a3(rgyud): 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sa yang g.yos par gyur/ rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grags par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs zhes bya ba byin no// 
59a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa / kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnam das na mkha'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i
59a5(rgyud): mchog gis gzungs 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba/ bsod nams chen po/ sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por
59a6(rgyud): gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// pad+ma lta bur 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so// 
59a7(rgyud): nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad snang bar byed do// zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad rab tu sim par byed do// nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal
59a8(rgyud): thams cad kyis migos so// sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mtho man med do// lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so// thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bdeg
59b1(rgyud): dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so// de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa
59b2(rgyud): tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi
59b3(rgyud): 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nang dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / mgon med pa dang / g.yul
59b4(rgyud): 'gyed pa dang / gcan zan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams dalas yongs su srung bar byed pa/ bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub
59b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha/ zhes ca co dang gzha bton te/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de/ snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/ 
59b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa brgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ na mkha'i snying po sring gsum sems
59b7(rgyud): can mchog/ 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'// sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog/ thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel// kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs
59b8(rgyud): min mkhyen// thar mkhyen chos mkhyen pade dang mi bde mkhyen// lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen// dus mkhyen ga mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyen/ 'gro mchog chos mchog
60a1(rgyud): sems can yon tan mchog/ lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog/ rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog/ ngag mchog rtogs mchog mchog pa/ 
60a2(rgyud): mchog min mchog/ zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab// 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab// rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab// mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum
60a3(rgyud): rig rab// legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron// thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron// dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron// rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron
60a4(rgyud): mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od// legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od// 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba// rdo rje'i dbang
60a5(rgyud): po 'dren dbang sems can dbang // rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po// rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang // dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang
60a6(rgyud): rdo rje bzang po rdo 'od rdo rje 'bar// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas rgyan// rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag/ rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang // na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo// sku mdog sngo zhing sngo/ 
60a7(rgyud): ba'i 'od kyis rgyan// ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams// mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs// lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar// rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur
60a8(rgyud): sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrugs byed phreng mchog can// klog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan// ral gri mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon// rdo'i mtshon thogs mnga' dang mdung thung
60b1(rgyud): 'jigs// 'khor lolo mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul// gsal zhing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa// bde 'brung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdorje'i dbyug/ sku rnams thams
60b2(rgyud): cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis rgyan// grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad// mu tig phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis// sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes// rab 'byam mchog brnyes sal/ 
60b3(rgyud): 'jug pa brnyes// mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la// rigs pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa// bde 'dren ni ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa// cha lugs gsal mchog nga rab chen po 'a
60b4(rgyud): byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren// legs 'dren zhing dgi stobs 'dren snying rje can// dri med cha lugs gsal ba lugs 'bar// rnam grags sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can// 
60b5(rgyud): 'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen// longs spyo/ gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ sku dkar sku ma thon sku mdzes sku bzang ba// sku ser sku dkar ngarab chen po'i sku
60b6(rgyud): sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku// rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams// gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog/ cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog/ dpa' 'dzin rin chen dam/ 
60b7(rgyud): pa 'chang ba'i mchog/ sngags pa ni phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs// rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu// srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'// ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs
60b8(rgyud): bkra shis pa// yon tan mthu stobs khyad par grags// nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od // nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu// nam mkha'i
61a1(rgyud): dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba// sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags// srid gsum bsrungs ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog/ zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os stag/ skye
61a2(rgyud): dgu'i bdag po pang byung pad ma skyes// kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba// dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag/ blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang // mkha
61a3(rgyud): rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan// zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas// 'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad// legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa// snying
61a4(rgyud): rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad// rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo// blo yangs par bkram zhing rnam par grags// kun tu longs spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog/ blo gros ba/ 
61a5(rgyud): pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs// sangs rgyas pad+ma ma 'argyas 'dra ba'i zhal// dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thang // snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul/ 
61a6(rgyud): ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun gnyis rab gsal ba// spyan zur mnga' ni rab dul gtod legs pa// 'jig rten zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra// mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs// drag po 'jigs pa
61a7(rgyud): sdig sel gsum las skyes// rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris pa sla// rab tu drag pa gnyen rab gser mdog can// lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams// spyan gsum rig pa gsum
61a8(rgyud): ldan me gsum sel// 'od bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'// na bza' bzang banabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen// legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mnga'// na bza' sna tshogs
61b1(rgyud): sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal// zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra// zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad// bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'// zhal mdangs rgya mtshogs la mdzad/ 
61b2(rgyud): lam me ba// dbang chen rdo rje'i thogs lags 'jigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin// sgra rnyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan// blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog/ rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzi
61b3(rgyud): rin chen zhal dang ldan// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang // stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing
61b4(rgyud): brtags// mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris bskyed pa'i rgyu// sgyul dad 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can// mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan// ston pa bzang po stong pa nyid lam
61b5(rgyud): gyi stegs// gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad/ brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa// dkyil 'khor dang pa kun gyi slob dpon lags// gcig pu skye dgu'i dkyil
61b6(rgyud): 'khor cho ga mkhyen// rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes// dbang bskur brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas// gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags// skye dgu rnams kyi/ 
61b7(rgyud): nyon mongs sel ba dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas// bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa// 'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang // nam mkha'i snying po sems
61b8(rgyud): can gcig pu yi// mdun 'dug nang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang // de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing // dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar par 'gyur// g.yul dang mthab rtsod shin tu ma
62a1(rgyud): bzang dang // mu ge'i gnod pa mi nang byung ba na// mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dang skyes nas// nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa// de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams
62a2(rgyud): cad dang // sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol// des na zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang // bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur// bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel
62a3(rgyud): bar bya ba 'am// rgyal srid 'thob dang byang gzugs nor 'thob dang // rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi sgrub phyir// bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de phyir ji ste rtag tu 'dod
62a4(rgyud): bde kun// 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba// namadamakha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la// rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang brtan par bgyi// 'phags pa na mkha'i snying
62a5(rgyud): po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang
62a6(rgyud): bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ snying rje chen po kun tu bzang po na mkha'i dkyil kun rab 'byams ma lus pa dang / mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyas/ 
62a7(rgyud): bta sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing / dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang / 
62a8(rgyud): rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa yon tan chen po'i sku// sa kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun tu bzang po gzugs snga
62b1(rgyud): tshogs can/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po
62b2(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun tu yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ na mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku
62b3(rgyud): rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas
62b4(rgyud): pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gyi kun tu bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legaso legs so// sangs rgyas 'byung ba tham
62b5(rgyud): cad kyi snying po gzungs chen po shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog/ lus 'od zer 'bru ma gyis snang bar byas pas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
62b6(rgyud): cang g.yo bar byas nas/ gzungs 'di bshad do// tad+ya thA/ oM na mo na masti/ b+hu ba ni/ shwa re/ ma hA b+ho gA ya/ a sa ma sa ma/ a mr-i ta sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma/ ga ga na sa ma/ tri b+hu ba nas ma/ 
62b7(rgyud): a she Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ pa ra mAR+Wa sa ma/ swa b+ha ba sa ma/ ta tha tA sa ma/ a ra dzi sa ma/ a d+hI sa ma/ bud+d+hi sa ma/ d+harma ta thA tA sa ma/ a b+hi Sha sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ e kA nA ya sA ga ra/ bi shud+d+he/ 
62b8(rgyud): A lo ka/ hI hI/ lab+d+ha lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ oM/ pra sa ga ta/ na ya na ya/ ha ma/ nir d+hiSh+ThA na/ saM b+ho ga/ a a na la ya la ya/ d+harma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza ya/ hUM hUM/ d+he ma d+ha ma swA hA/ de nas/ 
63a1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// bcom ldan
63a2(rgyud): 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas/ de skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byas so// de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub
63a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.yo bas rgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de/ dkyil 'alnga
63a4(rgyud): nas langs nas/ ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/ smras pa kye ma snying rje chen po dang / yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba
63a5(rgyud): chen mo/ mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam ni / sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongasu smin bar bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas
63a6(rgyud): med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas/ 'phags pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la/ lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs
63a7(rgyud): chen mo bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par bsags shing / bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthor bas/ byang chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la/ 
63a8(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni/ sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di
63b1(rgyud): mnyam par yang mi nus na/ gzung ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos/ gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o// kye ma gzungs chen mo
63b2(rgyud): 'di sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o// 'tsho ba bzang pos 'tshe ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis bzhi bzang ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// / 
63b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o// yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// 'di lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// lan
63b4(rgyud): gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// // lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis/ nyon mongs pa thams ca da las thar par 'gyur ro// de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis/ gong nas
63b5(rgyud): gong du yon tan rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'chag bzhin du bzlas pa dpyas na/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// 
63b6(rgyud): shing gcig bsgrengs kyi drung du bzlas brjod byas na/ grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// 'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ sems can thams cing dbang du 'gyur ro// nags tshal chen por/ 
63b7(rgyud): nang du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na/ bsam gtan chen po thob par 'gyur la/ nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil
63b8(rgyud): mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ me tog la sogs pa ji rnyed pa mchod nas/ lus ngal bar gyur gyi bar du/ gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/ ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na/ rmi lam du byang chub sems
64a1(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ chos kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad do// 'di skad du/ 
64a2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras legaso legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod che brjes nas sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsung ngo // de nas lus bde ba
64a3(rgyud): dang ta sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro// mthu chen po dang / che bar grags par yang 'gyur ro// lha rnams
64a4(rgyud): kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo // nang par langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnam ngas bklag par bya'o// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / 
64a5(rgyud): bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing / sdig pa thams cad dang bral/ te/ nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs
64a6(rgyud): pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro// lha la sogs pa yang de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni/ 
64a7(rgyud): ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje'i gtsug pungad la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa/ 
64a8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen mo rnams dang / rin chen drag pa can la
64b1(rgyud): sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo tshon mo rnams dang / lha ma sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / dar chen dang / gzugs bzang dang / shin tu lta na sdug pa
64b2(rgyud): la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang / lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / ma mo
64b3(rgyud): la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad
64b4(rgyud): langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sna
64b5(rgyud): tshogs kun gyi 'byor pa che// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje'i mtsho/ ga/ sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag/ rdo rje chen po/ dgyes pa che// gzi brjid chen po stobs po che// gnon dang rab
64b6(rgyud): gnon dpal gyi rab// khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal// rdo rje che na po rab tu bzhad// sgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa// rol mo chen pos rnam par rol// rab dga' chen pos 'dul ba po// lha chen
64b7(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po ste// btsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag/ sa stengs sa 'og sa la dgyes// de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa// dul dang sbyin pa'i go rims thabs// rab mkhyen stong gi
64b8(rgyud): mnga' bdag lags// shes nyen can te bzod la dgyes// brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che// brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa// stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste// mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang / 
65a1(rgyud): yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba// rdul sel rgya mtsho chen po ste// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mchog// rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs// cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa
65a2(rgyud): mdzes pa skal pa bzang // shin tu sdug pa dga' ba skyed pa// snying po chen po las byung ba// nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'// sa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' dang // rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul
65a3(rgyud): can/ gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs// rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra// rmugs dang smyo bzhi par mdzad// thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil// g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes pa ste/ 
65a4(rgyud): g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa// gsungs bzang ngang pa'i gdangs su bzhad // dbang po nyi dbang dbang chen sras// dbang po'i las lhag thub dang mnyam// chos 'dzin 'byor dang
65a5(rgyud): ldan par bstan// rab dga'i bun longs zhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skems par mdzad// dbang po rgyags nga'i rims nad sel// khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms// 
65a6(rgyud): gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang mnyam// mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang // mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das// sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig/ byang chub snying po rgya cher rol// rim pa
65a7(rgyud): rab ston dge ba ste// spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge/ gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa// ngag mdzad sreg mdzad mchog sbyin po// 'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms// 'thob
65a8(rgyud): mdzad dpe med gsung ba po// rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba// skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag/ nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa// sems can 'khor ba zhi mdzad pa// brtan po sdig pa rnams
65b1(rgyud): dang bral// kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba po// kun tu rgyus pa'i dkyil 'khor can// kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad// kun tu nyes pa sel ba lags// mi bzangs 'og rnam par dkrugs// de bzhin
65b2(rgyud): zad mdzad thugs par mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs// nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad// 'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phrog mdzad pa// rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad
65b3(rgyud): rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa// snang ba thams cad nges par 'joms// pha rol zhugs pa'i sdig sel ba// dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can// dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin// 'bras bu
65b4(rgyud): sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa// ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin// longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa// dbang phyug sbyin ni tshig sbyin pa// nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can// gzugs ban/ 
65b5(rgyud): dbang po rnam par rgyal// dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa// bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs// sa 'dzin gzung ba rang / ka' ba po// dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa/ 
65b6(rgyud): 'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad// rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam// sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba can// yon tan ye shes thog chen ldan// brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can// gsung ba
65b7(rgyud): chen po shes rab che// sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa// mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi// theg pa bla na med par ldan// mchod pa chen po'i chos che ba// 'bras bu chen po chos kyi mchog/ ston mdzad 'dul
65b8(rgyud): mdzad ston pa po// zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa// bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid// kun tu rab 'byam sel mdzad pa// snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen// snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// snying rje
66a1(rgyud): chen po yongs su rdzogs// dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad// mtsho mchog dang ba rab mtho ba// rtsod chen 'das pa spyod yul can// skye dgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa// rnyed par
66a2(rgyud): dka' ba'i ral 'byor can// kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba// dga' ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po// kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste// zhe sa bzang po rtag tu mnga'// dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ 
66a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma lags// zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs// mkhas brgyags spangs chog mkhyen// spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'/ 
66a4(rgyud): dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mkhyen// slob dpon chen po grags pa/ che// dam pa nyid de bla na med// gsang sngags rlabs da ni rgyas par mdzad// de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni// yon tan
66a5(rgyud): brgya yi spos kyis rgyas// dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs / yon tan 'byung ba rig sngags rgyal// gtsug na norabu thogs la sogs// mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas
66a6(rgyud): kyang ta sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs// kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin// mi rnams la la gang zhig gis// sdig
66a7(rgyud): bsal kun tu bzang po la// snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na// des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don// mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing // de bzhin
66a8(rgyud): gshegs tshul che ba yi// ye shes ma lus smra bar nus// de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya'i spobs las nges par 'byung 'gyur zhing // yon tan sna tshogs byung dang 'jig rten yan chad
66b1(rgyud): dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams las// bstod pa chen po snang byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam ngag yon tan 'jug
66b2(rgyud): gnas 'gyur// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgya
66b3(rgyud): pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Ta/ sarba
66b4(rgyud): duSh+TAn ta ka/ ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ de nas gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu/ sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas/ nyam thag pa'i skad
66b5(rgyud): phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha/ ha zhes 'dzer to// lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang / rgyan gyi char chen po phab po// bcom
66b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du/ rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// sdang ba sel ba dang / 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig/ rdo rje 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom
66b7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba lags so// rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad bzlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad bzlog pa dang / sdang ba tham/ 
66b8(rgyud): cad sel ba dang / dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang / 
67a1(rgyud): stobs bskyed pa dang / gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa bskyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyi ba dang / 
67a2(rgyud): sdang ba 'joms pa dang / snang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal
67a3(rgyud): 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs par bgyid pa sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / mtshams ma
67a4(rgyud): mchis pa bzlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang // bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyed pa dang ma/ skal pa bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad
67a5(rgyud): dga' bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci/ 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum/ tshegs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab/ 
67a6(rgyud): pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byang stems dang
67a7(rgyud): ro longs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang / srog 'jigs pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po byung ba na/ nang par langs nas/ lus khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal ste/ kha shar
67a8(rgyud): phyogs su bltas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing / lan bdun brjod na brjod pa tsam gyis/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur
67b1(rgyud): la/ thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so// de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur
67b2(rgyud): nas/ rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje 'jig pa dgyes pa che// rdo rje snying po stobs po che// rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags/ 
67b3(rgyud): pa cheta snying rje chen po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje hUM gi hUM lags te// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs pa po// chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che// chags pa'i zhags pa
67b4(rgyud): mgyogs pa che// phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste// spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags// rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che// mthon la thing dbu sbas rgyan pa lags// ral gri sngon po ral gri che// dkyil
67b5(rgyud): 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can// mthon ka'i spyan ting bu sngon// 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan// rdo rje sngon po stobs mim tshungs// rdo rdorje spro ba'i stobs che ba// khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che// 
67b6(rgyud): sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel// khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod// khro bo bgegs ris sel bar mdzad// gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa ste// rdo rje'i mangs ni nges par 'gums
67b7(rgyud): dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams// rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms// rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che// 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu khro// sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris// gzi brjid skyed
67b8(rgyud): pa grags mdzad pa// bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod// sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa// drag po chen po rdo rje khro// skyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad// gting dpag dka' ba ring du
68a1(rgyud): gshegs// rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'// rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan// dam pa'i ti se lhun po'i ri// gang rgyangs chen pos gzhad pa po// spyod yul bskal pa
68a2(rgyud): grangs med gsum// rig grangs 'chang mchog rdo rje can// rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags// na bza' dza gong rtsa dmar gsol// mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes// srin po srung / 
68a3(rgyud): po drag po ste// me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes// nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od // 'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed// grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po// rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod// 
68a4(rgyud): mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba// mgur bzang zhal ba bzung dam pa lags// cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od// phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa// ye shes che ldan srung
68a5(rgyud): ba ched rlung mar lags te spyod yul ring // gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha ro// la gshegs// 'jigs las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa// / rgya chen gtsug na nor bu thogs// mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs
68a6(rgyud): mtshon// 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig/ gsum gzigs rtse gsum btsug pud gsum// 'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshon// za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad// mtho bsku mchog zhal gsum pa/ 
68a7(rgyud): tsham chom med de srin las byung // rtag par dkar dgyes dus 'byor pa// rgyu skar rgyal ris 'phel bar mdzad// rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste// bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags// bai DUr+ya ltar dri
68a8(rgyud): med sku// mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs// dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad// dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog/ lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste// brtan po dpa' bo lam me ba// bde ba chen
68b1(rgyud): po 'ching ba gcong // dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba// mtshon che che rdzogs cod pan can// rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba// pad+ma chen po phyag ring ba// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mdog/ nag po nA/ 
68b2(rgyud): po 'byung po che// gtum chen thog thog chen po ste// rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa// rtul phod thub pa brtsan pa ste// 'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje// zhi ba dbang
68b3(rgyud): po rdo rje'i mtshon// brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems// rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rje lcags mangs sreg mdzad pa// rdo rje mangs ni rnam par sbyong // rdo rje don
68b4(rgyud): yod rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal// ye shes dam pa theg pa che// thabs brnyes snying rje chen po lags// rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can// spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po// rdo rje dril bu
68b5(rgyud): rnam dag spyan// 'dza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen// rdo rje chen po dgo na pa po// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje chen po gang rgyangs sgrogs// me tog chun po 'od gsal ba// dag pa zas
68b6(rgyud): gtsang sras kyi sras// nges pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags// sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog/ rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje gtsug sdud shes rab can// rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes// mdzes pa shin tu rnam
68b7(rgyud): par dag/ bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags// dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang // rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gi rjed// gsang ba pa ste gsang ba gsungs// skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba// rdo rje thog thog sgra chen
68b8(rgyud): sgrogs// rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms// rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba chen 'bar ba// nor bu spras pa'i na bza' gsol// spos dang me tog phreng gis rgyan// dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags// sa@/ 
69a1(rgyud): rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dbang phyug chen po grags pa che// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa
69a2(rgyud): po tata dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags// de lta rdo rje dbang phyug mgon// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod// de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs
69a3(rgyud): pata/ rdo rje gsang bas rgyan pa yi// rdo rje brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung // sdang ba thams cad bzlog byed pa// ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// dad pas gang zhig 'chang byed pa// 
69a4(rgyud): grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // nyes pa kun las rnam par grol// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'bra/ dang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che// gang zhig nang pa/ 
69a5(rgyud): langs nas brjod// de ni sdig pa kun las grol// ngan 'gro ku na las thar par 'gyur// gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di// su zhig nang par langs nas brjod// rgyal po blon po/ 
69a6(rgyud): grong khyer pa// gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur// bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa// 'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang // tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ 
69a7(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa bzhin// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nang par langs nas ni// lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod// de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang // ldan 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ming brgya rtsa brgyad
69a8(rgyud): 'don pa la// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang // zil gyis mnan par mi nus so// shes rab can ni gang zhig gis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog gton na/ 
69b1(rgyud): gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang // bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don// mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi// bde ba de yis
69b2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
69b3(rgyud): pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i rnam
69b4(rgyud): par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dang / del gzhon nur gyur pa/ thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cadabral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyi rgyan
69b5(rgyud): pa'i sku// zhabs brten gyi pad+ma la/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang klu dang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems
69b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho/ ma hA ma Ni/ ru tsi ra ka lA pa/ bi tsi tra/ muk+Sha dA ma/ a la kr-i ta sha rI ra/ 
69b7(rgyud): pa ra ma satwa mo tsa ka/ ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma/ ko Sha d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma/ lab d+ha/ bi dza ya/ su ra ta/ sam+b+ho ga pa dar sha ka/ kle sha ga ra/ pra sha ma ka/ shU n+yA tA swa b+hA ba/ a nu swe ri/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra/ ba ra ta/ 
69b8(rgyud): bar dang / ma ma pa sha bras pa/ ma sams ma/ an rna sa mas man+ta/ b+hang/ sa mnas d+h+yar/ si san+ta rAg pa/ sa mad mas ra/ sangs ra/ hiti ma d+hu ba/ ma hA badz+ram lnga len/ sI Tir+tha/ khyi khyi
70a1(rgyud): ba ra ba dang / karma a pag ma ka/ ku pu Shu/ d+ha ru d+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ su ru su ru/ d+had+hAd+han+ta/ d+hud+hAd+hA d+hA/ mahAm hA/ many+dzum hA/ maho la ma ya/ b+h+yaH/ shrI ma b+hI ma/ nang nang / 
70a2(rgyud): sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ mo tsa ya/ mA ma nA tha/ mo nu sr-i ta/ a pA ya du/ khan su khaM da ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ a nr-i thai ha~M/ duHkhi ti haM/ sar dza ha~M/ u pad du to ha a bi bik+to ha/ ku sI dzo haM/ maH d+harma
70a3(rgyud): hatatAn b+ha ga bAn/ duHkhi ta nAn/ su khan da dA/ a nA thA nAn/ sa nA thA ka ra/ sa ra dza saM/ bI ra dza ska ra/ u pad dru tA mAn/ sa ro pa tra ba/ pra sha ma ka/ a bi big tA nAn/ ku sha la sam+b+ha ra/ 
70a4(rgyud): pa ri bI ra yi tA/ ku si dA nAn+da/ ma hA bIr+ya te/ mar Na/ me mi ta/ ba dAd tA/ ma ma bi b+ha bAn/ nA tho b+hA ba~M/ shar// ba ra yA nA tutwA/ sarba du khA no/ me pre sha ma ya/ saH
70a5(rgyud): kle shar dzi si mi/ a ba na ma/ sarba sa na/ sa ro ba drag du/ kha ni me/ nA she ya/ sarba ku sha la d+harma/ pa ri pu ram mo/ ku ru/ sarba karme/ a ba ra Na/ kle sha ba ra tAm/ mi dzi kaM/ 
70a6(rgyud): rata ma hA bo d+hi satwa si bi d+hi/ bIr+ya bA ra mi tA/ yo gam+b+he/ san+ni yo dza ya/ A ba ra Na/ d+harma/ bi rA ga bi ra dza/ sany+tsa ha pra dza ha/ d+ha ri No/ sa ma kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+hi sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+ha
70a7(rgyud): satwa/ ba ra nga swA hA// rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na// de ma thag tu sems can rnams// skye dang rga bzang par gyur// ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas// 
70a8(rgyud): bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'angar// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'// log 'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur// sdig pa zhi bar byed ba yi// gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mdo la yang // grangs meng phrag na
70b1(rgyud): dung byung snyed// 'khor ba'i brtson dag nas thar// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing // gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na// brag dang nags dang
70b2(rgyud): tshal du bcas// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos// sangs rgyas 'od kyis snang ba yis// sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // srin
70b3(rgyud): po mi bzang gzugs can rnams// stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes// skad phyung tshig ni 'thun par smra// lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can// thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas// gang na rdo rje ral gri
70b4(rgyud): che tata/ de yi drung lcags smras pa ni// phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo/ rje'i mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la// shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can// bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab
70b5(rgyud): 'joms pa// sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang // sna tshogs gzugs can mau yi bdag/ shin tu stobs ldan / gzugs mdzes 'jigs// drag po drag po rab 'joms pa// 
70b6(rgyud): gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal// dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe// rdo rje can de snying sbyor ba// mi shes pa yi rab rib sel// sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba// skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par
70b7(rgyud): dgyes// gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba// nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad// mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can// spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste// dgyes shing na bza' sna
70b8(rgyud): tshogs gsol// 'jam pa'i dbyangs te rab tu bzhad// dkar gnag 'byed pa'i spyan mnga' ba// ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu bsgrags// rab tu dka' ba ston par dga'// rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan// rgya mtsho'i
71a1(rgyud): snying po'i spyod yul can// tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste// sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad// cha lugs sngo bas skyong ba// lha'i bdag po dga' bar mdzad// 'dong ba'i lha ste/ 
71a2(rgyud): 'dod sel brtan// rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa// brtan po rnams la brtan par grags// yon tan dag gi phyogs su gzhang// btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa// rtag tu mchod cing brjed pa lags// 
71a3(rgyud): stobs po che la shugs che ba// phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po// sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste// mdzes shes rab srung ngo tsha shes// dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen por ston pa
71a4(rgyud): po/ tadakyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste// dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// zhabs la brjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan// ha ha swA hA'i bdag
71a5(rgyud): che ba tata mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam// hUM gis 'jigs mdza nga 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po// lha dang lha min rnams kyis btung // de bzhin mchod cing ri mor
71a6(rgyud): bgyis// zha 'bring gang rgyangs chen po can// rlung drag mun pa sel bar mdzad// 'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags// gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba// drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba// 
71a7(rgyud): mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can// 'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu spyod// spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa// nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba// nyi ma'i 'od 'dra
71a8(rgyud): 'ja' khugs bzhin// tha ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bzhad// mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad// nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin// dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin// gzugs sbyin de/ 
71b1(rgyud): bzhin stobs sbyin pa// dpal ldan dpal mdzang bgegs gnon ri// kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad// 'dus pa'i nang du gangan gshegs pa// zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa// dpung
71b2(rgyud): / rgyan snyan cha gdub 'khor can// nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron// rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po// ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa// dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog/ 
71b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste// 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa// dkar ba sngo ba 'od bzang ba// mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags// ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba// de bzhin cha lugs
71b4(rgyud): rab tu ston// shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad// ston nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa// byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhye na// rnam par grags pa gsan pa nges// rig sngags 'am
71b5(rgyud): ba rnams kyis bstod// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po nAM// shin tu rnam brgyal 'khor los bsgyur// 'jigs med blo gros shes rab can// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
71b6(rgyud): 'dzin pa// mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste// zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa// lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur// sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad// sems can kun la rab ston pa// brtan
71b7(rgyud): po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi blo la mkhas// sred med bu ste drag shul stobs// me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste// byis pa'i sku mchog mchog sbyin pa// rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad// 
71b8(rgyud): phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad// bdag gir mi mdzad rtul med brtan// mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa// bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po// mi mchog brtson pa bstod du med// de bzhin thub
72a1(rgyud): med rnam par rgyal// brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// mya ngan med cing gnas pa med// 'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang // dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam par 'jom
72a2(rgyud): tshad med nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs// mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog/ gshin rje 'pham mdzad skye dgu srung // las dang nyon mongs rab bsregs pa// ston
72a3(rgyud): mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags// legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan// brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing // dad pa bskyed par byed pa 'di// lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad// bgegs
72a4(rgyud): chen dang ni log 'dren dang // gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang // ma/ dngas 'phrog rkun po rgod rnams kyis// de ring legs par ba stod par gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab// bsgyings
72a5(rgyud): pas lha yangs bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun la bltas nas kyang / 'di skad du ni tshig smras pa// khyod kun rtag tu bgegs me da cing // nges legs thar pa thob gyur la// 'jigs med
72a6(rgyud): bkra yang shis par shog/ nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig/ de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing // 'brug cher sgra ltar sgrogs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas// shar phyogs gzigs
72a7(rgyud): nas bka' stsal pa// kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul// sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs// shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur// kye ma bsod
72a8(rgyud): nams cher bcas pa'i// sems can rnams ni rab sbyangs phyir// dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs// 'jam pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad// la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas// sdug bsngal
72b1(rgyud): thams cad sel ba yi// grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa 'am// yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung // de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur// sdig pa thams
72b2(rgyud): cad rnam dag pa// de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kyi sa chen yang // ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis// rab dga' shin tu dri ma med
72b3(rgyud): 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyangs dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur// ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// sa chen dam pa de dag kyang // gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi// / 
72b4(rgyud): sems can chen pos mi thogs par// tshe zang nas ni thob par 'gyu dang // sdig pa thams cad rnam ngag dang // sems can kun la sdug pa dang // spros pa thams cad ni ba yi// byang chub bla
72b5(rgyud): med thob par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang / sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing // bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di// sor mo bcu yi
72b6(rgyud): thal sbyar nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyi su// nang par langs nas su brjod pa// de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang // de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams// 
72b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag/ rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang // de bzhin rdo rje'i mchog 'chang rnams// de la nges par srung
72b8(rgyud): bar byed// de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing // mnyam par gzhag pa snang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams// bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag/ dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yi// rgyang ma
73a1(rgyud): ngag nas phyag kyang 'tshal// de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas// 'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so// lan gcig bklags na tshangs chen dang // bsod nams mnyam par thob par 'gyur// 
73a2(rgyud): shes rab chen po gang zhig gis// nyi zer mtshan mchog brjod byas na// dri ma med cing rab dag la// rab tu 'od gsal sgra rnyan dang // sems can thams cad dga' ba yi// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang
73a3(rgyud): 'thob// mtshungs pa med cing stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang // 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing // yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi// gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnam
73a4(rgyud): kyis legs par gsungs pa yin// 'phags pa 'jam dang la gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// 
73a5(rgyud): 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
73a6(rgyud): sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mr-i ta/ bin+du dza ba/ ma hA su kha swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
73a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshom par mdzad nas/ bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di byung bas/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen
73a8(rgyud): po bskyed pa legaso legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzungs sngags 'di thos pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 
73b1(rgyud): gang la la'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de yang / sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la bsnyung bar 'dug cing / 
73b2(rgyud): gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod la/ bskor ba byas nas/ bzlas brjod byas na/ dam pa ci 'dod/ 
73b3(rgyud): pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la/ spos la sogs pas
73b4(rgyud): mchod de/ bzlas brjod byas na/ rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ da bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / nyon mo ngas pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do// de na
73b5(rgyud): rdo rje me tog thong chen pos gsum gyi dbang phyug dang / thabs gcu gtu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas/ stan la sa langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
73b6(rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa// sems can kun gyi gtso bo che// byang chub sems dpa' tshul che ba// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// chos dbyings
73b7(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing // nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba// skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing // theg
73b8(rgyud): pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa// theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te// theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// snang ba chen por snang ba brnyes// yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag/ zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/ 
74a1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal// theg pa chen po dag pa che// sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnam grangs pa// rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// 
74a2(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal// dar ba chen po nyon mongs choms// bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste// rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal// zla ba chen po nyi ma che// lhun po chen po dbang phyug che// lha
74a3(rgyud): chen mgon po chen po ste// 'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing // sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa// kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che// rnam sel khyod la phyag
74a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa ste// chos kyi spyo dad yul gshegs pa lags// ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che// sreng bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sku mdzes yon tan
74a5(rgyud): snying po mkhyen// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che// ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// bstan pa gnas dbang bdag po ste// bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/ 
74a6(rgyud): / yangs pa dri med shes rab can// snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon// zhi ba 'jig rten dag par mdzad// ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na// dpa' btsan khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 
74a7(rgyud): skal pa chen po nyon mongs bcom// 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste// zhi ba zhi mdzad pade byung ba// chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che// bde 'gror gnas pa dri ma
74a8(rgyud): med ta rnam ngag zugs mnga' ni ba mkhyen// nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rtse mo yangs pa rnam par grags// sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa// snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog dkyil 'khor
74b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog/ dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra// rnam gsum mkhyen pa brnyes pa'i bdag/ rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems/ 
74b2(rgyud): dpa'i yon tan gyi// 'byor pa brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes// bskal pa dag ni grangs med par// tshogs chen bsags khyod phyag 'tshalo// sa la gnas pas chen brnyes// sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ 
74b3(rgyud): yang dgas 'dzin las byung ba// ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshalo// ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa// nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel// ting nge 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba// mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal// 
74b4(rgyud): mgon po chen po snang ba che// sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel// ni gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa// yon tan pa mthar khyod phyug 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa// chos
74b5(rgyud): kun ni ba phun sum tshogs// dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa// rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje chen po dri med mchog/ rdo rje mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'// namakha' ma lus
74b6(rgyud): yul dang ldan// ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'// de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa// sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong // shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras// sred gtsang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dkyil
74b7(rgyud): 'khor rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sul can rnams kyi rtsal// rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen chen po rin chen blo// rin chen rdo rje'i 'od che ba// rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung // 
74b8(rgyud): rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad paM// stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes shing // ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston// stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan// stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshalo// shes rab mtshungs med/ 
75a1(rgyud): shes rab can// dag pa rnam dgas dang bral// chos cig las byung snang ba po// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags// 'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa// 'jig rten
75a2(rgyud): chos las snang bar 'das// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes// rgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag/ nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste// phyag chen skye bo kun la phan// sa 'dzin rnam par grags
75a3(rgyud): pa po to ta kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyod pa// dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog/ dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can// dga' ba ldan pa khyod phyag
75a4(rgyud): 'tshal// sgeg chen 'dzin zhing dgongs par ldan// rnam par skye ga la spyod pa brtan// rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog/ sgeg che na khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i
75a5(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// bla med mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad
75a6(rgyud): la/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// rdo rje bstan pa rnam grags pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yis// dkyil
75a7(rgyud): 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa// 'di dag so sor brjod byed na// nga ni nyes pa kun bzlog cing // rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang // nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis/ 
75a8(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la// blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa// de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ nang par langs nas brjod byed pa// sdang ba thams cad de dbang
75b1(rgyud): 'gyurateta bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su btang // sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang // de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang // ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing // sa mchog chen po thob par
75b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ gang zhig nges par gnas byas la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa// nges ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa// ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// rgyud chen ldan zhing blo tsha ba// gang zhig/ 
75b3(rgyud): ming mchog 'don pa ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bstan pa la// ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags/ 
75b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa rdzogs so// // 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po/ byang
75b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'alo// oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA pA sha/ ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha/ badz+ra satwa swAhA// de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi// gtsu
75b6(rgyud): 'di bshad ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par 'gyur// sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras// skal ldan chen po legs
75b7(rgyud): legs// sa stengs khyod kyis yangs par byas// khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing // yon tan dpag med mchog bskyed pa// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang // nyes pa bzlog cing thos pa
75b8(rgyud): 'di te 'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na// nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te// ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag/ 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin// lus can dag la su yang rung // khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed/
