76a1(rgyud): pa/ de dag las ni gcig tsam yang // byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog/ thos nas mos par byed pa dang // nges par yon tan
76a2(rgyud): thams cad kyang // thos par 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor// langs te sa yi dbang phyug po// sa yi snying po sa mchog la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni// sa yi snying po
76a3(rgyud): gtso bo che// glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// cod pan can tes brnyes pa// phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog/ rigs ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas// gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po// gzhi
76a4(rgyud): bcas ldan pa'i klung gi tshul// swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i ra// thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ma'i mchog/ snying po snying po mkhyen dpar grags// gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol// sa yi
76a5(rgyud): dbang phyug gar thabs can// sgeg po zhal bzang gar ma khan ldan// 'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po// rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen// snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med/ 
76a6(rgyud): mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba// shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs// 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal zhing // gar stabs chen po ston pa po// ston pa dpag bsam shing
76a7(rgyud): dang 'dra// nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa// nyi ma chen po nyid yin te// dbang phyug chen po 'bar ba bskor// yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa// sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can// 
76a8(rgyud): chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che// yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho// yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog/ thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste/ 
76b1(rgyud): theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med// mchod pa chen po sgo che ba// zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje 'chang chen mtshon brgya pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor me tog thong // blo gros chen po phyag
76b2(rgyud): ring ba// pad+ma chen po stobs po che// sngags 'chang chen po stobs cher ldan// sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags// lag na rdo rje yon tan nges// nor bu'i me tog thod kyis rgyan// mnyam nyid 'byam
76b3(rgyud): la longs spyod ba// rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can// rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan// sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin// sa la longs spyod longs spyod che// mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs// rab
76b4(rgyud): 'byam snod ni rnam par grags// smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'tshe mas pa// spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste// me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings// spro ba chen po phyag ring ba// brtan po
76b5(rgyud): brtan pa bde sbyin pa// ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste/ gangs can lhun po lta bu lags// dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang // btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug/ 
76b6(rgyud): 'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs// de bzhin nyid tshul spyod tshul can// rin chen tog ste cher bzhang pa// dbyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// gzigs pa ring ba spyan yangs pa// nam mkha'
76b7(rgyud): bzhin du thogs pa med// thogs pa med dpogs rin chen gtsug/ srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu// dul ba nyon mongs dri ma gsal// dag pa gtsang ma gso sbyong can// rnam par gnon pa yul
76b8(rgyud): las 'das// ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che// stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba// bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can// dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed// sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'jom pa
77a1(rgyud): mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan// dga' ba rgyal cher rab 'byung ba// rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen// rigs kun tu ni mchod pa lags// rgyal po rigs
77a2(rgyud): chos skyed pa'i rten// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// mngon par 'phags pa khyad par mchog/ mgrin bzangs nad dang
77a3(rgyud): bral ba lags// skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste// sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa// sgrol ba smin mdzad sdud par mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btud// rab zhugs dkyil 'kho
77a4(rgyud): rnams la mkhas// rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten// grub pa sbyi na pa rnam dag mchog/ tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po// dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste// 'od zer ljang ku'i 'od dang 'dra// 
77a5(rgyud): ser la na bza' ser po banabs// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ gyis rgyan// spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal// nor bu sna tshogs/ 'od 'byung ba// rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro// mnyam nyid
77a6(rgyud): mnyam pa dri ma med// sku yang dag cing na bza' dag/ dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan// dag pa'i chos mnga' dang ba ste// 'byung ldan sreg pa sel mdzad pa// 'khor ba zad mdzod shes rab can// tshul
77a7(rgyud): shes tshul la spyod yul ba// rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags// rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che// 'byung ldan rab 'byam shes rab can// ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba// sa yi snying po snying po tshe// rdo rje'i snyi
77a8(rgyud): po rnam par 'dren// dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs// khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil// dga' ba dang bskyed pa ste/ 
77b1(rgyud): ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba// rlung gi drag shul lta bur grags// drag po lags te drag sel btsang // rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la zhi// rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad// lhun po ti se ma la yas// 
77b2(rgyud): spyo yul zab ma nong pa ste// rin chen rdo rje snying po tshe// sa gni spyod yul mnga' ba lags// rin chen drag las byung ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dag gis rgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa lhur dgyes pa
77b3(rgyud): shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags// rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste// phyogs cha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che// de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis/ 
77b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas bstod nas ni// rdo rjes gsum dbang mchog smras// yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis// ming brgyabargyad mchog brjod cing // nyes pa bzlog pa 'di las gats+tsha
77b5(rgyud): sa yi steng na ngas ma mthong // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste// sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang // dri ma kun bral yon tan nges// de phyir
77b6(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad kyis// phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di// rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// bsam pa kun dang / 
77b7(rgyud): 'byor pa yi// gnas mchog bla na med pa ste// dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yi// yid ni shin tu dang ba yis// sa yi snying po mtshan gsal ba// 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i// 
77b8(rgyud): yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang // dpal yon rgya cher 'dzin pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mi ni gang zhig brjod byed pa// sdug bsngal kun las myur du grol// 'phags
78a1(rgyud): / pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya me tI pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra d+hI/ bod skad du/ 
78a2(rgyud): 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ne mo b+ha ga ba te/ shAkya
78a3(rgyud): mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te a dzi te/ a pa rA dzi te/ a dzi tany+dza ya/ ha ra ha ra/ me tri a ba lo ki taM/ ka ra ka ra/ ma hA sa ma ya sid+d+hi/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ 
78a4(rgyud): ma hA bo d+hi maN+Da bI dze/ sma ra sma ra/ A sma kaM sa ma ya/ bo d+hi bo d+hi / ma hA bo d+hi swA hA// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so// oM mo hi/ dmo hi/ ma hA mo hi swA hA/ snying po'o// oM mu ni mu ni sma ra swA hA// nye
78a5(rgyud): ba'i snying po'o// gzungs 'di nyan pa tsam dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la sems pa dang / bsgoms pa tsam gyis/ gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
78a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na/ bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o// tha na
78a7(rgyud): dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i ri dgas dang / bya rnams kyi rna khung du sgrog par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo// 'di thos pa tsam gyis/ nam du yang
78a8(rgyud): ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ ngan song gi dri mas kyang mi gos so// ma'i mngal du yang mi skye'o// lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang
78b1(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can de bstud par mi bgyi lags// nges par bang/ 
78b2(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po la ba mchis nas/ de ji ltar gyur kyang rung / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
78b3(rgyud): rdzogs so// @// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs
78b4(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// // 'di skad bdag gos thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'a/ dus ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
78b5(rgyud): gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phra/ ga du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang // chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rin chen snying po zla
78b6(rgyud): bsnang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas/ chos gos phrag po gcig tu gzar te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
78b7(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
78b8(rgyud): la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
79a1(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba/ khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de
79a2(rgyud): dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
79a3(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na/ des ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
79a4(rgyud): kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la dbade ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod
79a5(rgyud): spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste/ legaso legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis/ mtshams/ med pa lnga 'byang zhing / dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par
79a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig/ oM mu ne hUM ma hA bI ra swA hA// snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do// a hrI hU~M pad+ma pri ya swA hA// 'phags pa spyan
79a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o// oM me ha ra Na sAhA/ byams pa'i snying po'i// oM a gar+b+ha ya swA hA// nam mkha'i snying po'o// oM ma swa hi rA dza ya swA hA// kun tu bzang po'i snying zer/ 
79a8(rgyud): oM ku ru ba na ra ha swA hA// lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o// oM shr-I oM raM ga swA hA// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o// oM nis ra ba swA hA// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying
79b1(rgyud): po'o/ a kr-i ti ha rang swA hA// sa'i snying po'i snying po'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ 
79b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na/ de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom
79b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil
79b4(rgyud): 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ 
79b5(rgyud): skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta b+ha ba nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
79b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab byang chub kyi shing drung na/ 'khor rnam bzhi dang
79b7(rgyud): lha dang / mi rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / rigs drug gi sems can
79b8(rgyud): thams cad la/ spos dang / sman dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung ba
80a1(rgyud): 'di rnams sems can rnams kyi don du byin gyis brlabs tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhal zas kyi
80a2(rgyud): steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du raM dkar po la chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bas zhal zas kyi dri ma dag par gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a dkar po
80a3(rgyud): bsams te/ zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang yo byad du gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ oM zhes pas 'phags pa dang sems can thams cad mnyes shing tshim par gyur to// de nas
80a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje ltar byas te gzungs 'di dgasungs so// oM sarba d+harma tA badz+ra sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM a mr-i ta hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shra mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA khaM/ 
80a5(rgyud): ud ga te s+pha ra Na/ i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ oM ru ru sU ru dz+dza/ la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA// zhes gzungs
80a6(rgyud): 'di brjod ma thag tu mchod pa'i zhal zas kyis mchod nas/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyes pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
80a7(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang / bdag gi bsam pa rnam par
80a8(rgyud): dag pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa thams cad kyi pho brang dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dpag tu med cing brjod kyis mi khyab
80b1(rgyud): pa brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa 'byung zhing rgyas par gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / gsang sngags dang / rigs sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / 
80b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te chos kyi sbyin pa dang / bdag gi zang zing gi sbyin pa 'dis bde ba dang / dga' bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das
80b3(rgyud): kyis legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag bzang skyong legaso// dka' ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu byed pa legs// nga'i 'khor lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o// 
80b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / khyim bdag bzang skyong rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
80b5(rgyud): pa la mngon par bstod de dga' bar gyur to// bdud rtsi 'byung ba/ zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs/ 
80b6(rgyud): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba la chos ston to// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan
80b7(rgyud): pa dag pa dga' bo bas mtha' zhig na chos yid la byed cing / dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug pa las/ de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la/ yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ gzugs byed mi
80b8(rgyud): sdug pa/ shin tu rid cing skem pa/ kha nas me 'bar ba mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phra ba/ skra 'dzings pa sen mo dang mche ba ring la rno ba shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhig/ dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 
81a1(rgyud): dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod nga ste nag bdun na che'i dus byas te/ yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// dga' bos nges smras pa thos nas/ 
81a2(rgyud): shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ yi dgas de la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag che'i dus byas nas yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di// thabs ci byas na sdug bsngal de las yongs su
81a3(rgyud): thar par 'gyur/ de nas yi dgas nges dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te khyod kyis sang gi nyi ma la yi dgas gang ga klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang
81a4(rgyud): drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad dam re re yi zhal zas mchog dam pa phul te/ kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/ tshe ring zhing yi dgas
81a5(rgyud): kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te/ mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyu ra ro// de'i tshe dga' bos yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba/ lus mi sdug pa dang / shin tu ring cing skem pa dang / 
81a6(rgyud): kha nas me 'bar ba dang / mgrin pa mo khab tsam la skra 'dzings pa dang / sen mo dang mche ba ring zhing rno ba yang mthong la// yid du mi 'ong / mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas/ lus skyi bung zhes
81a7(rgyud): byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te/ myur bar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan
81a8(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus 'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol zhes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag pas mtha'
81b1(rgyud): zhig na chos yid la bgyid cing mchis pa las/ yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// khyod nga ste zhag bdun na nges par tshe'i dus byas te/ yi dgas kyi khams su
81b2(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// bdag gis de la thabs ci bgyi na/ yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhes dris na/ nges bdag la khyod kyis yi dgas gang ga'i klung gi bye
81b3(rgyud): ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa brgya stong snyed la/ zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
81b4(rgyud): gis ji lta bur yi dgas dang drang srong la sogs pa de snyed kyi kha zas 'byor par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod 'jigs par
81b5(rgyud): ma byed cig/ khyod kyis yi dgas gang ga'i klung gi bye/ khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang drang srong la so// sa pa la kha zas dang gtor ma mang po 'byor pa'i thabs ngal
81b6(rgyud): yod kyis yid blong bar ma byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ ngal gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i
81b7(rgyud): shugs shes bya ba yod de/ gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na/ yi dgas gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang drang srong la sogs te/ mang po'i kha zas dang
81b8(rgyud): gtor ma chog par 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa cig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas btsal ba'i bri bdu bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bo nga yang bram zer gyur pa na/ 
82a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba las gzungs 'di thos pas na/ de'i dbang gis yi dgas
82a2(rgyud): tshad med pa snyed dang / drang srong mang po la kha zas dang / gtor ma byin par gyur te/ yi dgas kyi khams su skyes pa de dag kyang sdug bsngal las rnam par grol nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes par gyur to// dga'
82a3(rgyud): bo khyod kyis zung shig/ bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kyang 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ 
82a4(rgyud): saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhi ngag tshe ring bar 'dod dam/ bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang / 
82a5(rgyud): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod na/ rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/ yang na dus thams ca/ da du byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba med do// snod gtsang ma'i
82a6(rgyud): nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la chan nam phye 'am/ khur ba la sogs pa cung zad cig btab ste/ lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag ste/ gzungs 'di lan bdun bsngags nas/ de bzhin gshegs
82a7(rgyud): pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ yi dgas thams
82a8(rgyud): cad skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa mi dge ba'i las bcom zhing bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
82b1(rgyud): gzugs dam pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po byad gzugs mi sdug pa bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sku
82b2(rgyud): 'jam klas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis yi dgas mang po'i sgom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas
82b3(rgyud): yid bzhin du za ba dang chog cing 'drangs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i
82b4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po'i 'jigs pa tha mas cad dang bral te/ yi dgas kyi khams zhi bar 'gyuradar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal
82b5(rgyud): pa/ rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu se gol lan gsum byas te/ gtor ma'i snod blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste/ 
82b6(rgyud): sa gtsang mar blugs par bya'o// de ltar gtor ma byin par byas nas/ phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i yi dgas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas
82b7(rgyud): bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro// kha zas de dag yi dgas kyi yid bzhin du za ba dang cho ga 'drangs pa dang / yi dgas kyi khams spong ba dang / mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// dga'
82b8(rgyud): bo gal te dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis/ kha zas la bsngags te yi dgas la sbyin pa byin na/ bsod nams tshad med pa snyed yongs
83a1(rgyud): su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par med de tshe ring ba dang bsod nams dang mdangs dang stobs skye
83a2(rgyud): zhing / 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa thams cad kyis gtse zhing gnod par byed mi nus pa dang / gzhan
83a3(rgyud): la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gal te gang zhig bram ze dang / drang srong la sbyin pa byed 'dod na/ kha zas yongs su dag pa snod gcig gi nang du bkang ste/ gzungs sngags lan
83a4(rgyud): bdun bzlas te/ 'bab chu gtsang mar gtor na/ de ltar byas pa sa lha rdzas kyi zhal zas mchog dam par gyur te/ des na bram ze dang / drang srong de dag kyang sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thob na/ 
83a5(rgyud): sngags kyi byin gyis so so nas/ sngon chad ci dang ci la dga' zhing / mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams su yongs su 'gyur/ khas/ so so nas 'thun par dus gcig tu de la tshe ring ba
83a6(rgyud): dang ta mdangs dang stobs su ldan te/ bde zhing skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so// gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong ba dang / thos pa'i sgo nas yongs su dag cing / shes pa
83a7(rgyud): mi nor ba dag tshangs pa'i lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod
83a8(rgyud): nams dang 'dra ste/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa mi nus par 'gyur ro// gal te dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma'am 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang chos pa
83b1(rgyud): dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/ spos dang me tog dang zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te/ dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs kyi bu pho dang / 
83b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas de lha rdzas kyi zhal zas su gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bstod
83b3(rgyud): pa dang gsol pa gdab pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags shing dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha mang pos rtag tu srung
83b4(rgyud): zhing skyob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par ra 'gyur ro// dga' bo khyod kyis 'di rjes su chos bzhin yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing
83b5(rgyud): thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas par ston cig dang / bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro// yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs
83b6(rgyud): rdzogs so// / yi dgas mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser
83b7(rgyud): skya ni/ shing n+ya gro nga'i kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs
83b8(rgyud): te chos ston to// de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas/ chos mngon sum du byed pa na/ mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la de'i mdun du yi dgas
84a1(rgyud): mo kha 'bar ma 'dug nas smras pa/ kye kun dga' bo khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur te/ yi dgas kyi gnas 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos smras pa/ brten pa'i thabs
84a2(rgyud): ci yod /  yi dgas mos smras pa/ kun dga' bo gal te nang par yi dgas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag la/ yi dgas re re la yang zas dang / skom yul ma ga d+ha'i bre
84a3(rgyud): bo tsam byin te/ bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas la/ bdag gi ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na de ltar na khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur bar 'gyur la/ bdag kyang yi dgas/ 
84a4(rgyud): kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye dpar 'gyur ro// de nas kun dga' bos/ yi dgas dmo kha 'bar ma rid cing mdog ngan la/ lus skem pa kha nas
84a5(rgyud): me lce 'bar ba/ lto dang kha skam pa/ ral pa'i phung po g.yengs pa/ spu dang / sen mo ring ba mthong ste/ tshig mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba de thos nas skrag cing spangs te/ 
84a6(rgyud): spu zing zhes byas nas/ stan las langs te shin tu rings pa dang / shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 
84a7(rgyud): 'dar bzhin du 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni gnangs srog 'gum par 'gyur lags so// bcom
84a8(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis yi dgas mo kha 'bar ma mthong ste/ khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur ro// zhes mchin bdag gis brten thabs ci mchis zhes smras nas/ de'i mchid nas gal te khyod kyis yi
84b1(rgyud): dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas te/ bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas na/ de ltar na khyod kyi tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/ bcom
84b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de ji ltar sgrub pa bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ kun dga' bo gang
84b3(rgyud): gis khyod yi dgas rnams dang / bram ze'i drang srong rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyi ma 'jigs shig/ kun dga' bo thams cad du 'od dang ldan pa rgya chen shugs ldan zhes bya ba'i
84b4(rgyud): gzungs yod do// des byin pa tsam gyis yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par 'gyur te/ yi dgas dang / bram ze'i drang srong re re la zas
84b5(rgyud): dang / skom yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro// / de ni sngonang bram zer gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / 
84b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas bzung ste/ des yi dgas dang / bram ze'i drang srong grangs su grangs pa mang ba dang / ches mang ba dag ngas zas dang / skom gyis tshim
84b7(rgyud): par byas te/ de dag thams cad yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha'i 'jig rten du skyes so// kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung la ngo lon gyis shig/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo
84b8(rgyud): ki te/ oM sa~M b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ kun dga' bo 'di yi dgas kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ lag pa brkyang ste drung du sbyin par bya'o// se gol yang brdab par bya'o// de ltar byas na
85a1(rgyud): byin ma thag tu phyogs bzhi'i yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag gi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur te/ yi dgas re re la yang yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun ba
85a2(rgyud): byin par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang zos pa tsam gyis yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas/ lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / 
85a3(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor zug tu bsnyad par bya'o// de ltar byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ tshe yang ring bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'bum
85a4(rgyud): gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mi ma yin ba rgyu ba/ 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum la sogs da pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / yi dgas
85a5(rgyud): rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang brtson 'gru/ sa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzugs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang / ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan par yang
85a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bram ze'i drang srong tshim par byed pa 'dod pa des ni/ mchod yon dang dbul bar bya ba dang / snod dkang ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la/ 'bab chu ga la yod pa'i gnas der sbyin
85a7(rgyud): par bya'o// de ltar byas na bram ze'i drang srong gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed dag lha'i bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas par 'gyur ro// bram ze'i
85a8(rgyud): drang srong de dag kyang dbang po tshim par 'gyur te// de dag thams cad kyis/ oM bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin par byed la/ sems can de dag kyang / bsam pa yongs su dag
85b1(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ bram ze'i gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rtag tu tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum gyi/ bye ma snyed dag gis
85b2(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgra thams cad shig par 'gyur ro// me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ zas sam/ skom gyi yo byad la/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
85b3(rgyud): byas la/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la 'bul bar bya'o// de ltar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen ma des/ phyogs bcu
85b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dang / de bzhin ga dashegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gis/ mchod pa byas par 'gyur
85b5(rgyud): bla mar byas/ rim gror byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing lung bstan pa dang / lha thams cad kyis kun tu srung bar yang 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo
85b6(rgyud): song la ngo lon yang gyis shig/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par ston cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang gyis shig ces nga smra'o// yi dgas mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba
85b7(rgyud): gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// // oM dz+nyA nA ba lo kau tai sa man+ta/ s+pha ra Na rashrI b+ha ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma Ni/ du ru du ru/ hri da ya dza la ni hUM/ 'bab chu 'am mtshe'i 'gram du
85b8(rgyud): 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pa'i khyor bar chu blugs la/ ye shes skar mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chur gtor na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi dgas ji snyed yod pa
86a1(rgyud): / de dag thams cad lnga'i kha zas kyi ro dang btung ba'i ro mchog dang ldan pa 'thob cing / yi dgas re re yang / kha zas dang / btung ba yul ma ga d+ha'i bri bdun bdun gyis tshim par byas par
86a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / chu de 'thungs pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad yi dgas kyi skye gnas las thar cing / bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ 
86a3(rgyud): gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa/ ri dgas sam/ bya 'am/ chul gnas pa la sogs pa gang gis chu de 'thungs pa de dag thams cad/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'tshan/ 
86a4(rgyud): lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ye shes skar mda'i snying po la// rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra// bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 
86a5(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi sa thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan zhes bya ba/ ri rab kyi ngos la bzhugs te/ ri rab
86a6(rgyud): la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis bskor nas/ mdun du byas te chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa'
86a7(rgyud): blo ldan la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul ba/ blo dang mi ldan pa/ yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol bshad
86a8(rgyud): pa ta hU bi tsu pi tsu pa dz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ gang zhig gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / chung ngu yang
86b1(rgyud): yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang / tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// gang gis zla ba drug gi bar du/ nyin re zhing rtsa bas khyor gang la rigs pa 'di lan bdun btab te/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'thungs
86b2(rgyud): na tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lan gcig 'thungs na/ lnga brgya 'dzin te/ nyin cig bzhin du shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nyin re bzhin du brjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang / yid gzungs
86b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// shes rab bskyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
86b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ ma ti ba hu l+ye ra/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na/ dar sha ne badz+nyA pa ta/ ga b+hI ra~M/ bo d+hi madz+nyA ru sa ri Ni/ a bid+d+ha/ ta mon d+ha/ ka rib d+ha ma ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la
86b5(rgyud): badz+rA dI pe/ me d+hi ba rin sarba a d+hiSh+NI te/ su ru su ru/ d+hu ru d+hu rA me d+ha A na ye swA hA// cho ga ni nang re zhing bzlas brjod bye san/ lobs sbyin par 'gyur ro// sman bram tsho snyim par
86b6(rgyud): bcug ste dung ba byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te/ zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
86b7(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi
86b8(rgyud): gzhi 'di gang gis gzungs pas chos thams cad gzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du yang gnod sbyin de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / 
87a1(rgyud): sba bar byed la de la nang thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do// s+yAng ya the dan/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ dza yot+ta ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+hi/ ma hA saM bo d+hi/ a d+hi bang po d+ha ni/ ha la ha la ha la/ 
87a2(rgyud): hi li hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ sarba bud+d+he/ d+harma a ba bo d+hi ni/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu Ta ni/ sarba pA pa ni/ bud+d+ha/ a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA// 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
87a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa mA dza sU tran nA ma ma hA sU tra/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
87a4(rgyud): natabacom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang / dgra bcom dab/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba
87a5(rgyud): bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// 
87a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngag na/ dbang che bar
87a7(rgyud): grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi se dun la bsnyen bkur byed do// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs
87a8(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag
87b1(rgyud): gi don rjes su thob pa srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong
87b2(rgyud): gi dge 'dun la/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ dbang che bar grags pa dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhag
87b3(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ bdag cag kyang song la/ bcom ldan 'das la re re nas tshig tu phrad bcad pas mngon par bstod par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// 
87b4(rgyud): de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes dbu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'a dam/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
87b5(rgyud): nas mi snang bar gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lta gas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha gcig gis tshig su bcang de gsol pa/ 'dus pa chen la
87b6(rgyud): gzhol ba yi// lha tshogs kun nas lhags gyur pas// gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la// blta ba'i slad du bdag cag mchis// tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ 
87b7(rgyud): drang por gyur pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di na dge sbyong rab brtson pa// kha lo pa ltar mig blangs shing // dbang po rnams ni legs sdom bgyid// tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigs su
87b8(rgyud): bcad de gsol pa// dbang phur 'ong ba 'obs 'dra ba'i// phur bu rab bcom dkrir mi tshugs// de dag sreng bral dag spyod cing // 'dren pas glang po bzhon ltar btul// tshangs ris kyi
88a1(rgyud): lnga bzhi pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gang dag sangs rgyas sbubs mchig// de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi ning // mi lus spangs par gyur nas kyang // lha yi lus ni tsang / 
88a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyid na bag bcu ma ste 'bod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas/ dge slong
88a3(rgyud): rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ba yin no// dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
88a4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ladang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po
88a5(rgyud): 'di kho na lnga bu dag 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang / ngag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas ba
88a6(rgyud): ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag lha rnams kyi ming dag brjod par byas/ lha rnams kyi ming ngas
88a7(rgyud): zung shig/ gang dag sa la gnas pa dang // gang dag ri khrod na gnas pa rnams// seng ge bzhin du tha dad la// sems bsdus mnyam par gzhag byas shing // kun nas 'dus par gyur pa ni// spu
88a8(rgyud): dag pang zhes byed pa yin// gang dgas la gnas pa dang // gang dag khrong gnas pa rnams// seng ge bzhin du ba nga la// sems bsdus mnyam par gnas byas shing // ku sa 'dus gyur chu
88b1(rgyud): zhes ta ta byed pa bdag gis brjod par bya// yid byang dag cing rab dang la// rnyog meng 'chi bdag spangs pa rnams// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug pa'i// lha dang mi yi bar na 'khod // slob pa lnga brgya phrag
88b2(rgyud): gnyis dang // gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang // stong phrag du ma rnam dag gi/ lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag/ mtha' nas mtha' ma mi mthong zhing // phyogs rnams thams cad khyab gyur pa// sangs
88b3(rgyud): rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te// de nas ston pas bstan dka' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ lha tshogs mngon par lhags gyur gyis// nges par rtog
88b4(rgyud): shes bka' stsal pa// tshigs su bcad pas mthar chags kyis // de dag rnams kyi ming brjod kyis// rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid dkyis ni// nga yis bshad pa mnyan par gyis// ser skya'i gnas
88b5(rgyud): kyi nags tshal gyis// gnod sbyin stong phrag bdun po dag/ ser 'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par
88b6(rgyud): lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gser can stong phrag drug po kun// kha dog sna cho
88b7(rgyud): ldan pa dag/ sar skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan ning 'ong dang ldan// kha dog ldan ning
88b8(rgyud): grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni// ri dgas stong phrag gsum po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags
89a1(rgyud): tshal ni/ snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan
89a2(rgyud): rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang
89a3(rgyud): bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag
89a4(rgyud): 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab// yangs pa la ni rtag gnas shing // brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi// gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa
89a5(rgyud): dang / gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'inang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha do/ ga ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag
89a6(rgyud): 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// kun tu bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha// gang dag de gnyis 'khor rnams dang // de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par
89a7(rgyud): lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed
89a8(rgyud): pa/ rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor bsrung zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / 
89b1(rgyud): de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang
89b2(rgyud): yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor
89b3(rgyud): rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par
89b4(rgyud): zhugs ta ta lho phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grag das dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// dming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ 
89b5(rgyud): glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang nga // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul lnga na zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// 
89b6(rgyud): dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// 
89b7(rgyud): lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags
89b8(rgyud): ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// nub phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// 
90a1(rgyud): ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bya// de ni nyid du ldan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de sang rus pa'i mang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan ni 'do ldan/ 
90a2(rgyud): kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ 
90a3(rgyud): dbang po zhes bya stobs pa che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan
90a4(rgyud): kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'a tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// byang / phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan
90a5(rgyud): pa ni/ taganod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan pa zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang
90a6(rgyud): 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang
90a7(rgyud): yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de
90a8(rgyud): 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du
90b1(rgyud): mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po bzhi dag
90b2(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stabs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul
90b3(rgyud): ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de dag gi ni khol po rnams// mchod rten
90b4(rgyud): mngal gnas bcas pa// slu byed g.yon can sgyu ma can// sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang // ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu// nga tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags// gang dag de yi khro
90b5(rgyud): rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul lnga na zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan// rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus
90b6(rgyud): pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang / dmag dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas lhags te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / ba radwa dza skye
90b7(rgyud): dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan ngan 'dod gtso dang // mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang // stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang // ri mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng ldeng ba
90b8(rgyud): dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin skyong ba 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod
91a1(rgyud): sbyin ring po'i 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro nas ji snyed yod pa yin// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// 
91a2(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni// 'jog
91a3(rgyud): po dang ni yangs pa'ang 'ongs// la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dag/ srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags// klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni// yul 'khor srung dang glang po che// 'jigs byed che dang
91a4(rgyud): sa srung bu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i klu yang 'ongs// gang dag de yi 'a khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags
91a5(rgyud): ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa 'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gang zhig klu rgyal zilamanan len// stobs ldan mig rno 'dab chags bya/ 
91a6(rgyud): de ming mdab bzangs khra bo yang // mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'ongs// de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin// ston pas mdab bzang bde mdzad cing // gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la// sangs
91a7(rgyud): rgyas skyabs su nye bar song // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du'o// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag
91a8(rgyud): 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing // rgya mtsho sten pa'i lha min rnams// thams cad nor lhas skrag gyur cing // mtsho la skyabasu 'du shes pa/ 
91b1(rgyud): zag bzangs ris dang rab bkra dang // rab sim byed dang btang bzung dang // stobs ldan bu ni brgya po kun// rnam snang byed bu'i bu rnams dang // stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan bzang // dpa' chen
91b2(rgyud): khyod kyi dus lags shes// dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du// go cha bgos te lhags pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan
91b3(rgyud): kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// chu lha mo dang bu mo dang // zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs// mdza' bshes ma yang
91b4(rgyud): chu lha can// lha mo grogs ldan nyid kyang 'ongs// sa dang chu dang rlung gri dang // me yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser
91b5(rgyud): skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan ning 'od dang ldan// khango/ 
91b6(rgyud): ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// khyab 'jug lha dang gzhon can lha// mtshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur// zla la gan+da
91b7(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams kyis// zla ba nyid ni mdun du bdar// nyi mar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis// nyi ma nyid du mdun bdar cing // char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag/ rgyu skar rnams kyi mdun bdar
91b8(rgyud): lhags// thams cad bzang po rdo rje can// brgya byin khyer 'jig 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ 
92a1(rgyud): snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// 
92a2(rgyud): dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni// me lce'i rtse 'dra mchi ltas can// zhi ba mo dang dka' bzlog ma// me tog gos can 'od
92a3(rgyud): gyur cing // rgyu ba mo dang mtshan chings bzang // 'chi med rnam pa du ma dang // gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa// 'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog
92a4(rgyud): sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni//  snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul
92a5(rgyud): ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// sngo bsangs sngo bsangs chen mo dang // 
92a6(rgyud): mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang // rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du// yid rab 'khrug ma'ang 'ongs gyur cing // phag mo phag mo chen mo dang // slong ma nges pa lhan cig lhags// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag
92a7(rgyud): kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing
92a8(rgyud): 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan ning grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang // gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing
92b1(rgyud): skra dkar mo la sogs pa dang // gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur// 'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang // spel ma rnam pa du ma dang // dag pa dang ni 'od can ma// ma mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags/ 
92b2(rgyud): bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par
92b3(rgyud): lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral
92b4(rgyud): dang rta ta nag po btab pa du ma dang // lum bi ni dang lum bi ma chog/ skar ma zhes bya legs smon dang // 'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du// dbang bsgyur rnams kyang lhags
92b5(rgyud): par gyur// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor
92b6(rgyud): rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon
92b7(rgyud): par zhugs// lha tshogs drug cu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang
92b8(rgyud): ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// tshangs pa'i 'jig
93a1(rgyud): rten stong dag gi/ tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba// kun bgeng gzhon nu skar rgyal te// so sor dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag dang // lhan cig 'grogs
93a2(rgyud): te der lhags pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la
93a3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo// kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang // bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor zhing // de dag rnams
93a4(rgyud): kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // / de yang 'dus pa'i tshal du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul lnga den zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge
93a5(rgyud): slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du/ mngon par zhugs// dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan/ bcas// skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi// lha rnams de dag der
93a6(rgyud): lhags shing // dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so// nags pos smras pa'i tshogs la ltos// 'dod chags kyis ni 'di bzung la// bcing ba gyis dang khyed la legs// 'di dag kun nas yongs su
93a7(rgyud): lata'adi dag gson por ma btang zhes// de na nag po sde bo che// sde rnams la ni bskul byed cing // khros shing rang dbang med gyur nas// rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te// lag pa sa la brdabs na
93a8(rgyud): ni/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ste// de nas lha yi sprin phreng dang // glog dang bcas pa'i char yang phab// sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te// den ston / 
93b1(rgyud): bstan dga' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ bdud sde mngon par lhags gyur gyis// nges par rtogs shes bka' stsal pa// brtson par byed pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas/ 
93b2(rgyud): ni/ de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas// de dag chags bral yin par rtogs// rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni// slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'// de dag g.yul nas rnam rgyal zhing // 'jigs bral
93b3(rgyud): grags dang ldan pa yin// bar gyis sdom ni/ mdun stong gser can ri mnyam dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srin dang // kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnams// de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang // klu dang
93b4(rgyud): mngab bzang lha min dang // chu lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang // / tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang // dkar mo bde byed dang / da phyug dang // kun 'gyeng gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang // dbang bcas bdud
93b5(rgyud): dang dge slong ngo // de nas gsang ba'i lha'i bu shin tu dbang che bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs pa/ ra gyur nas// de'i tshe tshigs 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo
93b6(rgyud): bshad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di dag gis mdo 'di yang dag par bstan par bgyi zhing / yang dag par brjod par bgyi lag so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags
93b7(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ te dze te dza ba ti/ tsita tre tsing tra ba ti/ ta le ta la ba ti/ kha me kha ma ba ti/ k+She me k+She ma ba ti/ b+hang de byang dra ba ti/ ya she ya sha ba ti/ dU ti dA ta ba ti/ tsa pa le tsa pa la ba ti/ kha tse kha tsa bA ti/ 
93b8(rgyud): ti/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di ring / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rmongs pa ma
94a1(rgyud): mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na/ de ni ji sring mtsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las srung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro// de la
94a2(rgyud): bonod thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lag so// gong du klog pa der dge bar 'gyur zhing / de la dgung lo bdun du srung bar bgyid par yang 'gyur lags so// ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam
94a3(rgyud): gyis dgung char 'bab par yang 'gyur/ chang par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bebs par yang 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur lag so// blo nad thams cad la byab par bgyis sam/ chab la bzlas brjod/ 
94a4(rgyud): bgyis te su la na/ des de'i blo nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas gso dal pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma pa dag ma gtogs pa
94a5(rgyud): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i rigs gong ma rnams kyi rig sngag sa 'di lags la/ gsang sngags kyi tshig zhib mo yanga'adi dag lags te/ 'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongs su 'dzin par
94a6(rgyud): bgyid pa lagaso// tad+ya thA/ b+ha le b+hA la ma le/ dur du le/ hi me/ phub pi se/ kA tsa k+Shi ku tse sI/ mI mI ni She re tho ra NI/ bam pi ba po tasta ke/ ta re ke gu ru ga ro Te/ gug gu mi ti/ ta re k+Sha/ sU t+yA ma nu pA la yaH
94a7(rgyud): 'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo lags te/ gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin tam/ klog par bgyid na/ de la mi dang mi ma
94a8(rgyud): lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing / gdugs pa yang mi mchi sprul yang mi mchi/ dug yang mi mchi la/ de'i lus la gnod pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lagaso// 'byung po thams cad
94b1(rgyud): kyang dga' bar 'gyur lagasaso// ji srid 'tsho bar du 'byung po thams cad las srung bar bgyis par yang 'gyur lag so// gang klog par bgyid pa dang / gang nyan par bgyid pa de la dgung lo bdun du su
94b2(rgyud): bar bgyis par 'gyur lagaso// chab la bzlas brjod bgyid te gtor tam/ 'tshal du spru la na de'i bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa'i bdag
94b3(rgyud): po thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi yul yang lags te/ mdo sde 'di yongs su gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lags so// tad+ya thA/ lin de li pi lo ba
94b4(rgyud): pa pe pang ke ka me/ kA tse kA tse k+Shi/ ka tsa ping ga le/ du me dumaM du me/ te Te traTe/ tad traTe/ tra TAk+Shi/ ko lA ko li/ ki ka ko/ li ke/ sA d+ha sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/ ud grI NA tha tse ti/ bcom
94b5(rgyud): ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dem bur ma gyur pa dang / mnyams par bzung ste/ srung bar bgyid na/ de ni tham
94b6(rgyud): cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// ji tsam 'tshal ba de tsam gyi dgung char yang 'bab par 'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur
94b7(rgyud): dgung ser 'beb par yang 'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su thar par yang 'gyur lags so// dug 'byin par yang 'gyur lags so// 
94b8(rgyud): chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na/ des bro nang thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol
95a1(rgyud): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang de bzhin du/ mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid cing / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjes su yi rang bar
95a2(rgyud): bgying la/ 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa lagaso// tad+ya thA/ bI re bI ra ba ti/ to Ta to Ta ba ti/ b+had dre b+had dra ba ti/ go ne go na ba ti/ me g+he me g+ha ba ti/ dz+wa la ne dza
95a3(rgyud): la na ba ti/ b+hu te b+hU ta ba ti/ kho ra de kho ra da ba ti/ i dan su tra ma nu gr-ih+Na tha/ a nu pA la ya tha tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin
95a4(rgyud): par bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad la sa srung bar bgyis par 'gyur lag so// de la mi dang mi ma la/ gus pa 'ga' yang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang du klog
95a5(rgyud): pa der/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba bgyis par 'gyur lag so// sems can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lag so// de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 
95a6(rgyud): lagaso// de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lagaso// sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur lagaso// gang du klog par 'gyur ba der dgung lo bdun du srung
95a7(rgyud): ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams la thar par yang 'gyur lags so// dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags so// bro nad thams cad sel bar yang 'gyur lags
95a8(rgyud): soso ta skud pa'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na/ bro nang thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis gsol pa/ 
95b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin cing grub par bgyi ba lags so// rnam thos kyi bus gsol pa/ tad+ya thA/ ku re ku ra NI/ mo ro mo ra NI/ ka tseka tsaN+Di/ 
95b2(rgyud): kri mi kri mi ni/ yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/ bu re/ po raM/ pu ra tI/ ho re ho ra nI/ pra ho re/ ho ra nI/ ho ra nI/ 'phags skyes pos gsol pa/ ke she ke sha pa ti/ ke sha NI/ ma ke sha the ti/ tho ba ni/ me
95b3(rgyud): ri ti/ mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/ tsak+kha tsak+sha NI/ tsak+Shu bA ki/ ni b+hi ti ri/ tirmi ni/ she me shi me/ sha mA ni te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib me
95b4(rgyud): 'di bzhi dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang / ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste/ srung bar bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i ba dar du srung ba bgyid par 'gyur lagaso// de la 'byung po thams
95b5(rgyud): cad dang / bro nad thams cad kyang slar mi ldog par 'gyur lag so// gdug pas zin pa dang / dug thams cad las thar par 'a gyur lags so// skud pa'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ 
95b6(rgyud): bcings sam gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na/ cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha ma yin dang rlung lhas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags
95b7(rgyud): 'di yang / mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ ga le/ ga ga le/ ga ga le/ ga NI/ khi ni khi ni/ g+hu she g+huSh+mA/ g+hu g+huSh+Ta/ kha ne/ kha kha ne/ kha na kha ni/ li pe lu pe/ lu ba
95b8(rgyud): lu pe re/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing / ma bkol bar bzung na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung bar 'gyur lag so// de'i bro nang thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gru
96a1(rgyud): / lag so// lus la dag gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
96a2(rgyud): mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongasu bzung ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rig sngags dag smras pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang
96a3(rgyud): yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing / kun tu gzung ba dang / srung ba dang / sgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol// de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras/ 
96a4(rgyud): bu dang bcas par 'gyur lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kun tu gzung ba 'dri ni grub pa yin te/ nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo
96a5(rgyud): sde 'di grub pa dang / srung ba dang / sgrub pa dag bshad par bya ste/ nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/ bcom
96a6(rgyud): ldan 'das nyan thos tshogs dang bcas pas mdo sde chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du srung ba dang / sgrub pa dag bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir srung ba
96a7(rgyud): dang ta sgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// tA la ta la/ tan ta la/ ta to ta le/ me te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i grub pa ni 'di yin no// sa le sa sa li ti/ 
96a8(rgyud): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// la Te la Te/ lo lo ti/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// d+hu pu d+hu pu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ka tsi bi ka tsi/ ka tsa bi ka tse te/ de nas bcom ldan 'dra/ 
96b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// d+hu me d+hu me/ d+ha se d+ha se/ d+ha so d+ha so d+ha re/ d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ro d+ha d+hI ti/ de la srung ba ni 'di yin no// tin ti re tsi rAkrA/ pa~M ga lak+Sha rak+Sha/ mtshams bcang ba ni 'a man
96b2(rgyud): bad+d+ha bad+d+ho/ bad+d+ha/ si ri mi ti/ bad+d+ha/ gu She bad+d+ha/ g+hu g+hu She/ bad+d+ha/ g+ha She g+hu She/ ya ma bad+d+ha b+hi/ sgrub pa ni 'di yin no// pe khe sa d+ha ya tu tu le sa/ d+ha ye ti/ zhag gsum smyung ba byas pas/ tshes bco lnga'i/ 
96b3(rgyud): nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la srung ba lan brgya brjod par bya zhing / bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la mdun pa/ 
96b4(rgyud): re re la/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas na srung ba byas pa yin zhing / lan gsum spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam parasmin pa ni ma gtog so// zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la
96b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la/ skud pa de lag tu blangs te/ bzlas shing mtshams bcad par byas te/ lan brgya rtsabargyad brjod cing / mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te mtshams gtso
96b6(rgyud): par byed na/ lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur ro// lho phyogs nas lce spyang mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste/ 'dug par gyur na/ de nas mtshams bcad par shes par bya'o// des de bzhin du smyung ba/ 
96b7(rgyud): byas te/ tshes bco lnga'i nyi ma la mchod pa byas te skud pa blangs te/ nyan thos kyi chog rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga zhib mos lan bdun bzlas te bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing / rig
96b8(rgyud): sngags thams cad lan gcig bzlas brjod byas shing / bsgrub pa byas na/ char pa chen po dang / rlung chen po yang 'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du ldang zhing 'bar/ skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/ 
97a1(rgyud): lan bdun gyi bar du yang brjod par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu sprin ces bya ba dang / sprin bzang zhes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/ de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing / grub pa sbyin pa dang / rjes
97a2(rgyud): yi rang bar yang 'gyur ro// de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sprin ni ku tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o// sprin bzang gi ni 'di yin te/ ka ra ka ra ka ra ra zhes bya'o// tshig 'di dag dang / skud pa lag tu blangs pas
97a3(rgyud): mdo sde dang gsang sngags rnams bsams na gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang / rig sngags 'di dag thams cad kyis chu 'am/ skud pa la
97a4(rgyud): bzlas na gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med de/ las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang / gzhan dag srung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di bzung bar bya'o// bcom
97a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag/ yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la ma ngon par bstod do// 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur/ 
97a6(rgyud): cing tata sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing // nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogaso// 
97a7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / badz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harmA sA ga ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ 
97a8(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bA re na sem
97b1(rgyud): drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag
97b2(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag ngas ni chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ cha phra ba/ brtags pa/ mkhas shing shre
97b3(rgyud): pas rig par bya ba rtogs so// ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
97b4(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// ngas thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'kho ru lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o// dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin
97b5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi blo dang lda
97b6(rgyud): pa/ gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/ gang dag de shes pa dang / gang dag de 'dzin pa de dag gis ni myur ba kho nar
97b7(rgyud): chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brjed ngas pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing chos bzung ba rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par
97b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon
98a1(rgyud): par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
98a2(rgyud): kyis bzhag go// da ltar nga yang 'jog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdom gyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/ 
98a3(rgyud): de na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro// thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyam su len par 'gyur ro// nyams su blangs pa'i chos ni gzhan dag
98a4(rgyud): la khong du chud par byed do// tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin dum thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / bla na med pa'i tshig gi
98a5(rgyud): rab tu dbye ba dang / sa nas sa rtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o// de la 'di dag ni gzi byin brtan par byed pani
98a6(rgyud): tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za 'dzam+bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la
98a7(rgyud): zas kyi rnam grangs rnams dang / sman rnams sbyin par 'gyur ro// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi gnod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
98a8(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis mnos pa/ bstan pa yong su 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig/ khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/ s+yAng ya the dan/ karma ke tam nung tse/ 
98b1(rgyud): ru tra gran+d+ha ma/ thu man/ nel ta/ a sa ku la s+thA bu mi a nus+pha ri/ i shag ma i shas+t+ra/ kle ma.a nug te/ yA mu la gum b+he/ pa b+he mgur ba ya ba/ a s+ya bak+Sha s+ya bi lag/ be la ma thA/ shrI ba ba ri pAny+dzaka/ bras te/ 
98b2(rgyud): a ba bi la/ a gra be la/ ni shi khu u tse dzu me/ u dze dzu me/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbab pa grub pa dang / gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
98b3(rgyud): rgyas 'od srung mthong la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/ rim gro yang byed byed pa rnams 'ching ste/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi gnod sbyin bab pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zung shig/ kun das
98b4(rgyud): bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzi nu pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po che na po bzhi sems bzhin du gan so// kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags
98b5(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di dag bzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// kun dga'/ bo shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed ces
98b6(rgyud): bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnaso// kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na ni/ gnod sbyin rnam grags shes bya ba gnaso// kun dga' bo
98b7(rgyud): 'dzam+bu gling na ni gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas te/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gzhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa
98b8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni de bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun dag
99a1(rgyud): po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig gi mchog srog chags 'byung po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung shig dang ngas bshad do// kun dga'
99a2(rgyud): bo de la nga'i phyi na 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nus so// s+yAd ya the dan/ dan d+ha ra ma hA ha ra/ ha ra ma ba ra na/ rud dra tra/ ku ma ti dri tra/ in dra man tu ke/ a pa te/ 
99a3(rgyud): sa hA rA/ sa d+hA ma ti/ i la la bi ma ti/ a ba ti/ ta ra pa ra/ yi biSh+Ta sa da baSh+Ti/ a ba tiSh+Tha/ pa ri brta/ i sha brda/ sa da brda/ kra ma kra ma ti ran/ a si ba ma la bi na ha thi/ tha sha su re d+hu ra d+hu ra/ 
99a4(rgyud): ug+ni mug+na/ ug+na ba ti/ bi sa ra gra mi ta/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / klu dang / 
99a5(rgyud): dri za dang / sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi/ nang na gnas pa dang / lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar
99a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod kyi gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dgazung shig/ phyis 'gyod ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag mi/ gling
99a7(rgyud): bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya// gsang sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba// de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni// chos rgyal rnams kyi bstan pa
99a8(rgyud): dgata nyams par gyur pa de la ston// dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po yang // mthar gyis su ni song nas kyang // zab cing don dang ldan pa yi// tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya// 'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste/ 
99b1(rgyud): de dag mkhas rnams nyan par gyis// drag po dag gis thos nas yang // phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste// gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med// de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur// sa 'di chags pa med/ 
99b2(rgyud): pa ste ta sangs rgyas sa ni bsam mi khyab// chags pa med par bstan pa yi// bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas// nyi ma sprin las byung ba ltar// de ni sa steng de bzhin snang // 'di la skye mched phung // 
99b3(rgyud): po rnams// bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang // dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams// sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod// de yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang // nams kyang chud zar
99b4(rgyud): mi 'gyur te// ma thos chos rnams de dag thos// nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas// rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog/ mig bzang rnams kyang dag par 'gyur// 'chang ba dang ni
99b5(rgyud): ston byang ba// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags// sangs rgyas kyi na chos rnams la// the tsom mi mnga' bden pa gang / bden des bdag la lung mnos pa// ci yod thams cad gnas
99b6(rgyud): gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la// byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des// rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la// ston par rab tu gnas gyur cig/ gling bzhi'i gnas kyi gnod
99b7(rgyud): sbyin dag/ ma dad pa dang dad par bstan// gang la rtogs pa mi snang ba// de la de kun don ston 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang // glang chen snang dang khyad par stobs// drag po dga' byed
99b8(rgyud): gsod byed dang // zla ba mgo med lus gsod pa// dpa' sde dang ni lag dpa' dang // srin po dang nis 'dzin pa// ljang ku kha dang sna bzang dang // ral gri'i spu can bong bu rnams// thams cad grub par byed/ 
100a1(rgyud): par shog/ gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la// gnod sbyin srin po dag ni// spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed// rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang // tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang / 
100a2(rgyud): nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang // yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur// lung mnos pa yang chud mi za// rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur// rtag tu don dang yi ge la// de yi shes pa
100a3(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa yang // de yi legs bshad nyan pa rnams// de yi mo la 'dran par byed// s+yAng la the dan/ hu kun/ mu kum
100a4(rgyud): ra naHbi ha ra na/ i sha sa kra ma na/ oM su mu kha/ ta ka Na/ a pri ya/ u s+thA me/ ko ba ha re/ u ru pa/ pra ba Na ta na saM gra me ba hag re/ pra shi ga re/ gu d+hA ba ni/ ud ta na/ bi ku Na/ i sha
100a5(rgyud): kunaHa tu la tu la/ a Ti ba Ti/ ba ri tsa mo sha/ ha ra/ dza ga ta/ e be saM pra mu khe/ a ga b+ha re/ Sha hu sa hU/ i ti ya/ thA hu/ tsa tu ra dI bi ka yan/ dza hu ma hu/ ug+na hu/ d+ha ra sa hu/ 
100a6(rgyud): saM gra ha/ a bi na gra ha/ a bi na gra ha/ pradz+nyA brid d+hi ye/ tha hu sa hA/ ka ra ku ru/ d+hu sa hu/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod// de ni thos la/ 
100a7(rgyud): rmongs pa med// de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur// skar mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin// zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin// de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg/ de nas bcom ldan
