100a8(rgyud): 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// s+yAd ya the dan/ tsar d+he bi tsi d+he/ a ma ma ku te/ a ti mi ti/ pa ra ha re/ g+ha Na b+he/ hi pa ra me/ mA hA pra ti ba hA ne/ dza ya dza ya/ ma nu ke/ pa la ba
100b1(rgyud): le ug dra ba ti/ swa ra swa ra/ a bi sa re/ gu gun de/ pra bi ba d+he/ sa me/ a dza ta dza ya/ nu pa la su/ kho ma su d+hi ni ku ma no// sak+She/ tsA pe tsA be/ tsu be/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bu lu pu lu/ bya ba pra sa re/ ka ra ka d+hiH
100b2(rgyud): d+heta bidz+ri bi dzi/ a pra ti san d+hi/ nA nA nu ma ti/ bran nu ma te/ a ri da si/ dzeShA nu pa ni ngaM/ a saM gra a ba ti/ rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thogs te 'chang na/ gling
100b3(rgyud): bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams kyang dbang du
100b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bra bzhin du 'tsho ba'i mthar thug gi bar du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dgon par 'dug la gzungs sngag
100b5(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod de/ nyin lan gsu/ ma mtshan lan gsum du dran par bya'o// de nas zhag/ bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa thams cad 'grub par
100b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi
100b7(rgyud): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / 
100b8(rgyud): pradz+nyA ba rma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya big+h+nAn bi na ya ka ra tA d+ha ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
101a1(rgyud): dgegs sel ba'i gzungs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i mdze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs te/ 
101a2(rgyud): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo tshogs kyi bdag po su gang tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'dzin pa des cho ga thams cad dang / dgongs pa thams cad 'grub pa
101a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ na mo stu ste/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ da ra da ra/ Da ha Da ha/ gr-ih+Na/ b+ha dz+nyA b+ha dz+nyA/ na mo stu ste/ ru ru tsa tsa ye swA hA// a b+hu trA/ bi na du/ 
101a4(rgyud): khan man tsed d+ha ba ra sa ma gats+tsha ti/ ha ha ya/ ma hA hA stingak+Sha ta nan/ pra go ba ye mo/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru dmu ru/ na ma na ma swA hA// nang par langs te sngags lan bdun bzlas
101a5(rgyud): la/ chu khyor ba gang steng 'og gi phyogasu gtor cig dang bge/ gas thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// gsang sngag sa sgrub 'dod pas skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor
101a6(rgyud): lag pa la bcings na rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// gang na tshogs kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan gcig bklags na/ yang bgegs rnams pa/ 
101a7(rgyud): chad mi byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis
101a8(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // 'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ A TA na Ti ya ma su tran na ma ma hA sU tra/ 
101b1(rgyud): bo skad du/ mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / 'thun pa'i mngonas bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos padus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'ad
101b2(rgyud): mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dgar ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu/ kha dog 'phags pa g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / 
101b3(rgyud): g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
101b4(rgyud): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas nga phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams
101b5(rgyud): cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de'i tshe tshe/ gas su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs
101b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas// blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni de mtshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang // nga ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams
101b7(rgyud): cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal
101b8(rgyud): dgon pa dag dang / nags mdab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de nas gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdugs pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das
102a1(rgyud): kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdugs pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
102a2(rgyud): rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang
102a3(rgyud): lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / 
102a4(rgyud): bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / dmi ma lags pa gdugs pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon dpar ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa
102a5(rgyud): rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba
102a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legaso legs so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad do// 
102a7(rgyud): de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
102a8(rgyud): sngar/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / 'thun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to// skye bo gang dag gtong pong
102b1(rgyud): cing // phra ma ma mchis ser sna bral// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa legs// gang gi char la rten nas ni// des na nyin mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor cam// 
102b2(rgyud): nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu
102b3(rgyud): dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// dri za rnams kyi yongs bskor cing // dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang
102b4(rgyud): po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu
102b5(rgyud): cad shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal/ zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang rings gnas/ shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol// 
102b6(rgyud): khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ go'u tom rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// ma
102b7(rgyud): ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na yi dgas shes bgyi
102b8(rgyud): btata rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can// srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po
103a1(rgyud): / rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi// de ni nyid lhan cig tu// glung dgar gyis nag ce// grul bus rnams kyis yongs bskar cing // grul bus rnams kyi mdun gyis bzlas/ 
103a2(rgyud): de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gnan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnas/ 
103a3(rgyud): kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing
103a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol // khyod la mi men phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang dus// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ 
103a5(rgyud): go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang / zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi// de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ 
103a6(rgyud): phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba// de na
103a7(rgyud): mtsho tshan zab mo ni// shin tu 'anga' ba dka' ba ste// de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes// skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// ming
103a8(rgyud): ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing // klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyang cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ 
103b1(rgyud): de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs pa tshe// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyi mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyi rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen
103b2(rgyud): mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skye mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs
103b3(rgyud): gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang
103b4(rgyud): zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi// de lta ru nub kyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa
103b5(rgyud): lags// gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga' zhing lhun chen/ blta mdzes dang // gang na mi rnams chel no// brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing // de dag mi mo mo 'debs la// bshol yang
103b6(rgyud): 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing // tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang // nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing // zas su sa lu kha dog dang // dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang // dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi/ 
103b7(rgyud): 'dra ba 'tshal// na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas// chod mar de 'tshal sran song min// gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur yin// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan
103b8(rgyud): pa ni/ gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// 
104a1(rgyud): de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcud gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po nas bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gnan gyis mi thub lags
104a2(rgyud): de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang rig
104a3(rgyud): gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol// khyod la ming 'thun phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag
104a4(rgyud): 'chol cig/ go'u tam khyod la phyag 'tshal cig/ sangs rgya sa rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tsho/ la mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags she
104a5(rgyud): skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs
104a6(rgyud): na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po sde bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal
104a7(rgyud): po dag gi mnga' gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing // phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu// de dag ni tshabs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he/ 
104a8(rgyud): dang ta ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so// glang po che gcig gis shing rta
104b1(rgyud): drangs shing // phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lagaso// chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang
104b2(rgyud): gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing / phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lagaso// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i// gnod sbyini 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// gzhon pa de dag 'tshal
104b3(rgyud): nas ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis// 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu
104b4(rgyud): rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa stengs kun tu rgyu ba dang nga / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba da / lag so// byang phyogs na mchog bi ka zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis
104b5(rgyud): lag so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang
104b6(rgyud): mchis lagaso// chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te// chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung // de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur// btsun pa grong khyer
104b7(rgyud): u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na// lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang // de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'// 
104b8(rgyud): btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi// pha rol byang gi phyogs chan// 'dunas bya dkar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te// der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lagaso// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs
105a1(rgyud): dang / 'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis// de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rmub khrung khrung sgra snyan// khru drug sgra skad chen po dang // shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byan cing // rma bya rnams kyi
105a2(rgyud): dag dang // ko ru kum pa dang chun lag dang // bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'// lus ngan po de glu gar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse// btsun pa grong khyer lcang la can gyi
105a3(rgyud): rol na// rgyal po dpar bo zhes bgyi ba// yul 'khor mu khyung na mchis lag so// gdag gang na mchis pa'i mdunas de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lag so// de lags
105a4(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ aM li mi da li/ ki Ti mU le/ hi li ki Ti mU le/ hu du me/ hu dur du le/ go ri/ gan d+hA ri/ gong ca ni/ oM ga mo ke swA hA// btsun pa bcom
105a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnam sa dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lag so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas/ 
105a6(rgyud): myos pa dang // klu yis myos pa spun dang ni// phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang // rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang // ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang
105a7(rgyud): rnga dzin dang ni khu drug sa// tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang // gser spyong bu ma gser can dang // pa bsangs dang pur bu dag/ 'dug gnas ji srisnyed rgyal po lags// de dag na bdag gi spun lags te/ des
105a8(rgyud): la bdag dri ba 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// dri bo 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchini zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lag so// de dag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i dri ba yis// legs pa
105b1(rgyud): smras pa 'di thos nas// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ kun+d+ha le kun+d+ha le/ kun+d+ha le/ kun+d+ha le/ e hi e hi/ 
105b2(rgyud): sA d+ha ma ti ke/ sA d+ha b+ha Na Di ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+pa bA to si swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / 
105b3(rgyud): kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing / 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za
105b4(rgyud): 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgang po 'am/ dri za rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu/ pho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag
105b5(rgyud): gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed/ gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyi/ 
105b6(rgyud): dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
105b7(rgyud): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur
105b8(rgyud): ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgad po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am/ sha zi/ 
106a1(rgyud): 'khor mo'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ sha za'i mngag gtsug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing grags tshol ba la la ni ga nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis
106a2(rgyud): par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed la sha za rnams kyis sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ 
106a3(rgyud): lagaso// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ hA me hU me/ hU me li/ hu mi lA/ ba tI ye swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum
106a4(rgyud): chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag na gyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/ rtsib logs che dang bsus po che// lag
106a5(rgyud): dang ni sa la rgyu// g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang // sprin mngon/ dang ni dri med dang // rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs// ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi// 
106a6(rgyud): 'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed// la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang // tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te// de la bdag grul bum 'di ni
106a7(rgyud): bdag la mtshe'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lagaso// bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis// legs par smras pa
106a8(rgyud): 'di thos na// ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ sa rai bi si re/ si ri bi sa re/ si re bi sa re/ kriSh+Na tsa ga le/ ka rA Di/ bi ga le swAhA/ 
106b1(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu sgrub dang / kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / 
106b2(rgyud): sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te grul bum 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgad po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi
106b3(rgyud): bu po 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar byed pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba
106b4(rgyud): la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyu dar na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyis grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po pho
106b5(rgyud): brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dag pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcu ma ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ 
106b6(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la/ kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don
106b7(rgyud): par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgad po 'am/ yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu pho 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor pho 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor
106b8(rgyud): mo'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed
107a1(rgyud): cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dgas rnams kyi yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba
107a2(rgyud): / bdun du 'gas lagaso// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ yu mi yu mi/ yu mi le/ yu mi la ba tra ye swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnam
107a3(rgyud): dang ta klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lagaso// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang // nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang // ser po dang ni zho rna dang // dbang po'i lag
107a4(rgyud): dang bkra shis dang // mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral// rab grol dang da ni rgyal ba'i bdag/ ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang // yangs pa can dang bkra bdud rgyal// gdengs ka chen dang skar dka' dang // nag
107a5(rgyud): po che dang lag 'gro dang // ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang // g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang // sngo bsangs dkar dang 'gro/ gas pa ni// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni
107a6(rgyud): bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la mtshe'o// klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lagaso// bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i klu
107a7(rgyud): rnams kyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ tsi li bi tsi li/ gau ri/ 
107a8(rgyud): gan d+ha ri/ ma ti gi/ tsaN+Da li swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyis dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i/ 
107b1(rgyud): mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid / rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'am/ klu mo'am/ klu rgang po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu
107b2(rgyud): po'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma mtshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing / glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar 'greng ngam/ 
107b3(rgyud): nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyis klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza
107b4(rgyud): ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma dam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun
107b5(rgyud): tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te/ 
107b6(rgyud): lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgang po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho 'am/ lus srul po'i 'kho
107b7(rgyud): mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ 
107b8(rgyud): glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba
108a1(rgyud): bdun du 'gas lagaso// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ A pe ba ha ni/ ma hA na pa tri ye swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang
108a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lagaso// 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // ba ra dwa tsa skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod
108a3(rgyud): tsetso dang // mgrin ngan dang ni 'gul nges dang // stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang // ri mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa lang skyong dang
108a4(rgyud): 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tsho// gas sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ 
108a5(rgyud): 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o// gnod sbyin
108a6(rgyud): 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lag so// bdag la mtshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka'i dog pa
108a7(rgyud): bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi le me le/ kIrti mA le/ hi li kIrti mU le/ oM tum+me tum+be/ oM tum+ba tum+be/ oM g+ha mo ge/ go do haM/ 
108a8(rgyud): b+h+r-i ga re/ ri She set+ta me swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ 
108b1(rgyud): rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid / rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin rgang po 'am
108b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag
108b3(rgyud): gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i
108b4(rgyud): nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal dpa bdun du 'gas lagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan
108b5(rgyud): thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lag sa pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug
108b6(rgyud): pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te srin po 'am/ srin mo 'am/ srin po rgang po'am/ srin mo rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ 
108b7(rgyud): srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po'i 'khor po 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma mtshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar
108b8(rgyud): mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na grags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams kyi 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo
109a1(rgyud): a dza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lagaso// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ hi li ho li/  s+phu lu hU lu/ yu me yu me li/ yu mA la ba tri ye swAhA/ 
109a2(rgyud): denas rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di
109a3(rgyud): nyid rta rgya cher brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ga
109a4(rgyud): la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal dpa/ dge slong dag mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog
109a5(rgyud): 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'tshar gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma
109a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / ngag la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byedakyi
109a7(rgyud): tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas
109a8(rgyud): blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni de mtshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang // nga ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// 
109b1(rgyud): khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags mang ba dag dang / bas
109b2(rgyud): mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la// de na gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par
109b3(rgyud): ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma
109b4(rgyud): lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom lda na 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches ma dang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong
109b5(rgyud): rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod
109b6(rgyud): sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag par bgyi ba dang / mngon par ma dad pa rnams kyang sbar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa
109b7(rgyud): dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na/ legaso legaso zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong dag
109b8(rgyud): ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
110a1(rgyud): te/ nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol te/ 
110a2(rgyud): skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing // phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa lags// gang zhig 'char la brten nas ni// des na nyin mor brjod pa yi
110a3(rgyud): nyi ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor can/ gnyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khro/ 
110a4(rgyud): srung zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyi d+ha/ gtu rtse// dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // dri zarna/ mas kyi mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te/ 
110a5(rgyud): brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul la gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyi/ 
110a6(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tsha
110a7(rgyud): lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag la 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal ni phyag 'tshal cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tsha
110a8(rgyud): cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa
110b1(rgyud): lags// gang na yi dgas shes bgyi ba// rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can// srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang
110b2(rgyud): ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // grul bum rnams kyi
110b3(rgyud): mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan
110b4(rgyud): gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas // sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes nga khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yi
110b5(rgyud): phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang rings gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad
110b6(rgyud): bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi// de ltar lho yi phyogs de
110b7(rgyud): ni/ ta bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po
110b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba// des na mtsho chen zab mo ni// shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste// de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes// skye bo rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i// phyogs de mngon par spyod
111a1(rgyud): dgying ba// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nyi du lhan cig tu// glu nga gar gyis rtag tu che// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bsku
111a2(rgyud): cing ta klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ 
111a3(rgyud): kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// 
111a4(rgyud): mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tsha wa lags// bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol// khyod la mi mi dan phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni
111a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi// de ltar nub kyi phyogs de
111a6(rgyud): ni/ bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga' zhing lhun chen lta mdzes dang // gang na mi rnams tshe lo// 
111a7(rgyud): nitabargya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing // de dag mo rmo mi 'debs la// bshol yang 'chang bar mi bgyid cing // tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang // nges par yongasu spyod bgyid cing // zas su sa lu kha dog dang // 
111a8(rgyud): dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang // dri dang me tog tshogs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal// na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas// chod mar de 'tshal sran tshong min// gang na me lce rtse 'dra ba'i// sman dga' khrung ba
111b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba yi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi// de ni nyid lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gan tuH
111b2(rgyud): rnams kyi yongs bskor cing // gnod sbyin rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lba/ 
111b3(rgyud): min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dungad// skyes mchog khyod la
111b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyad ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad
111b5(rgyud): yang dang yang du thos// de slang bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ goru tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol gyi ga/ sangs rgyas rig dang nabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag
111b6(rgyud): 'tshal mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho
111b7(rgyud): phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ 
111b8(rgyud): phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing // phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu// de dag gi ni chibs
112a1(rgyud): rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma 'tshal zhing / phyogs phyogs dag tu yang
112a2(rgyud): mchi lagaso// glang po tshe gcig gis shing rta drangs shing / phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mche leg so// chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bung/ 
112a3(rgyud): med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing / phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lagaso// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// 
112a4(rgyud): phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis// 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba
112a5(rgyud): ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa stengs kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lag so// byang phyogs na mchoka pi bad ka zhes bgyi ba yang
112a6(rgyud): mchis lagaso// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so// / 
112a7(rgyud): chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi mtsho mchis te// chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung // de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur// btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha
112a8(rgyud): rol na// lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang // de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gdar// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs
112b1(rgyud): can gyi pha rol// byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lagaso// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang // 'jigs rungs lto spu can dag mchi
112b2(rgyud): der ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rma ba khrung khrung sgra snyan dang // khu drug sgra skad chen po dang // shang shang te ru s+tha 'byin cing // ma bya rnams kyi spu dag dang // ko'u dus pa dang chun lags dang // bya rnams sna tshogs
112b3(rgyud): skad 'byin cing // me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'// lus ngan po dgu gar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse// btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na// rgyal po dnga' bo zhes bgyi ba// yul 'khor bu khyud na mchis
112b4(rgyud): lags so// bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lagaso // de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ i li mi
112b5(rgyud): lita i le mi le/ ki Ti mU le/ hi li ki Ti mU li/ hu du me/ hu dur du me/ gau ri gan+d+ha ri/ gau do ha ni/ oM kaM mo ka~M swA hA// btsun pa ts+tsha ma ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen
112b6(rgyud): po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang // klu yis myos pa spun rnams dang // phreng bas myos dang sbrang
112b7(rgyud): rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang // rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang // ud pal pad+ma zla ba dang // rnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra// tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga
112b8(rgyud): dang / gser spyod bu mo gser can dang // pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lag de dag bdag gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// dri za 'di ni bdag mi
113a1(rgyud): / gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis// legs par smras pa 'di thos nas// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// 
113a2(rgyud): de'i mgo tshol pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ ku tu le/ ku tu le/ ku tu la/ ku tu le/ e hi e hi/ sA d+ha ma ti ke/ sA d+ha ma ti ke/ sA d+ha ma ti ke/ sA d+ha d+har+t+ti/ 
113a3(rgyud): ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bA to si swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i
113a4(rgyud): mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing / 'don par bgyid dpa de la/ gal te dri za'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgad po 'am/ dri za
113a5(rgyud): rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu po 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing
113a6(rgyud): glags tshol ba la la zhig/ nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams ni dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang
113a7(rgyud): lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen ma/ 
113a8(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos
113b1(rgyud): shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgang po 'am/ sha za rgan mo'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo
113b2(rgyud): sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi
113b3(rgyud): rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas
113b4(rgyud): lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// / tad+ya thA/ hA me hA me/ hU mi le/ hU mi la/ ba tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum
113b5(rgyud): rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde da bon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyis ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/ 
113b6(rgyud): rtsib logs che dang gsus po che// lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu// g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang // sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang // rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs// ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // 
113b7(rgyud): srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi// 'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed// la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang // tshen kun dang ni mig bkra bo// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lag te/ 
113b8(rgyud): dedag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lagaso// bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum
114a1(rgyud): kyis pa legs par smras pa 'di thos na// a dza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du gas// de lags sngags kyi tshig ni 'di ga lags so// d+yathA/ si ri bi si re/ sar
114a2(rgyud): bis re/ si ri bi sa re/ kriSh+Na tshaka li/ ka ra Di/ bi ga le swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu
114a3(rgyud): rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum mam/ 
114a4(rgyud): grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgad po'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul dbum gyi 'khor po 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo'am/ 
114a5(rgyud): grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar maN+Da
114a6(rgyud): par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du
114a7(rgyud): tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i
114a8(rgyud): mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgang po'am/ 
114b1(rgyud): yi dgas rgan mo'am/ yi dgas kyi bu po'am/ yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor po'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzug ma 'che bar bgyi sa/ 
114b2(rgyud): glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dgas rnams yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang
114b3(rgyud): lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lagaso// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so// tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/ yu mi li/ yu mi lA ba tri ye
114b4(rgyud): swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang 8/ klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dbo na rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyid lag so// 'di lta ste/ dga'
114b5(rgyud): dpe nye dag kun dga' dang // nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam+bu bzang // ser po dang / ni nyon dang // dbang po lag dang bkra shis dang // mya ngan ming dang mya ngan bral// rab grol dang ni rgyal po'i bdag
114b6(rgyud): ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang // yangs pa can dang bkra bdun rgyal// gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang // nag po che dang lag 'gro dang // ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang // g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang / 
114b7(rgyud): sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni// 'grogs gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / 
114b8(rgyud): de dag la go bor bgyid lags so// bdag la mtshe ba'i klu dag dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas/ 
115a1(rgyud): de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di ga lags so// tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ gau rIgAn+ta ri/ ma ta gi/ tsaN+Da li swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong
115a2(rgyud): ma'am/  dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di
115a3(rgyud): nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgang po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu po 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am/ klu'i 'khor ma
115a4(rgyud): klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa / glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ 
115a5(rgyud): glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams klu 'du ba'i na du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa
115a6(rgyud): bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba
115a7(rgyud): ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nying / rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te lus srul po 'am/ 
115a8(rgyud): lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul po rgad pho 'am/ lus srul po rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ 
115b1(rgyud): lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing grags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ 
115b2(rgyud): glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhi
115b3(rgyud): du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso// tad+ya thA/ a pe/ ba ha ne/ ba hA nA/ ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin
115b4(rgyud): rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sdeng po na rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // ba radwa/ 
115b5(rgyud): tsa skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod rtso dang // mgrin ngan dang / ni mgul nges dang // stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang // ri mnyam gser can gang po
115b6(rgyud): dang / seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po
115b7(rgyud): yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la ba/ 
115b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags// bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// 
116a1(rgyud): / legs par smras pa 'di thos nas// ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshol ba bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hi le mi le/ hi le mi le/ kI d+hi mA la
116a2(rgyud): hi le kI d+hi mU le/ oM tum be tum be/ oM tum be tum be/ oM ge mo gau/ ge do hi/ b+hi g+ha re/ ri Sha sad t+ye me swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam
116a3(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/ rgya cher lung mnos shing
116a4(rgyud): 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am// gnod sbyin rgang pho 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin
116a5(rgyud): gyi 'khor po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi ma ga gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la 'a zhig
116a6(rgyud): nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo
116a7(rgyud): can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
116a8(rgyud): bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung nod cing 'don par
116b1(rgyud): bgying ba de la gal te srin pa'om/ srin mo'am/ srin po nang pa'am/ srin po nan mo'am/ srin po'i bu pa'om/ srin po'i bu ma 'am/ srin po'i 'khor pa'am/ srin po'i 'khor ma'am/ srin pa
116b2(rgyud): mngag gzhug pa'am/ srin po'i mang ga gzug sa 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing grags tshol bal la zhig nye bar mchi ning / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing / 
116b3(rgyud): gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams kyi sbyin po 'dra bu'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho byung lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas
116b4(rgyud): lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tud+ya thA/ hi le hi laM/ hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu me le/ suM mi lA bi tri ye swA hA/ zhes rgya cher smras nas/ de'i rkang pa
116b5(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dge slong dag khyed kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
116b6(rgyud): mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad ba dag mngon par dang bar bya ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang
116b7(rgyud): 'thun pa'i mngo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang ba la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid long shig/ zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
116b8(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bar sdom ni/ i ki/ hu si/ yu tsi/ a hi hi/ gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang / 
117a1(rgyud): go rims bzhin du sbyar ro// mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan/ 
117a2(rgyud): po dzi na mi tA dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
117a3(rgyud): sprin chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'i gnas na/ 
117a4(rgyud): nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub ste/ mus dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po
117a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nyer dga' dang / rgya mtsho/ dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lha dang / 'jogapo dang / yul 'khor srung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i
117a6(rgyud): rgyal po gtang zung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang / glog gi phreng ba dang / gtsug na nor bu rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug
117a7(rgyud): bud can dang / gtsug pud 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po can dang / 
117a8(rgyud): lag gi 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin tu bstan dang / mgul na nor bu dang / sprin byung dang / 
117b1(rgyud): char rgyun dang / rab 'jom dang / rnam par 'jom dang / mthu bsgyings dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs zab dang / klu'i rgyal pa tshor sgrogs dang / rnam par sgra 'byin dang / u dpal dang / rgyal chen dang / 
117b2(rgyud): gshol mda' 'dzin dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i mdab ma dang / kun tu snang dang / rna rtsub dang / dung dang / da ra da ra dang / klu'i rgyal po u pa dar da ra dang / bde byed da
117b3(rgyud): lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang / srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / 
117b4(rgyud): dung thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen sna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / glog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / chu stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po/ 
117b5(rgyud): dam pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / bai DUr+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog sgra dang / gser 'o/ dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang / 'char ba
117b6(rgyud): dang / ba glang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal pa dang / ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / mgo stong can dang / gtsug na/ 
117b7(rgyud): nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong ba dang / sprin chen dang / sde bzang dang / sa skyong dang / mis byin dang / rnam par dul dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum b+hi ra dang / chu srin kum b+hi
117b8(rgyud): ra'i gdong dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gdugs dang / pad+ma ka dang / mjug ma dang / rab 'byang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang / bal le ra dang / shing
118a1(rgyud): rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug rings dang / mgo bo che dang / bim pi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / 
118a2(rgyud): gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / sdong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / mig bzang dang / drag po chen
118a3(rgyud): po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shul can dang / rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin sprin chen dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas mthung dang / sprin zla dang / rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / 
118a4(rgyud): me tog dri chen po dang / ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / kha ba can dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / 
118a5(rgyud): mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal/ po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / khro med dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpa' dang / chu 'dzin dang / 
118a6(rgyud): sprin gdugs dang / ing gi ra'i gdong dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / sprin las mngon 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyang lto dang / zhi ba dang / 
118a7(rgyud): dpa' ba dang / gser dang can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug drag dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'khrugs sgra dang / rnga sgra
118a8(rgyud): dang nyabadud rtsi'i rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / 'brug sgrogs dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa/ klu bye ba khrag
118b1(rgyud): khrag brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa ba ni dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tsheklu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ dbus ma
118b2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bla ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba
118b3(rgyud): dang dbyug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang / rin po
118b4(rgyud): che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i lda ldi dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dag bcom
118b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la phul nas/ bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dun go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ smon lam rnams bta pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul
118b6(rgyud): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / 
118b7(rgyud): rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrangs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad
118b8(rgyud): las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa
119a1(rgyud): / rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun tu mngon par phyogs pa/ mdapag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi
119a2(rgyud): sprin rgyamatsho phyogs kun phyogani rgyas par 'gengs pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtshar sbyin
119a3(rgyud): mi 'dres pa dadag tu ming // grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med brjod du med pa dag gis/ namakha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus
119a4(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba tha/ mas cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin
119a5(rgyud): rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang // 
119a6(rgyud): phye ma dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i rgya mtsho'i
119a7(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyis sprin rgya mtsho dpag
119a8(rgyud): tu med pa/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// 
119b1(rgyud): bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis
119b2(rgyud): brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// thams cad kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab
119b3(rgyud): pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu smras
119b4(rgyud): 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che'o/ dad zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin
119b5(rgyud): rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya ma tshe sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul
119b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnamasu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i
119b7(rgyud): / rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang byed pa'i nor bu rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis/ na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khen
119b8(rgyud): par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs
120a1(rgyud): kyi khang pa brtsegs pa/ ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnam/ 
120a2(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog
120a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par rgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin
120a4(rgyud): gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ra ba'i snying po can/ bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams
120a5(rgyud): cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis rab tu rgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs
120a6(rgyud): pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ 
120a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi chom chom dang / phreng ba dang rin po che'i
120a8(rgyud): mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma
120b1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che sngang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma
120b2(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches rgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / anang rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od
120b3(rgyud): zer ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po
120b4(rgyud): che 'bar ba thams cad 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng gre'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho
120b5(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer/ nga ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis
120b6(rgyud): brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs pa thams cad kyi
120b7(rgyud): shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod
120b8(rgyud): pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan
121a1(rgyud): pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
121a2(rgyud): lus phyed tsam na thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos
121a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang / ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin
121a4(rgyud): rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po rtsa na gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu mngon pa dar phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi
121a5(rgyud): seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i phreng
121a6(rgyud): ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang me tog dang pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i
121a7(rgyud): snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams ca
121a8(rgyud): kyi phreng ba rab tu dbyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu rgyan pa/ rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu chen po che'i yal ga dang / phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams
121b1(rgyud): cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas rgyan pa nyid snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ nam
121b2(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi
121b3(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyis me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho
121b4(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla dere rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho
121b5(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba'i kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re n+ya
121b6(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshog su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dra ba
121b7(rgyud): bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi ze ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya
121b8(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / namakha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// 
122a1(rgyud): mchod par bya'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba
122a2(rgyud): bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i
122a3(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i
122a4(rgyud): gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad kyi sdong bu yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam dpar snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spos
122a5(rgyud): dang gdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya
122a6(rgyud): chen po snang bar byed pa kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar
122a7(rgyud): bya'o// ta ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres
122a8(rgyud): pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgya mtsho sprin
122b1(rgyud): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
122b2(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai DUr+ya dang rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can gyi gzug
122b3(rgyud): mtha' yas pa dag/ sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang
122b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbu ngas can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin
122b5(rgyud): rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya// mchod par bya'o// nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya
122b6(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas
122b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa tham
122b8(rgyud): cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongasu/ 
123a1(rgyud): smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bko/ 
123a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// 
123a3(rgyud): rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar
123a4(rgyud): byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
123a5(rgyud): kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshe gas kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang
123a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ 
123a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi
123a8(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad+ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnam dang
123b1(rgyud): rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya
123b2(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i mdzod mtha' /
