123b3(rgyud): pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kyis kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti
123b4(rgyud): stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// // zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag dgis yang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byasate
123b5(rgyud): zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ga/ nga nas/ rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// de'i tshe stong gsu ma gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i
123b6(rgyud): smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / 
123b7(rgyud): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongaso// de nas klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan
123b8(rgyud): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung te/ bcom ldan 'das la
124a1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te nu ba nus na lung bstan pa'i srang du/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
124a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdug
124a3(rgyud): lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
124a4(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' ya das rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ba/ dugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
124a5(rgyud): ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal tham sa cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir dus su
124a6(rgyud): char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/ rtswa dang shing gel pa dang / sman dang nags tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur te/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur
124a7(rgyud): gang gis 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil
124a8(rgyud): 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar
124b1(rgyud): sems pa leg so// legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal tham cad
124b2(rgyud): rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'o// klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang / mi rnams ni mes ma'i tshig/ mtshon gyis mi
124b3(rgyud): tshugs/ chus mi khyer/ ngag gis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi zil gyis mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su srung bar 'gyur/ 
124b4(rgyud): bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/ lha dang dbacas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du thag thogs
124b5(rgyud): med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / miri chos bla ma rtogs nas/ lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'ji
124b6(rgyud): rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po lha dang mi'i byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go// klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams
124b7(rgyud): pa'i yid kyis las kyis gnas par bya'o// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod/ 
124b8(rgyud): par byed/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/ rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do// 
125a1(rgyud): klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra ni d+ha ra ni/ u d+ha ra ni/ sa pra tiSh+Thi tA/ bI dza ya bar+Na/ sad t+ya pra ti dz+nyA sa ra t+na/ dz+nyA na pa ti/ ung / 
125a2(rgyud): pA dA ni b+hi nA mA ni/ a b+hi she tsa nI A b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ A dzi ma du/ e hI ku ma pA la ni/ bA hA ha rakle sha na/ d+hu nA pA bam/ sho d+ha ya marga na/ ni ra ka/ d+harma tA shud+d+ha/ lo ka bi ti mA ra rA dza sa du khA/ 
125a3(rgyud): sha ma nA sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka nA a d+hiSh+Tha te/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na be swA hA// klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
125a4(rgyud): pasate bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod dpar bya'o// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po
125a5(rgyud): sprul pa snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi/ sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig
125a6(rgyud): las byung ba'i rus dang / rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan bzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o// de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams cad dang / klu'i/ 
125a7(rgyud): cho rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal
125a8(rgyud): thams cad gcod par byed/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do// klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
125b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad ming po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyi rnam par mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dra
125b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
125b3(rgyud): sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
125b4(rgyud): pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'a ngas de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
125b5(rgyud): pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdug
125b6(rgyud): chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshalo// 
125b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
125b8(rgyud): pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang
126a1(rgyud): bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar chen
126a2(rgyud): gsil byung mi dga' rab 'jom sgra zab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gda' la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga ri
126a3(rgyud): chusprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
126a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kun tu ston la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dpa sprin rgya chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
126a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgra/ gas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
126a6(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' banabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
126a7(rgyud): pa sprin gyis lo tog bskyed la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin
126a8(rgyud): gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// 
126b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ud pal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
126b2(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen
126b3(rgyud): 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshalo// 
126b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam para'ajoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de ba bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chub la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
126b5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sgra na dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
126b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar namakha' mtho nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de/ 
126b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyems pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa re/ 
126b8(rgyud): bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i smon la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la
127a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyis kun tu 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas
127a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa/ 'dzam+bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa
127a3(rgyud): sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas/ klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam
127a4(rgyud): bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtswa dang / shi nga gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cang bskyed par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ stong gsum
127a5(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgya la pos gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe
127a6(rgyud): slad ma'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / chos ma lags pa/ 
127a7(rgyud): skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod
127a8(rgyud): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par gsol/ 
127b1(rgyud): gang dag klu thams cad la yang dag par skul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can bas/ 
127b2(rgyud): cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang / rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi
127b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur/ 
127b4(rgyud): ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sngags gzhi rnams/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thamasad la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ 
127b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan la ngas kyi klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i
127b6(rgyud): gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
127b7(rgyud): gsol ba 'debs pa legs legaso// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bgyings pa/ dpa' ba'i tog ces bya
127b8(rgyud): ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa rje su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab/ 
128a1(rgyud): / par byed char ches na gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams cad bskul bar byed/ lha thams cad sim par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sems can
128a2(rgyud): thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do// tad+ya thA/ ma hA d+hA na/ a ba b+hA sa ni/ shrI ti dzi le gas+thi Di Ta bi kra mA/ badz+ra sa hA ta ne/ pa ra ma bi ra dza/ nirma la gu Na ke tu sUr+yA ba b+he/ bi ma la~M ga yaSh+Ti/ 
128a3(rgyud): b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ du dum bu/ ha na han/ ma hA pra b+he bai d+h+yA ta ma hA mo ha e d+ha kA re/ pran+d+ha gra shud d+he/ pa ri pU ra Na mi tA/ me tri bI ra ma na skan d+ha/ mai tI ma bud+d+ha re/ dza la dza la/ dza la dza la/ dza ma/ 
128a4(rgyud): bu d+ha re/ bo d+h+yang ga ku su me/ da sha ba le/ tsa tur du bai shA ra tre/ aSh+ma da sha e be Ni ka bud+d+ha d+harme shu b+ha ma ti pu N+ya rA shi/ sh+tsa kla d+harma sa ma nI ti/ gam b+hi ra bi ra dzi ste/ bi ma lo/ bi she
128a5(rgyud): prA pa te/ ni rApra b+ha d+harme/ sarba lo ka dz+yeShA/ dz+yeSh+Te pa ra pre ba re/ a nu ta ta re/ a sang ge/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ shAn ta ma te/ shwen ta pA pe/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ 
128a6(rgyud): tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ra ma bud+d+hA nu mA te/ ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi te swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
128a7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i bar chad byed pa lnga
128a8(rgyud): bsal bar bya'o// s+yAd ya be dan/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ nA gA nan/ dza ba dza ba/ dzi bi dzi bi/ dzu bu dz+ra Ta/ klu chen po dag tshur shog/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu / 
128b1(rgyud): gli 'di car rab tu shAg+sa/ 656/ 6/ tsud+har+thar+ya/ klu'i bdag pa tshan po dag cung shog/ me'u chen podag/ sangs rgyas pa bden pas/ la m+bu grib rji pa rab tu
128b2(rgyud): shig/ ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ klu thams cad dgug par bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang
128b3(rgyud): snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang / bsam pa chen pos/ klu ri bdag po chen po dag tshur shog/ sangs rgyas rnams
128b4(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon/ tan rnams dran par gyis shig/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ chu chen po'i chu dang / sprin gyi chu 'chang ba can lag
128b5(rgyud): gis 'gro chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshurasheg/ ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+hi Ti g+hi Ti/ g+hu Tu g+hu Tu/ drag shul can khro ba
128b6(rgyud): shugs chen po dang ldan pa/ dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig/

128b8(rgyud): gi bden pas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char pob shig swA hA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po'i brtsegs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/ mngon par
129a1(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams tshur shog/ byams pa'i sems kyis 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ lag na

129a3(rgyud): / thams cad dgug go// byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/ na ra na ra/ ni ri ni ri/ nu ru nu ru swA hA// yon po sna tshogasu gyur pa mgo stong pa/ mgo dang / mig dmar ba/ stobs che ba'i
129a4(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug par bya'o// kye kye lag gis 'gro tshe na po dag mchog tu thugs rje can/ bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin
129a5(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis na ga/ ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/ gu T+ya gu Du swA hA/ stobs/ dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / gzi brjid thog pa med pa dang
129a6(rgyud): ldan pa dag gis/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams phob shig/ sha ra sha ra/ shi ri shi ri/ shu ru shu ru swA hA/ kye kye klu chen po rnams rang rang gi rigs dang / cho rigs dran par gyis la/

129a8(rgyud): shig swA hA// brgya byin gyis bden pas 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bden pas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag brgyad pa'i bdenas/

129b3(rgyud): rab tu phob shig swA hA// klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phobo shig swA hA// klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bden

129b5(rgyud): phob shig swA hA// lha thams cad kyis bden pas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA// klu thams cad kyi/ sa bden pas sa chen po 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ 
129b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin thams cad kyis bden pas sems can thams cad bsrungs shig swA hA// dri za thams cad kyi bden pas mi rnams kyi 'khrug pa dang / gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA// lha ma yin
129b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi bden pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog shig swA hA// nam mkha' lding thams cad kyi bden pas/ klu thams cad byams par byos la/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char
129b8(rgyud): chen po'i rgyun pob shig swA hA// mi 'am ci'i thams cad kyi bden pas sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA// sems can thams cad ni tshim par gyis shig swA hA// lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis bden
130a1(rgyud): pas/ yangs shing rgya che ba'i char gyi rgyun pob shig swA hA// 'dir char la sgrib pa lnga po yang dag par zung shig swA hA/ mi thams cad kyis bden pas/ mi thams cad la yongasu bsrungs
130a2(rgyud): shig sA hA// ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ da rang ra/ di rid ri/ du ru du ru/ na ta na ta/ ni Ti ni Ti/ nu Tu nu Tu/ shin tu 'gyogs mar bzhud ma/ sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/ sprin ldan ma/ sprin chen ldan ma/

130a7(rgyud): Ni b+hi ri Ni/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma ri/ dbu dgu dang ldan ma/ sprin chen phreng ldan ma/ glog tshogs phreng ldan ma/ lag go 'gro thams cad 'dzin ma/ sprin lta bu'i na

130b1(rgyud): 'bol bar de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs kyis 'ja m+bu'i gling 'dir char pa tha shog ces bskul dugs so swA hA/ yar ya ra/ yar yar/ su ru su ru/ rar nga / di dzing / rdu ma dzu

130b3(rgyud): man+da ta pra ba ra sha big+ha nAn/ mai tre yadz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ ha ra pA pan/ sarba satwA nAn/ a d+hi sha ya pu NAm/ sarba bud+d+hA nAn d+ha ri Ni d+ha re/ shu b+ha mA te/ gu N+DA gra pA b+he Ne/ masma
130b4(rgyud): dz+nyA nota la ge/ shuk+kha d+harme sa t+ya pa ti dz+nye/ ma hA ya na d+hu ShIlo ka dz+yeSh+pe b+he ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha mai tri A pU rA ye sarba k+She tAr+t+ti ra/ shukle shwe tA ma/ pa ra d+ha re/ pan ta ra ba si ni/ d+hu d+hu re/ d+hu d+hu ru/ sha/ 
130b5(rgyud): ma sha ma/ shan ta ma se/ char gyi bgegs thams cad rna ma par gsal bar gsol swA hA// dus gsum gyi deb zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bden pas byams pa'i thugs
130b6(rgyud): kyis yang dag par brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyi thugs skyon med pas klu chen po rnams la yang dag par bskul lo// klu'i rgyal po chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil

131a1(rgyud): pobo shig swA hA// klu rgyal po gci can la yang dag par bskul lo// 'dzam bura'i gling 'dir char rab tub ba shigs hA// klu'i rgyal pa tshulal yang dag par bsku'o//  m+bu'i grib

131b1(rgyud): dag par bskul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ nA ge nA ge/ ma hA nA ge/ g+ho re mA na se/ nA ga hri da ya/ d+hu mA ku le u gra ro She/ pra tsan da te dze/ bi Sho gre/ a ShI bi shi/ a hi go re/ kriSha

131b3(rgyud): mahA b+ho ge/ ma Ni da re/ pi ri phi ri/ phu ru pu ru/ pa ra pa ra/ baR+Sha baR+Sha dza lam+bu d+ha ri/ sham+bu sham+bu/ ba ta/ tu Tu ma be/ d+hu d+hu/ d+hu d+hu ma be/ me g+ha pra b+he me g+ha ba hI ne/ d+haka d+ha ka D+ga ka d+hA mA baM/ gA nA g+ha nA/ shi ke ni/ 
131b4(rgyud): ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma hA nA ga ga Ne/ ni ra tran+tu/ pa dza raha karA ma hA nA dI da ye/ g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma pA ya ti ka/ dzA ga rau d+hu dzadag me/ bi ka Ta saM ka Te/ go ra bi sU dz+re ni badz+ra b+ha Ne/ klu thams cad
131b5(rgyud): dgug go// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob

131b7(rgyud): cho ga ni char chen dbab par 'dod na/ bla gob med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla re sngon po bri/ ba dan sngon po dpyang ngo // chos smra ba lus bkrus la/ yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas shing / gos gtsang ma sngon po
131b8(rgyud): bsgos la spos dri zhim pos bskus nas/ zas dkar gsum zos la/ stan sngon po'i steng du 'dug nas/ kha shar phyogs su blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas/ sprin chen
132a1(rgyud): bo radakyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyid mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklags par byar// chu sngon pos bkang ba'i bum pa gang ba bani bzhag par bya// gtor ma dang / bdug pa dang / me tog
132a2(rgyud): nus kyi sbyar ro// de la chos smra bas/ phyogs bzhir pa'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar bya ste/ shar phyogasu khru gsum tsam du/ klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa/ ba'i
132a3(rgyud): bas bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// nub phyogasu khru bdun tsam du/ klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa/ klu'i g.yog
132a4(rgyud): 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// byang phyog su lhung/ rnam du/ klu rgyal po mi gong gu ga// klu gamago 'a khongs sa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// chos smra bas rang gi lus bsrungs

132a6(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/ 'di ni cho ga'o// gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ sprin chen po'i klung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/ nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun tshun chad/ gdon mi za bar
132a7(rgyud): char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho ni dus las yol yang srid kyi thub pa chen po'i gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang / yon tan la gnas te/ 'chal pa'i tshul/ 
132a8(rgyud): khrims dang / sha dang nya la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'o thug dang zho dang 'o ma dang / 'bras can bu ram can la sogs pa dang / mngar gsum za zhing bklag par bya'o// de ltar na 'grub par 'gyur te/ 
132b1(rgyud): thub pa'i rgyal pos gsung ba bzhin du the tsom med par bya'o// 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa/ klung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas
132b2(rgyud): pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len dra bi d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab
132b3(rgyud): pata rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha bA ta maN+Da li sarba nA ga hri da yan nA ma ma hA yA sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u/ klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ theg
132b4(rgyud): pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' tham sa cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na/ nor bu rin po
132b5(rgyud): che'i rtse mo can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na/ klu stong du tshang ba'i klu tshogs chen po// klu thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing / klu'i rgyalapo 'khor chen po dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po
132b6(rgyud): dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po yang dag skul dang / klu'i rgyal po klog phreng can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po btang gzung dang / 
132b7(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po dung dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshams bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po klog 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can dang / klu'i rgyal
132b8(rgyud): po sprin chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po skar mnga' gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po dus min sgrogs dang / 
133a1(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang / klu'i rgyal po klog rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par
133a2(rgyud): snang dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od chen lam dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu dang / klu'i rgyal po/ 
133a3(rgyud): dpal 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par sgrog pa'i skad dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal/ 
133a4(rgyud): bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po sha sho sgra chen dang / klu'i rgyal po dang ding sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po rab 'jom dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal
133a5(rgyud): po rlung rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgya la po dpal ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po smad dkris bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin rgyas dang / klu'i
133a6(rgyud): rgyal po sprin gyis dga' byed dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis 'gebs pa'i rigs dang / klu'i rgyal po legs par 'gebs dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par rtse dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po
133a7(rgyud): ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po mthong dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gyi dkyir gyi legs par 'gebs dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyi mi
133a8(rgyud): thub dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin las chu 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po po de mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po krung 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khrug par byed dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po
133b1(rgyud): dag dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos/ na mkha' la di ri ri sgrogs shing / rdzi char
133b2(rgyud): chen po rab tu 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das la srid zhu bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir lhag so// kyai klu chen po dag klu dag tshur shog/ mu lu mu lu/ tsa ta tsa ta/ paT pa Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta swA hA// glog 'bar ba
133b3(rgyud): rab tu phyung zhing rje chen po'i rgyun thong la char phob shig/ kye kye klu chen po dag/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyis shig/ kye klu chen po dag tshur
133b4(rgyud): shog chur shog/ 'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu phob shig/ 8/ g+hu Du g+hu Du mur+yA muR+ShA/ hi hi hi hi/ tsuR+Ya tsuR+Sha/ ma hA na ga hri da ya/ sarba nA gA nAM A kAr+N+Na sany+tso da ye/ shi grAn+d+ha ra swA hA/ 
133b5(rgyud): sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan bkod pa dag/ gser/ rnams kyi mtha' rin po che thams cad tshon gyi lda ldi madz+re/ sa pa mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu 'phyang ba/ rgya mtsho chen po'i
133b6(rgyud): sprin dag dang / lha'i rin po ches mdzes par byas pa'i gzhal med khang me tog rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs la/ rin po che'i sprin
133b7(rgyud): rab tu 'phyang zhing / lha'i ras bcos bu mang po mu tig gi rgyan phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin/ 
133b8(rgyud): dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i rin po che bkod pa chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs pa
134a1(rgyud): par byin gyis rlobs/ sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha'i bu re'i dril bu'i sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / 
134a2(rgyud): bya'i tshogs thams cad skad 'byin cing me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / rgya mtsho sprin chen po sgra cher sgrogs shing / lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la/ mu tig gi lnga ldi rnam/ 
134a3(rgyud): pa sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / gser skud kyis rgyan pa'i snang ba chen po can gyis rtse mos na mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi
134a4(rgyud): phreng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis na mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa la mkhas pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / snang ba dang ngan pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgras kun tu khebs pa'i rgya chen po'i sprin
134a5(rgyud): ngag gis/ na mkha' mngon par khebs par gyis shig/ klung ngaklu'i rgyal po thams cad tshur shog/ sa'i steng 'dir 'bru ga sgra sgrogs shing char phob shig/ char rab tu phob shig/ 
134a6(rgyud): kun tu rab tu phob shig/ di ri rir sgrogs shig/ klog chen po snang ba rab tu phyung shig/ 'du shing kun tu 'dul tog yang dar dir zhing 'dug ste/ klu'i skad chen po yid du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byin cing dbyangs
134a7(rgyud): chen po rab tu sgrogs pa dag 'dzam+bu'i gling du char rab tu phob shig/ g+ha Da g+ha Da/ g+hi Di g+hi Di/ hU nu hu Du/ g+hu Du g+hu Du/ ga Ta ga Ta/ g+hi Ti g+hi Ti/ ma Ta ma Ta/ tsa Ta tsaT/ paT pa Ta/ kye kye klu dang klu chen po dag chu
134a8(rgyud): tshur tshur shog/ tshur shog/ d+hu d+hu/ d+hu d+hu/ hA hA hA hA/ hI hI/ hUM hUM/ 'brug chen po spogs shing / rlung chen po rab tu gtong ba dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ 'dzam bu gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ 
134b1(rgyud): swAhA/ kye kye klu dang klu'i rgyal po dag/ klu thams cad la yang dag par bskul gyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling du char phob shig/ g+huT+Ta g+hu Du/ phaT phaT/ hA hA/ he he/ klu chen po dag 'dus shig/ sa'i steng du char
134b2(rgyud): rab tu phab shig/ b+hUM ru g+hu ru/ ki ri ki ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ di ri de/ ki li ki li/ zhing thams cad yongs su gang sher gyis shig/ 'bru dang shing ldan pa dang / dz+ra dang / shing gel ba dang / swan
134b3(rgyud): thams cad rab tu skye bar gyis shig/ byams pa'i sems kyis tshur shog/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / lag na rdo rje'i bden pa dang / klu thams cad
134b4(rgyud): kyi bden pas klu chen po ngag tshur sheg tshur sheg swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu la yang dag par bskul lo// sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po
134b5(rgyud): dpal gyis gzi brjid la yang dag par bskul lo// chos kyi ba/ den pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA/ hA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la yang dag par bskulo// dge
134b6(rgyud): 'dun gyis bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phobo shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo// lag na rdo rje'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig
134b7(rgyud): swA hA// klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par bskulo// tshangs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shi ga swA hA// klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin la yang dag par bskul lo// dbang
134b8(rgyud): po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la yang dag par bsku'o// khyab 'jug gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phab shig swA hA/ 
135a1(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po drang ba can la yang dag par bskul lo// drag po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu popo shig swA hA/ klu ri rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par bsku'o// drang srongan/ 
135a2(rgyud): bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA// klu'i rgyal po skrag 'bros byed la yang dag par bskul lo// lha'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgya
135a3(rgyud): po gzi can chen po la yang dag par bskul lo// klu thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA// klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la yang dag par bskul lo// gnod sbyin gyis
135a4(rgyud): bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA // klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la yang dag par bskul lo// srin po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig
135a5(rgyud): swA hA/ klu gong ma thams cad kyi bden pas char rab tu phan shig char phob shig/ ma 'phyi bar tshur sheg tshur sheg/ kye kye klu chen po dag klu thams cad kyi snying po la yang dag par
135a6(rgyud): bskul lo// kun nas drang ngo / sa ra sa ra/ hA hA/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ ha hA hA hA/ hi hi hi hi/ e h+ye hi/ tha tha tha/ tsa tsa tsa ra ta/ zhing thams cad kun gang bar gyis shig/ 'bru thams cad kyi char pho ba shig/ rlung chen
135a7(rgyud): po rab tu thong shig/ dr-i druM/ g+hu g+h+r-i/ bAM pAM/ Ta TaT/ ni pA ra Ni/ sta~M b+hi ni/ mo hA ni/ dzA gA li puk+ka si/ pra hA Ne/ ma taM gi/ dza ye bi dza ye/ hA hA swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dpal gyi gzhi
135a8(rgyud): brjid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rab 'joms dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'byung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun tu 'gebs
135b1(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgrogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgyas mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen rnam par sgrogs pa'i sgra'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
135b2(rgyud): chen 'jigs mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen srung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnga sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid
135b3(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbyangs snyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen skar ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen tshub ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen shin
135b4(rgyud): tu brtan pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sprin pa rtun pas dga' bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin tshe na'ur 'ur sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'jigs pas/ 
135b5(rgyud): 'jigs mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen thog tog/ rab 'bebs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bkra/ 
135b6(rgyud): shis kyi ched dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po thams cad la yang dag par bskul/ 
135b7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' lung gis/ myur du sheg sheg/ kye kye klu dang / klu chen po dag tshur sheg tshur sheg/ hu lu hu lu/ su ru su ru/ d+ha pa d+ha pa/ g+hu ra g+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma 'chi bar sangs rgyas kyi bden pas
135b8(rgyud): tshur sheg/ chos kyi bden pas tshur sheg/ dge 'dun gyis bden pas tshur sheg/ klu thams cad dang / klu chen po gong ma gong ma dag gis bden pas/ 'dzam bu gling 'dir char phob shig/ a la la n+de
136a1(rgyud): ga byed cing / a la la zhes glu len pa dang / al la zhes gru'i rnam par tshul ba chen pa byed cing 'dum/ char gyi rgyun chen po'i thebs shing / muchen pa rnams kyi chos kyi sna
136a2(rgyud): 'ong bston pa da// gu lu gu lu/ nA ke na ge/ matsa~M tsaT/ nA ga nI/ hAhA/ hi hi/ nA gnag ni nAg/ sarban te// bar+d+ha ma d+ha na~M/ sA ra Ni/ me re ta re Ni/ ta re/ ta ha ra/ ta re/ ke bil ke na/ ba~M bra rnaMn/ 
136a3(rgyud): b+ha yA nA ge/ A kaDa D+ha A kaDa d+h+ya/ mA bi lam ba tha/ bi d+hu dz+wa re/ g+ho ra rA pi Ni/ kA le/ a kA le/ gardza ta/ sarba me g+ha bi gurba Ni/ sany+tsa da ne/ sarba k+She tran/ a pU ra Ni/ tsakre tsakra brti/ hi ri hi ri/ b+he ga b+ha ge/ 
136a4(rgyud): sma ra sma ra/ kA li kA li/ ma hA kA li/ hri da yaM/ pra bi sha/ a te/ dam tre/ sarba nA gA A kaR+Sha Ni/ pU ra ya pU ra ya hUM hUM/ rat+na tAH khyi / bedzeShe/ badz+re badz+ra pA Ni/ kA la sho d+ha re/ nA ga tu bi ni/ su
136a5(rgyud): ru be/ b+ho gi b+haM gi/ ma hA b+ho gi/ ma hA b+ho gi/ b+ho ga ru pu/ ta ya ban/ baR+Sha Ni/ sarba nag sats+tshed ni swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ su ru paM/ kA la rA b+hu
136a6(rgyud): Ni swA hA// chos smra bas thog ma kho nar srung ba'i cho ga byas la/ chos gos kyi grwar lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa bor nas/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u/ klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba
136a7(rgyud): 'di zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du/ rgyun ma chad par bklag par bya'o// shar phyog su ni ba lang gi lci bas klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// lho phyogasu ni klu'i rgya
136a8(rgyud): po rab tu rgyas byed ces bya ba mgo lnga pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// nub phyogasu ni rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can zhes bya ba/ mgo bdun pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// byang phyogasu ni klu'i
136b1(rgyud): rgyal po sprin bskul zhes bya ba/ mgo dgu pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// bla re dang gos sngon po dang / rgyal mtshan sngon po dang / lha bshos thams cad kyang sngon por bya'o// klu thams cad la dbab pa ni mang
136b2(rgyud): gsum gyis bya'o// mngar gsum gyi dgang blugs bdun yang / klu'i snying pos sbyin sreg bya'o// sprin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang bris te/ char gyi rgyun 'bebs te phan tshun thug cing mthar klog 'gyu bar bya'o// 
136b3(rgyud): 'dir dbab pa ni khur ba bkra shis ldan dang / pan tse dang / sha dang / nya sha dang / sbrang rtsi las byas pa'i zas mchog rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas chos smra ba gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos pas rlung gi dkyil
136b4(rgyud): 'khor gyi leru klu thams cad kyi snying po bklag par bya'o// de nas daklu rnams dang po'i nyin mo nas brtsams te/ di ri rir s+tha sgrogs par byed cing / sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byin par 'gyur/ 
136b5(rgyud): le'u 'di la the tsom dang brnyas par mi bya'o// gal te rgya mtsho dus tshad las yol na/ 'di yang char las yol bar 'gyuraro// / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
136b6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
136b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gang la la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
136b8(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug bsgrags la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
137a1(rgyud): sprin kun tu ston la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
137a2(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin rnam par rgyas mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi yan lag
137a3(rgyud): mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin lta bu'i na bza' ba nabs la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
137a4(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'bru snyun la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin gyi phre
137a5(rgyud): ba can la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin 'thor la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
137a6(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
137a7(rgyud): sprin 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
137a8(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi byin la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug rnam par sgrog la phyag 'tshalo// 
137b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi chub la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
137b2(rgyud): rgyas sprin sdud la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug nges par sgrogs la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 
137b3(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde legasu gyur cig/ 'byung po thams cad la byams par gyur cig/ dud 'gror gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa med par gyur cig/ ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ sgrib pa thad
137b4(rgyud): rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i cho ga' di grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sU ta sU ta/ sU ta sU ta/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu/ 
137b5(rgyud): Ta swA hA/ char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am// dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis/ mgo bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas
137b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi ger bris nas/ gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste/ pog phor mdun gyis na mkha' la gyen du 'dug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams lan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la mtsho/ 
137b7(rgyud): pa chen po byas te/ zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun ma chad par byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sprin chen po klung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thas cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso// 
137b8(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nA ga ra dza bI ra pr-its+tsha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha
138a1(rgyud): / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na/ lus 'phags ri'i dbang po brag phug na bzhugs te/ de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can kha dog shin tu 'phags/ 
138a2(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa/ nam sros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lus
138a3(rgyud): 'phags ri 'di na/ ring po dag dge slong rnams la 'tshe na/ de la bdag gis ji ltar mi 'tshe bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi klu'i rgyal po gzi can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
138a4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po legs so legs so// 'di lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka'/ stsal pa/ dge slong de'i phyir/ dug dang / sman chen po bco brgyad pa
138a5(rgyud): 'di dag gi ming zung shig/ tad+ya thA/ pan+ta re/ ka ra Te/ ke yA re/ po dang gA ma te/ bI du ma te/ a ra Ta/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ru t+ya/ da ha da na/ a ta da ha/ dze le dza la/ pha le/ sha Ta sha Ta/ ku lin
138a6(rgyud): ku li/ e kar shI ta/ ra gA pi shwa/ dge slong dag su zhig dug dang sman chen po bco brgyad pa de dag gi ming 'dzin pa'i de'i lus la rims kyis mi tshugs/ dug dang / mtshon dang / byang snyems dang / ro longs dang
138a7(rgyud): nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pas mi tshugs/ de la ring po dag 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro// su zhig 'di dag 'dzin pa de ji srid 'tshe'i bar du srung ba byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
138a8(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyi nus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// 
138b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ gra ha mA tri ka nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
138b2(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / nyi ma dang
138b3(rgyud): zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / ba ba sangs dang / phur bu dang / gza' lhag pa dang / spen pa dang / sgra gcan 'dzin dang / 'jug rings rnams dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa mang po rnams kyis bstod
138b4(rgyud): ba/ rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje'ikhri la bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' dum dang yang thab sa gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
138b5(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rje'i dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
138b6(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rje gzhu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
138b7(rgyud): po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
138b8(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139a1(rgyud): chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang / byang chub sems dpa
139a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to// bkod pa chen po'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba dang / bar
139a3(rgyud): du dge ba dang / tha mar dge ba dang / don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to// de nas phyag na rdo rje 'khor de dag la ltas te langs nas/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
139a4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du ma sa bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bske mas pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krung legs par bcas nas/ 
139a5(rgyud): 'khor de dag la 'gying bag tu bltas te/ rdo rje'i thal mo rang gi snying khar bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gza' mi bzad pa/ mi zad pa'i
139a6(rgyud): gzugs can/ drag shul can gyi sems dang ldan pa/ khro bo khro ba'i gzugs can dag/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ tho 'tshams par bgyid pa/ mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid cing / kha
139a7(rgyud): cig nor zas 'phrog par bgyid/ kha cig srog 'phrog par bgyid/ sems can tshe ring ba kha cig ni thung ngur bgyid do// de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshe bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi slad du/ 
139a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yang khyod kyi snying rje bskyed pas sems can thos
139b1(rgyud): cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gsang chen pas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa ni leg so leg so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / gza' mi zad pa'i gzugs
139b2(rgyud): can shin tu khro ba dang / shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyi mchod pa dang / mchod yon dang bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshadado// de dag mchod pas mchod gyur cing // 
139b3(rgyud): gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa// gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang // ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang // lha rnams dang ni lha min dang // mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang // mi rnams dang ni mi ma yin// 
139b4(rgyud): drag po gzi brjid chen po dang // khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i// gas sngags rnams dang mchod pa dang // rim pa bzhin du bshad pa/ bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
139b5(rgyud): nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhug so// de nas de'i mdo la ni ma la sogs pa'i gza' thams cad langs te/ bcom ldan 'das
139b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas dbus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
139b7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba
139b8(rgyud): rnams la srung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug bzhil ba dang / dgu bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing
140a1(rgyud): // pa rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshang du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang / gsang sngags bka' stsal to// oM mo g+ho nAs/ 
140a2(rgyud): swA hA tata oM shI tA sha be swA hA/ oM rak+ta aM ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/ oM bud+hA ya swA hA/ oM b+ho g+ha sma ta ye swA hA/ oM a su rod ta mA ya swA hA/ oM kr-iSh+Na ban+d+ha ya swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swA hA/ oM dz+ya tiSh+Thi ta be swA hA/ 
140a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas grub pa yin te/ kha dog dang 'thun par spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod pa bya'o// kham pa'am/ 
140a4(rgyud): zangs la sogs pa'am/ gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas/ re re la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// da lag na rdo rje de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs
140a5(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o// de nas gzu rnams thams cad srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// dbul po ra/ gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe zad pa las tshe ring por byed pa/ 
140a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs gang yin pa dang / gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi// 
140a7(rgyud): ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod par bya ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun
140a8(rgyud): gyis bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar byeda'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza'
140b1(rgyud): rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tsha lo// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshalo// bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tsha'o/ 
140b2(rgyud): rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// gzar khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+redz+ra badz+re/ pad+ma pad+me/ sa ra sa ra/ swa ra swa ra sa ra s+pha ra swA hA/ na maHpad+ma d+ha ra sa/ na maHsarba gra hA NAM/ sarbA
140b3(rgyud): pa ri pu ra kA NA na mo rok+Shat+na NAM na mo dAng sha ra shA nI/ tad+ya thA/ oM bud+d+he bud+d+ho/ badz+re badz+re/ pad+me pad+me/ sa ra sa ra/ swa ra swa ra sa ra/ sma ra sma ra/ bi kri Da/ bi kri ra/ mA ra mA ra/ marda ya marda ya/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba big+h+nA na/ 
140b4(rgyud): ku ru ku ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ d+hin+da b+hin+da/ k+Sha ba yak+Sha pa ya shAn te shAn te/ dAnadun te/ dApa ya dA pa ya/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag nyid myur dub/ na dugasol// bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad
140b5(rgyud): la srung du gsol// srung du gsa'o// gza' thams cad dang / rgyu skar rnam sa kyi gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdzul/ phrul chen po mnga' ba sdang ba'i sems can rnams gsal du gsoso// 
140b6(rgyud): bdag gi sdig pa rnams bskam du gsol/ tsiN+Da tsin+da/ tu ru tu ru/ tsit+ti tsitI/ su mu su mu/ mu tsu mu tsu/ b+ha ba b+ha be/ u gre u gra rU pe/ dU ra ya/ pU ra ya/ ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa ma nor thi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ye
140b7(rgyud): swAhA/ oM swAhA/ b+hUHAhA hrIHswAp+pa d+h+yaHswA hAHd+hiHA hA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ A di tA ya sA hA/ sa mA ya swA hA/ d+ha ra NI su tA ya swA hA/ bud+hA ya sA hA/ be ha sA ta ye swA hA/ shre kA ya swA hA/ sha ni sh+tsa rA yA swA hA/ rA hA be swA hA/ 
140b8(rgyud): ke ta be swA hA/ bu d+hA ya swA hA/ badz+ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ ku mA rA ya swA hA/ sarba gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba dA da sha rA shi ni b+hu swA hA/ sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM sarba bi d+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 
141a1(rgyud): / phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig dngos grub thams cad kyi gni yin no// phyag na rdo rje gang yang gza' rnams kyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig
141a2(rgyud): 'di dag ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas/ tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston par bya'o// 
141a3(rgyud): de nas zla ba nya ba'i nyin mtshan thogs zag bklags na de dag la lo dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // gza'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' lhung ba dang / rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyu ro// 
141a4(rgyud): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// gza' thams cad la mchod pa byas dpar 'gyur ro// gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa sbyin dpar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag
141a5(rgyud): 'tshal te/ legs lagaso zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur to// gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ gra ha mA tri ka nA ma d+ha ra NI/ 
141a6(rgyud): bod skad du/ gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer
141a7(rgyud): nata lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / pa ba sangs dang / phur bu dang / 
141a8(rgyud): gza' lhag pa dang / spen pa dang / sgra gcan dang / 'jug rings dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs te/ mang po rnams kyis bstod cing / rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyis rgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la
141b1(rgyud): bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang / 
141b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gzhu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang / byang chub
141b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub
141b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i tig dang / byang
141b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan
141b6(rgyud): dang nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
141b7(rgyud): rnams kyi bskor cing / mdun du ltas pa la chos ston te/ bkod pa chen po rgyan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dag pa/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres
141b8(rgyud): pa yongs su dag pa/ yong su byang ba'i chos ston to// de nas phyag na rdo rje 'khor de dag la bltas te langs nas/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong dus
142a1(rgyud): bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ snyems pa dang bcas pa'i skyil mokrung legs par bcas nas/ 'khor de dag la 'gying bag tu bltas te/ rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying/ 
142a2(rgyud): khar bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gza' mi zad pa'i gzugs can/ drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i gzugs can dag/ sems can rnams la 'tshe
142a3(rgyud): bar bgyid/ mtho tsam par bgyid/ mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid kha cig ni nor rdzas 'phrog/ kha cig ni srog 'phrog par bgyid cing / sems can tshe ring po rnams ni tshe thung bar bgyid pa ste/ de ltar sems can thams
142a4(rgyud): cad la gnod pas 'tshe bar bgyid pa de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad srung bar 'gyur ba bar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
142a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed nas/ sems can tham/ sa cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsang chen pas kyang che/ sa gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa de ni/ legs so// 
142a6(rgyud): leg so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / gza' mi zad pa'i gzugs can/ shin tu khro bo shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / mchod yon dang / bzlas brjod bzang po
142a7(rgyud): bzang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do// de dag mchod pas mchod 'gyur zhing // gnod par byed pa gnod byed pas// gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang // ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang // lha rnams dang ni lha min dang / 
142a8(rgyud): mi 'am ci'i klu dag dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang // mi rnams dang ni srul po dang // drag po gzi brjid chen po dag/ khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i// gsang sngags dang ni mchod pa dag/ rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya// de nas de
142b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas/ snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhug so// de nas de'i mdo la nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad langs te/ bcom ldan
142b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas dbus mo btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
142b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnam
142b4(rgyud): tshogs pas/ chos smra ba rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs nga su bskyang ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug bzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / 
142b5(rgyud): sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas pa/ com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang / gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/ 
142b6(rgyud): oM me g+holka ya swA hA/ oM shI tA sha be swA hA/ oM rak+taM ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ oM b+ho gA s+pha dA ya swA hA/ oM a su rot+na mA ya swA hA/ oM kr-iSh+Na ba ra NA ya swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swA hA/ oM dz+yo te shwe be
142b7(rgyud): swA hA ta ta lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i/ gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas 'grub pa yin te/ kha dog dang 'thun pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o// kham
142b8(rgyud): pa 'am tazangs la sogs pa 'am/ gser 'am/ dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul bas/ re re la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad do// lag na rdo rje de'i 'og tu/ gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi
143a1(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig/ lan bdun brjod par bya'o// des ni gza' thams cad srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// dngul ba'i gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro// tshe zad pa las cher
143a2(rgyud): bar byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs gang yin pa dang / gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag
143a3(rgyud): kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyu ro// lag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod pa byas te/ nyin cig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la garma
143a4(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid kun gyi bsam pa thams cad yongasu gas par 'gyur ro// de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbu dal ba yang sel bar byed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shA
143a5(rgyud): thub pa gza' thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje 'chang la phya/ ga 'tsha lo// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshalo// bsam pa thams cad
143a6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshalo// rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshalo// gza'i khyim bcu gnyis rnams la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re/ pad+me pad+me/ sa ra sa ra/ swa sa ra/ sA sa ra/ sma ra
143a7(rgyud): s+pha ra/ ba kr-i Da/ bi kr-i Da/ mA ra mA ra/ mdze marda/ g+hA ta yaM/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAn/ ku ru ku ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshiR+Sha/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ k+ShA pa yak+Sha pa ya/ shAn+ti/ dIn+ta/ dA pa ye/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag yid myur du
143a8(rgyud): bstan du gas so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu 'phrul chen po rnams 'dul dugs la/ bdag gi sdig pa rnam par snyam du gsol/ tsaidz+riM/ su su su mu/ mu tsu mre tsu/ b+ha ba b+ha bi/ u gre/ rU be rlu la/ pUr la// 
143b1(rgyud): ma ma sarba satwa nAny+tsa ma no ra thi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi ta sa ma ye swA hA/ oM swA hA/ b+hUHswA hA/ hrIHswA hAHd+hu swA hA/ d+hi swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ A ditA ya swA hA/ so mA ya swA hA/ d+hA raNI su tA ya swA hA/ bu d+hA ya/ 
143b2(rgyud): swAhA/ br-i ha s+pha dA ya swA hA/ shu krA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na bar+N+Na ya swA hA/ rA hA baM swA hA/ ke te be swA hA/ bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ badz+ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha ra ya swA hA/ ku mA rA ya swA hA/ nak+Shatra twA NA na swA hA/ dA da sha ra shI nA swA hA
143b3(rgyud): sarba u pa dra pA na~M swA hA/ oM sarba bi d+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha chung gi yar ngo ches bdun nas brtsam ste/ gso sbyong dang / 
143b4(rgyud): ldan par byas nas/ tshes bcu bani'i'abar du/ gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te gzung bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya ba'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na de la lo dgu'i bar du/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med pa
143b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gza'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ gza' thams cad la mchod pa byas
143b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tsha la te/ legaso legaso zhes gsol nas mi snang bar gyur to// / 
143b7(rgyud): gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba su d+ha ra na ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / 
143b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham bi na/ tsher ma can zhes bya ba'i nags chen po na/ dge slong lnga brgya
143b9(rgyud): tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rab tu mang po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe ko'u sham
144a1(rgyud): chamagrong khyer chen pan// khyim bdag zlab parang bzhes byag/ dbang nye bar nag/ yid nye bar nag/ bu ba dang / zhum mang ba ba'a'am mang ba dang ldan pa/ dang kyang che dang pa nag gnas pa de/ bca/ 
144a2(rgyud): ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag
144a3(rgyud): zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te nus nas nub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgu bca/ 
144a4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig/ zhu lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag
144a5(rgyud): khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / khyod kyis ji ltar dris pa dz+ridz+riM/ ba lung bstan pas/ ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / khyim bdag zlab bzang pos/ 
144a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la legs zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dbul por gyur pa las/ 
144a7(rgyud): ltar dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / bro nad kyi thebs na yang bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka'
144a8(rgyud): stsal to// khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir dbul po'i don du 'dri/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dbul
144b1(rgyud): ba mang ba dang / gso ba mang ba dang / bu pho dang / bu mo mang ba/ bza' mi mang po dang ldan pa lags te/ de'i slad du/ gang gis sems can dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / bro nad kyi
144b2(rgyud): thebs pa rnams bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod mang po ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sdug pa dang / yid du mchis pa dang / mthong na yid du 'thad pa dang / dbang phyug
144b3(rgyud): tu 'gyur ba dang / sbyin bdag mdzad pas mi 'tshal zhing / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor dang 'bru'i mdzod dang / bang mdzod rnams dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel
144b4(rgyud): dang dbyi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dbul bas ma 'tshal cing / 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi bu smad dang / bza' mi rnams bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de/ bcom ldan 'das
144b5(rgyud): kyis legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'das pa'i dus
144b6(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
144b7(rgyud): pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs
144b8(rgyud): kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de las/ nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di thos te/ gzung zhing bcangs bklags/ kun chub par byas/ rje su yi rangs par byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
145a1(rgyud): / par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bung yang ngas de bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i mthus mi rnams rnam par 'thob tshim par mi byed do// mi ma yin pa rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham
145a2(rgyud): par mi byed do// gnod sbyin rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// srin po rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// yi dgas rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// sha za rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham
145a3(rgyud): par mi byed do// 'byung po rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// grul bum rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// brjed byed rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// gnon po rnams rnam par
145a4(rgyud): 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// lus srul po rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// lha rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'tho 'tsham par mi byed do// 
145a5(rgyud): zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams da nga / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / za su sha za ba/ rnams dang / za su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / za su zhag/ 
145a6(rgyud): za ba rnams dang / za su rkang za ba rnams dang / za su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zasu gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zasu dbugs rngub pa rnams dang / 'byung ba za ba'i bar rnams rnam pa
145a7(rgyud): 'che bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi khyim na yod dam/ snying la yong ngam/ lag na yod dam/ glegs bam du chud ngam/ thos par gyurate
145a8(rgyud): kun chub par byas sam/ daklags sam/ bzung ngam/ rje su yi rang bar byas sam// gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mdo la yun ring ba'i don dang / phan pa dang / dge ba dang / 
145b1(rgyud): grub pa dang / bde ba dang / lo logs par 'gyur ro// su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di nam phyed na lan gnyis sam/ lan gsum mam/ lan bzhi
145b2(rgyud): gton na/ de'i lha yi rangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan pa la dga' ba dang / chos gdags par byas pas dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang / chos smra ba la dga' bas lhag
145b3(rgyud): ba'i bsam pas/ bdag nyid 'ong ste 'bru'i char 'beb so// na mo badz+ra d+ha ra sA ga ra nir g+ho ShA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su ra be b+ha dr-i b+ha dra ba ti/ oM ga le/ me ga le/ maM ga la ba ti/ a le/ a tsa le/ a
145b4(rgyud): ra leta a tsa ba le/ ud ka ta ni/ ud b+he da ni/ pa s+ya ba ti/ dA na pa ti/ d+ha ma pra ti/ shrI ma ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nirma le/ ru ru su ra pe/ su rU pa maM le/ bi ma le/ tsa le/ a tsa na
145b5(rgyud): ste/ a nan te/ bi na naste/ bi shwa ke she/ bi shwa ni shi/ aM ku re/ maM ku re/ pra baM ku raM/ bI ra me/ bI ra me/ bi d+ha me/ ri ri me/ ngi di me/ du du me/ kha kha me/ ta ta re/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra tA ra/ badz+re bar+m+ma
145b6(rgyud): badz+re ta ba me/ Ta ke Ta ke/ dza ke wa ke/ u ka ke pu ka ke/ Tha ke tha ra ke/ a brta ni/ baR+Sha ni Sha da ni badz+ra d+ha ra sA ga ra nir g+ho Sha Na/ ta thA ga ta ma nusma ra sarba ta thA ga tA/ sa t+ya ma nu sma ra/ d+harma sat+ya ma nu sma re/ saM g+ha sa t+yam
145b7(rgyud): nusma ra/ datad ta/ pu ra pu ra/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pU ra Ni/ b+ha ra b+ha ra Ni/ a ma le/ su maM ga le/ shAn ta mi ta/ shu b+ha ma ti/ maM ga la b+ha ni/ ma hA ma ti/ b+ha dra ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ su tsan+d+ra ma ti/ a gats+tshe/ a gats+tshe/ sa ma
145b8(rgyud): ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ A ba ra Ni mu Nu s+pha ra swA hA/ pra b+hA ba ma nu sma ra swA hA/ didi me nu sma ra swA hA/ te dzem nu s+pha ra sA hA/ bidzi ya ma ru s+pha ra swA hA/ hri ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ sarbas twa bi na ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ oM bA su d+ha re swA hA/ oM bA su shri le sAhA/ 
146a1(rgyud): oM shrI dA su swA hA/ oM bA su swA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'din nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs te/ gzungs 'di'i mthus/ mu ge dang / nang dang / 'chings 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu su zhig de bzhin gshes/ 
146a2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nub gcig bton na/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i don tu bdag gi
146a3(rgyud): khyim mam/ gnas gtsang ma'i bang mdzod dam/ gnas gang du yang rung bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gsang sngags kyi
146a4(rgyud): lha'i phyir tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas te/ nub gcig bton na/ rigs kyi bu de'i khyim nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dang dngul dang / yo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i tshad tsam
146a5(rgyud): gyis gang bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang gnod pa tham/ sa cad kyang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i phyir khyo da rab tu bsgrims la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di zung shig/ chongs
146a6(rgyud): shig te lhogs shig/ ston cig gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / des khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das legaso zhes gsol te/ 
146a7(rgyud): khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das las nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di thos nas tshim zhing / dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan
146a8(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor gyi rgyun ces bgyi ba blangs lag gzungasu zin lags// gzung lags/ 
146b1(rgyud): bklags lags// kun chub par bgyis lags/ rjesu yi rangs par bgyis lag so// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyis lag so// de'i skad cig tsam la khyim bdag zlab
146b2(rgyud): bzang po'i bang mdzod rnams yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nA/ 
146b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi thang nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim nor dang / 'brus yongs su ga
146b4(rgyud): ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos// de nas tshe dang ldan pas/ na dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ ko ru sham tha
146b5(rgyud): grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang bo'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas nang du zhugs pa dang / nor dang / 'brus yongasu gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rin
146b6(rgyud): po che phun sum tshogs pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing dga' la mgu yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' na
146b7(rgyud): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ya mtshan du 'dzin cing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
146b8(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang nor dang 'bru phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
147a1(rgyud): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' go/ rigs kyi bu khyim bdag zla ba bzang po dang cing mchog tu dang la/ dge ba'i bsam pa can des/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs/ 
147a2(rgyud): 'di bzung zhing rab tu gton te/ blangs shing bklags kun chub par byas/ rje su yi rang bar byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyi
147a3(rgyud): kyang nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di long shig/ chongs shig/ lpags shig/ ston cig/ zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de ni skye bo mang po la
147a4(rgyud): phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyu ro// kun dga' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan
147a5(rgyud): du smra ba ni/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ngo // lan
147a6(rgyud): gnyi su gton tam/ lan gsum du gnyen kyang 'gal bar byed pa de ni gnas med do// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi phyed pa yin no// kun dga' bo 'di dag ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba zad pa
147a7(rgyud): rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur na/ glegs bam la yi ger 'dri ba dang / yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/ gzung sngags 'di ni sems can
147a8(rgyud): dbul po dang / nad sna tshogs kyi gzir ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thams cad kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang / bshad pa dang / rje su yi rang ba da
147b1(rgyud): rab tu phye ba dang / bsngags pa dang / bkrol ba dang / gsal bar mdzad pa dang / bskyed pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / bstod pa dang / snyan par brjod pa dang / go bar mdzad pa dang / 
147b2(rgyud): bsnyad pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa'i ched du rjod cing tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam
147b3(rgyud): gyis mi khyab ste// sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad rnams kyi// rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
147b4(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba// ye shes pha rol bgrod pa byon gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la mgu zhing yi rangs nas rab tu dga'
147b5(rgyud): ste/ dga' dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam gra ngas 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
147b6(rgyud): 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gter zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
147b7(rgyud): cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs shes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 
147b8(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya
148a1(rgyud): ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/ dang po re shig spyid zla tha chung gi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab
148a2(rgyud): pa'i chu bor song ste/ de nas nu ma'i bar du chu'i nang du nub par byas te 'dug la/ nyi ma la sngon du phyogs par yongasu rtog pa ji snyed gnas kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// bza' ba thams cad spangs te/ nyon mongs shing
148a3(rgyud): smra bcad byas te/ nub bdun du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang sku yang dbu skra ma gtogs par gur gum dang / tsan dan gyi byugs par bya ba ni nub mo sngo bar langs te/ chur khru bdun/ zheng
148a4(rgyud): du khru gsum ste/ khru bcu dang bcas pa la tshon sna ma lus pa ga/ so sbyong dang ldan pa'i lha bzos bcom ldan 'das ma mdog lha dang ser sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa na 'bras
