148a5(rgyud): bu chen po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa na sgrub pa po rnams la ste ra ba'i rin po che'i za ma tog mu tig dang / rdo rje pha lam dang / bai DUr+ya'i 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan pa bya'o// steng du
148a6(rgyud): lha'i bu rin po che char mngon du 'bebs bzhin pa bya'o// g.yas log su dpal chen mo pad+ma'i phyag can sgrub pa po la nye bar dgongs pa la gnas bzhin pa bya'o// g.yon log su pad+ma'i dpal rin po che'i snyim pa gang ba
148a7(rgyud): bya'o// ta 'og tu sgrub pa po pad+ma'i lag pa can bya'o// de nas thang sku sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub phyogasu kha bstan la bkram ste/ de nas nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma ma gtogs pa mdzod kyi bzhes pa
148a8(rgyud): yang dbul zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la tsan dan dang a ga ru'i bdug pas bsregs par bya'o// zhu mar gyi mar me brgya 'bul bar bya'o// de nas stan gcig la gnas la bcom ldan 'das
148b1(rgyud): ma'i zhal la dmigs la nub mo mtshan bzlas pa byas na/ de nas skya rengs shar ba'i dus su skyes bu chen po tsom gyi nor rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun 'bab cing khang pa gang bar 'gyu ro// yang na mtshan mo phyed na chu'i nang
148b2(rgyud): du zhugs la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// zla gcig tu gcig gi sbyor bas nor gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur te/ mi shes par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyur ro// yang na rgyal po'i sgor mngon par 'dod na nyin mo chu'i nang du bzlas
148b3(rgyud): pa bya zhing / mtshan ma'i phyed na til gyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na rgyal rigs las snyed pa chen po thob bo// yung kar mar la bsres nas sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du byed do// kun tu ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i/ 
148b4(rgyud): blon po dbang du byed do// kha cig gis ni sbyor ba gang gis mtshan mo ba bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan can dran par byas na sbyin bdag chen dpor 'gyur ro// yang na sgrub thabs chen po bshad par bya ste/ cho
148b5(rgyud): 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ zas ci srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung na thang ka nub phyogasu bstan la dgram zhing / nyin mo shes rab kyi
148b6(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa klag cing / mtshan mo stan cig la gnas pas/ nub yal gyis bzlas pa byas na nor gyi phung po chen po rnyed de/ mthor gnod byas kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur te/ lha khang chen po bya'o// cho ga 'di/ 
148b7(rgyud): cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs la bzlas pa byas na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob cing / bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma dngosu mthong zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// ji ltar de ltar/ 
148b8(rgyud): tshangs spyod bya zhing / kha na ma tho ba'i zas chang dang / nya sha la sogs pa spangs shing mtshan mo bzlas pa byas na dbul por mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang / zla ba bzang
149a1(rgyud): po yongasu dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don du gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so// // na mo rat+na tra yA ya aM
149a2(rgyud): bA su d+ha re swA hA/ snying po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA su shrI swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA su swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i yang nye ba'i snying po'o// thal mo sbyar te gung mo gnyis dang / de nas srin lag/ 
149a3(rgyud): gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis pa shibs te bsdigs mdzub phan tshun sbrel la/ mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bsnol te/ rtse mo gnyis rgyab spyad de/ khab lta bu byas la/ gung mo rtse sprad pa la mtheb mo zung
149a4(rgyud): cig de'i 'og tu sbyar te/ reg pa bcas pa ni rab tu gzung ba'i rtog pa la sa gsungs pa ste/ las thams cad sgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i gzungs 'di thub pas gsungs pa'o// na mo rat+na tra
149a5(rgyud): yA yata.oM shri yi shrI ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri d+ha na ka ri swA hA/ bsgrub par bya/ kha'i sngagaso// rig pa 'di'i dang po re shig dam tshig gi phya/ ga rgya ni sor mo rnams thal mo sbyar la mtheb chen dbusu bcug/ 
149a6(rgyud): pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// i sa ma ye/ sa me sa ma ya ka ri/ ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngagaso// phyag rgya de nyid la gung mo dang sdigs mdzub kyi tshigs gsum pa
149a7(rgyud): skul zhing mtheb chung gnyis cung zad phyir phyung ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'di ni dbab pa dang / bsdu ba dang / bsgrub bya'i sngags kyis bya'o// phyag rgya de nyid la bsdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ba ni me tog
149a8(rgyud): gi phyag rgya yin te/ oM bA su d+he swA hA/ me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo brkyang ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya yin te/ sngags ni oM bA su d+ha re swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la ming med brkyang ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ sngags ni oM bA/ 
149b1(rgyud): bA su d+ha ma ti shrI ye swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la mthe'u chung gi sen mo mtheb chen gyis bkab ste/ sor mo gzhan rnams ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni oM bA su d+ha ri Ni swA hA/ sen mo gan
149b2(rgyud): rgyal du byas la mthe bong gnyis logasu sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni oM bA su d+ha re Ni swA hA/ lhag ma nye bar spyod pa nyi shu rtsa ba'i sngags kyis thun mong gi phyag rgya 'am/ sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o// 
149b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ka'i cho ga ni nyams pa med cing / skra'i nyams pa med pa skud pa ma chad pa'i zheng du mtho gang gi tshad nyid la ring du mtho do byas te/ steng du bcom ldan 'das bri/ g.ya su 'phags pa spyan
149b4(rgyud): ras gzigs bya/ g.yon du rdo rje 'chang bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og thang ka'i dbusu bcom ldan 'das ma bri ste/ gser gyi mdo dag can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gos srab mo'i sham kag
149b5(rgyud): banabs pa/ de bzhin du gos srab mo'i stod g.yogs can/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi sham thabs dang ldan pa'o// de nas 'og phyog/ su sgrub pa po lag na mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos
149b6(rgyud): gtsang sbra byas gos gtsang ma gyon te/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad bya'o// de'i mdun du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig byas la ji ltar 'byor pas mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po dang ldan pas sbyang ba byas
149b7(rgyud): tetezhing gi dbusu thang sku bzhugs gsol te/ dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang / nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// thang ka'i 'og tu lan brgya rtsa gcig gis sngags byas pa'i bu ma pa
149b8(rgyud): chus yongasu gang ba bzhag par bya'o// bum pa'i chus gtor ma btang zhing / glang bu dang / thong 'dzin gnyis la gtor bya'o// glang bu'i mgul pa dang / thong 'dzin gyi mgul par me tog gi phreng ba gdags par bya'o// 
150a1(rgyud): de rnams kyi mdun du sngags pas chu'i rgyun zhing la lan g.yas logs su bskor bar bya ba ni sngags pas mdun tu 'gro zhing sngags pa'i ting ni zhing rmor 'gro bar bya'o// phyis sa bon 'debs pa'i/ 
150a2(rgyud): dus su cho ga 'dis brgyad brgya bsngags la sa bon sbar ba gang ba lan bdun bzlas te/ zhing la gtor bar bya'o// sa bon gdab pa'i cho ga'o// de ni zhing rnga ba'i dus su yang cho ga 'dis bya'o// cho ga lhag po ni 'dir dge
150a3(rgyud): slong bzhi la zhing gi mtshams bzhir ci 'dod kyi ston mo byas te/ de nas sngags pas chang pa bdun bzlas pa byed cing / rnga ba ni lo tog rtsa ba bya ba'i cho ga'o// da ni g.yul 'chag pa bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ 
150a4(rgyud): g.yul 'chag pa'i dus su sngags pas rang nyid gtsang sbra byas la gos gtsang ma gon la shar du zhal bstan te/ sku gzugs bzhugasu gsol la dri dang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / yang na nye bar
150a5(rgyud): longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la bzlas pa byas te/ 'bru'i phung / po mtshams bzhir gzhon nu ma gsar du bag ma byas shi/ nga khyo yod pa'i bud med bzhi la ston mo byas la/ de rnyed kyi mthar
150a6(rgyud): zad pa med par gnaso// de nas skyes bus 'bru 'dral zhing grangs byed pa'i dpral ba la sngags dgod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags de srid du smra bcang byas la bzlas pa bya'o// ji snyed du sngo la bltas na
150a7(rgyud): gnyis 'gyur du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de rnyed 'das pa bya'o// de nas 'bru'i lhag ma de mi 'jal bar 'chings pa'i mi la sogs pa bos shing sbyin pa'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par bya'o// g.yul 'chag pa'i cho ga'o// da ni 'bru
150a8(rgyud): bang mdzod du 'jug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ dang po re shig mdzad kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du 'byung po gnyis gcer bu gsus pa 'phyang ba/ dbang po 'phyang ba/ g.yon pa'i lag na 'bru'i snod gzung zhing 'bru stug bzhin
150b1(rgyud): pata gser gyi mdog/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gnyis bri bar bya'o// mdzod kyi khang par yang dri dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon sbyin zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ka'i
150b2(rgyud): mdzod kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o// de nas 'o ma'i chu rgyun gtor bzhin pa'i sngags pas 'gro bar bya zhing / de'i rgyab nas de nas bri bar khyim du gzhug par bya'o// de'i rjes la 'bru'i mdzod khang du phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o// de nas
150b3(rgyud): mdzod kyi khang pa ru dge 'dun gyi ston mo byas la dri dang / me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do// nor rgyun ma'i gzungs rdzogs par bklag par bya'o// gtor ma rgya chen po byas la thang ka'i mdun du de nas skyes bus
150b4(rgyud): 'bru phyir 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'dra bar bsam la gur gum gyi grog la sngags bris la/ spyi bor bcingasang la kha gos kyi bkab la nyi ma re re zhing 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o// mdzod
150b5(rgyud): khang gi sgo ru nyin re nor rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi mdo bklag par bya'o// sngags pas bsgrub bya'i sngags bltas la/ dus gsu ma du brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o// ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma
150b6(rgyud): nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ga Na pa ti hri da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
150b7(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ro la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b8(rgyud): dpa' chen po sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang la la tshogs kyi bdag po/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'dzin
151a1(rgyud): / na de ri las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de gzung bas dgos pa 'grub cing / gsang sngags thams cad kyang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dad+ya// mchos te ma ga/ pa ta ye swAhA/ oM gaHga
151a2(rgyud): gaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHoM ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ oM ga Na d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ o ga Ne shwa rA ya swA hA/ o ga Na pa ti pU dzi ta ya sA hA/ o ka Ta ka Ta/ maT ma Ta/ da ra da ra/ bi dar bi dar/ ha na ha na/ greh+Na gr-ih+Na/ d+hA bad+d+ha
151a3(rgyud): bta b+hany+tsa b+hany+tsa/ stam+b+ha stam+b+ha/ dzam+b+ha dzam+b+ha/ mo ha mo ha/ de hi de hi/ dA pa ya dA pa ya/ da nA di sid+d+hismai pra yats+tsha/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra na mostu te ma hA ru dra pa tsa nA ya swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM su ru su ru swA hA/ 
151a4(rgyud): oM mu ru mu ru swA hA/ pA pa shAM ti ba su puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ oM a b+hu rata bin du kA b+hi ta tsit+ta ma hA sa mA gats+tsha ti/ ma hA b+ha ya/ ma hA ba la/ ma hA pa ra kra me ma hA hasta/ ma hA dak+Shi NA ya/ pra b+ho dza dA ma~M swA hA/ ta
151a5(rgyud): thAHoM ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ oM tu ru tu ru swA hA/ oM gaHgaHga/ \u0f7fgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHoM na mo na ma swA hA/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge
151a6(rgyud): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig tshogs kyi bdag po/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'di rtsom zhing / gsang sngags bsgrubs pas/ dkon mchog gsum mchod du yul gzhan
151a7(rgyud): du 'gro 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la me tog dang / bdug pas mchod pa byas te/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'di bklags na/ las thams cad
151a8(rgyud): 'grub kyis/ 'di la the tshom ma za zhig/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag 'khrug dang / yul 'khrug pa thams cad kyi nang du yang dran par byas na/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du nang bar
151b1(rgyud): langs nas tshig tu bton na/ thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis mdangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur zhing / thag ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
151b2(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
151b3(rgyud): 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ga Na pa ti tan tran ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas
151b4(rgyud): dpal ldan tshogs bdag che// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs pad dag dgyes// gzugs brnyan maN+Dal gru bzhir bzhag/ zla ba drug tu mchod par bya// lha yis 'khor los bsgyur ba dang // tshe 'di nyid la/ 
151b5(rgyud): bskal pa mnyam// bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur// longs spyod lha dang mnyam pa dang // tshe yang ring ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// / mi la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur// lha yi bu yang bran bzhin 'gyur/ 
151b6(rgyud): bdag gis sgo ba nyan par 'gyur// klu yang de yi sgo ba nyan// bran bzhin las rnams byed par 'gyur// lha yi longs spyod mnga' ris las// 'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos grub sgrub pa'i skal pa tsA
151b7(rgyud): gdul bya dbang gis sku sprul pa// lha chen tshogs bdag chen pos bya// dngos grub dam pa mchog sgrub na// mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // longs spyod yid bzhin 'phel bar byed// 'jig rten phan mdzad lha
151b8(rgyud): yi lha// gang gi mchod pa dngos grub yin// lha chen tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud las dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas dben pa'i gnasu ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dag bya ste// ba yi lci bas
152a1(rgyud): legs par byugs// 'jam zhing mnyen la dbus mtho ba'i// dbus su tshogs bdag sku gzugs bzhugs// me tog dkar pos de la gtor// bdag nyid gcer bur byung byas te// log 'dren gzug
152a2(rgyud): kyis yang dag mchod// ba ra ta ka zla ba drug/ nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du// gsang sngags brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs// bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// oM ni bkra shis dpal dang
152a3(rgyud): ldan te gsang sngags mgo la bzhag par bya// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// dngos grub gter byed yi ge yang // de 'og gral la bzhag par bya// nyi ma lta bu'i yi ge yang // de yi rjes la bklag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
152a4(rgyud): mtshan dang po// yi ge'i mchog ni blang bar bya// gsal byed yi ge dang po yang // de yi mjug tu brjod par bya// rin chen yi ge swA zhes bya// la sa kyi yi ge hA zhes bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gsang sngags bzlas// 
152a5(rgyud): lha chen dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud las lha'i dngos grub kyi gsang snga/ gas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas tshogs kyi bdag po bshad// tshogs kyi bdag po sku mdog dkar// glang po
152a6(rgyud): che yi mgo bo can// mche ba ya gcig chag pa dang // phyag g.yas la phug bsnams pa dang // byi ba'i gdan la bcibs pa dang // rin po che yis sku rgyan pa// zla ba tshes pas dbu rgyan pa// 'od gsal ba/ 'od zer 'phro ba/ 
152a7(rgyud): mdog bzang ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ gsus pa che ba/ rgyan gyis bud pa'o// dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud las tshogs kyi bdag po bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas dkar ma rgyal gyi nyin par me tog dkar po
152a8(rgyud): blangs te tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs bris te/ kha dog dkar po glang po che'i dbu can/ phyag g.yas na la phug bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na rin po che'i nor bu bsnams pa/ gsus pa che ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis
152b1(rgyud): brgyan pa/ zla ba dang byi ba'i khri la bzhugs pa mkhas pas bya'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ bdag la zhal phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid log 'dren gyi gzugs kyis yang dag par mchod do// tshogs kyi
152b2(rgyud): bdag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas dbang ldan gyi mtshamasu tshogs kyi bdag po dkar po glang po che'i mgo can/ byi ba la zhon pa/ mig gsum/ zla ba phyed 'dzin pa/ g.yas
152b3(rgyud): na la phug dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa tri shU la dang thod pa 'dzin pa lag pa khu tshur bcangs pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang la mdzub mo bkug la gung mo'i tshig su bzung bar bya ba ni/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i
152b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gsang sngags bstan pa ni// oM ni dpal ldan mgo la gzhag/ de nas yid bzhin nor bu ni// rin po
152b5(rgyud): tshe yi yi ge bri// sde tshan gsal byed dang po yang // de yi rjesu bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po// dbyangs yigabargyad pas mdzes par bya// gsal byed dang po'i yi ge'i yang / 
152b6(rgyud): blo yis blangs te yid kyi bri// sde tshan gsum pa'i gsum pa la// dang po'i bzhi pa sbyar bar bya// sde tshan bdun pa'i gsum pa la// gsum pa'i dang pos 'og tu sbyar// yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la// bzhi pa'i lnga pa
152b7(rgyud): zla ba bzhag/ dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan par bya// bzhi pa'i gsum pas de nas brjod// dngos grub sgrub pa'i yi ge ni// de yi rjes la bri bar bya// gsang sngags drag po'i yi ge yang // kun gyi mthar ni/ 
152b8(rgyud): brjod par bya// gsang sngags 'di'i dngos grub ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid kyi byin// dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur// tshogs bdag chen po'i gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
153a1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang gsungs pa ni// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yi// mtshan gyi gsang sngags shes bya ba'i// dngos grub sgrub pa'i snying po ni// dpal dang yaM gi yi ge ste// oM zhes bya bani
153a2(rgyud): mgo la gzhag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge las// nyi ma'i yi ge 'og tu spras// dbyangs yig drug pa'i 'og tu sbyar// thig lenA das brgyan par bya// mtshan gyi dang po'i yi ge ni// de yi rjes la brjod par bya// bzhi pa'i
153a3(rgyud): lnga pa de nas sbyar// lnga pa'i dang po bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po// 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge yang // dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan pa ni// de yi rjes la bri bar bya// zhi ba'i yig 'bru gnyis pa/ 
153a4(rgyud): yang ta kun gyis mthar ni brjod par bya// mtshan gyi gsang sngags shes bya ba// 'dod pa thams cad grub byed yin/ mtshan gyis gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas
153a5(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad par bya// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par ni// me to/ ga dkar po'i rtsa ba blang // tsan dan dkar po dag las ni/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs ni// mthe bong gi ni tshad tsam
153a6(rgyud): byad gsus pa che la phyag bani pa// mkhas pas byas te legs par bya// rin po che yi snod du gzhug/ dkar chen mngon par gsal ba'i tshe// nang gi cha ris sku khrus gsol// gsal zhing dang la yid du 'ong // 
153a7(rgyud): dridradang ldan pa'i bum pa yis// me tog dkar po'i dri yis ni// bdag tshal ldan pas khrus bya'o// de nas de ma thag tu ni// dkyil 'khor dbusu spyan drangs la// me tog dkar po dbul bar bya// la phug la dur
153a8(rgyud): bcas pa yi// gtor ma chen po'ong de nas dngul// spos dang dri dang mar me dang // lha ba shos dge mchod par bya// gsang sngags 'dis la phub dang / la du dang / chu dang / dkar gsum gyis gtor mas tshogs kyi bdag sa
153b1(rgyud): la phul te/ spos dang me tog rnams kyang dbul// de ltar byas na phyis bgegs byed par mi nus// tshogs kyi bdag po'i mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas la phug ces bya ba/ ro brgyad ldan pa'i nyung ma
153b2(rgyud): ste/  zas rnams kun gyi mchog kyang yin// ro mchog brgyad dang ldan pa yin// kha dang skyur dang ska ba dang // mngar dang tsha dang lan tshwa'i ro// gzhun dang bro mchog che ba yang // nad sna brgyad kyi gnyen po yin// mkhris
153b3(rgyud): bad kan 'dus pa dang // khrag dang chu ser ma zhu ba// rlung dang rims nad kun la phan// 'di 'dra byung ba'i kha zas med// lha rnams kun gyi mchu yang 'gul// dngos grub 'grub pa'i zhal zas yin// tshogs
153b4(rgyud): kyi bdag po mchod par bya// la du zhes bya'i zhal zas na// mngar ga/ sum 'bras bu gsum pa ni// de bzhin zhim pa'i spos kyis bran// bag zan gyi ni rol bu bya// 'o ma mar du bcos byas la// 
153b5(rgyud): tshogs pa'i gtor ma chen po bya// mar dang khur ba mngar gsum dpa // 'thun pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs kyis// tshogs bdag chen po mchod par bya// de ltar tshogs kyi bdag po la'o// tshogs kyi bad
153b6(rgyud): popo'i sku gzugs lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhug la/ sems gzhan du ma g.yengs par bzlas brjod 'bum bya ste la phug la sngags kyis btab ste tshogs kyi bdag po mchod na/ tshe 'di nyid la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
153b7(rgyud): rgyal po dang bsod nams mnyam par 'gyur ro// me tog dkar pos mchod na rgyal po la sogs pa pham par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po la sogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa bdag gi dbang du
153b8(rgyud): 'dus par 'gyur ro// dngos grub sgrub pa'i zhal zas bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas cho ga bshad par bya// dngul zhes bya ba'i rin chen la// tshogs bdag chen po'i gzugs byas te/ yid
154a1(rgyud): bzhin nor bu lag na thogs// dkyil 'khor chen po khru gang tshad// rin chen me tog dkar po bkram// gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas byas pas// nad dang sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur// shes
154a2(rgyud): dang dung las tshogs bdag sku// mkhas pas ji ltar 'byor par bya// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar 'gyur// rin chen shel las tshogs bdag sku// mthe bong gi ni tshad tsam bya// se na pra zhes bya ba'i
154a3(rgyud): sngags// rig pa 'bum du bzlas byas te// shel gyi sku de khrus byas nas// ske re ma rgyal gyi nyin par ni// bdag nyid shar du kha ltas nas// gos dkar gyon te khrus byas la// thal sbyar yid kyi gsol ba gdab// bdag la
154a4(rgyud): gnod pa'i bgegs gang yin// shel gyi sku de me long ste// mi g.yo mi 'gul rab tu zhugs// bdag nyid khrus byas shar du blta// / dza ra pa dang rkun ma ni// gang yin me long nang du 'byung // de tshe de yis
154a5(rgyud): ngos zin 'gyur// tshogs bdag shel gyi sku ni// mchod pa rab ga sal legs byas la// nA ga ku ru zhes bya ba'i// rig pa'i/ bum du bzlas bya na// nad dang sdug bsngal gyis nyen la// sku de bstan
154a6(rgyud): btsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur// sdug bsngal las kyang thar par 'gyur// zhi ba chen po'i cho ga yin// rin chen gser zhes bya ba la// tshogs bdag chen po sku byas te// rgyal gyi nyon par
154a7(rgyud): mig chen// mchod dang rab tu gnas pa bya// ba ra zhes bya'i gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas pa yis// sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i khyim der ni// nor rnams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// gsuM
154a8(rgyud): gyi tshogs bdag mthong ba yis// bgegs rnams thams cad nor 'bul 'gyur// bgegs kyi gnod pa mi nus te// rgyal po bzhin du mchod par 'gyur// gser gyi tshogs bdag gnas pa yis// sa phyogs
154b1(rgyud): rin chen char pa 'bebs// gser gyi tshogs kyi bdag po la// bgegs kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis// nor rnams thams cad 'dul ba yin// bdag nyid phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// tshogs kyi bdag gi
154b2(rgyud): sku gzugs mchog/ byas pa'i yon tan rnams la ni// gnod sbyin rnams kyi gter kha 'byed// skye ba 'di dang phyi ma la// rtag tu yo byad 'phel bar 'gyur// nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bus// rgyal bu bzhin du
154b3(rgyud): bsnyen bkur byed// de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag gis// sku gzugs dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bzhag/ b+ha ga zhes bya'i gsang sngags ni// bzlas pa 'bum du byas pa yis// tshe de nyid la dngos grub ni// 
154b4(rgyud): ci 'dod pa ni sbyin par mdzad// lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni// sgrub pa po la stsol bar mdzad// shin tu thugs rje'i bad dag nyid pas// dpal ldan tshogs bdag thugs rje can// thugs
154b5(rgyud): rje'i phung pos dbul ba sgob// nor lha chen po'i bdag nyid 'di// der ram ras la legs bris te// rgyal gyi nyin par spyan phye nas// gang gi khyim du bzhugs pa de'i// sa phyogs de ni bkra
154b6(rgyud): shis 'gyur/ zangs la tshogs bdag chen po'i sku// mkhas pas legs par bzo byas te// tsan dan dmar pos byugs pa'i sa ra// maN+Dal steng du legs par bzhag/ ban du ka yi me tog dang // pad+ma
154b7(rgyud): ga'i rin chen dang // me tog dmar po kun gyis mchod// brum zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bzlas// rgyal po'i bu mo dbang du 'gyur// lha yi bu mo klu mo dang // mi 'am ci yi bu mo dang // bram ze'i bu mo mtshan ldan mo// 
154b8(rgyud): mchog tu gzugs bzang gus par 'gyur// bran mo bzhin du bsgo ba nyan// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sku gzugs dag la brten te 'grub// mchod pa tsam gyis 'byung ba yin// gzhan yang tshogs
155a1(rgyud): bdag chen po'i sku// rin po tshe yi rgyu las byas// dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs byas te// rat+na sid+d+hi zhes bya ba'i// rig pa 'bum du bzlas pa bya// sa 'og gter rnams ston par 'gyur// cing / 
155a2(rgyud): bar yang spyod par 'gyur// tshogs bdag chen po'i rgyud las rgyal po la sogs pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag che// drag po chen po drag shul can// sangs rgyas thugs
155a3(rgyud): la byol song dbu// glang chen gzhon nus zhal rgyan pa// spyan gsum mche ba bzhi dang ldan// phyag bzhi zhabs pa ni klu chen gdan// dbang po mche ba dkar po 'dzin// de 'og zhags pa g.yon pa na// dgra sta kha T+wAM rtse gsum
155a4(rgyud): 'dzin ta mthing ka gsus pa che ba'o// de lta bu yi tshogs bdag sku// khar ba khru chu dag la bya// rgyal gyi nyin par rab tu gan sa// des na sgom zhing sgrub pa ni// dkyil 'khor bya ba'i sa brtag pa/ 
155a5(rgyud): le'u tshe dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya// dbusu pad+ma mdab brgyad la// tshogs bdag chen pos bsgru kha bya mnan// zla ba'i gdan la yum dang ni// gnyisu med par dgod
155a6(rgyud): par bya// de'i ming artsi ka ri ste// rdo rje phag gdong ma zhes bya// dgra sta band lag na thogs// khrag gis gang ba gco la stob// shar gyi le'u tshe ser po la// khams gsum gyi bdag po la phug dang gri 'dzin pa'o// 
155a7(rgyud): lho phyogs kyi le'u tshe sngon po la// gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje mchu// ma he de ba'i gdong can dbyug to dang tho ba 'dzin pa nag po'o// nub phyogs kyi le'u tshe dmar po la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po sprin bdag ces bya ba dmar po
155a8(rgyud): chus gang ba'i sprin phung dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// byang phyogs le'u tshe lnga ljang kun la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po nor gnas shes bya ba ljang ku dbyug tho dang rin po che'i kha T+wAM ga thogs pa'o// byang shar le'u tshe
155b1(rgyud): dkar po la bgegs kyi rgyal po bi na ya ka glang po che'i gdong mdung rtse gsum pa dang la phug thogs pa nag po'o// shar lho ri le'u tshe dmar po la yi dgas kyi rgyal po drag po zhes bya// dgra sta dang thong pa ril po thogs
155b2(rgyud): pa nag po'o// lho nub kyi le'u tshe nag po la sprin phung gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i sprin phung dang / klog gi 'od du bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyis thogs pa'o// byang nub kyi le'u tshe nag po la bgegs kyi rgyal po log 'dren sna
155b3(rgyud): yon zhes bya ba glang po tsha'i sna can rtse gsum dang thod pa skam pa'i nang du la phug dang shas bkang ba thogs pa'o// lha rnams la klu'i rgyal po brgyad bka' nyan pa ni klu'i rgyal po a ba la dang / ba ru Na dang / dung skyong
155b4(rgyud): dang rta'ajog po dang / rigs ldan dang / mtha' yas dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po rnam so// shar gyi sgor rgyal po chen po yul 'azhi srung // lho skor 'phags skyes po// nub skor spyan mig bzang // byang/ 
155b5(rgyud): sgor rnam thos sras rnams sku mdog dkar ba dang / bsngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang ku shes par bya'o// lag na nor bu rin po che re re// ral gri re re ro// 'di rnams kyi chung ma ni mi bri'o// 'di ltar
155b6(rgyud): bris pa'i byang shar du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum la/ de'i nang du dgra po'i gzugs spra tshil las byas pa ring pa/ gnag pa/ sgra zed pa/ til mar gyis byugs te/ snying khar ming rus bris la gzhu'o/ de'i sker ros
155b7(rgyud): las byas pa'i theg pa gdag so// de ltar byas na gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la/ la du dang / la phug dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dang / gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la nya sha dang sgog gcong du sbyar ba'i dmar gyi gtor ma re re
155b8(rgyud): ba sha ma klu chen po brgyad la gtor mche ba gcig dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la re re bya/ gal te ma 'byor na che ba gcig bya/ lha bshos re re dbul bar bya'o// gzhan yang drag po'i rdzas spyang ki'i thod pa dang / zir nag po
156a1(rgyud): // dang / ske tshe dang / nyung gar dang / nyung nag bzhag par bya'o// tshogs bdag chen por dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcugacig pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// sgom pa'i rim pa 'di sa bu/ sa zung / 
156a2(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas// shin tu gsang ste bsgrub par bya// yi yi rang bzhin stong pa las// snang ba'i rang bzhin hUM dang ni// ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon 'byung // ming gi sngags las rab tu bskyed// khro ba'i sprul pas
156a3(rgyud): stong gsum bkang // 'od bsdus thogs ma'i hUM las 'dus// tshogs kyi bdag po chen po de// 'gro ba'i don du bzhengs pa ni// khro bo chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yum dang 'khor yang rdzogs par bskyed// phu brgyad klu brgyad
156a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshul// rgyal po de bzhin khro bo'i tshul// yi ge b+he dang ming las bskyed// 'od zer tshul gyis spyan drangs la// dza dang dza yi 'phro 'ang dang // hUM dang hUM gi gsang sngags dang // lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan
156a5(rgyud): drangs la// nus pa'i mthu dang ldan par bya// mchod dang gtor ma btab par bya// bi laM grih+Na kha yi sngags// snying po dag dang spel bar bya// sgom pa'i rim pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang sngags

156a7(rgyud): la dbyangs yig brgyad pas rgyan// dgug pa'i yi ge dag dang ni// 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar ba yis// rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya'o// yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar bar bya// nyi ma
156a8(rgyud): yi ni yi ge dang // bzhi pa'i lnga pa de nas bri// de la dbyangs yig brgyad pas rgyan// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i yi ge la// dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan par bya// lnga pa'i bzhi pa'i yi ge la// gsum pa'i lnga pa sbyar bar bya// bzhi pa'i dang
156b1(rgyud): po'i yi ge las// byangs yig bani bas brgyan pa drug/ 'byung ba drung gi yi ge la// de mi 'og tu sbyar bar bya// rin po tshe yi yi ge dang / las kyi yi ge mtha' mar brjod// tshogs bdag chen por rtsa ba'i sngags// 'dod bzang / 
156b2(rgyud): sgrub byed yin// gnod sbyin brgyad kyi gsang sngags ni// ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa// ya ya zhes bya la sogs dang // bam zhes bya ba la sogs dang // bi na ya ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / b+hai ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / 
156b3(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba dang tri zhes bya ba ste brgyad la hUM dang phaT kyis mtha' rten pas srog gi snying po'o// klu'i sngags ni ming las bskyed// oM dang hUM phaT dang ldan par bya// rgyal po chen po'i gsang sngags ni// b+he zhes bya ba dang / b+hi zhes
156b4(rgyud): bya ba dang / b+ha zhes bya ba'i sngagasu 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyi ga sang sngags 'byung ba'i le ru ste bcu gsum pa'o// // bsgrub bya dgu pa'i sngags ni// ya dang k+Sha dang ka dang la// ma dang ha dang b+he ra b+he/ 
156b5(rgyud): tr-i ngar dang tsadag gis// sha dz+nyA nI dzi ni dza zhes lan grangs mang du bzlas pa bar bya'o// gnod sbyin brgyad kyis gsang sngags kyis// ngag rje 'i bla rdo blang bar bya// de nas bla rdo bsreg par bya// de nas bla rngo man
156b6(rgyud): par bya// rbad pa'i gsang sngags rgyal po ni// ya dang k+Sha dang ka dang la// ma dang hA dang b+he ra be// de ba yak+Sha ya ma dang // nA ga nA ga thum ri la yaM// che ge dgra bo thum ri la ya// ya ya ces kyang bskul bar bya// de bsad pa yi gas/ 
156b7(rgyud): sngags ni// ma dang hA dang b+hai ra be// yak+Sha la sogs gong dang 'thun// de'i rjes 'di skad brjod par bya// nA sha ya na lan gnyis// sha ya tsuN+Da tsUN+Da ya/ nA ya ka tA mA ra ya// ha na tsakra rim pa gnyis// bi nA ya ka dzi b+hin+da/ tam+b+ha
156b8(rgyud): kA ra de nas brjod// tshi ge mA ra ya zhes pa// hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ drag po bsad pa sngags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang ni drag po'i sngags/ oM bidz+nyA b+hi ba b+hi sarba bidrA bi nA sha ya hr-i mi ta ya/ hU tsi tub tu/ 
157a1(rgyud): pra ma ru tA ya/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ brah+ma brah+ma/ brad+d+hA ya prah+mA ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ khar ba'am yang na zangs dag la// log 'dren chen po'i gzugs byas la// de la rab gnas/ 
157a2(rgyud): mchod pa bya// dgra bo gzugs brnyan 'og tu gzhug/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i stan du bya// dgra de 'chi bar the tshom med// yang ni sbyor ba'i las rnams ni// dgos pa chen po 'di gsung so// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku/ 
157a3(rgyud): tsan dan nam rin po che la byas te/ rab gnas byas la mchod pa phul te/ ser ba gcod par 'dod na ser ba'i bdag po rlung lha dang / chu lha'i gzugs byas te/ sprin gyi gzugs dang / 'brug gi gzugs byas

157a5(rgyud): kar yang phyogasu gtor bar bya'o// ser ba 'bebs par 'dod na/ chu dang sprin gyi maN+Dal mngon par bri te/ tshogs bdag chen po 'brug la zhon par bsgoms te/ bdag gi bka' nyan par
157a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i rdza su bya ba la/ lcags phye gser phye zangs phye rnams/ gnam chu 'bras kyi phyes smras te/ ser ba ji tsam 'dod pa'i dbyibs che chung byas la khrag gi byugs la bdun dang bdun phrag mang du byas te/ 
157a7(rgyud): kaka ki ku'i thod pa'i nang du blugs te/ sprin gyis dgab par bya'o// ka ka'i thod pa la sngags bri bar bya'o// rim pa gsum mo// rten gyi rdzas kyang bzhag par bya'o// brum bruM b+ha ri sha ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
157a8(rgyud): sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa dang / ka ka'i thod pa'i nang du ser ba dngosu gsum mam bdun nam brgyad byung ba dang / dgra'i yul du bskyal te/ sngags zlos nas bzlas pas 'bab bo// gal te ma bab na

157b2(rgyud): ring po 'bab bo// lo tog 'joms pa'i sngags ni pU zhes bya ba'o// de gcod par 'dod na ni sku dang ka ki ma byung ba la nyi ma re rer 'bab pas dbyung bar bya'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o//

157b6(rgyud): shrI dz+nyA nas// 'jig rten dngos grub ched du ni// rgya gar yul nas bsnams nas byon// rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas la btang pa yin// rgyud 'di bsam pas grub pa yin// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA li tan+t+ra/ 
157b7(rgyud): bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud/ dbang gi rta mchog sku la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ shar lha'i dur khrod chen po ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas shing tsan dan gyi nags tshal rag
157b8(rgyud): tu dga' bo'i ming zhes bya ba mi ma yin pho mo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du/ dpal nag po chen po zhes bya ba bi na ya ka la sogs te 'khor gdug pa can rnams kyi dbus na skye 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs
158a1(rgyud): la dbang byed pa'i nag po chen po zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na mthar byed na'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rgyal po chen po bani la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis
158a2(rgyud): bskor te/ dreg pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM baM zhes brjod pas/ dur khrod ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas nas
158a3(rgyud): nag po rang dbang med par 'char byed rta'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las ci bya zer zhing rang rtags srog gi snying po 'di mdongs gsol du phul ba/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra br-ig+h+na bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT zhes phu'o// dpal
158a4(rgyud): nag po chen po'i rgyud las gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rgyal po mig mi bzang gi mthar byed rta'i rgyal po dal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma pad+ma khros pa'i bdag/ nag/ 
158a5(rgyud): po chen po drag shul can// gsang ba'i sgrub pa bshad du gsol// mgon po bsgrub par bya ba gang // bsad cing lus srog dbye ba dang // ma grub shis bstan pa dang // mgon po'i rtags dang
158a6(rgyud): ser ba rnams// rta mchog chen pos bdag la gsol// zhes zhus pas// de nas pad+ma khros pa yis// nag po'i sgrub thabs ched du brjod// dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung
158a7(rgyud): slad du// gza' skar tshes grangs shis pa la// dur khrod la sogs shing gcig tu// bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas la// nag po chen po bsgrub par bya// phungs sa 'am sa nag dag la ni// stegs bu
158a8(rgyud): gru bani byas nas ni// dri spos khrag gi chag chag bya// dbusu gru gsum zla kham ldan// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// de dbus thod chen nang du ni/ sha lnga snying snas rgyan pa yi// gtor ma bshos bu khru gang tshad// dal
158b1(rgyud): mnga' gzugs dmar nag dar// gri snying tsa ka li yang gzugs// de nyid mgon po'i rten du bzhag/ Da ma ru yi lpags pa'i nang // mgon po'i srog sngags bri bar bya// lho yi nang du bla rdos dril// spos dang rgyun gtor
158b2(rgyud): gtang bar bya// dkon mchog skyil mchod pa bsham// de nas pad+mar bdag bsgoms la// thugs ka'i hrI las 'od 'phros pas// bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa// rang gi mdun du bsam byas la// mchod
158b3(rgyud): pab rnam lnga dbul bar bya// rnam dag bdun gyi 'og tu ni// tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya// btang snyoms la sogs paM raM tri// pang stengs yi ge hUM las ni// nag po zhal gcig phyag drug pa// gri gug phreng ba ra ma
158b4(rgyud): ru thong pa mdung dang zhags pa bsnams// g.yas g.yon rim pas bsnams pa'o// sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgya na// sku smad ba te khra bo gsol// stag lpags zhing gi sham thabs can// gtum
158b5(rgyud): po spyan gsum mche ba btsigs// dpral bar dri yi thig les rgyan// spyi gtsug mi bskyod sprul sku brtan// de ltar bdag mdun gang sal bsgoms nas// spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas pa bya// gtor ma pU
158b6(rgyud): dza la sogs pas// nag po tshol sbyin par bya// mgon po'i thugs ka'i hUM las ni// srog gi yi ge g.yas nas bskor// khor yug dag gis bzla bar bya// oM badz+ra ma hA ka la k+Shi k+She tra big+h+na bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ de skad ces/ 
158b7(rgyud): ni rab brjod pas// rnal 'byor bar chad byed pa rnams// nag po grub pa'i rtags rnams 'byung // dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las bsnyen cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas ya nga dag bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas
158b8(rgyud): bstan pa be shig pa dang // nag po chen pos bsgral 'dod na// stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas kyang // drag po e na'i nang du ni// pho mo rabs chad thod pa'i nang // gzugs ni spra tshil dag la bya// ming rus dag ni bkod nas
159a1(rgyud): kyang tata bsad dang na ba skabs dang sbyar// mgon po'i sku dang dam rdzas rnams// kha dang kha la bgod par bya// phag thod nang du thun rdzas blugs// rtag gtor rgyun gtor g.yas dang g.yon// gas
159a2(rgyud): sngags 'di yis bsad par bya// oM badz+ra ma hA ka la k+ShaM k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA lA ya shA sa na u pa ha ri Ni e Sha a pash+tsi ma ka lo a yaM i daM rat+na tra ya a pa kA ri Na ya di pra ti dz+nyA sma
159a3(rgyud): ra si ta da i daM duSh+TAM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na dgra bo mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM bi nA ya ka bi las traM bi hri hA dza si ma bu bi nA ya ka a
159a4(rgyud): muka bri srog hur thums dza mA ra ya rbad/ drag sngags bzlas shing dathun gyis bra ba// zhag bdun par du smra mi bya// de la rtags rnam des rdzogs par 'gyur// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyu de las
159a5(rgyud): lus srog dbye ba'i le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// las mtha' sbyin sreg dag gis brtul// glu gsum dbusu gdug pa'i shing // dbusu nag po 'khor bcwa
159a6(rgyud): bskyed// ling ka gtor ma dam rdzas rnams// nag po'i zhal du dbul bar bya// sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg par bya// ag+ni dz+wa la raM las rdzogs// thal ba rlung dmar ngag la bskur// a mu ka ni myur du rlog/ 
159a7(rgyud): dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las mtha' rdul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// de ltar bsgrubs kyang ma grub na// gcig dang gnyis la nan tan bskyed// de ltar byas kyang ma grub na// sa/ 
159a8(rgyud): gsum khrag gsum dug gsum la// khru gang ba yi gzugs kyi tshe// gru gsum dbus su nag po'i gzugs// spyi tshar dag tu lding du gzhug/ bris sku dam rdzas bla rdo rnams// rang gi gru gsum mal gyi 'og/ dug
159b1(rgyud): dang tshe rams steng nas dgapa// thun rdzas brab ning sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ phaTahUM hU~M kA ya nA big+h+na bi trek+She kI la kA hA ma badz+ra o// de skad brjod cing thun gyis brab// de la rtags
159b2(rgyud): / rnams rdzogs pa dang // de nas gso ba'i cho ga bya// bris sku bla rdo dam rdzas rnams// spos chus bkru zhing sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra ma hA ka la k+Shi k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT sos sos swA hA// de skad byas la gnas
159b3(rgyud): su ni// mgon po'i gzugs kyang spos chus bkru// gru gsum dbusu blangs byas la// dgra bo'i mi rus snying khar gzhug/ zhag bdun bsgrubs la dgra la skyel// a nu ka ni myur du brlag/ dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud
159b4(rgyud): las ma grub na// spogs pa'i cho ga dang gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bya nag 'phur zhing lding ba da dang // mon pa a tsa ra dang ni// dge ba shes ban+de slob dpon dang / 
159b5(rgyud): 'od dang sgra dang khang pa 'tsheg/ mgon po'i sku dag dngos su mthong // dag/ la dmag drangs sems can bsad// mi nag dag la snying ste/ khas dang // mdze bo dang ni sprang po dang // bya nag thang la lhung ba 'gyur
159b6(rgyud): dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las rtags kyi rim pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// serab dbab pa'i las bya na// mon nam mdze can thod pa ru// 'khor lo rtsibs pani bris nas kyang // 
159b7(rgyud): rigs lnga klu yi sa bon dgod// rtsibs mtshan ser srun ming rus dang // yul du phob ces bya ba bri// de mthar 'khor lo rtsibs dgu la// dregs pa'i sngags dag bri bar bya// rgyab tu gang yin yul ming dang // rlung gi snying
159b8(rgyud): po bri bar bya// bdag nyid pad+ma khros par sgom// gsang sngags 'di yis gnad la bor// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra big+h+na bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ nA ga snying gzer/ phu hur thums dza khro shar hri la b+h+yo// de skad ces ni rab brjid la/ 
160a1(rgyud): / nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang // khrag dang dug gis thob par brab// lo 'bras rlung khyer rtags byung na// dgra yi yul du dbab par bya// gal te 'jig rten phung po'o// dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud
160a2(rgyud): las/ ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// e ma 'khor 'dus ngo mtshar can// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// dam tshig la gnas sdom pa gzung // gtor ma dag
160a3(rgyud): la brtson par bya// dam rdzas bla rdo lus la bsrel// zhes gsungs pas rgyal po mig mi bzang la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs nas nag po chen pos bstan pa srung bar khas blangs nas mi snang bar gyur to// 
160a4(rgyud): dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba phur bu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya/ 
160a5(rgyud): shrI ma hA kA la nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis
160a6(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
160a7(rgyud): der log su lha'i sde dpon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag po/ ma hA ka la 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur ba/ dpal mgon po nag po chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyog
160a8(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol// nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / 'byung
160b1(rgyud): thams cad dang / nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang / nyes par ltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing ngo // 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo // thang
160b2(rgyud): kA kho ra khor yug tu ni ril thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo // gzhan yang / oM shrI ma hA ka la gA na gu ti swA hA/ na maHshrI ma hA kA la gA ne gu ti shA yA/ na mo yo gi na Nin/ tad+ya thA/ oM hi le hi le/ ki te ki te ni/ tsi
160b3(rgyud): ci de ni swA hA/ 'di bton pas gtsug lag khang dang / dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/ dug gsum nad kyi sman pa/ rigs 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing / rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla/ bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang
160b4(rgyud): phyug srin po lang ka pu re'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa/ lha ma yi na gyi bu mo// na mkha'i glog ma snying rdul du rlog pa/ dkon ma cho ga gsum gyis bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam
160b5(rgyud): bcas so// 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzung / sa so// // 'phags pa nag po chen po'i ga zungs rims nad thams cad las thar par byed pa/ sangs
160b6(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// nag po chen po skyes bu gnag ser mche ba rnon po/ mche ba chen po/ rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa brjod par bya ba ste/ 
160b7(rgyud): phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der/ bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na/ rA dzA d+hu te na/ da ha da ha/ rA dza d+hu te na/ pa tsa pa tsa rA d+hu te na/ ba hu shra be ba hu pa ri bA re/ ba hu pa ri
160b8(rgyud): / mi rgyar gyi mam/ nyan can/ oM suM suH/  \u0f7f/ bungs / \u0f7f9\u0f7f/ g+ha 9/ dIsas rgyag su rtse/ tsA bas/ brimasat+ya/ kA TI ga suH/  uH/ 
161a1(rgyud): dza no muny+tsa/ hasta muny+tsa/ pA dro puny+tsa/ a gu l+ya muny+tsa/ a gra pra ta ga muny+tsa/ a ba sa ra/ a n+ya sI muny+tsa/ gan+d+ha/ dzar mu to si/ bdag la swA hA/ a dz+wa la mA aM gu le hUM/ sarba dzadz+war nan phaT/ 'phags pa/ 
161a2(rgyud): nag po chen po'i gzungs/ rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te
161a3(rgyud): gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ de bi ma hA kA li nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
161a4(rgyud): gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhug so// de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug
161a5(rgyud): ma bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i lcam mo/ lha mo nag mo tshon mos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyog sa gcig tu 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo nag mo chen
161a6(rgyud): pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rigs pa 'di 'bul na/ bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud kyi
161a7(rgyud): yum gshin rje'i lcam mo nag mo chen mos steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing bar bya'o// 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o// thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ril
161a8(rgyud): / thug pa tshun chad bcing bar bya'o// de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ a ru ru bi tiSh+Tha bA to si ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha bA to si swA hA/ 'di bton pas rims dang / nad dang / mings dang / nyes par bltas pa thams cad
161b1(rgyud): dang / mdze dang / bol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad ni bar 'gyur ro swA hA/ lha mo nog mo chen mo'i gzungs rdzogaso// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI di bi kA la pra ma rA dza tan+t+ra kI li/ bong skad du/ dpal
161b2(rgyud): lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'i rgyud/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po
161b3(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po phyag na rdo rje lus bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba/ srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/ nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugaso// 'khor ni brgya byin dang / sha
161b4(rgyud): za dang / srin po dang / ma mo'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te bzhugaso// de'i tshe na dpal phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te bka' stsal pa/ nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin bde brgyad
161b5(rgyud): nyon cig/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di ni bdud kyi ma gshin rje'i srid mo zhes bya ba rgyal tshab chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa 'dzin pa gcig yod de/ khyed kyis de la mchod pa gyis
161b6(rgyud): shig/ bstod pa gyis shig/ ngas kyang khyed la byin gyis brlab bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor gyi nang nas lha'i dbang po ze rgya byin stan las langs te dpal lha mo nag mo la dge ba bcu'i
161b7(rgyud): sgo nas bstod pa// sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol na// dge bcu'i las la sems rab cher sbyangs nas// lam gyi khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang // mtho ris skyes pa rnams la dge bcu yi// tshul gyis/ 
161b8(rgyud): don mdzad phyi rol sgyur ba yi// dpal ldan lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'das pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas// sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byang phun sum tshogs// gzhan gyi lan chags gnod pa'i rkyen
162a1(rgyud): dang ldan// 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma byin len pa'i tshul la rab spangs pas// bsod nams tshogs kyis longs spyod phun sum tshogs// gter gyi lo srung / 
162a2(rgyud): mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes// sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi tshangs spyod pa'i bka' rnams srung ba dang // mngal gyi grong khyer dman las rnam par 'phags// srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du
162a3(rgyud): spangs pa ste// dge sbyong chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon mongs brdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis// gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso// gsung mchog rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te/ 
162a4(rgyud): bden par gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// phra ma'i skyon spang ngas mi phyed 'khor dang ldan// nyid la rnam par 'dul ba'i 'khor dkyis bskor// lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad ma// dkar mo'i
162a5(rgyud): 'khor tshogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ngag 'khyal spangs pa'i yon tan sbyin pa yis// ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo ba ra chad spangs// dgos 'brel tshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma// 
162a6(rgyud): byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal kheng sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis// zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs snyan ma// tshig rtsub gshe ba'i gnyen po byed pa ste// ngag rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag
162a7(rgyud): 'tshal bstod// rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni// 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spangs pa'i rtags// bdag med rtag su seng ges rna brgyan// brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bzung
162a8(rgyud): ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam par spangs// phyi rol yul 'di gnyis med cho su gzigs// gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags// sbrul gyi sna rgyan can la phyag 'tshal bstod// log par lta ba'i chos
162b1(rgyud): phyogs rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can// spros bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten 'di na las gnyis dgas
162b2(rgyud): dag tam dag mi dge bcu las ngan song grub// dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub// las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs pas// gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang // dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir
162b3(rgyud): gdugs pa'i tshul can 'gro ba 'dren mdzad sa// bstod par 'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas dpal lha mo nag mtshan mo la// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa// dam pa
162b4(rgyud): rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni// tshogs kyis sbyangs pa'i don dam mthong ba yis// gnyen po ye shes rim par bsgom pa la// mthar phyin pa la gshegs pa'i don mchog lags// de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni/ 
162b5(rgyud): 'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te// dang po'i tshogs las yang dag/ rab bsags pas// dang pos las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes// / rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni// rnam par mi rtog skye med tshul
162b6(rgyud): gyis gzigs// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni// rangs mas sa gnyis dag la rab rten nas// de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son// rang sems bzhi pa'i sa la cher bsgoms pas// lnga
162b7(rgyud): pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son// rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas// bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son// rang sems brgyad pa nyid la cher bsgoms pas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid// 
162b8(rgyud): dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon tan sgrub// de yi stobs kyi ye shes 'phen par 'grub// 'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni// sangs rgyas pa la smin pa'i smon lam can// sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'changam
163a1(rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i tshul ston cing // gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub shog// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rnam gocan gyis
163a2(rgyud): dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa// dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste// don dam spros bral chos nyid 'di las brtsal// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden// 'khor
163a3(rgyud): ba mya ngan gnyi su med pas zab// sems can sangs rgyas gnyi su med pas 'phags// las dang rnam smin gnyi su med pas bstod// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyi su med pas smin// yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig
163a4(rgyud): gi dang tata/  spros dang spros med don dam dbyings kyis bsdus// bsod nam su ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen te// mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod// bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul gcig/ 
163a5(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab ma'i mthu// mtho ris ngan song / gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing // bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhi na gcig gi bstod// skyed med rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun grub
163a6(rgyud): mchog/ sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid de// sgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis med grub pa'i ngang // bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bskyod// yab dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub
163a7(rgyud): sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don// stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i ngang // gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i ngang // lus ngag gnyis
163a8(rgyud): med sems nyid gcig gi tshul// rtsol byed brtsol bya gnyis med don gcig pas// rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis bstod// mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas// dbyings dang rig pa
163b1(rgyud): gnyis me ngo rtogs te/ slong dang ram grom yang dag don gcig pas// thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// pyi nga nang med gnyis med gcig gi dang / sems ldan sems med nam dag na pa
163b2(rgyud): tshul tata snang dang mi snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong // gnyis med don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di dag rnams na don dam zab mo'i tshul// spros pa med pa'i don dang 'brel ba ste/ 'di rnams ldum
163b3(rgyud): khyod kyi thugs la gsal// 'di ltar bstod pa bdag kyang khyod ltar shog/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i rgyal ba zur phud lnga pas dpal lha mo la phrin las kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ sems nyid phrin las rnam bzhi'i khyad
163b4(rgyud): par ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// 'thun par bstan pa'i zhi ba dpal lha mo// zhi mdzad ni
163b5(rgyud): 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// zhi ba'i 'khor gyi bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu dngas// kun tu zhi mdzad khya nga la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi ngagra dang nad rnams zhi bar mdzod
163b6(rgyud): 'thun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo// rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can// rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtsom ni// rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjid// kun tu rgyas mdzad ma la
163b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzod// 'thun par bstan pa'i dbang mo dpal lha mo// dbang mdzad dbang sgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can// dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// 
163b8(rgyud): rtags kyi sku mdog dmar po shin tu brjid// kun tu dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi nad dang ngag rnams dbang du mdzod// 'thun par bstan pa'i drag po dpal lha mo// drag mdzad dag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can/ 
164a1(rgyud): / drag mo ri 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu brjid// kun tu drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi nad dang ngagra rnams drag pos song // khyod kyi rang
164a2(rgyud): bzhin cir yang ma grub la// 'di ltar 'dzin nyid cir yang snang ba ni// phrin las rnam bzhi 'gro don mdzad pa lags// bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin lhun grub nas// khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog/ 
164a3(rgyud): de nas dpal lha mo nog mo la klu'i rgyal po dga' bos sku'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa// gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma// yon tan rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// don du snang ba med
164a4(rgyud): kyang gdul bya'i phyir// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstan pa'o// khamasagadul phyir gdan du bong bu zhon// mya ngan mi 'da'i rtag su lhag sgrog mang // bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas rgyan// gaN+Da
164a5(rgyud): don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes bkris// byang chub sems ldan smyig tsug zla rgyas gsal// shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas rgyan// dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang // bsod
164a6(rgyud): nams gter gyi phyag mtshan ne'u le bsnams// dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral pa kham nag spug/ nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dpal mche ba gtsigs// 'khor ba ljags la gtar phyir dkan sgra 'debs// gdugs pa
164a7(rgyud): zhel gnon phyir sdang mig bgrang // thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan rtsa dmar// snyoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ ma mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// sku gsung thugs rtags
164a8(rgyud): phyag rgya kha T+wAM gsor// sku gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan// drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir tshub mas rgyan// nyon mongs sreg phyir me phung nang na bzhugs// 'dod khams bskyed phyir yongs 'du shing
164b1(rgyud): la rten// lha min 'dul phyir rdzong gi dka' bzlog ma// dpa' brtan brtan phyir stag gi sham thabs pa nabs// bstan pa srung phyir drag mo'i cha lugs rdzogs// nga rgyal dbang sdud bdag med sgra sgrogs phyir// thabs
164b2(rgyud): kyi snyan cha g.yas pa seng ges rgyan// zhe sdang dbang 'dul dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab snyan cha g.yon pa sbrul gyi rgyan// 'du byed mi rtag rtag su dril bu sgrogs// chags phyir rngam mdzad rak+ta'i rba klong 'thud
164b3(rgyud): dam tshig srung phyir zhing lpags rgyan du mdzad// tha dad las rnams 'dul phyir rma bya'i 'bru// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyang nas// ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar ba'i phyir// rang bzhin
164b4(rgyud): gnas mchog byang shar mtshams na brtan// dbu ma'i sa la gnas/ phyir dre'u zhon// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir ma yi tshul// // mkha' 'gro ma mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas
164b5(rgyud): grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas dpal lha mo la sku gsung thu gas kyi sgo nas bstod pa// don dam gnyis med byang chub sem sa yin yang // srid gsum gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// 
164b6(rgyud): rang sems rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang // rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba las// keng rus thod phreng zhing gi rgyan dang ldan// sku mdog gnag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal// sngon mo ral pa 'dzings pa'i sprul
164b7(rgyud): pa 'gyed// sku yi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma Ti// gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyingasu bzhengs// yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la bzhad// phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye bar mdzod// gsung gi sprul pa
164b8(rgyud): dpal ldan rim ti// gru gsum dmar na ga zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhes// dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum ma ste// dbang gi phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho ma// drag
165a1(rgyud): po 'joms mngad bdudud bung zil gyis gnan/ gro drug skal mdzad sems can kun gyim// bstan pa rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi lus ngag yang gsum byin gyis rlu
165a2(rgyud): de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thog bzangs ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa// spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang // thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum// gdod
165a3(rgyud): gnas gnyis med na mkha'i snying po ni// dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par gsal// 'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la// byis pa rnams kyi bstod pa byed pa ltung // blun po rnams kyis dngos por rab
165a4(rgyud): brtags nas// gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig/ rgya dba'i don yangs thugs chung khyod nyid la// tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams// nams kyang grol bar 'gyur ba'i
165a5(rgyud): chos nyid min// gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma gtogs par// khyod kyi smon lam brtags kyi cho 'phrul la// don du gzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams// khyod la rten nas thams cad
165a6(rgyud): btub par 'gyur// gang zhig skye ba med par shes pa dang // gdod nas gnyis med snying po sgom nus na// gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin// khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis// bskal pa
165a7(rgyud): grangs med 'das par rab bltas kyang // khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus// gang zhig gzugasu mi 'dzin rnams kyis mthong // sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyis// khyod ni bos kyang bskal
165a8(rgyud): par mi thos te// 'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni// khyod kyang bos la de yang khyod kyis thos// gang zhig lus ngag dge bas khyod bsgrub pa'i// blun po de yis nams kyang khyod nyid spangs// lus ngag spangs
165b1(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas// mchod na dngos grub de yis gter thob 'gyur// khyod ni rgyal ba mang po'i yon tan sdud// chos kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mo la// zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir// 
165b2(rgyud): mi mjed 'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir// phyi rol tshul gyis thams cad 'dren mdzad ma// khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa// sgrib pa mang po stong nyid dang du gshegs// stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod// stong
165b3(rgyud): pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod// 'di ltar bstod na bstod par 'gyur grang bas// khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang // byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod// de nas na mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje
165b4(rgyud): gser mig can gyi dpal lha mo la bstod pa// dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i don// thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam pa'i mkha' la spyod // byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la// sgo gsum rdul
165b5(rgyud): snyed dbyangs kyi phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis khyod ni mchod pas ma ba sgribs kyang // dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyi/ ra// 'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char babs pas// mchod pa'i
165b6(rgyud): tshogs 'dis dang myos gyur cig/ dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig bdag po ste// bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs// khyod kyi thang du 'gyod pas rab bshags na// thugs rje'i shugs kyi sgrib pa byang bar mdzod// 
165b7(rgyud): khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni// 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs// dga' 'thun phrag dog med pa'i spros pa ni// rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul// 'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog/ 
165b8(rgyud): ni nya nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'iri mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcu dus gsum kun tu 'gro don la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs// yang dag khyed kyi yon tan sku mchog ni// gdug pa 'dul zhing ba
166a1(rgyud): bsrung ba'i phyir// sems can zad par ma gyur par du ni// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba gdab// 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang // rje su yi rang bskul zhing gsol
166a2(rgyud): btab nas// dge ba 'di yi ngan song stongs gyur te// thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo// de nas dpal ldan lha mo la na mkha'i lha bran rnams kyis bstod pa// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil
166a3(rgyud): maN rlung nag dgu pa'i klong 'khyil po brang nas// ma cig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma// bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam gcig ma// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo re ma ti// nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can
166a4(rgyud): mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can// khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor dbazhugs pa ni// don dam dbyings kyi spyod pa med pa'i rtags// dbu skra g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni// yum gyi mkha' la
166a5(rgyud): sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu 'khyil ba ni// don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i rtags// ral pa'i gseb nas me stag 'phro ba ni// thugs kyi sprul pa phyog
166a6(rgyud): bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbu la thod blon phreng ba bcings pa ni// thugs rje sbrul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// g.yas na seng ge 'gying zhing mchod ba ni// sman mo thams cad zil gyi gnon pa'i rtags// g.yon na
166a7(rgyud): sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka 'phyar ba ni// zhe sdang ma spangs dbyingasu dag pa'i rtags// snyan cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrang pa ni// srid
166a8(rgyud): gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig gzigs pa'i rtags// zhal gyis drag pa hom khung gdengs pa ni// bstan pa 'jigs pa'i ru Ta sgrol ba'i rtags// rno gdugs mche bzur gsum gtsigs ni// bsgral pa'i zhing bcus la
166b1(rgyud): sgrol ba'i rtags// sku la ning lpags g.yang bani gsol ba ni/ yang dag chos dang don dang ldan pa'i rtags// glang chen po rlon bsnams byed bkris pa ni// theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags// re lde na ga pos
166b2(rgyud): snam phyed bkris pa ni// 'jig rten 'di na che btsan ldan pa'i rtags// lte ba'i khung nas nyi ma 'char ba ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gting nas skems pa'i rtags// spyi bo gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni// dug gsum
166b3(rgyud): ma rig sun pa sel ba'i rtags// zhabs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khrel ba ni// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags// phyag g.yas shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni// sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas
166b4(rgyud): gcod pa'i rtags// phyag g.yon thod rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags// bod dbug pa byin phyogs zhon pa ni// log par lta ba'i sems can
166b5(rgyud): sgrol ba'i rtags// srin po'i og mas snga ru byas pa ni// srin yul lang gapu rangs 'dul ba'i rtags// sbrul nag chun pos na ngasmed byas pa ni// zhe sdang dbang gi bgegs rigs 'joms
166b6(rgyud): pa'i rtags// rus sbal nag po'i phob bu btang ba ni// klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i rtags// snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi khram ba ma ni// dam tshig nyams pa khram la 'debs pa'i rtags// phyi shar
166b7(rgyud): nad kyi rgyal ba btags pa ni// bstan pa 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bo la// nad ka 'debs shing ngal kha sgyur ba'i rtags// don dam bcud kyi rtag su zhag gi zo ris btang // thugs rje chags pa'i rtag su rak+Sha'i thig
166b8(rgyud): len rgyan// 'dul byed phrin las rtag su thal ba'i mtshan mas btab// ma mo 'bum phrag bran du khol ba ni// khams gsum khyab par phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags// ma cig kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skams// 
167a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'byur bas ri rab tshogs por 'phen// bdag gi btsun par lham khyod la bstod// de nas yang gshin rje nag pos dpal lha mo la che ba'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa// lha mo pal
167a2(rgyud): ldan mkha' 'gro nag mo khyod la ni// rgyun tu til mar gyis byugs lan bu gcig ma ste// ro nye rna chas bsgyings shing cha lugs mang po 'chang byed ma// rgyan tu rkang sgrogs lcags la byas pa gcig gi rkang pa
167a3(rgyud): mdzes par rgyan pa ste// mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba de ni nag mo khyon nyid yin par shes// ral pas bdag nyid mdzes par rgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes// 'khor ba 'jig
167a4(rgyud): pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag du ba 'thul ba na// nag mo mche ba mi bzang khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur// lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i
167a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor can du dur khrod dgyes// khyod ni g.yog bcas mya ngan me// da cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang sgrog/ khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bcad g.yul du mtshon gyis bsad
167a6(rgyud): pa yi ta mgo phreng lag na thogs shing gar thabs bskor zhing lag pa brkyang bskum che// rkub chos che la klu dbang gshibs pa'i ska rags bcings shing lag na mdung dang ni// ba dan thogs shing khrag gi chang gis
167a7(rgyud): ra ros myos te mig rtsa dmar por byas// mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod ni 'byung po phal chen kun gyis mthong // rkang pa'i gos ni kau rlon mtshan pas drangs pas snam gyis phyed ni re ldes dkris// mi'i sgyu ma sar pa/ 
167a8(rgyud): zhal gyi zla ba rgyan cing khrag zhag chom bus thig ler rgyan// mi shas sor chem chem za yin mi rore cod pan mgo la rgyan pa ste// bdag la skyob pa'i drag mo mi sha thogs khyod snga nas ma mthong gzod mthong na// bdud dang
167b1(rgyud): srinams sa rnams kya mag tu gangag spang nang 'ang la 'jung// lham payang sa lum ma dag gnag cing bzod par dag/ 'a ba byud man/  tsun ma mas kyi bstong pabyed pa ga zhan rje rgyam ba cad ga tu
167b2(rgyud): lha rnams dang ni 'grabs rus pa rnams 'dren phyir rang rtum pas nan pa la gcig la// brang gis 'gro bskul mgog dengs ka stong dang ldan ning bung spogs cig gis rgyan nas brgyan du byas// ya gcig la ni
167b3(rgyud): seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor zhings gni gnod pa'i sa steng gi/ phyogs nas rgyu ba'i nyim zla ba lha mo khyod kyi skeng nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis gnon// rgyamatho slong nas me 'bar thu rnams skes
167b4(rgyud): par byed par nus pa'i bud med thams cad zhi mdzad pa// lha chen sku dang na dmas par bzhugs pa'i dka' bzlog nag mo mi nang phyugs nang / kun la 'jigs pa med// ma cig dpal ldan lha mo khyod nyid la min/ 
167b5(rgyud): ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod par bgyi// de nas dpal lha mo nog mo la bram ze mchog sred kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa// ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo// rdo rje lha mo nog mo che/ 
167b6(rgyud): mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis btsun par khyod bstod kyis// bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas// yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags// ma mor grags shing 'jig rten skyong // dpa' rtul drag
167b7(rgyud): spyod brtson 'grus che// 'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal// gshin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod// gosu dar gos sngon po gsol// sdug dang mi sdug cha lugs 'chang // spyan mig mthong na mi sdug kun tu sdang // dad cing / 
167b8(rgyud): tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud// re 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas// res 'ga' tshal dang shing la gnas// re 'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas// lha mo'i gnas rten de ru 'cha'// gnas de ri dang tshal dgon ru// rtag tu lha/ 
168a1(rgyud): sa ldang bsadas// de ma gangs pa skong ba da// bgags tu skyod rdzas ma// bdagag pasam pakru ba mdzod//  sgros rgyal mtshan byas// gang ni ga tag su srung ba myed/ sa
168a2(rgyud): lug zugs rnams 'phel bar byed// seng ge stag dang spang gi yis// rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang // rdo dril chen snyan par sgrogs// byin te dril chen snyan par sgrogs// lan 'ga' lag na tri shul thogs/ 
168a3(rgyud): lan ga ra ti Ta'i ru mtshon 'phyar// mar gyi ches dgu bcu gcig na// de yi dus su mchod byas na// lha ma khyod las lhag pa med// bdud 'dul lha min srin mor ston// dag dang 'thab che rgyal bar byed// bung mengs
168a4(rgyud): na mchog yin te// tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra// rgyal po'i khaM bran pad+ma 'dra// zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra// chu la rgal na gru zam/ dra// phongs pa rnams kyi gnyen bshes 'dra// lha dang lha min g.yul
168a5(rgyud): 'gyed tshe// lha mo khyod kyi lte ba la// lha rnams kun gyi rdzong bcas nas// / lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas// lha ma yin rnams pham par byed// lag na mdung dmar chems se chems// ru mtshon pa dang
168a6(rgyud): me ltar 'bar// dgra 'dul g.yul bzlog khyed la bstod// de nas drang srong chen po ke'u di rgyas dpal lha mo dpe byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa// 'jig rten gco la rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal// ma rnams nang na khyod ni rtag tu
168a7(rgyud): mchog yin te// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod// byad bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab rgyan// mig yangs 'dam skyes sngon po'i mdab ma 'dra/ 
168a8(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes snang ba grags pas rgyan// dper na ring thang med pa'i nor bu 'dra// dang bdag pad+mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang // sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra
168b1(rgyud): shes pa/ bdus zu shi ma pa da/ lus ma da sa des dun gyis pa sa// mtshanam yo narnam pa snga gas cam drim mi shes kunanas thas dzes pa// dran pa rnams kyin nas mchag tu gyur
168b2(rgyud): seng ge gcan can mchog gyur bzhin// sngags bstod cig ni 'di las 'byung ba yis// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad 'grub par shog/ ces bstod do// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 
168b3(rgyud): khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs so// da yang bstod pa 'di dag gdon sgoms shig/ yid la rtag tu zlos shig/ lha mo 'di la bstod pa ni nga la bstod pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa yin no// lda
168b4(rgyud): mo ngas kyang mi 'di srung bar byed do// skyob par byed do// ci 'dod pa'i dngosagrub gter ro// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor de rnams tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rgyan gyi char chen po
168b5(rgyud): phab nas so so gnas su 'khod do// bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rlung rdzos/ sa so// / rgya gar skad du/ shI di wi kA li aSh+Ta shad+d+ha ka/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 
168b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bzhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa'
168b7(rgyud): thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad do// de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug
168b8(rgyud): gotode nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' srin mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi
169a1(rgyud): / rnam grangs ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus la dgongs nas dpal lha mo nog so la gzigs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs/ 
169a2(rgyud): thos bsam sgom la cher gnas pa'i// rgyu 'bras rkyen gyi bdag nyid can// 'gro la pan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog/ dpal ldan lha mo nag mo 'phags// byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste// sa ltar sten pa'i
169a3(rgyud): bzhir gyur pa// yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra// byang chub smin byed me lta bu// dge ba'i 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo// shes rab rnam dag na mkha' ste// khyod ni 'byung ba chen po 'dra// 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod/ 
169a4(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i// las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas// nga rgyal gzugs kyis 'dul ba goms// shes ra dab snying rje'i lam du 'gro// khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu// dper na yid
169a5(rgyud): bzhin nor bu'i chu// kun la phan pa'i dpag bsam shing // nyi ma 'dra/ bar khyod la gsal// zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing / ming ni ri bong rwa dang 'dra// rang gi rgyud ni 'khor lo 'dra// u dum
169a6(rgyud): ba ltar khyod dkon yang // bdud rtsi lta bur yongs tshim mdzad// 'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags// rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyang ston// chu dang na mkha'i tshub ma ltar// gdul bya'i srid gsum cis kyang 'dul// dus
169a7(rgyud): gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong // dam pa rnams dang yang dag cig/ dam pa rnams kyi lam du 'gro/ lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo// srin mo klu mo sha za mo// bdud mo 'byung mo grul bum mo// drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyu/ 
169a8(rgyud): mata rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma// mkha 'gro gtum mo zhing sgrol ma// ni rgyas dbang dang drag pos 'dul// dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang ston// rnam pa brgyad kyi dbyibs kyang 'byung // 'gro ba drug po'i tshul
169b1(rgyud): yang ston// phung po lnga yang brjod par dus// dbang chom byed yul lnga 'angs no// rten cing 'brel ba'i spyod ba mkhas// yul can rnams ni bsod la mkhas// de bzhin ngas rnams gsod pa dang // lus can rnam/ 
169b2(rgyud): ni gsod la brtson// sems ni gsod pa med la mkhas// 'khor ba las ni ring du song // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan te// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong mdzad dpal
169b3(rgyud): ldan ma// dam chos 'dzin pa rnams la byams// oM AHhUM shrI de bi kA li sa ma sa dzaHDA kI ni DA ya sa ma swA hA// ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa// yon tan brgyartsa brgyad kyang thob// dmyal ba'i sdug
169b4(rgyud): bsngal myong mi 'gyur// yi dgas gnasu mi skye zhing // byol song skye ba sa thogs mi 'gyur// lus 'phags gnasu skyes pa na// thog la sogs pa mi 'bab cing // sgra mi snyan du rlung gis min// de bzhin pa
169b5(rgyud): glang spyod du yang // chu dang brlabs kyis khyer mi nus// 'dzam+bu'i gling du/ gang skyes pa// sna tshogs gnod pas nyen mi 'gyur// 'dod par lha rnams gnas su yang // skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur
169b6(rgyud): bsam gtan bzhi'i skye gnas// tshad med pa zhi ni 'phel bar 'gyur// gzugs med gnas ni bzhi por yang // don med na ni mi skye ste// 'du shes med par nams kyang min// 'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams// 
169b7(rgyud): khams gsum tshul gyi bdag don spyod// rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur// sems la 'dzin par mi byed de// nyon mongs rtsa ba drug po dang // de bzhin nye ba nyi shu dang // mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyur// bskal pa/ 
169b8(rgyud): grangs med mang por yang // mi khom brgyad du skye mi 'gyur// mu stegs rtsod pa bzlog pa dang // mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan// sdug bsngal bskal pa mang por yang // nams kyang
170a1(rgyud): 'khor bar mi ltung zhing // mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir// nyan thos sa rnams non pa dang // rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni// rab dga' dri med 'od byed 'gro// 
170a2(rgyud): sbyang dka' mngon 'gyur ring du song // mi g.yo legs pa chos kyi sprin// sangs rgyas sa chen bla na med// bcu gnyis po yang thob 'gyur te// kun tu 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od// nam mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od// rin chen 'od dang
170a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'od// las kyi 'od dang dpe med sa// dpal ldan sa dang shes rab 'od// thams cad mkhyen dang rang rig ste// bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang // 'di tshe byung na myur du thob// sa rnams ma thob bar du yang / 
170a4(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang // shes rab snying rje ldan gyur cing // chos la dga' ba rnams kyis srung // dngos grub thob ste de bzhi nu gshegs// rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan byang
170a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dang // dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi// ming brgya rtsa/ brgyang gang 'dzin pa// yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad thob ste// sku gsung thugs ni grub nas kyang // khams gsum chos kyi rgyal
170a6(rgyud): por 'gyur zhes gsungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang / dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la rje su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do// dpal
170a7(rgyud): lha mo nag ma tshon mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa rdzogaso// // lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa// dus gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug/ 
170a8(rgyud): gsum rgyus// sdig min las grub lha dang lha ma yin// dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'di ru// sha khrag dmar la rol pa'i lha mo khyod// lha yi g.yul ngo rgyal bar zhal mchis las// lha ma yin gyi
170b1(rgyud): dpung rnams brlag par mdzod ces bstod do// rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang
170b2(rgyud): mdzad kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ badz+ra ma bu/ badz+ra ma bu/ bud+d+ha badz+re/ badz+ra ma
170b3(rgyud): bu bud+ha dze/ shUn+ya tA pra be she/ bai ro tsan gar+b+he/ pats+tshe/ dri sa/ a ba bo d+ha na swA hA// cho ga ni rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro// bdud thams cad dang / dgra
170b4(rgyud): thams cad dang / log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshug so// 'chi pa'i tshe 'phags pa 'od dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems
170b5(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar smon lam btang pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro// rdzogs so// oM badz+ra A yu She hUM a/ 'phags pa tshe dpag med kyi snying po 'di
170b6(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas sam/ sngags chab kyis dbang bskur na tshe nur bar 'gyuraro// oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+yai/ a pa ra mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM ba ro pa tsi te swA hA// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ra mi ta A/ 
170b7(rgyud): yudz+nyA na na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gi
170b8(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
171a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten
171a2(rgyud): gyi khams yon tan dang g+ha med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i gzi brjid
171a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin par bzhes te/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni tshe thung ba las
171a4(rgyud): tshe lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher dus ma/ yin par 'chi bar bstan to// 'jam dpal sems can/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang
