193b2(rgyud): mdog/ byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du ning 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma
193b3(rgyud): stong dang ldan pa yi// in+d+ra nI la'i me tog ni// rgya che dum 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad 'byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams
193b4(rgyud): rnam par g.yos par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i log lta'i sgrib g.yog/ sa sel// dag pa'i smon lam 'khor lo bskor// bdag kying snying po 'di yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid// 
193b5(rgyud): oM b+h+rUM hrIHha hUM swA hA// snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logasu// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// dbus gtsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// 'og gi phyog
193b6(rgyud): kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// zhing khams za ma tog mdzes na// sangs rgyas gnon pa'i dpal bzhugs so// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras
193b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun mgrin pa sngon po rgyal// an rnyil gyi ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkhar la gshegs// glog 'gru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom
193b8(rgyud): ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba dum byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// an+da rnyil gyi me tog ni// rgya me dumar 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer nga mtshar ldan
194a1(rgyud): pa dang / rmad 'byung chen po'i tshig bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i shes bya'i sgrib nags sel// ye shes ral gris rtsa ba bregs// bdag kyang snying po nga'i
194a2(rgyud): mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ snying po 'di skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// dbus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas
194a3(rgyud): bzhugs// spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs 'dus nas// rig sngags mthu chen 'chad pa dang // gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i// shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kum
194a4(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams ni spyi bor bzhag/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi logs byin // na mkha' snyan pa yis kyang bkang // de'i tshe phyogs bcur ba zhugs pa yi// khro bo'i rgyal po ma lus rnams// sa stengs thams
194a5(rgyud): cad gar gyis bkang // g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zla gam dang / zlum po gru bzhi gru gsum 'gros// mchod dang gyed mchongs dril po dang // rdebs dang btsir ba'i tshul gyis su// bgegs
194a6(rgyud): rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad// lag pa thal sbyar che btsums 'gyed// sor mo cig snol gcig 'khyung dang // kun snol kun 'khyud kun gdengs dang // rgyab snol re sa 'khyud kun 'khyud dang // mos
194a7(rgyud): res 'khyud sgreng kun sgreng dang // mnyam gzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya// sa gnon skyab sbyin mchog sbyin sogs// phyag rgya du ma bgegs rtsol mdzad// gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs// ma lus 'khor dang
194a8(rgyud): bcas pa rnams// gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba// snga na med pa'i rig sngags rmad// ngo mtshar byung zhes thos ma thag/ lus kyang shin tu 'dar gyur nas// rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lhags te// phyag 'tshal
194b1(rgyud): phal mo sbyar nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// gang zhig gdong bcu gcig pa yi// rig sngags len cing 'dzin pa dang // rgyun du 'don dang yid la byed// 'jig rten mgon po spyan ras gzigs
194b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs 'di rnams// gang gi yid la byed pa 'am// yang na ji tsam dran yang rung // dge ldan rigs kyi bu de ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal po rnams kyi sras// byang chub sems dpa'
194b3(rgyud): rnams kyi bshes// rigs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yab// byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin te// bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs// skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste// bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing // de yi
194b4(rgyud): tshul khrims ral ba med// mi de skye ba don yod de// lha gnas dga' gnas spu gseb tu// ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi 'dzud// 'jig rten 'di yi nad rigs dang // gdon rigs ji
194b5(rgyud): snyed yod pa 'am// rig sngags byeng stems ma lus pa// de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis// tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang // shi ba sems rgyal
194b6(rgyud): med par ni// gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug/ rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang // rgyal ba rnams la chos nyan cing // rgyal sras rnams dang stabs gcig tu// stobs dang mi 'jigs kun
194b7(rgyud): brnyes te// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas// skad cig glog 'gyu ji bzhin du// 'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing // zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
194b8(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las lha byung ba ri leru ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin// bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la// phyag 'tshal phyogasu 'khong nas ni// gas
195a1(rgyud): pa gtod nas tshig 'di gso lo// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun// rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon// 'gro ba thugs
195a2(rgyud): brtse chen po yis// snying po byin rlabs ldan la gsol// rmad du 'byung ba'i snying po la// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang // rig pa 'dzin rnams 'thun par dgyes// 'on kyang 'gro mangs gzung ba
195a3(rgyud): dang tatadangos grus thams cad myur ba dang // snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir// mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyis// byin rlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags// 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol// rig sngags nyi
195a4(rgyud): ma zla ba'i 'od// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sprin bral byed// 'gro ba tu/ dgas brtse badzad pa dang // bdag la phan pa'i don slad du// rgya ral ba mya ngan kun bral bas// rtsa ba'i gzung sngags bshad du/

195a6(rgyud): seng ge'i sgra// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungaso// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ o a ka Te bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ Ti ka Te/ ka
195a7(rgyud): Ta ka Te/ ka ro To/ bIr+ya swA hA// yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun// rig sngags 'dis ni nges par bskyed// khyad par du ni mdze nad la// rtsa las byung ba'i me bzhin no// rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi
195a8(rgyud): bzhin sbyor phyin maN+Dal lham pa brgyad// bser skya yi bdud rtsis byugs// yan lag bcu gnyis mgor bcas pa'i// sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs nas// lhag ma yan lag thig le
195b1(rgyud): bya / cung zad lce la myang bas ni// dus dus sum brgya drug cu'i ched// nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni// lo gcig dus su rtogs ldan 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// dpal skyed 'che ba bzlog pa yi// ting nge
195b2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungaso// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ mahA
195b3(rgyud): satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra wa d+d+hi pad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni dz+wa la ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya hrIHhUM phaT swA hA// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// glo bur gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir// bdun phrag

196a3(rgyud): da ta la/ badz+rod shAn+ti ta ti/ si ta ma du to ga ta pra na ma Na pa kA ra ba ra tuSh+TaM bid+yA ka ma ga saM b+ha ka na kA ra/ sarba bid+yA ba tA he sha kA ra/ pa ra ma shin+ta ka ra/ bud d+ha bo d+ha ya ma ti/ b+ha ga bA ha ya grI ba sarba bid+yA hri da ya/

196a8(rgyud): kurba di naM/ sarba dza mu kha dra pre ta tA ya phaT/ na maHsarba duSh+Ta ga ho ta sA da nA ya ha ya gri ba sid d+h+r-i tu me man+ta pa da ni swA hA/ oM a mr-i tod b+ha bA ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ na maHsarba satwAM sh+tsa si dz+yA tu me man+ta

198b7(rgyud): ra ta la/ d+hu na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha a pra kam+b+ha/ ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karma A wa ra Na bi sho d+haka/ sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pu ra ka/ sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsaka/ sarba satwa A shA pa/ 
198b8(rgyud): ri pU ra// sarbas twa mA shA sa na kar na mastu te swA hA/ a mo g+ha ya swA hA/ a mo g+ni pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzI tA ye swA hA/ a mi tA b+hU ye swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA su tA ya sAhA/ 
199a1(rgyud): mA ra sai n+ya pra marda nA ya swA hA// A b+ha yA ya swA hA/ a b+ha ya prad ya swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bidzi yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dzi yA ya swA hA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ a kA la mri t+yu pra shA
199a2(rgyud): ma nA ya swA hA// i deny+tsa me karma ku ru na mostu taM swA hA// oM ra Na ra Na hUM pheT/ o dza ya hUM phaT/ oM dz+ra dz+r-i dzA swA hA// oM hU dza ya swA hA/ oM hriHtrai lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+he pA she a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhUM
199a3(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ oM ba su ba ti swA hA/ oM A r-i li ka swA hA/ oM ba hu ba hu le swA hA/ oM I ro li ka hriHhrIHhUM phaT swA hA/ ni ya tA a ni ya ta be da ni ye a shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga ba karma No a she She taHk+Sha yai ku
199a4(rgyud): ru swA hA// oM pad+ma hasta ya swA hA/ oM bud d+ha d+harma saM g+ha ya swA hA// rabs chad thod par ro bsregs so// nyungs kar ser po dri chu bcas// bskyed de myu gus sngags stong
199a5(rgyud): brjod// 'bras bu la ni khri brjod bya// lus la thogs na byad ste/ mas sogs// nad dang gdon rnams myur du sel// gzhan dga'as rnams gang la yang bdun bdun grangs kyi sngags kyis sbyar/ 
199a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// ltos 'gro bas ni rab rgyal ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po ha la ha la yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs/

199a8(rgyud): many+dzu shrI/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni a d+hi ka/ bo d+hi satwa ma hA sate b+h+yaHa te na maHgri tA/ b+ha ga bAM/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra tAM hri da ya sarba karma ba da/ sarba gra ho tsA da ne ka ra/ b+ha ba a ma ra Ne bi na sha ka ba shI taM/ s+yad ya/ 
199b1(rgyud): skri bye ba rnaMs ta ma ba dz+nyAs// bral ba dz+nyAs ta/ ng+ga la sA rUb la ka te shwa ra ma/ brangs me sa tatiti/ takA ru ka/ ku ru/ k+Sha ma skam bcags pa ya ti/ bajam te/ mahA bi nga ya n+ti/ d+hu
199b2(rgyud): d+hu ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tsa la tram tra/ na mo me d+ya d+he/ serbas twa b+he ya/ brangs har byar/ ha ri bA d+ha nong \u0f7f/ bA pra bre bA/ b+hA ba na ga ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ g+hu ru b+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsho
199b3(rgyud): suM pra se d+ha/ satwam bi ma la/ phal pha la/ nUr+Ne/ Ar+yA ba lo ka ti shwa rA ya/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka kriSh+Na dz+nyA na d+ha/ dza nA mu ku Ta bo la b+ha/ pra la b+ha/ tsa le tsa la~M/ ma la ma la/ ka la ka la/ ha la ha la/ 
199b4(rgyud): ga la ga la/ ta la ta la/ da la da la/ na la na la/ tu ru t+yeH8/ hu lu hu lu/ hi li hi li/ he bo d+hi satwa/ na mastu d+hA nu/ hU hUM/ hriHku ru ku ru/ hri da ya/ a nusma ra/ sa ma ya ar+tha

199b7(rgyud): bdud rnams zhi// 'dod pa thams cad skongs gyur te// mtshams med lnga byas mis kyang 'grub// gal te grub par ma gyur na// bdag gis mtshams med las byas te// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun bsrungs

200a1(rgyud): byed pas 'ching bar 'gyur// se'u bo che'i lcug ma la// ro bsregs thal ba khri phrag bdun// bsngags nas gtor bas char ches pa// char pa myur du 'chad par byed// dri chu ga cir

200b8(rgyud): Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/ sarba Adz+nyA ya/ an+d+ha kA ra/ 
201a1(rgyud): mA ma ya tri/ tad+ya thA/ oM sA d+ha ni sA d+han/ sid d+he sing d+he/ sid d+ha d+hA ra/ b+ha ga ba te/ pa ra bar/ kle shang bin/ adz+dza she Sha ma Ni sha ma ya/ sarba pA pa bi shud d+he/ d+ha

202a1(rgyud): sha la a b+hi bar dad namaHsarba ta thA ga tA na nam Ar+yA ba loka te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ruHkA ya/ s+pha ra pra ti d+hA ma hA satwa sid+g+ha tu me man+ta bdeHswAhA/

202b8(rgyud): hi nI la kar+N+Na/ e h+ye hi bA ma s+thi ti siM ha mu kha ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa suny+tsa/ ma hA aT+TA T+TA niR+Sha di ni/ e h+yaM hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sid d+ha/ mo gI shwa ra/ ban d+ha ban+d+ha pA tsaM/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi d+yaM/ sma raste he \u0f7f
203a1(rgyud): ga ga lo ka bi lo ka ste/ ta thA ga tA/ dang te med rAH/ pra sA d+ha ya me swA hA/ sing d+ha ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo kI shwa ra ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+DA ya swA hA/ bA ra tra mu khA
203a2(rgyud): swAsAhAtasiM ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra si ha mu khA ya swA hA// sid d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ badz+ra hasta ya swA hA/ ma hA badz+ra histA ye swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ye dz+nyo pa bI
203a3(rgyud): taye swA hA/ ma hA kA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakra A yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA// shaM kha shab+da nin+na da na ki ra ya swA hA/ bo d+ha na ka ra yai swA hA/ bA ma skan+d+ha di sha s+t+r-i ta kriSh+Na dzi na ya swA hA/ bA ma hasta b+ha g+ha tsaR+Ya ni ba se nA ya/

203a5(rgyud): satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+h+r-i tu me man+ta pa dAHswA hA/ smug pu me lin sUr len dang // shel dang bai DUr+ya ka ram// gser gyi snod du khur bcas pa// maN+Dal dbus bzhag
203a6(rgyud): sngags khri brjod// mug khri rdo yi kong bur ni// chur bcas snga gre bdar byas nas// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod de// khong du 'thungs pas dbyig dug dang // sbyar dug lan cig skyes dug dang // bza' nyes tsam yang sel
203a7(rgyud): yang sel 'gyur na// dug rigs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sogs pas the tsom mi bya'o// dad can shes rab ldan pa'i mi// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags gang la yang // nan tan rtse gcig tu brjod na// de yis thams cad
203a8(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig dad pa'i lcags kyu dang bro yi bar ldan pa la// lha klu 'bum phrag mthus skyob cing / dkar po dge ba kun slong sems// byang chub rin chen gter thob par// sngags kyi mthus ni mdzod
203b1(rgyud): pa ste/ ta sngags la nyes dang med pa la// bstan na rang nyid nyams par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las rigs kyi khyad par gyi sngags byung ba'i
203b2(rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bsdus pa'i dngos// 'jig rten mgon po bcu yi dang // stobs bcu rgyas pa'i rang bzhin can// pha rol phyin bcu lhun grub
203b3(rgyud): pata ta sa bcu gcig tu rdzogs nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun tu khyab mdzad pa'i// bcu gcig pa yi mtshan nyid yin// bsod nams bskal par ldan pa'i mis// rang gi lus la sngags dgod bya// sngags dang
203b4(rgyud): bcas pa'i lus la ni// sred med bus kyang mi tshugs na// 'jig rten gzhan lta smos ci dgos// byad dang sha za ro langs dang // 'byung pos mtshon dang grib gnon dang // ltas ngan rnam
203b5(rgyud): ni myur du sel// bla ma las byung rim pas ni// myur du bla med byang chub 'gyur// bla ma'i lung dang bral bas ni// nams kyi nga 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// spyi bor yi ge oM dkar po// nan
203b6(rgyud): tan du bsam par bya// dpral bar yi ge a ljang ku/ de bzhin du ni bsam par bya// lce yi steng du yi ge mchog/ hriHyig dmar 'od ldan bsam// snying gi phyogasu hUM sngon po// lte ba ra ha yig ser po ste// de
203b7(rgyud): bzhin gsang bar ho ljang ku// bshang ba'i gnas su ho sngon po// pus mo gnyis la sa ser skya// rkang mthil yi ge ha ljang ser// lag mthil gnyis la hA dkar po// lag ngar la ni hri sngon te// 
203b8(rgyud): dpung par yi ge tra bkong bya// yi ge'i tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas// gang dang gang yang rung ba yi// rtsol ba rnams la 'jug par bya// stsol ba de dang de dag kyang // sngags kyi byin rlabs las rtsel zhing // 
204a1(rgyud): lus kyang sngags kyi nga ba nyid// sngags kyis bskyed pa'i lus nyid ni// sngags dang bcas pa'i lus su 'gyur// sngags kyi lus kyi rigs rnams kyi// zhing khams dum sbyang nas/ 
204a2(rgyud): kyang ta ta 'gro ba rnams kyi lus su ni// 'gro ba grol ba'i spyod pa ni// kun bzang mchog dang mtshungs pa ste// 'gro dang dbyer med don rig 'gyur// don de ma lus thob pa'i thabs// ngag gi rigs
204a3(rgyud): par gyur pa yis// rig 'dzin zhes bya'i dngos po ste// de la gang gnas de yi ming // rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste// sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes// lhag dang bcas pa'i rtsom pa ni// 
204a4(rgyud): shin tu ngal ba nyid yin te// ngal ba nyid kyis grol ba'i la dam// bgrod par bka' ba de spangs nas// shin tu bag yang das bde ba'i lam// skal sman yang dag sgrub 'di la// nan tan
204a5(rgyud): du ni 'jug par bya// ston pas de skad gsungs pa'i tshe// 'khorarnams dga' nas thal sbyar te// mkha' la me tog gto nas kyang // mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso// thams
204a6(rgyud): cad kyis ni phyag 'tshal te// bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang // gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i// zhal dang sku yi 'du byed la// 'dzum bzhin du ni ltas nas kyang // gsang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag/ dbus
204a7(rgyud): btsugs thal mo sbyar byas te// phyogs bcu rang rang bde bar 'khod// de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni// 'gro ba'i don du rig sngags gsungs// bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs phyir// las kyi sbyor ba'ang
204a8(rgyud): tha dad do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+d+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo// ad+had b+h+yaHsamyak+kha bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

204b3(rgyud): kun gyi dbur// sngon gyi phyag 'chil ban po brjod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsanA b+hU har dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te/ samyaSh+pe bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tre b+h+yaHaR+tha

205a8(rgyud): ar+tha b+h+ya/ samyak+Sha bud+d+he b+h+yo/ nam Ar+yA ba mi ga ti shwa rA ye/ be d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kI ya/ ted+ya thA/ maM oM lo mo li/ bi la ta mo// ts+yai ma ti li swA hA/ chu'am tha lo

206a1(rgyud): dzA ya ta ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ sasak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ aR+shang b+h+yaHsamyak+ta bu d+he b+h+yo/ nam Ar+yA ba la ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hAs twA ya/

208a1(rgyud): ha na han/ daha dang / btsab tsa/ a mr-i te hUM phakra lngas ngan thams cad 'joms pa dang // gnas khang byin gyis brlabs pa dang // tshe dang longs spyod rtags pa dang // dal 'byor phun sum
208a2(rgyud): tshogs pa dang // dang po thal mo sbyar byas te// phyis ni lag g.yon bsdigs mdzub bcas// oM dang a la la la ho// zhes ni brjod cing khang pa yi// nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas// de nas hUM sgras se/ 
208a3(rgyud): gol gtogs// de nas oM AHbadz+ra dang // s+thA na pa Ni b+h+yaHa haM// rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT brjod// shin tu 'jam pa'i gtan la ni// rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas nas// bsrang te mig ni sna rtser pab// dal ba
208a4(rgyud): rlung ldan dkan la ni// lce yis cung zad reg par bya// lte ba cung za/ da 'khum pa yis// sems ni bag yod gnas par bya// rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min// gtsang ba ma yin mi gtsang min//
