208a8(rgyud): sems dpa'i sems nyid kyang // gang nas ma 'angs gar mi gnas// gar yang ma song brtags na stong // brtags par byed pa rtog pa tsam// dngos rnams rtags pa ming tsam te// kun rdzob tsam du
208b1(rgyud): ming lag sa// na darang gis sems bzung ma/ dra kyi bzhi dang gzung // drug pa'i gnyis pa des brten// de la dang ba gnyis pas ban pa/ dang ze ma tsa lus mnan pa ste// bcu ga pang/ 
208b2(rgyud): grog su gnagag mi ge dgus grub pa ni// sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin te// 'ad bar rnam pa drug dang bcas// chu drug gis ni dang byas nas// yul nI rnam drug la 'jug// yul drug pa/ 
208b3(rgyud): dag gi dbang byas nas// nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas// nyon mongs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin// phung po rnam 'dug dang ldan// phung pa grangs kyi dbye bas ni// yan lag drug drug 'a
208b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// yan lag rdzogs pa'i grib mas ni// ra don dag pa'i sems sgrib byed// sgrib gnyis gobasal dgug pon// gas mgo ngo ba dang bcas pa// tig tshings
208b5(rgyud): su bzhugs pa'o// srog tsal bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ phyi rol snang banub par 'gyur// rtsol dang bral nas da/ skye ste// yi ge la ni sems gnas 'gyur// yi ge gas la
208b6(rgyud): 'od zer ni/ kha spu khung rnams thams cad nas// sems dang bcas pa ldang 'jug ste// slar yang thig le bsdus nas ni// yi ge nyid kyang mi dmig so// 'dzin pa de las thos nas kyang // sgyu ma'i
208b7(rgyud): rnam pa rjes dran bya// de la goms nas ting 'dzin ni// nyams pa med pa thob par 'gyur// ting 'dzin de bstan gyur nas ni// lus 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa thob// rig 'dzin de la gnas nas
208b8(rgyud): ni/ bla med byang chub de thob 'gyur// skad cig de la rdos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bur dag nas kyang // mkha' ltar kun la khyab par spyod// rten ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste// lus ni 'phags pa/ 
209a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal lo// yan lag phyag na rdo rje ste// mgo dang thod nam pham pa// gtsug tor sgrib pa rnam sel nyid// ti zla kun tu bzang po ste// sa chu me chung namakha' dang // nas shes nyid dang bcas
209a2(rgyud): pa'o//  thams cad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste// bsam gtan la ni gnas pa'i phyir// stsal rnams so sor bsdu bar bya// sems klong pas ni nges par 'grub// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dus ni rtag pa ma
209a3(rgyud): yin te// mi rtog sems nyid 'brel gyur nas// dus la tha dad mi rtog go/ nyi ma'i 'khor lo chu rgyun dang // namakha'i phyogs ni ji lta bar// sems kyang sems kyis btsal bar bya// gzhan ni go skabs mi
209a4(rgyud): 'byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyu dad kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ thun mong gi sngag/ des byung ba'i le ru ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas drang
209a5(rgyud): srong gnas nas ni// sna tshogs gzugs ldan zhes bya ba/ bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rigs 'dzin zhig/ rgya cher rang gi 'khor bcas la// dkyil 'gro/ 
209a6(rgyud): drung du lhags nas ni// rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni// ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol// oM mtha' yas
209a7(rgyud): spros la nyer zhi zhing // zhi mdzad du zhi rab spyod mdzod// rtog bcom rtog mkhyen rtog yongs zhugs// ye shes kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo// zhi las zhi 'gyur mtha' 'byung ba// chos rnams kun
209a8(rgyud): mchog zhi chos che// spros med las spros dkar bcu bya// mtha' yas chos la phyag 'tshal lo// grol gyur grol mdzad dag pa che// dag par spyod pa gtsang ma mgon// tshogs rdzogs tshogs
209b1(rgyud): ldan chogs spyod rgyal// tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo// rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyims rgyan// 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'o// rtag pa don chen rtag zhugs la// mgon po spyan ras gzi
209b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// khams gsum bag chags kyis bkrugs pa// thibs po'i ling rtog zhugs pa rnams// mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang // sems la gsal myur shin tu dga'// mngon sum med la
209b3(rgyud): brjod bral yang // lkog tu gyur pa smos ci dgos// lkog don mngon du byed pa la// phyag rgya dang ni 'dra 'bag mchog/ mngon sum thob ldan ming nas kyang // don la sems kyi gsal ba skye// don gang yang
209b4(rgyud): yang goms pa las// sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste// de gsal dmi rtog blo 'bras bu// sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o// blo dman rnams kyi 'jug pa dang // 'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang // rnon po
209b5(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur phyir// gzugs brnyan byung tshul ba shad du gsol// myur du 'jug dang grol ba dang // myur du byang chub cher 'gyur cing // gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul
209b6(rgyud): 'byung can// 'dren pas de ring bshad du gsol// mkha' sprin rtag pa med pa la// mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltar// rnam rtog gis bkrugs sems la ni// su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par
209b7(rgyud): 'gyur// dmigs pa'i mtshan ma gsal byed pa// gzugs brnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste// legs par 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing // byin rlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
209b8(rgyud): 'dren pa gtses// ljags kyi dbang po rab bkram nas// gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul byung ba// nga las mnyan par brtson pa ni// legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog/ rigs 'dzin byang chub
210a1(rgyud): sems khyod legs// rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan nas kyang // legs par gsungs pa yid la zhog/ khyod la yang dag pa shang bya ba// byin rlabs dgyes pa'i gzus
210a2(rgyud): brnyan dang // tshon gyis ris su bris pa 'am// rin chen rigs sams rdo 'am// shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags// dang po'i las can sems can la// dmigs pa gsal ba
210a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang // byin rlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po gsal zhing drang // gzhon zhing chags pa med pa la// bsang zhing dud pas bdugs nas ni// dang ldan dang
210a4(rgyud): tshul bzang bas bzhag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon gyi sku// bco brgyad sor tshad ldan pa la// gdan khri dag ni so ra dgu ste// rgyab yol sor tshad drug gis bskyed// 
210a5(rgyud): bzhengs te ldem bag nyams dga' ba// rin chen du ma'i ga thugs kyis rgyan// g.yas kyi dang po bgrang phreng ste// gnyis pa mi 'jigs stsol ba'i phyag/ g.yon pa
210a6(rgyud): dang po pad+ma dmar// gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs thogs// zhal gyi drangs ni bcu gcig la// mdun gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can// byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i mdangs// 
210a7(rgyud): dkar po dkar ser dmar skya bo// g.yon gyi gsum ni khro bo'i zhal// sgeg pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste// dmar dang dmar ser leb rgan no// g.yas su gtum pa'i khro zhal gsum/ 
210a8(rgyud): sngo dang ser dang ldang ku'o// rgyab tu khro ga tum mdog dam rab// rta skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal// khro ba'i zhal rnams mche ba gtsigs// mig gsum dbu skra ser ba ni// gyen du cho
210b1(rgyud): btsugs bcings pa'o// stengs du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i zhal// byi ru bcag pa'i mtshan 'dra ba'i// dbu yi cod pan nang rnams su// 'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams// re re bzhin du
210b2(rgyud): bzhugs par bya// dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang // rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang // lag rgyan sen mo dor bcas pa// do shal rkang gdub ska rags can// rgyan dang na bza' mdzes pas
210b3(rgyud): brgyan// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ris ma dag la dga' gyur nas// yid gzhungs dal spyod khro ba med// sred chung shes rab snying rje che// thabs ldan ri mo rgyud la mkhas// bsam pa
210b4(rgyud): bzang ldan tshul khrims srung // 'dri chos gzo la gzhungs pa yis// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su bri// gzu/ dgas bzang yid dal gtsang ldan pa'i// bu mos bkal
210b5(rgyud): pa'i ras la ni// tshon bzang ngur smrig mdog bya'o// 'thasabar bcas te 'jam por bya// thig gi phyogs chab shad na sa kyang // ser skya chen gyi gzugs brnyan ni// tshad la mkha
210b6(rgyud): pa tshad ldan pa'i// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// dkar po wa yi shes yin te// dmar po sems rtso li khri'o// sngon po rams dang mthing shing ste// ser po pa bla dag pa yin// nag po snag tsha nyid/ 
210b7(rgyud): yin te// ljang khu rams dang ldong ros sgyur// yang na spang ma nyid kyis byas// smug rtsi rams dang skags sbyar te// gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya// sbyin dang bral na grub par 'gyur// shing sprin ser dang
210b8(rgyud): ka pi ta// le me ta dang than dzar// de dag so sor sbyar ba yi// gsal zhing bkrugs med dag par byed// a ta pas ni snun par byed// gan to has ni rtag par 'gyur// rgyas par gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ 
211a1(rgyud): yang na sgo gcig pa yang rung // dkyil 'khor cha rim gsum pa'am// yang na gnyis sam gsum yang rung // dbus su gdong ni bcu gcig ni// mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi ldan bri// shar
211a2(rgyud): du spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ dkyil 'khor rnam snang gtso bo can// de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi// phyag bzhi pa dang bcas pa'o// lhor ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ dkyil 'khor shAka thub gtse
211a3(rgyud): bo can// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa'o// nub tu rig ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// sems dpa' bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o// dbus su rdo rje dbang mo
211a4(rgyud): yang ta ta mdun du rdo rje rtag pa ste// g.yasu rdo rje dpal 'byung // / rgyab tu rdo rje dpag med de// g.yon du rdo rje don grub bo// / shar du lha mo spyan ma ni// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// 
211a5(rgyud): g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o// rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa ste// gas na du rdo rje legs pa'o// lhor ni lha mo mA ma ki/ mdu na du rdo rje rin chen no// g.yasu rdo rje nyi ma ste// rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal
211a6(rgyud): mtshan no// g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa yin// nub tu na bza' dkar ma yang // mdun du rdo rje chos yin te// g.ya su rdo rje rnon po yin// rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu zhes pa// g.yon du rdo rje smra ba'o// byang du lha mo sgrol ma
211a7(rgyud): yang ta/ mdun du rdo rje las yin te// g.yasu rdo rje srung ba'o// rgyub tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste// ga
211a8(rgyud): kyi dang por nga rigs rtags// gnyis pa thams cad skyabs sbyin te// g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma yang // phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'o// sngags nor phreng yang 'chang ba'o// 
211b1(rgyud): 'khor gyi lha mo de dag kun// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yon pa'i tha ma bum pa 'chang // lhag ma gong ltar shes par bya// byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang // khro mo bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o// 
211b2(rgyud): dbus su rdo rje hUM byed de// sngon po u pa la yi mdog/ mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste// g.ya su rdo rje drag mo'o// rgyab tu rdo rje brjed pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje mthu chen mo// shar gyi 'khor lo'i
211b3(rgyud): cha rtsibs la// khro bo gshin rje gshed po nag/ mdun du rdo rje dbang zhal ma// g.yasu rdo rje khyab 'jug mo// rgyab tu rdo rje gzhon nu ma// g.yon du rdo rje bskul byed ma// 'khor lo rtsibs ni mnyam pa la/ 
211b4(rgyud): khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub ser// mdun du rdo rje gnag byed mo// g.yas/ su rdo rje ma chen mo// rgyab tu rdo rje zla ba mo// g.yon du rdo rje no/ na po ma// rtsibs gsum rdo rje gtsug tor gser// rdo rje khro mo
211b5(rgyud): khrag 'thung mo// rdo rje'i rlung 'dzin chen mo dang // rdo rje sdang byed mor bcas pa'o// nub kyi rtsibs la rta mgrin dmar// mdu na du rdo rje rmongs byed mo// g.yas su rdo rje zhi ba mo// g.yon durdo/ 
211b6(rgyud): rje tshol byed ma lnga pa'i rtsibs la de bzhin du// khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ldang // mdun du rdo rje gsor byed ma// g.yas su rdo rje gtum mo tshe// rgyab tu rdo rje ro langs sam// g.yon du rdo rje
211b7(rgyud): rengs byed ma// rtsibs drug 'khor lor bri be ni// rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal ldang sngo// mdun du rdo rje chu dbang mo// g.yas su dngos grub 'byung ma'o// rgyab tu rdo rje mtshan mo dog/ g.yon
211b8(rgyud): du rdo rje mkha' dbang phyug/ de ltar rdo rje khro bo khro mo rnams// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o// khro bo phyag gnyis mdara' gzhu bkang // g.yas na be con kha T+wAM dang // tho ba rdo rje rgyag
212a1(rgyud): dang ta'akhor lo gtun shing rdo rje rnams// rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang ba'o// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub zhags pa'o// kun kyang stag gi sham thabs can// khro mo rnams kyi
212a2(rgyud): phyag rgya ni// g.yas na gri gug cang te'u ste// g.yon na thong khrag kha tsA // zhing lpags dag gi chos gos te// gzig gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can// khro bo'i g.yon na sgeg pa'i tshogs// de rgyal
212a3(rgyud): cha yi snam bu la// phyogs rer lha mo bzhi bzhi dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bzhi// phyogs rar brgyad brgyad bkod pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhengs pa'i tshul// de bzhin bskor bzhin
212a4(rgyud): sems ma mchog/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dang / 8/ 'bebs ma rang rtags phyag rgya g.yas// gnyis pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma dang // gnyis
212a5(rgyud): pa dar gyi chos gos so// kun kyang sgeg nyams ldan par bri// de rgyab dkyil 'khor cha la ni// shar du brgya byin glang chen zhon// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// gnyis pa skyabs sbyin
212a6(rgyud): phyag rgya can// g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma ste// gnyis pa rang mdog phreng ba bri// de yi g.yon du tshangs pa ser// ngang pa'i khri la bzhugs pa la// g.yas kyi dang po nyi ma 'chang // me yi phyogasu nyi ma ste// 
212a7(rgyud): mdog dmar ra zhon me dpung 'dzin// lho yi phyogasu gshin rje sngo// thod dbyug bzung ba ma he zhon// bdan bral du ni srin po gnag/ rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhon// nub tu chu lha dkar po ni// klu yi khri la
212a8(rgyud): sbrul zhags bzung // de yi g.yon du sa bdag dkar// bum pa gzung ste rus sbal zhon// lha min phyogs su rlung lha ldang // ba dan gzung ste sha bzhon// byang du gnod sbyin mi la zhon// ljang nag phyag na
212b1(rgyud): gter sgom mo// byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni// rje gsum bzung ste khyu mchog zhon// sgo bzhir rgyal po chen po ba ni// phyogs kyi kha dog go cha can// pi wang ral gri zhags pa can// rin chen dbyug tho
212b2(rgyud): g.yas kyis 'chang // gnyis pa skyabs kyi phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa ma la bgrang phreng ni// phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// kun kyang sgeg nyams phyogs kyi mdog/ rim bzhin stag gzig dom
212b3(rgyud): seng ge'i// khri la bzhugs pa'i gzigs pa can// rang rang phyogs kyi sgo la ni// srung brtson shin tu 'grus pa'o// dkyil 'khor cha brgyad khor yug tu// bza' shing me tog spos shing dang // 
212b4(rgyud): mdzes pa'i shing tshogs tshal gseb tu// mdzes pa'i bya mo// gas dud 'gro dang // lha yi bu dang bu mo sogs// de ba zhin klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za grul bum bu mo'o// rol
212b5(rgyud): mo byed pa du ma bri// 'di ltar dad na la las ni// 'jig rten skye nga ba'i nang rol tu// bza' dang rgyu skar sum cu drug/ rin chen pad+ma la gnas bri// smin drug pad+ma dmar po 'chang // snar
212b6(rgyud): ma yis ni mgo ud pa la// nab so bad kar lag tri shul// rgyal ni bgrang phreng skag sbrul nag/ mchu ni pad ser gri mnyam gzhag/ me bzhi pad dkar dbo dbyug pa// nag pa pad+ma sa ri ras
212b7(rgyud): sa ga po ta lha mtshams bum// snron ni rdo rje snrubs dbyug ste// chu snod rib pa chu smad pang // byi zhun gser gyi 'khor lo ste// gro zhun chu sgyogs mon gru dang // mon gre shel sgong khrums stod kyis// 
212b8(rgyud): ral gri khrums smang ku mu da// nam grub dan ba skar gyis// shing le bra nye dbyug sran no// zla ba ku mu dkar po ste// nyi ma pad+ma dmar pa'o// mig dmar me yi phung po ste// gza' lag ud pal sngon po'o// 
213a1(rgyud): pur bus chos kyi glegs bam mo// pa ba sangs ni bgrang phreng gzung // spen pa lag na ral gri 'chang // sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i gzhong bu'o// nang gi grwa yi char gtogs pa// bkra shis
213a2(rgyud): lha mo brgyad yin te// rtag dga' ma dang rgyal ma shar// don grub ma dang mi 'pham lhor// nub tu bde ba bde dga' ma// myur grub ma dang gtan ma byang // rtse lnga rtse gsum rdo rje dang / 
213a3(rgyud): sngon po ser po rin chen dang // dkar dang dmar dang ud pal dang // ud pal sngo dang ku mu da// dang po phyag na rim bzhin 'chang // skyabs sbyin pad+ma bgrang phreng ni// lhag ma rnams kyi rim
213a4(rgyud): bzhin 'chang // de dag thams cad phyogs mdog go// rgyas pra'i spros pas skyon yang // lnga bcu brgyad dam sum cub dun// nyi shu dgu 'am nyi shu lnga// bco lnga dgu'am lnga 'am
213a5(rgyud): gcig/ yi ge phyag rgya gzugs brnyan tshogs// sprul pa'i sku yi cho 'phrul te// rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa yi// sems kyi byin rlabs nyid du 'gyur// bde gshegs sku dang / 
213a6(rgyud): po ti dang // phyag rgya sogs pa rab gnas bya// nyams sam dri mas gos pa ni// bkrus dang ba shig nas dag byed pa// rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis su// dal bsod nams dpag tu med/ 
213a7(rgyud): gzugs tshogs sngo bas sman 'gyur yang // de yis bsod nams mtha' yas thob// phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid de// de bzhin nyid de stong pa
213a8(rgyud): nyid dang byang chub na mkha'i mtshan nyid dang // mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu'o// sum cu gnyis dang brgyad cu ni// yi ge brda dang spros pa'i sku// longs sku bsod
213b1(rgyud): nams rgyu 'thun 'bras// kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid ldan// ngag dang ma dag skal ldan la// bde gshegs phrin las gzugs sku gnyis// tshogs gnyis la ni sku gsum byung // 
213b2(rgyud): rnam byang kun nyon mongs pas stong // lus ngag yid kyi spyod yul min// dmigs med na mkha'i khams rtog pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku'o// rtags chad med pa'i rten 'bral ni// / 
213b3(rgyud): skye 'gag med par thugs chud pas// yid kyi rnam shes 'jug lam gyis// bsam gtan gom pas shes par bya// dad pa'i lcags kyu shes rab can// lha klu 'bum phrag dkar po'i/ 
213b4(rgyud): sems dge ba// kun spong byang chub gter gyi rin chen nor// thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor los bsgyur ba 'byung // sems kyi dbus su ces phyir ngal spyod pas// dbang por byas
213b5(rgyud): rgyud kun khyad par du// pad+ma'i dra ba phyag stong gis rgyan par/ myur du sgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams// bsdus brtson dang byas ldan pas gces su byas// bla ma'i lung yod
213b6(rgyud): snying rje gang ldan pa// rgyal dang rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas// 'jig rten skyong tshogs dga' ba smos ci dgos// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
213b7(rgyud): pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga'o// / de nas dga' ldan gnas 'khrungs pa// bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa// rig pa gsum ldan lha yi
213b8(rgyud): bu tamadzes pa'i rtog ces mtshan gsol pa// spyan ras gzigs la cher dang nas// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas shing // 'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas// mgrin gcig tu
214a1(rgyud): ni 'di skad gsol// oM khams gsum kun gyi bla ma gtso// 'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// sa gsum ye shes 'od po che// bde bar gshegs la phyag
214a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ rig ldan bde ldan byin rlabs can// g.yung drang rtag pa dam chos gtso// kun rtog sel skyob phyag 'tshal lo// rtag par brtse ldan spyan ras
214a3(rgyud): gzigs// byang chub sems tshogs 'byung tshogs rgyal// bya ba byas nas bskal par gnas// pad 'chang tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// thugs
214a4(rgyud): rjes ye shes las byung ba'i// rig sngags phreng ba byin rlabasacan// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// sem/ nas can rnams la phan don phyir// phyag rgya phrin las ldan
214a5(rgyud): par gsungs// las kyi dri ma dang ldan zhing // nyon mongs pa dag rgyal gyis bcings nas// le lo ser sna'i 'dab rdzab can// khur dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams/ 
214a6(rgyud): myur du grol bar bya ba dang // thugs rje nyi ma bkram byas te// srid 'dab stug po bskam pa dang // myur du sangs rgyas 'grub bya'i phyir// lha dang gsang sngags blang ba dang // phrin las sbyor/ 
214a7(rgyud): ba ldan pa dang // brgyud pa rgyun gzhan med pa yi// sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung ba shad du gsol// rig sngags rjes gnang med pa ni// bsgrubs kyang 'bral med ngal ba ste// 'dren pa med pa'i shing
214a8(rgyud): rtani ta 'khor lo bzang yang gang du phyin// nyon mongs rtsa ba bcad pa'i phyir// rig sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs// bdag 'dzin gi tshe 'bigs pa'i mdung // sdug bsngal mcho ba skams nyi ma
214b1(rgyud): chen/ kun rtog rdul phung sreg pa'i me// shes rab me tog 'khrungs pa'i rlan// nang ngan kun sel sman mchog ste// bag tshogs sel ba'i sred med bu// bag chags bkrus pa'i chu rgyun te// lo
214b2(rgyud): spyod 'phel ba'i gter chen nyid// 'khor ba la rgal gru gzings te// nyes pa kun sel rlung dang mtshungs// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas chen gyis// srab 'jam
214b3(rgyud): ring ba'i ljags bkram nas// tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyis gsung // 'gro la thugs rje chen po yis// sngags 'byung brgyud pa'i rims 'byung ba'i// cho ga dam pa nyan brtson pa/ 
214b4(rgyud): shin tu legs so lha yi bu// nyams dga' dge ba'i sa phyog sa su// sa yi cha mnyam dkyil 'khor ltar// pad+ma'i ga ngan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni// tshen sna ma lus rnams kyi bri// 
214b5(rgyud): mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig pa'i lha mo khro bor ba cas// 'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i// sku 'am
214b6(rgyud): phyag rgya bkod pa dang // mchod pa'i tshogs kyang bkram par bya// mar me yon chab byug pos dri// zhal zas gtor ma sna tshogs dang // gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang na bza'
214b7(rgyud): lhab lhub dang // sil snyan me tog phreng du ma// yid 'ong mdzes pa'i tshig gis rgyan// slob ma gus pas bla ma la// yon phul brtson byas 'di skad gsol// sems can kun gyi sams
214b8(rgyud): kyi mnyen// dmus long lam log las 'dren pa// rab rib sel ba'i thub ma can// bdag la 'dren pa'i sgrol ma sogs// shes rab snying rje'i skye ba can// thos bsam sgom pa'i gru
215a1(rgyud): gzings can// las can sdug bsngal chu sgrol ba'i// thabs brtson mnyan pa khyod phyag 'tshal// byang chub lam mthong dang g.yas thugs// 'gro rnams thar lam rten gzigs
215a2(rgyud): bad ta dge brtson dge la bskul ba'o// dag bcu med pa dag la stsol// dam tshig sdom gnas ngang tshul bzang // bag yod dbyangs mkhas ltung ba med// chos don gnyer ba'i don sgrub bo// 
215a3(rgyud): skyabs dang sdom gnas bdag la stsol// dpa' brtan zhi dul spyad pa yi// dga' slang slob dpon 'di skad brjod// oM gti mug rnam dge bde gshegs thugs// rnam par snang mdzad skyabs
215a4(rgyud): su mchi// zhe sdang rnam dag rdo rje thugs// mi bskyod pa la skyabs su mchi// ser sna rnam dag longs spyod gter// rin che na mdangs ldan skyabasu mchi// 'dod chags rnam dag pad+ma'i
215a5(rgyud): gsung // 'od dpag med la skyabs su mchi// phrag dog rnam ngag phrin las rgyal// don yod rdo rje skyabasu mchi// AHgnas med mkha' dang mnyam spyod pa// chos dbyings chos
215a6(rgyud): la skyabasu mchi// skye med skye snang ltar sgrub chos// 'phags lam brgyad la skyabasu mchi// don gcig tshogs lam bcu gnyis grangs// gsung rab yan lag skyabs su mchi// rgyu 'bras snang ba'i so
215a7(rgyud): ser rtogs// nyan thos dge 'dun skyabasu mchi// gcig gam tshogs spyod rdzu 'phrul che// rang rgyal dge 'dun skyabs su mchi// snying rje shes rab byang chub 'brel// sems chen tshogs la skyabs su mchi// 
215a8(rgyud): gsod dang rku brdzun 'khrig spyod dang // tshig rtsub phra ma dag 'khyal dang // brnab sems gnod sems log lta spyod// thar pa'i srog gcod bcu pa spongs// chang mthung til mar 'chir las dang / 
215b1(rgyud): mgar dang rgya skyegs rtswa shing gcod// srog chags tshogs dang mgo zlum 'tshong // mtho ris lus kyi gags chen spong // rtag dang phyag rgya 'gra 'bag dang // rten dang dge 'dun rtags yi ge/ 'grang phreng
215b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i yo byad sogs// 'gom dang ba shig pa gtan du spong // mchod pa snying dang sgog pa dang // 'bags dang lhag mar gyur pa dang // sha dang dman pa'i lag gi zas// srog chags yod
215b3(rgyud): pa'i chu rnams spongs// de nas bzung ste ji srid pa// byang chub snying por thug bar du// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims sogs// 
215b4(rgyud): nam du mi dor brtan por gzung // lha dang slob dpon yid byed cing // rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya gzung // 'gro la zang zing mi 'jigs skyabs// chos kyi sbyin pa ci 'byor su la// theg gsum
215b5(rgyud): tha dad chos tshul rnams// mi 'gal sbyor bas rgyun tu spyad/ lus ngag yid dang longs spyod bcas// ser sna med pas mchod 'os mchod// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa'i// rig
215b6(rgyud): 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// des spyod dam tshig dam pa rnams// sdom tshul brtan po gzung bar bya// 'gro rnams kun la snying brtse dang // yi dgas rnams la gtor ma sbyin// dzam+b+ha la ni chu yis mchod// 
215b7(rgyud): yi dgas dag kyang chus gnyis bya// de rjes slob ma rab dga' nas// ci 'byor lha dang bla ma mchod// dga' chen las sbyor slob dpon dgongs// snying brtse bdag la gzigs nas kyang // lha dang sngags
215b8(rgyud): dang byin rlabs thabs// de bdag brtse phyir stsal du gsol// rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs bzhugs pa'i// nyams dga' thar pa'i grong khyer che// yid bzhin longs spyod char du 'bar// khang chen
216a1(rgyud): der ni bdag 'jug 'tshal// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// zab mo'i sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// spros bral dmigs su med pa'i don// lam chen bdag la stsal du gsol/ 
216a2(rgyud): denas slob dpon sngags rig pa// de nyid bcu sbyar mkhas pa pos// g.yon pa chos gos rtse gzung ste// lag pa g.yas chos phyag rgya can// gsang bstod 'dzum pa'i 'od mdangs rgyas// dang ldan pa ni
216a3(rgyud): 'di skad brjod// oM bu shog theg pa chen po yi// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin phyir// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams// khyod la nges par bstan par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// dus
216a4(rgyud): gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang sngags rab sgom dpas// mtshungs med pa yi ye shes rnams// shAkya sa dang gi dpa' bos kyang // gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med kyis
216a5(rgyud): bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dpung chen dag kyang 'dis pa tsam mo// 'jig rten rjes 'dul rdzogs bya'i phyir// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de phyir kun thob bya ba'i phyir// 
216a6(rgyud): bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shog/ sngags dang rdzas kyi srung ba dang // lha yi rten mig de la mchod// u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag/ rgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 
216a7(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo // sngags kyi spyod tshul 'byung ba ni// de bas kyang ni ches dkon te// ngang gi tshul min sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// bskal pa du mar bsags pa'i sdig/ gang
216a8(rgyud): la sdig khur ci yod pa// lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang // byin rlabs tsam gyis byang gyur nas// blo gros dri ma med pa yis// spyod tshul rlabs pa zhugs nas lha// ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyun bcad nas/ 
216b1(rgyud): mtshan ldan su ni gzhan dor spyod // bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mtshungs med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams ni// gang du skyes kyang gzung ba'i phyir// na/ 
216b2(rgyud): khyed rnams theg chen rigs// sha stag tu ni sbyangs te// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba// dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di// gang du rgyas par khrid nas kyang // bde bar gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ 
216b3(rgyud): de bas spro la brtson par gyis// slob ma ku sha dge ba yis// stan la nyal nas rmi lam dri// gsang dang sbyang ba byas nas kyang // chus bkrus 'di rnams klag pa dang // bkra shis du ma klag byas te/ 
216b4(rgyud): gdong pa dar gyis bcings nas kyang // 'bras kyi me tog phreng dab ni// lha yi dkyil 'khor dbus su dor// slar blangs mgo la bcings bya ste// pad+ma ldan rigs mtshan gyis rgyan/ 
216b5(rgyud): mig phye de la lha rnams dang // byang chub phyogs chos mtshan ma yi// yon tan ye shes stobs mnga' ba// mchod rten lha tshogs bcas pa gdan// yid ches dang ba mngon byas la/ 
216b6(rgyud): ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa bya// de nas dag pa'i sras de la// mar me la ni mar me ltar// 'dod pa'i lha ni stsal bar bya// brjod pa dang bcas 'brel pa yis// rtsa ba'i snying po nye snying tshogs// sngags
216b7(rgyud): kyang gsal bar sbyin par bya// zhi ba shel gyi phreng ba ste// rgyas pa la ni a ru ra// dbang la lung thang dmar po shis// drag pora'am ru rag sha/ bod ces ni las kun byed// sngags bcad
216b8(rgyud): btsal nas mgo la bcing // hUM dang bcas pa'i rdo rje yang // lag pa g.yas su bzhag par bya// stod g.yogs kr-iSh+Na sa ri ste// smad g.yogs kha dog sngon po'o// dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste// zhal zas
217a1(rgyud): snod ni pad+ma rgyan// sems can kun don spyod pa'i rdzas// thub pas bkra shis bzhed pa'i rtags// gdugs nya bum pa dpa' be'u dang // rgyal mtshan 'khor lo pad+ma su la// nad sel
217a2(rgyud): bde byed 'tshe ba'i phyir// 'dod yon phyogs rigs grub pa'i rdzas// gi wang ngur ba li khri zho// bil ba sbrang rtsi a ru ra// ka ra bi ra'i 'bras bu rnams// hrIHzhes dag pas stsal bar bya// gur gum ga pur
217a3(rgyud): gla rtsi dang // ba yi 'o mas sbyar byas nas// tshig 'di lce la bzhag par bya// oM yan gar nges pa'i tshig rig dang // ming gi rnam grangs chos rig dang // dri ba lan ldon spobs pa rig/ phyi nang mtshan
217a4(rgyud): nyid don rig shog/ badz+ra d+harma pra be sha/ oM bcas brjod cing lho la ni// lan gsum rdo rje gzhag par bya// hrIHyi ge dmar po me 'bar bsam// gang la goms pa de 'byung zhing
217a5(rgyud): goms pa gzhan gyi dbang med na// rtog pa'i 'byung ba chad pa'i phyi ra// kun rtog phyag rgya la dmigs bshad// dmigs pa'i rten gyi sngags la yang // byin rlabs tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur
217a6(rgyud): sa la dbang bskur thob 'dod pas// phyag na 'khor lo 'chang la dmigs// ting 'dzin brtan la rdo rje ste// dpa' thob 'dod pas rin chen dmigs// gzugs bzang 'dod pas pad+ma ste// spobs pa 'dod
217a7(rgyud): pas ral gri'o// gzhan don 'dod pas rgya gram ste// rdo rje dkar pos sems gsal 'gyur// shes rab 'dod pas glegs bam mo// khang bzang gis ni mo'i rgyal po// thub gzugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jam
217a8(rgyud): thal sbyar bas ni 'gro bas bkur// 'khar bsil byams dang snying rje skye// lcags kyu 'jig rten skyong bas srung // rin chen ze'u 'brus lce bder 'gyur// dril bus skad snyan byed par 'gyur// bgrang phreng
217b1(rgyud): gis ni lung bstan 'thob// khri rkang gis ni nye dbang 'gyur// lha sogs gdug pa dung yin te// mdung rtse gsum pas g.yul las rgyal// pad+ma dmar pos lha ru ste// ril ba spyi blugs tshang ris skye// sprin
217b2(rgyud): mdog lnga ni drang srong skye// me long gis ni lha zhal mthong // pad+ma ra gas ye shes skye// pad+ma sngon pos dag pa'i zhing // pad+ma dkar pos dge tshegs 'phel// ri bos bu dang bu mo 'phel// dgra stas bdud
217b3(rgyud): kyi bar chod sel// 'khor dang sems 'thun 'bring g+ha ras// phub kyis dgra dang gcan zan 'joms// rnga yab dkar pos sdig pa 'phyag/ me tog snyems nad sel byed// rin chen mdangs ni yid 'ong gregs/ 
217b4(rgyud): gzhus ni nor dang go 'phangs rnyed// chu shel dug dang tsha rig sel // mi 'jigs spyan gyis 'jigs skrag 'joms// dgra la rdo rje gtun shing ste// rdo rje nag mo bdud 'dul 'gyur// rin
217b5(rgyud): chen ral gris rig sngags bzlog/ lto ba na las lhung bzed de/ rims nad sel byed zhags pa'o// 'bru 'dod pas ni 'bru 'i snya ma// nor dbyig 'dod pas rin chen phug/ yang na lung
217b6(rgyud): bstan 'dod pas na// mgo la sangs rgyas dmigs par bya// mngon par shes pa lnga 'dod na// sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya// de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma'i
217b7(rgyud): zhal ta sa yi snying po la gzigs nas// sa yi go rims 'di gsungs so// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni// gsang sngags thams cad sa gsum ste// gsang sngags sa dang sngags sbyar sa// rigs 'chang
217b8(rgyud): sa dang rigs gsalas// rigs mchogs dang rig chenas// phyag rgya chen po ros rnams so// gtsug tor chen po'i sangs rgyas sa// gnas skabs drug tu rgyal bas gsungs// kun tu 'od dang ngang
218a1(rgyud): pa'i spya/ yi ge 'kho la tshogs chenas// rdo chang ye shes bla ma'is// rdzogs sangs bde ba chen po'os// sa ma snying pos gsol pa// mgon po 'angags pa zugs rje'i spyan ras/ 
218a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug/ byin rlabs lcags kyu lta bus 'khor ba'i brtson ra nas// klu phyugs 'bum phrag drang ltar dge ba kun slong gis// byang chub rin chen sa la 'jog mdzad ngo mtshar che// 'phag
218a3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las byin rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// rab dga'i tshul du 'khrus
218a4(rgyud): pa'i lha// ting 'dzin yangs pa zhes bya ba// rtogs pa rgya che za dpa zhig/ 'khor dang bcas pa bzhes byas te// me tog ri dan chen rigs byung ba// ston pa'i phyogs su chur bzhin pag/ 
218a5(rgyud): mkha' la gdugs kyi bla re bkang // 'khor dang bcas pa na phrin gcig tu// bsang bstod nas ni chog 'di gsol// gan rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i// rdo rje rig
218a6(rgyud): mchog grub pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung phyir// bdag dang sems can kun tu yang // dngos grub 'byung rim bshad du gsol// la la g.yeng bar gyur pa yis// bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod
218a7(rgyud): kyi sngags rgyud brdibs pa 'chang byed 'byung // snyan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar skye// gdams ngag med pas 'gro ba bslus// dngos grub med pas bstan pa zhig/ sred pas lan cig sogs
218a8(rgyud): par 'gyur// gnyis pa dmyal tshogs ngan 'gror 'gro// la la las kyi skye mched sgo// dbang po rten khang dmar myur la// gdam ngag rgyud tshul yod mod kyi// chos tshul bzhin du spyod
218b1(rgyud): byed cing // gang la dbang du gzung ba yi// bu 'dra bas kyang brnyas gyur nas// sdang ba 'phel nas rtsod par 'gyur// des kyang gnyis ka dmyal sogs 'gro/ la la thos rlung shes rab dam na/ 
218b2(rgyud): rmongs pa gzhan rkyen nga rgyal can// bstan pa dang ni 'chad byed la// skyon smod smra bas dmyal sogs 'gro// la la mi dge'i bshes gnyen gyis// log lam 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin can// yang dag
218b3(rgyud): lam smod brtson pa dor// log sgrub can de dmyal bar 'gro/ la la bsam med sngags brjod med// mar me bdug spos gtor ma sogs// 'byung pos brlabs te bdag nyid dang // 'khor bcas tshe
218b4(rgyud): thung longs spyod 'grib// la la 'dod sred gtum rdeb che// ma khas gzhan dag la phra dog gis// spro ba kun tshul 'chos cho sra la smod// rang nyid lta ngan sgrub la rtsod// ther zug blo yi mun
218b5(rgyud): pa can// 'byung po drag po'i rigs su skye// la la ser sna rab 'jug pas// lha dang bla ma'i tshig gis bstod// zas dang / longs spyod rgyan gos dang // me tog bdug spos gtor ma
218b6(rgyud): sogs// nyung ngur mug tshul rgyun stsol na// zas skom dag gi gdungs pa yi// yi dgas dman pa'i rigasu ni// yang nas yang du skye bar ngos// de phyir de dag spangs nas ni// ya rabs bsam pa bzang ldan pas/ 
218b7(rgyud): tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis// gtan la phab don ma 'khrul par// brjod cing yid la byed pa dang // the tsom med par brtson byed pas// 'gro tshogs sgrol byed thabs thob nas// rang don 'ab
218b8(rgyud): zhig smos ci dgos// de nas lag na rdo rje gtso// ye shes mtha' yas mnga' ba'i skus// 'gro la snying rtser rab gzigs nas// gsang ba'i skad kyis 'di skad gsungs// nga la mnyan par brtson byed pa// 
219a1(rgyud): shin tu legs lnga yi bu// lha dang dngos grub 'brung 'brel ba'i// ting 'dzin yi bshad par bya// khyod nyid rtse gcig yid kyis ni// legs par nyon la yid la zung // shin tu/ 
219a2(rgyud): zab cing rgya che ba'i// dam chos thob pa shin tu dka'// rgyun chad med pa'i thugs rje can// spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po gtso// rang gi sems la bskyed par bya// shin tu gsal ni/ 
219a3(rgyud): dngos grub 'gyur// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa yi ge'i byang chub sems// gsum pa sgro btags ming tshogs sems// bzhi pa gzugs brnyan phyog rgya'i sems// lnga pa
219a4(rgyud): byin rlabs rgyas 'debs sems// sgra dang brag cha'i tshul la dbyung bar// gtso bo'i 'khor gyi khyad par gsol// dbu ngas su yi ge o la ste// shar du hUM sne lho run// nub tu hrIHyig/ 
219a5(rgyud): byang du hA// rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed// lha ni gang du 'pho 'gyur bas// dkyil 'khor de yi rigs 'byung / yin// rigs kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyis// rig pa rigs kyi rgyas
219a6(rgyud): 'debs shing // rigs kyi lha tshogs pho mo rnams// nyams dga' dben pa'i tshul gyis su// phan tshun du ni bltas nas gnas// ldem bag na bza' 'phyang 'phrul dang // 'phur lding sil
219a7(rgyud): snyan rin chen tshogs// du ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan bya ste// la la ldem bzhengs bgying dang bcas// la la rdo rje skyil krung bcas// la la pad+ma'i skyil krung ste// la la sems dpa'i skyil krung can// 
219a8(rgyud): lal khro thabs brkyang bskum can// la la zhal phyag zhabs kyang mang // la la zhabs ni gnyis yin te// la la zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis// la la bang sdong badra can// la la baid+ma mi
219b1(rgyud): 'jigs phyag/ guHdebu pa 'khar bsil dang // rnga yab legs skyabs sbyin phyag/ rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang // khar rnga shing rnga rnga rnga dung // zangs lcags rdo dang u pa'i dzi// ring zlum rnyed/ 
219b2(rgyud): nyeg leb phyal che// chung phra spo yangs dog pa dang // ral gri chu gri gri rings dang // gri leb gri zlum gri kyog dang // sta zur sta leb phyal sta dang // snga chung gzhogs ste 'bigs sta dang // zlum ste
219b3(rgyud): phreng ste bzhar sta dang // mdung dang rtse gsum 'phen mdung dang // 'khor lo kha T+wAM gtun shing skyogs// snyi ma tig bu me tog dang // sdong bu lo 'dab yal ga dang // ba dan pad gdugs rgyal
219b4(rgyud): mtshan spungs// rgya gram pad+ma rin chen sgrom// 'khor lo glegs pa ma u dpal go// de la sogs te mchog mtha' yas// phyag rgya stong snyed tshangs pa 'am// brgya rtsa brgyad dam bzhi
219b5(rgyud): bcu drug/ nyi shu gnyis sam bcu gnyis drug/ bzhi 'am/ gnyis sogs mos pas 'byung // phyag rgya bcings ldan phyag rgya ste// des ni lha la rgyas 'debs byed// goms pa'i
219b6(rgyud): stobs kyis phyag rgya che// seng ge'i sgra ni seng ge zhon// rgyal po rol pa'i stabs tshul can// rtse gsum sbrul dang mi 'jigs phyag/ pad+ma sdong bcas ral gri 'bar// dpa' bo'i lcags kyu thong/ 
219b7(rgyud): pa ni/ ta nang pa bdun gyi cha gnas pa// gtum po drag po 'od ldan ma// g.yon du klu yi dbang phyug mo// pad+ma dang ni zla ba'i steng // phyogs mdog sems dpa'i skyil krung can// yid bzhin nor bu rtu la bcibs
219b8(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug 'khor lo dang // rdo rje pad+ma rin chen phyag/ skyabs gsol mchog sbyin phyag rgya can// 'khor ni sems dpa'i skyil krung ste// mdog bzang sgeg pa'i lha mo ni// yid myur rin
220a1(rgyud): chen bzang mo dang // bang rgyal mo dang rten mo// rin chen pad+ma zla nyi la// 'khor lo grogs kyi tshul du'o// pad+mo byung gnas rma byan no// zhal cig phyag pa ni ldem pag can// ngadA skyabs
220a2(rgyud): sbyin lcags kyu dang // ril ba spyi blug phyag na 'chang // sgeg mo phreng ma glu gar ma// pad zla sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo // mi bskyod pa ni mkha' lding bcibs// ral gri pad+ma mnga' gzhu dang // skyabs
220a3(rgyud): sbyin gang ba'i bum pa thogs// bzang 'dzin ma dang rnam sbyangs ma// sa srung ma dang rab brtan mo// de dag gong gi cha byad mtshungs// don yod zhags pa klu stengs bzhugs// rin po che dang zhags pa
220a4(rgyud): dang ta skyabs sbyin lcags kyu 'chang ba'o// seng ge mo dang glang po mra// rta gdong khyu mchog gdong ldan ma// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la'o// ha la ha la rus sbal stengs// rdo rje dril bu skyabs sbyin
220a5(rgyud): dang / chos kyi za ma tog 'chang ba'o// nyi 'od ma dang zla 'od ma// chu dbang mo dang nor phreng mo// dge ba'i mdangs dang / ldan pa'o// mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung che// chu srin steng du rol pa'i
220a6(rgyud): tshul / taDa ma ru dang bgrang phreng dang // mi 'jigs phyag dang lcags sgrog go/ lu gu rgyud ma 'khor lo ma// gsang ba mo dang ril bsrel mo// glang sor rdo rje chos dbang phyug/ chos kyi 'khor lo chos
220a7(rgyud): 'chang rgya// skyabs sbyin pad+ma po tir bcas// dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma// sil snyan ma rnams pad zla ra ni// phyed krung ldem bag tshul du'o// rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor ni// ha ri ha ri ha ri
220a8(rgyud): zhon/ zhal gsum phyag brgyad pa la// 'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang // pad dkar bgrang phreng skyabs sbyin dang // bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa 'chang // mkha' lding gdong ma shA ri'i gdong // 
220b1(rgyud): nyizhal zla zhal lha mo'o// mgrin sngo dga' bo nye dga' ste// zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma dang // po ti skyabs sbyin bgrang phreng phyag/ seng ge'i gdong mo klu zhal mo// dga' byed mo dang srog byed mo// pad zlar
220b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo // dbus su mgon po gdong bcu gcig/ gsang 'dzin mo dang 'dzin pa mo// sngags srung ba dang grub bsrungs ma// gong ltar cha byang phyogs mdog go// phyogs bzhi 'khor log
220b3(rgyud): chal ni// gtso bo sems dpa' bzhi dang bcas// shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni// thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyug/ rdo rje phyag rgya gter sgom can// kun kyang pad+ma zla ba la'o// lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug
220b4(rgyud): ste// grub chen dbang phyug dang phag zhal// grub pa'i rnal 'byoran dbang drug dang // glu 'dzin dbang phyug ces bya'o// nub tu pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni// skyes bu seng ge'i zhal dang ni// pad+ma'i
220b5(rgyud): phyag dang sbrul nag phyag/ rtse bran rgyas 'dzin zhes bya'o// byang du dam tshig dbang phyug dang // 'khor lo 'chang dang stag lpags 'chang // kun grub dbang phyug sgra dung 'phel// phyogs
220b6(rgyud): dang phyogs kyi mdog can no// 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang // rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po// kun tu grags pa'i lha chen rnams// stan la dga' ba dgod par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das don du
220b7(rgyud): rigs bzang skye ba bzhes dgongs pa// bskal pa bzang po 'di 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stong yang dgod par bya// de ltar rgyas par spros pa ni// lha rnams bgrang ni rgya che bar// tshig stong nyis
220b8(rgyud): brgya bzhi bcu bdun// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha// mgon po gdong bcu gcig pa yi// lha grangs dkyil 'khor bkod pa'o// spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu// 'jig rten dbang
221a1(rgyud): / ni dkyil 'khor lnga// rig pa'i lha mo dkyil 'khor lnga// rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun// dkyil 'khor de dag re re la// sems kyi dkyil 'khor lha mang ste// rang bzhin gyis
221a2(rgyud): ni nyi shu lnga// rgyu 'bras tshul du rnam pa dag/ ye shes tshal lnga yin te// chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal// gang gang mos pa de dang de'i// dkyil 'khor rnam par spro ba 'am// gcig tu mos
221a3(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas// khams gsum rgyal por longs spyod che// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// gtsang sbra che zhing dang sems can// rtse gcig sgrub la
221a4(rgyud): nan tan stsol// blo bzang 'gro la 'jug cing spyod// ngag snyan dang dgis khro ba med// g.yo rgyu 'dod brkam g.yeng ba med// lus dngag dal zhing thos pa mang // nga rgyal ser sna chags pa med// gtong
221a5(rgyud): phod snying rje drag ldan pas// spyan ras gzigs la gang dmigs na sa// de yi snying po rtsa sngags la// bar chod med pas rab brjod nas// gzhan la phan phyir smon lam brjod// spyan ras
221a6(rgyud): gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang tshe// khro bo chen po rdzu 'phrul gyis// de dag myur du sel byed shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang la nad rims gang
221a7(rgyud): byung tshe// gso sbyong sman dang sman par ni// bdag nyid myur nas myur sel shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// mu ge'i nang du 'byung 'gyur tshe// phyogs gcig nas ni rnam g.yos nas
221a8(rgyud): zas skom rgyun chad med par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang du 'khrug pa che 'byung tshe// rang dbang gis ni sems gyur nas// bde bas phan tshun sdum par shog/ spyan ras
221b1(rgyud): gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gcig la gcig za dang // zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe// de dag sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// 
221b2(rgyud): yi dgas zas skom gdungs pa dang // log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs tshe// nad bral bdud rtsi kun snang shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang thabs mkhra
221b3(rgyud): bas tata shes rab gru dang ldan nas kyang // thabs kyi sdug bsngal grol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims zhags ldan lam la rtag/ mya ngan 'das pa'i
221b4(rgyud): ri bo 'dzeg/ 'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jug shog/ spyan ras gzi dgas mgon phyag 'tshalo// ngan song gnas rnams mthong nas kyang / der phyin de rnams zad pa yi// gnyen po sa
221b5(rgyud): sar 'byung bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// dmyal rnams tsha grang bcad gtubs tshe// go cha/ che dang bsil grib dang // drod kyi 'od du gyur par shog/ rig
221b6(rgyud): sngags yang yang brjod pa yis// yang dag lam nyid rtog par shog/ kun 'byung sa bon rul nas ni// sdug bsngal phung po skam par shog/ mgon po mya ngan 'das thob nas// 'jig rten phyogs
221b7(rgyud): bcur rab grags 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bsnyen pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas// dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir// sgrub pa la ni brtson par bya// zla ba dkar po'i tshes gcig
221b8(rgyud): nasatata khrus byas gas gsar gyon byas nas// sku gzugs bzang po'i mdun 'dug nas// bsnyung bar gnas nas nyin gcig la// dus gsum sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad// brjod cing ci 'byor mchod par bya/ 
222a1(rgyud): tshes brgyad tho rangs dus nas ni// dben par gdan khri bzang po la// sku gzugs nub tu gzigs nas bzhag/ bza' ltung mngar bas sbags par mchod// a ga ru dang
222a2(rgyud): du ru ka/ bdug pa rgyun tu bsreg par bya// 'bru dkar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing // zhag gsum bzlas pa ci nus bya// de nas zhag gsum bar du bdag/ 'o ma zho dang 'bras can 'tshal// lha la mchod pa
222a3(rgyud): cher bskyed nas// byang chub shing drung stong rtsa brgyad// du ru ka yi mar du spang // dum bur re re sngags raM dang // byang chub sems dpa'i drung du sreg/ sa yang g.yo zhing sku yang g.yo// steng zhal nas ni
222a4(rgyud): snyan pa'i sgra// legaso legs rigs kyi bu// khyod ni nan tan brtson 'grus can// 'dod sman don gnyer gang yin pa// mkha' la 'phur ram rkang mgyogs sam// drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la// bdag dang
222a5(rgyud): skal mnyam 'dod na yang // de ring nyid du sprul bar bgyi// bco lnga// 'i tshes la sku gzugs te// bde gshegs ring bsrel lo/ da pa yi// mchod rten nang ngam drung du bzhugs// gso sbyong
222a6(rgyud): blangs nas bsnyung bar yis// skya snar me tog brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags re brjod pas sku la brdeg/ de tshe mdun zhal rtsa ba nas// 'brug sgra chen po lta bu 'byung // sa chen rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur// de tshe bdag
222a7(rgyud): nyid mi skrag par// sngags bsgrub rje su dran pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang drug/ thugs rje tshe dang ldan pa la// bdag nyid gus pas phyag 'argya
222a8(rgyud): bdag ni sems can thams ca kyi// mi gan grubs riganas gyur nas cang // 'gro ba kun gyi 'dod rnams// tshul bzhin du na gang bar shig/ de ci 'ad ba stsol ba la// lha klu tshogs kyi pa tshang
222b1(rgyud): med ta sngags kyi 'dod don kur grub yin// bsod nams rdzogs byed smon lam mo// phyag 'tshal brten la bskor ba dang // mchod rten rtsig cing dkyil 'khor ni// rnal 'byor yan lag las ldan pa/ 
222b2(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir// rgyun chad med par brtson pa na// dge byed smon lam rgyas pa ni// de dag myur du 'byung bar 'gyur// de phyir smon lam mchog tu bshad// gang la dge spyong g.yel ba
222b3(rgyud): yis// le lo can ni bdud gzung nas// gya chom smra zhing chos la smad// bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur// daphyir sman rigs gdol pa can// log spyod can ni ring du song // ser sna le lo
222b4(rgyud): nga rgyal can// bag med gi yeng dang bcas pa ni// bdud kyi 'chi/ lam log lam pa/ zhugs dang sbar la btang bar bya// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi
222b5(rgyud): rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs/ sngags brjod tsam gyis gsal bar bshad// nad gdon
222b6(rgyud): gang dang gang la yang // sngags pas drag tu gsal btab la// rang gi rtse gcig sems kyis bzla// dang po snying rjer bcas pa yi// sngags kyis nad dang gdon las grol// de tshe mchod la
222b7(rgyud): brtson par bya// spro nad nyin re ldang ba dang // nyin gnyis pa 'am nyin gsum pa 'am// nyin bzhi nyin bdun ldang ba'i rims// 'byung po mkha' 'gro sha za 'am// smyo byed brjed byed lus srul
222b8(rgyud): potota 'dre gdon drag pos bgyis modado kyang // brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur// yang na srang bu kha dog lnga// mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdung ldan mgul lam dpung par gdags
223a1(rgyud): kha na ma tho bsags pa yi// sgrib kun zhi zhing byang gyur na// bgegs sogs nang lta smos ci dgos// bde rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab bo// spangs dang 'bras kyi phreng ba
223a2(rgyud): dang ta shu ba po la mig rma 'dze dang // me dpal lhog pa g.yan la sogs// ma rungs pa yi nad rnams dang // ral gri mda' mdung la sogs pas// myos sam de yis nyen pa dang // sbrul
223a3(rgyud): dang sdig pa rtsangs pa dang // bung ba mchu rnon la sogs pa'i// gdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang // brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod// yang nas ser 'jim pas byug/ de yi nad las grol bar
223a4(rgyud): nges tate bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi// gzhogs ga cig phyogasu nad langs sam// rna ba 'on nam sna sums na/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa 'am// 'bru mar zho dang ru rta dang // lan
223a5(rgyud): bdun brjod nas sku byug dang // zos shing rna ba sngar thugs nas// sos par 'gyur bar the tsom med// de nas byang chubasems dpa' che// nyi 'od kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang / 
223a6(rgyud): srung dang lam 'gro bskyab pa'i phyir// byin rlabs ldan pa'i chog 'di gsungs// na mo bud+d+ha ya gu ra be/ na mo d+harmA ya tA yi ne/ na maHsaM g+hA ya ma hA te/ ti b+h+yo ba swA hA na ma/ nyin mtshan dus su 'di
223a7(rgyud): brjod pas// sdig kun byang zhing nang rnams zhi// lam du bgegs bdud mi phrad cing // rtag tu sems dga' dam pa 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyang // srung ba'i don du sngags 'di
223a8(rgyud): gsungs// sha ma ti he ru sha ho// A dz+nyA pa te/ su ru te/ shaM ki Te/ ba ri ma b+ha te/ su ru te/ kA la Ta te khi ma te swA hA// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// bdun bzlas mdung pa nyi shu gcig/ na sar ba taH/ 
223b1(rgyud): nad sel 'gyur// gzhan yang yon tan grangs med thob// sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la// bdun bzlas rma khar btab naso so// seng ldang stag gzigs dom dred kyi// lpags la nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags// 
223b2(rgyud): brjod nas gra khrims can la bsgom// de mngag tu rim se la 'gyur// blo bur nad kyis nyen pa la// lan bdun brjod pa'i gri gul bdag/ sdong ces lung kar man chu kar// sbyar nas nyi
223b3(rgyud): gcig brjod// nad pa'i mal bzhag nas bdugs na// 'byung po 'bros te nang las grol// til mar nang du ru rta bcos// byugs pas gzhogs nang rna nang dang // zhagum myur du sel bar byed// yang na rtsi mar
223b4(rgyud): nyid la bya// til mar lte bar bskus pa yis// myur du bu'o/ ngan 'gyur bar nges// khyim rtsa sha mazin par nges// du rug dang sgra dpong sbyar// snying nang drag pa sel bar 'gyur// ba rog mo yi
223b5(rgyud): dron gyis// rma khar brnyan na mes tshigasoso// srin bu ri/ khu snying la za// rta dkar gcin la khyod gang 'thung // des ni sr-i ga chags bud par 'gyur// 'bras la rams kyi lo ma yis// 
223b6(rgyud): khu bskol bas byugs par bya// bong bu'i rtug pa sar pa btsir// nyal kar mig tu blug naso so// mtshan mo srang la kud dkar ro// de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar/ 
223b7(rgyud): dpung par btags pas g.yul las rgyal// phug ron ril ma nyi shu brgyad// bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang // shing sgrog la sogs grol bar nges// thal ba 'am byed ma la ni sngags// 
223b8(rgyud): stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol// gdon dang yams nad bzlog pa la// dri bzangs chu la bzlas nas bkru/ bud med bu 'dod don du ni// stong bzlas pa mar btung bar bya// byi ba sprul dang ru sbal
224a1(rgyud): sha phye ma gtor na phyugs rnams rengs// mar ga ni dang shu dag dang // skra dang gos snyos sbrang rtsi sbyar// sngags 'di yis ni shes rab 'phel// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam
224a2(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ khA hi khA hi/ ba li te swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kAru
224a3(rgyud): Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad+me pu/ ma hA pad+mi pu/ pad+ma li tsa ni pu/ a mo g+ha be te/ na mo a do ta ku tA yai/ sa ra sa ri/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ i maM ma kI ro ga na sha ya swA hA// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas
224a4(rgyud): kyang ti/ thal bas mig ni phyi rol skus// mig nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun// bsdu dgas bdun bzlas pas rna ba yi// nad rnams thams cad 'joms
224a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// gur gum kar cha mnyam pas// sna yi nad ni sel par byed// a ru ra yi phyi ma dang // sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pa ni// sau yi nad dang lce yi nang // thams cad 'joms par she
224a6(rgyud): par bya// oM hUM shrI hUM shu k+She phu/ nyi shu rtsa gcig chu la bzla// 'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa sel// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yas ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ 
224a7(rgyud): ya tad+ya thA/ oM rit+ne shai/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ a su ra man+ta ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hu ru hu ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ha na ha na/ sarba dzA ren+d+ra ka/ ban d+he na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba gre ha swA hA// sngags 'di mtshal gyis/ 
224a8(rgyud): bris nas kyang // mgul du btags na nad rnams sel// gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis// las rnams de dang de la sbyar// sbrang bu srin bu sbrul lhog pa// g.yan pa shu ba skye nad la// sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gi/ 
224b1(rgyud): drug/ gang zhig btson du zhugs pa la// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa la// tsan dan sde gu snying kar byug/ gang gi mig nad sel ba la// shing mngar chu'am spos chu'am// la la sha yi khu yis bya// rna ba
224b2(rgyud): ni til mar gyis// gzhan gyi yi ge gsal ba dang // 'thab mo shags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe// bum pa chu yis gdong pa bkru// gang yang byis pa srung ba ni// seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi pa// pad+mag
224b3(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug dang // don yod zhags pa'i sngags rings dag/ stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas btags na// tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod// ba lang rwa dang po so 'cha'// shing kun dang sbrul lpags pa dang / 
224b4(rgyud): ras bal sa bon drug po dang // de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis / nas kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i sgra// byi la'i rtug pa bra ha ti/ 8/ shug pa bya rog sgo nga dang // ba lang rmig pa na le sham// da ru
224b5(rgyud): ra dang lhan cig sbyar// de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis// lpags rnams sel phyir ru tra yis// dud pa bcu drug ces khya ba'i// pu shel rtse dang ba bla dang // btsan dug gi ni sprul
224b6(rgyud): shun gyis// bdugs na rims nad thams cad sil// nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed// ba lang lci ba'i khu bar ni// se ma ra dza'i phye ma gdab// yi ge hI yis byin rlabs nas// mgrin pa sngon po'i// 
224b7(rgyud): rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad brjod mthungs pas ni// dug dang rims nad sel bar byed// skyer ba bskol ba'i khur bar ni// so ma ra dza'i phye ma sbyar// ril bu brgya sran tsam gyis tshad// yid
224b8(rgyud): bzhin nor bu sngags brjod nas// zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams// zos kyang lus la gnod pa med// 'o mar yung ba sran cig bskol// se mor dza blugs te blung // so so chang la ha la'i sngags// 
225a1(rgyud): brgyartsa brgyang sngags grangs chang ba// brjod dung daskyugs nas ni// ga gis tshugs par mi 'gyuraro// khyim gyi dngadu brgyam chu dang // skye bar rgyal mar bcas// byem mar mar/ 
225a2(rgyud): sbrang rtsi bcas// ha ri chen po rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi btung bar bya// sbrul nad thams cad sel bar byed// shu dag ru rta a ga ru// yung ba bong nga dkar po rnams// don yod nags pa'i snga
225a3(rgyud): kyis mnye// thugs pas dag nad thams cad sel// rgya mtsha srang gang mar srang gnyis// gcin srang brgyad dang lhan cig bsgo'o// rdo rje chos kyis sngags kyis 'thungs// dugu nang thams cad sel bar
225a4(rgyud): byed dang rgyam chu cha gsum mar srang ba ni// sbyar te mi shol sngags brjod nas// blugs nas reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdig basprul kyi zin pa sel// ku ma ri dang ser po gnyis// khyim cha myang cha sngar
225a5(rgyud): bcas la// gar dbang sngags dang chu yis btung // dug nang thams cad sel bar byed// ser po gnyis dang ldong ris da nga // go thal gur gum leb rgan ci// pad+ma rgyan lung sngags kyis
225a6(rgyud): btung ta dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed// gang la gza' dang rgyu skar gyis// 'tshe ba 'byung na des bsal phyir// pad+ma 'dab brgyad maN+Dal gyis// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dbus rnamasu// mgon po 'jam
225a7(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje ni// mkha' lding gzugs su 'gyur ba la// spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig gis// gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkod// nyi ma zla ba lag 'dzin pa'i// khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs// 
225a8(rgyud): mnan pa'i mkha' lding mig sman mdog/ nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs// mig gsum ldan pa brjod pa'i// rin chen lnga yi sder bshog can// rdo rje mchu rno khro dang bcas// nyi ma bye bas rgyan pa'i 'od// 
225b1(rgyud): snying ga pa nyi ma 'od 'bar la// g.yig nag po sngags kyis bskul// spu rnams gzings kyis gyur nas kyang // phyogs bcur rdo rdo khyab par 'gro// gza' dang rgyu sar mogo byas te// gdon
225b2(rgyud): da klu rnams sreg par byas// thugs rje mi bshol ba yi sngags// 'brug sgra lta bur gsal bar brjod// gang yang grangs med stong phrag ni// las rnams thams cad sngags 'dis grub// 
225b3(rgyud): mkha'i lding dkar po brjod pa'i lus// klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya// de la mgrin pa sngon po yi// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bkul ba ni// sa stengs gtum po klu yi gdon// dum nges pa
225b4(rgyud): sel bar byed// klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsregs// 'gro la 'dzi nad gtong bar byed // mkha' lding dmar po sprul za dam// me tog thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon na 'chang ste g.yas pan
225b5(rgyud): ral gri me 'od 'bar ba 'chang // mgon po seng ge'i sgras bskul nas// dpa' rlabs bskal pa'i me dang mnyam/ sbrul dang rin chen dbyug tho can// mkha' lding sha za'i gdon
225b6(rgyud): la ni// mgon po ha ri'i sngags kyis bskul// mkha' 'gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni// ljang ku ral gri phur pa 'chang // pad+ma ral gri sngags kyis bskul// las rnams gang dang gang la yang / 
225b7(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o// ji ltar mos te phyag rgyar bcas// lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya// ngo bo nyid kyi mtshon pa yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur// da ni phyag rgya bshad
225b8(rgyud): par bya// sku yi mdun du langs nas kyang // rkang pa g.yas pa yud tsam bskus// lag gnyis so sor thung ngu brkyang // gung srin so sor mthil du bkug/ mtheb mdzub dag ni so sor brkyang // gru khug
226a1(rgyud): lag mthil mdun du brtan// 'gro 'am 'dug kyang dag dpung las// rgyal phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa
226a2(rgyud): yata ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a pa te/ ba ra ba te/ e h+ye hi swA hA// yang na sngon ltar lus bsrang ste// snying khar thal sbyar spro ba bsnol// mdzub mo gnyis
226a3(rgyud): bsgrengs rtse mo sprad// mtheb gnyis mdzub tshig dang por bkug/ lag mthil cung zad ma reg pa// gzungs sngags gang brjod phyag rgya'o// bgegs kyi 'che ba byung ba'i tshe// sngags dang / 
226a4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'dis gsal bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA/ ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba d+harmA Ni maN+Da la ya// a h+yeH/ 
226a5(rgyud): po ri ma shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA// yang na sgom pa 'jug pas ni/ thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo // dbus btsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar// mdzub gnyis bkug la rtse sprad nas/ 
226a6(rgyud): de la mthe bo gnyis bzhar bar bya// 'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges// yang na lag gnyis rgyab sprad nas// sor mo rtse rnams reg par bya// mtheb gnyis brkyang nas mdzub nang sbyar// smin 'tshams su
226a7(rgyud): ni bzhag par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ba d+his tA ga ya tA thA / ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+TA na mo badz+rA ya me swA hA// khyad par du ni lha mthong 'gyur// yang ni bgreng ste/ 
226a8(rgyud): mnyam gzhag rgya// snying kar bzhag la sngags 'di brjod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba de ba a na le swA hA/ 
226b1(rgyud): glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin// yang ni bgreng ste ting pa spyad// lag gnyis kyis 'jigs byed rgyal bya// chu sngags gang rung brjod pas ni// ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur// yang na pad+ma rgyan lung gi/ rtsa
226b2(rgyud): sngags kyi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis thal sbyar srin lag gis// mthe bo'i sen mo mnan byas te// mthe'u chung rtse mo'i gung mo spyad// gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste// dgug na mdzub ce
226b3(rgyud): dgu la zhing dgug/ yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub me dgug/ g.yon pa slar btang bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nas A d+hi ba ma ki te shwa rA ya/ ba d+h+wa~M sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mahA kI ru Ni kA ya~M/ 
226b4(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ni/ e h+ye hi swA hA// yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na// mdzub mo g.yas pi lha chen rnams// yid dan phyag rgya 'di bcas la// nyi zla gzas bzung dus su me// 
226b5(rgyud): gzungs sngags pa mar bzlas nas// phyag rgyas btab nas zos pas ni// shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel zhing // nad med gzugs bzang thob par nges// 'grengs
226b6(rgyud): terkang pa shibs thal sbyar nas// mtheb gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug pa// snying khar bzhag bya spyan ras gzigs// yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya// mchod sogs las kyi
226b7(rgyud): sngon 'gro ba'o// de bzhin gshegs la yang ngo // mdzub bkug mthe bong sen mor bcas// lag gnyis rgyab sprang gar dbang rgya// thal sbyar mtheb mdzub so sor brkyang // mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya
226b8(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang // mi bshol ba yi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rgyab spang mtheb gnyis brkyang // bdug pa bzang la sngags 'di bzla// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+yA a
227a1(rgyud): ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo rat+na sha ri tsin+da/ a laM kA ra marga te dza su pra tsaka bi shwa rA dza ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+ne rat+ne/ ta ta sha rat+na/ 
227a2(rgyud): ta sha rat+na/ pra te ma he rat+ne pra b+hU te/ rat+na gar+b+he swA hA// snga bar brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do// nor yang thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur// 'gro gzhan bdag la byams 'dod na// so shing la ni nyi shu
227a3(rgyud): gcig/ lnga ba rkyen 'dod pa shu dag la// stong brgyad bzlas snying khar bsku// gang bshad phyag rgya dang bcas pas// gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs kyang 'bros// na maHsarba bud d+ha d+harma
227a4(rgyud): saMg+hA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya nga/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA ma twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ 8/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu bi hu pi/ ka ba du pi/ pra/ 
227a5(rgyud): gA ya ni swA hA// rnam grangs bdug pas sangs rgyas 'dagu/ lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya// yan lag g.yas/ pa'i mthe bong ni// lag mthil bzhag nas sor mo dag
227a6(rgyud): rna ltag phyar nas mdzub mo ni// brkyang bskum bskul bas spro ba dang // g.yon pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// dus ma yin par 'chi sogs bzlog/ lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang // sor mo bsnol te bkod
227a7(rgyud): pa las// mthe bong mthe'u chung so so ni// sprad de sprad pa shes rab rgya// oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni swA hA// de bzhin bsnol te dkan pa yi// gung gnyis nang du bshibs sbreng ba// mar me'i rgya ste sngags 'di'o// 
227a8(rgyud): oM dpra lo tsan swA hA// de nyid sbubs nas gung mo gnyis// rtse sprad bsgrengs pa bdug spos so// oM d+hU ba d+ha ta swAhA/ rting sprang so rmongs sar dgug/ thug pa'i tshul ni thug pa'i rgya// oM d+hi li bi t+yas
227b1(rgyud): ting spang sor mo gyon du bgrod // nal nas mthor tshul ba shos kyi rgya// a na ba ce k+Sha ta swA hA/ lag gnyis bkug nas rtse brgyad spyad // mthe bong gyen du yin pa ni// na batha' das pa'i phyag rgya'o// 
227b2(rgyud): bA sa ra NiswAhA// bIm pa la bye bteg pa'i tshul// rom stsal ba'i phyag rgya'o// oM Ak+Sha hrIHsa ka la gaN pa rin reH/ ba ri kha sa a/ a ba ta ti/ A ba tar ti/ sa ba ta cung sha di ka lo
227b3(rgyud): bA la sa bai re na re b+h+ya yong ba liM gring+kan+d+ha/ khAd tu bib tu/ ya thai ba ya bets+tsha dzaHhUM ba \u0f7f/ si d+d+hiSh+Tasarbas twA ni/ shASh+T+r-i/ ru/ pubr-i k+ka rub sha~M ku ru/ A bar/ ku ru grupa taM/ ka ro kun tu nu paH/ a
227b4(rgyud): a ba lo ki te shwa re s+ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hUM/ oM a ka ro mu khaMs darba d+harmA NAM ad+ya nu ta pan+na tAHoM AHhUM baiT swA hA/ oM hrIHdza~M b+ha la dang lin+d+rA ya swA hA/ longs spyod rtag phyir gnod gnas la/ 
227b5(rgyud): chu gtsang rtag tu sbyin par bya// oM A hriHlo ke shA ra hu nA s+thA ti ka rA ya swA hA// yi dgas rnams la srar zas// ci chu dang bcas pa stsa la// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor
227b6(rgyud): grogs// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // 'byung po yi dgos kun brtson 'gyur// sems kyi lcags kyu ldan bya ste// nyon mongs sems la rab drang ste// lha klu 'bum phrag sems dga' ba'i// 
227b7(rgyud): kun slong byang chub rin chen gyis// las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyed// mdzad pa rgya chen kun grub 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhe
227b8(rgyud): bya ba'i rgyud las sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba// 'khor gyi
228a1(rgyud): tshogs dang bcas pa zhig/ mchod pa'i bkod pa chen po dang // bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis// bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas// bskor ba du ma byas na sa kyang // phyag
228a2(rgyud): 'tshal gsang bstod phyogs gcig mchod// dbus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// mgon po'i yon tan kun gyi rgyal// ye shes rmad kyi 'byung gnas gtso// thar pa'i lam chen nyi shar rgyal// 'dren
228a3(rgyud): pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan dpe mthar thug med pa'i sku// gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la// blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' can// sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs dbyangs du ma bas/ 
228a4(rgyud): mi khyab// nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha' bkang nas// tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung // gsung gi gsang ba phyag 'tshadal lo// ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo// bsam yas
228a5(rgyud): bsam du med bsams pas// bsam mi khyab pa'i shes rab dang // thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba nyon mongs 'ching gcod pa'i// ma rig g.yul las rgyal byedapa
228a6(rgyud): kun rtog dra ba sel ba yi// sgron ma di ring bshad du gsol// byis rnams mun pa'i 'obos su lhung // nyan thos 'dod chags tshogs kyi skrag/ rang rgyal gsang ba'i bzo dang ldan// byang chub sems
228a7(rgyud): dpa' 'ching bas 'jigs// nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la// shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis// bag chags bcas pa gtan spong ba'i// thabs mchog du ma bshad du gsol// de nas
228a8(rgyud): bcom ldan thub pa ches// 'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas// tshangs pa'i dbyangs chen gsung snyan pas// namakha'i khams chen rab bkang nas// shes rab snying rjer 'brel pa yi// sbyor ba'i tshe/ 
228b1(rgyud): gdu ma gsungs// bsdus pa'i don du byas pa 'di// nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni// legs so byang chub sems dpa' che// dpal dang ldan pa khyod legs so// rtse gcig gus dang bcas pa yi// sems kyi
228b2(rgyud): legs nyon yid la bzung // nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su// shin tu dga' ba'i sa las ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// shar ram lho yi sgo gtong bya// 
228b3(rgyud): dkar po ser po dmar po dang // ljang ku'i tshon gyis bri bar bya// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// dkar po'i lte bar 'tshams par dmar// mu khyud gnyis dang ldan pa'o// gser dngul zangs sam
228b4(rgyud): sa nyid la// bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa pra// kha g.yel na dbas chod zhum pa la// shin tu gtsang mar bkrus nas kyang // dag pur gur gum bcu gang dang // gla rtsi gi wang chu yis bkang / 
228b5(rgyud): byAg+h+ri seng g+hi ha sa der// ka ri kar ni de ba ko/ nas 'bras ti/ gro mon sran dang // gser dngul byi ru mu tig dang // man shaM la yin te rin chen lnga// bum par stsal nas ras dkar gyis/ 
228b6(rgyud): mgul pa bcings nas kha rgyan yang // dri zhing shing lo me tog bzhag/ me tog phreng dang bcas pa de// pad+ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang // rgya mtsho chen por 'khrugs pa nas// dpag bsam shing chen
228b7(rgyud): 'bras bur bcas// 'jig rten dbang gis gang ba yis// sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas// sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas// dgongs pa rgya chen skyes 'gyur te// legaso bkra shis
228b8(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal sras rnams dang rig pa yi// lha mo tshogs dang glu len dang // bkra shis du ma brjod par 'gyur// de tshe mkha' la ye shes kyi// 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yis// shing chen yongasu
229a1(rgyud): smin pa las// bdud rtsi char chen 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong la gtor ma sbyin// rgyal dang rgyal sras mchod par bya// skar ma la sogs 'bab pa 'am// tshes gcig/ 
229a2(rgyud): nas ni nya yi bar// sngags kyi phreng ba brjod par bya// lha la yang yang bskor ba bya// las rnams gang dang gang la yang // lha yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya// de dang de ni las rnams la// ci bde bar yang
229a3(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// phran tshegs las la spyan ma'i sngags// ldog pa 'brum pa la sogs la// mi bshol ba yi sngags kyi sbyar// gdon rigs bzlog la gar dbang ste// byang stems rig sngags bzlog
229a4(rgyud): pa la ha don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bkru/ shes rab 'phel ba rdo rje chos// klu nang ha la ha las sel// tshe 'phel pad+ma rgyan lung ste// mgrin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed// ha ri chen
229a5(rgyud): pos bdug spos te// gdong bcu gcig pas blo bur sel// se ge sgras ni 'ja nad sel// rnal 'byor yo byad 'dod pa sa ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyi bkru/ bkra shis rol mo du ma dang
229a6(rgyud): gtsang sbra gos sar ldan pa yis// snyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan pas bkru/ myur du sgrib pa 'byung ba dang // 'dod yon kun grub sngags phreng ni// gang dang gang yang sbyar bar 'gyur// phran tshegs gzhan lta smos ci dgro// 
229a7(rgyud): zla ba gzas bzung gyur pa'i tshe// mar srang gcig ni dngul snod gzhug/ sku gzugs mdun bzhag sngags brjod nas// zla ba sos nas mar blangs te// zos sam lus la byugs pa yis// nang rnams zhi
229a8(rgyud): zhing bde bar 'gyur// ldong chos gi'u wang cha mnyam pas// sku yi mdun bzhag sngags stong bzla// chus bkrung bral bar thig le ni// khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub// chu slon sbyar nas lu
229b1(rgyud): krus na// nad dang bgegs rnams dag par 'gyur// bsre 'bras la ni brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas nas khro nal g.yas la byug/ dgra dpung phyogasu bstan na ni// dgra g.yul shin tu nyes par
229b2(rgyud): 'gyur// bal bu 'bras bu sngags rer bcas// bal bu re la brgya rtsa brgyad// sku yi drung du bsgregs pas ni// mi yams phyugs nang thams cad 'chad// skud pa gtsang ma mdog dmar pa/ 
229b3(rgyud): sngags re btab pa'i mdud pa bdun// zhal gcig steng zhal btags nas ni// nad pa la btags rims nad zhi// sngags re mdud pa nyi shu gcig/ mdun zhal steng bzhag blangs btags pas// 
229b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs gdon// drag pos zin pa 'joms pa par byed// gal te des kyang ma sos na// mdung re brgya rtsa brgyad pa rjod nas// zhal gcig mdun zhal dbur btags te// blangs te btag
229b5(rgyud): ninges par grol// sdug bsngal nad pa yun rings brdungs// khyim du/ 'dre gdon 'jig zhug nA// 'bru re sngags re thang 'brom la/ khras// sku bdun brgya rtsa brgyad bsgrags te// gong ltar sgrub pa'i skung
229b6(rgyud): pa yang / lus la btags na nges par grol// mi mdza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang // byang stems drag po bzlog pa la// sku la spos dang me tog mchog/ bi na ya yi gzugs mdun du// bra bo'i 'bras bu dag
229b7(rgyud): ming sreg/ sngags re mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud ldan g.yon gyi khri zhal gdags// zhag bzhi lon nas sku las dgrol// mdud pa re re'i bar du ni// sngags re brjod cing bcad par bya// bdag la sdang
229b8(rgyud): byed skyabasu 'ong // rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa'o// brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud nas mdung bzhag steng btags pa// zhag
230a1(rgyud): gcig lon bgrol lus btags na// las rnams bkra shis tshul du 'grub// gang zhing sgrib pa'i gshegs ldan pas// las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing // dus dus bkra mi
230a2(rgyud): shis byung na// gtsang sbra bum chu bzang po gnyis// brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs re re brjod// dang pos sku gzugs bkru bar bya// gnyis pas bi na ya ka bkrus// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas// 
230a3(rgyud): rang nyid de nas bkru bar bya// bar chad byang nas 'dod kun 'grub// ci ltar sprul pa'i gdon bsal phyir// byi la'i mgo rus thal ba dang // sa bzang chu ltar spras pa'i sa// byi la yis ni gzugs
230a4(rgyud): byas te// sku yi mdun du bzhag nas kyang // khro zhal g.yon pa dar srad bus gdags// rta mgrin sngags ni stong phrag brab// gzungs brgya bzlas pa'i ral gri yis// dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du
230a5(rgyud): gtub// dum bu re re sngags re dang // dong gi nang du dor bar bya/ de dag gnod pa gtan du gsol// mig nang sna tshogs ma rungs la// 'bras bu gsum pa zhig tu btags// sbrang dkar
230a6(rgyud): khye'u 'tshe'i nu nor bcas// bu btsas sar pa'i bud med dang // khyi pag dag gis mthong byas nas// thum po 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags// sngags stong 'das nas sbyar ba des// mig tu blugs na mig
230a7(rgyud): 'bras skye// mig nad thams cad sel bar byed// mig rnon dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// lhag ma ma yin khron pa'i chus// gu gul ga pur cha mnyam bskol// khyer gang 'dag par gyur pa de// rtsa ba'i
230a8(rgyud): zhal sngangs sngags stong 'das// bkrol nas ril bu byas med na// ha la ha la'i dug 'joms 'gyur// glang po dkar po'i gi'u wang ni// mthing bum bzhag nas sku yi mdun// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan
230b1(rgyud): lag bskul// dpral bar thig le byas gyur na// lha klu 'byung po'i mi rnams dga'// khyo shugs mi mthun rtag pa la// ngur ba'i mjug sgro sku mdun du// stong bzlas lag tu blangs nas bdun/ 
230b2(rgyud): chu bskams sa 'am char med na// ling ka'i drung du sku bzhugs la// cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du// stong brjod chus skyes char chen 'bebs// gang zhig char tshe ring 'dod ni// 'gog par snyoms
230b3(rgyud): zhugs phyag rgya bcing // sku yi mdun du rtag par ni// a ga ru nag bdug pa sogs// mchod pa rgyun tu mchod bya zhing // brgyad nas nye bar sngags stong brjod// mig gi mngon shes sgrub pa'i phyir
230b4(rgyud): dri zhim dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// rgyal mtshan pa dan kha dog bzhi// bla re yol ba dkar po yi// dbus suM pad+ma lnga bris te// ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdungs bzhugs// tsan dan dkar
230b5(rgyud): po'i dri chu dang // bdug pa rgyun tu mchod par bya// ba mdog ser skya 'i mar gyi ni// sgron ma'i phreng bas mchod par bya// man shi ri ka ku shu dang // pad+ma dmar dang sngon po dang // rgya mtsho chab kyi
230b6(rgyud): dbu ba dang // nya rkun nag po'i myu gu dang // ma rlabs pa dang gu gul dang // ku ban sa dang gi'u wa nga dang // gur gum dmar dang ser po dang // tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdungs// de rnams phyed tshad gla rtsi dang // ga pur
230b7(rgyud): stsal nas re re'i tshad// sngags ni stong phrag re re grangs// sku yi mdun du brjod par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas// sngags khrir bcas te nya la ni// zangs kyi ze ma tog tu spru la// sku yi steng zhal
230b8(rgyud): btags nas ni// mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab// khar ba'i thur mas mig tu stsa la// ling thog gi ni mchi ma 'dzag/ sbyin dkar sbyin dmar g.yos pa dang // klad pa na dang mig nang dang // glo bur
231a1(rgyud): long dang thibs pa sel// nyin gnyis bskus na lus kyis nang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel bar 'gyur// gsum pa gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad 'bya
231a2(rgyud): lngas ni rtsod pa g.yul las rgyal// drug pas rming na byang stems sel// bdun pa blo bur 'chi ba med// bdun phrag gnyis kyis dbang phyug 'thob// gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur// bzhi pas
231a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin lnga pas klu// lnga pas lha mi srin po rnams// drug pas mkha' lding ri bdun lha// bdun pa nag po chen po 'grub// brgyad pa ma mo dgus gter mthong // bcu pas 'gro ba'i sman par
231a4(rgyud): 'gyur tata bcu gcig lha ma'i khang par phyin// bcu gnyis rig 'dzin drang srong khyim// bcu gsum klu'i khang par phyin // bcu bzhi sum cu gsum pa'i gnas// bco lnga mtshan mo kun
231a5(rgyud): mthong ste// bcu drug khams gter mthong bar nges// bcu padu/ na rdo rje sa gzhi dang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med// bco brgyad pa ni nyi ltar mgyogs// bcu dgus rgyal
231a6(rgyud): sras kun mthong 'gyur// nyi shus spyan ras gzigs nyid kyis// lung bstan dam chos bshad par 'gyur// nyi shu gcig gis gzugs khams phyin// mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// 
231a7(rgyud): lo gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi// zhing khams du mar phyin pa dang // dam chos nyan dang zhing sbyong 'gyur// mig sman sbyor ba bla med 'di// sangs rgyas mu stegs can la gsang // de nas gzhan yA/ 
231a8(rgyud): bshad bya ba// sna tshogs sman gyis sbyor ba yis// bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i// 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed nyen// ga pur gla rtsi gi'u wang dang // gur gum dza ti li shi dang // ka tan la dang sug
231b1(rgyud): spel dang // tsan dan dkar dang pad+ma dang // gser gyi me tog u pal sngo// re re la yang sngags stong bkra// snang ci dkar po lhan cig bsdu// dkyil 'khor dbus su sku yi zhal// dbu ma la ni gdags
231b2(rgyud): bya ste / ta tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi par// nyin re sngags stong brjod par bya// mchod pas rgya cher mchod par bya// bstod dang gsol ba gdabs par bya// dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen gang // bco lnga'i
231b3(rgyud): nyin par lnga stong bzla// de nas gtsang ma'i snod bzhag ste// dgos pa gang dang gang la yang // lha ni de dang de dag sbyar// gang la bgegs kyis gdon gyur nas// pad+ma gar gyi sngags kyis bdun//

232a1(rgyud): / pa'i rims dang drag por rims// brtun byed la sogs rims rigs dang // glo bur ba dang rtag pa'i gdon// nang dag po ni ji snyed dang // dug rigs rims dang lba ba dang // 'bras dang lkog
