237a4(rgyud): ring dpal 'phel zhing // nad med longs spyod rgyas pa dang /  bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+mo 'dra ba
237a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba las me la rten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo zhes bya ba// mkha' la yi ge sprul nas ni// 'gro
237a6(rgyud): don sna tshogs mdzad pa zhig/ 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor der lhags nas// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas par mchod// phyogs gcig 'khod nas ston/ 
237a7(rgyud): pa la/ ta mgrin gcig gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'di skad tshig ni gsol ba 'debs// oM mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan pa'i sku// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// chos kyi longs spyod ji snyed pa// 
237a8(rgyud): rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal// gang la mkho ba de yi gtso bo// 'dren pa gzugs brnyan du ma 'chang // sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sku// bde ba che la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'gyur/ 
237b1(rgyud): rnam dag byang chub lam// phyogs chos byang chub sum cu bdun// stobs dang mi 'jigs brtson mdzad pa// chos rnams lhun 'grub sku phyag 'tshal// rnam dag rgya mtshor ldan rnams la// thugs/ 
237b2(rgyud): rje rgya mtsho rgyun byung bas// zhing khams rgya mtsho skyong mdzad pa'i// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// sngags dang rdzas dang phyag rgya'i rims// sna tshogs kyis ni don mdzad phyir// theg pa kun
237b3(rgyud): las khyad par du// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags// nan tan sgrub pa smos ci dgos// sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang bas kyang // nad dang gnod sel bskal pa yi// sgrib rnams 'byung bas khyad pa
237b4(rgyud): 'phags// dbul po rigs dang sman pa yang // zhugs ma tha gnas bde ldan zhing // cung zad grub nas nus mthu ni// / dpag mad 'byung bas khyad par 'phags// mgon po bcom
237b5(rgyud): ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpal chen ye shes kun gyi mdzod// / 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gzi can// 'gro la 'dren gtsu ded dpon gyi// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags
237b6(rgyud): dang phyag rgyar bcas pa yis// 'gro la sna tshogs phan don du// ji ltar 'gyur mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// pad+ma'i spyan gdangs 'dzum mdzad nas// tshangs
237b7(rgyud): pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'gro la pan phyir 'di skad gsungs// dge byed phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// 'gro la phan phyir zhus pa ni// legs so rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo che// shes rab 'cha
237b8(rgyud): pa khyod legs so// sems dpa' chen po de phyir ngas// khyod la ngo mtshar legs par bshad// khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// legs pa zung la rgya cher spros// ras sam grog shing
238a1(rgyud): shu ga / lam nga gas med pa la// klu sus byung san cidang // ma g+huH// ba byung banas/ do dang ldan pa thab / 
238a2(rgyud): d+ha ra d+ha dang poste// gnyis pad+hir d+hi ri s+ho// gsum pa d+hA ru d+ha rus+t+wa~M// in+d+ra baiTA ba ni lnga pa// tsa le tsa le gnyis bri'o// pra tsa le gnyis grub ro// klu su me dang ku sum// bdun pa bris te/ 
238a3(rgyud): brgyad pa la// ba le i li mi li bri/ a ma tsau ti dz+wa la dang // swahwA bcas pa dbusu'o// phyag 'tshal bcas sngags mtha' mar bri// rab rdzogs sngags kyis lhor dmigs nas// 
238a4(rgyud): ma'i mchod pas mchod bya ste// sngags stong brjod pas lwa des la gdags// 'di ni srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// nang / dang yam nang gdon rnams dang // 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob
238a5(rgyud): par nges// rig sngags bzlog nas khyad par du// rdo rje da//  brtso lnga la// 'od kyi bzlum po yi// ri mo gnyis dang bas pa bri// rwa rnams la ni hU~M gnyis par// rig sngags bzlog
238a6(rgyud): / dang bcas pa bri// lte bar oM hrIHswA hA'i bar// bdag nyid bsrung zhes bri bar bya// mu khyud dang por bri bar bya// gzigs dbang yid bzhin nor sngag so// gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gsum/ 
238a7(rgyud): par pad+ma gar dbang gi/ sngags rnams g.yas su bskor bar bya// gal te nad yams bzlog pa la// 'dab brgyad pad+ma mu khyud gsum// sngon ltar yi ge bkod pa la// mu khyud gnyis par spyan gyi
238a8(rgyud): sngags// gsum par rten 'brel sngags bris nas// lus sam mgul du thogs pas ni// nad rims dang ni lkog 'brum sogs// rlung gi rdul bzhin sel bar 'gyur// de nas tshig de thos ma thag/ 
238b1(rgyud): lha min bu mnod bdag mo// sa tu de bi zhes bya ba// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas te// bu mo khris ni mgrin gcig tu// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// rje btsun 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig tu
238b2(rgyud): mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// bdag gi sngags 'di gang 'dzin pa// gal te 'brum nang byung nas ni// bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro// dam bcas 'di dran par bya// tre ba la bya yi ka ka
238b3(rgyud): nita/ tasu ma ya bi lA sa ka ka ra ni// ki shun pany+tsa tra li he na yi// ke nA ka ta tsa ra Ni// ya mir+Na nad man tsa// ya mi pa ra nang bur dra// dA tsa pi ta tra tsan+d+ra nad dam// sastu de wi me b+ha wa// lha mos de skad
238b4(rgyud): gsol ma thag/ mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// oM oM b+ho bi ta/ bi ti mi ti/ ga tsan+d+rA ka ra Ni a mu ka s+ya ka pya/ la dag d+ha rba ra kA ku ru swA hA/ byin rlab ldan pa'i sngags de ni// rgyun
238b5(rgyud): tu bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// oM ha na se rU pa d+ha ri sAn+da / srang bu ma nyams dkar po la// nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud ra bya// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzla nas kyang // lus sam mgul du
238b6(rgyud): gdags par bya// kr-i hi ti ka tig tra tha brag shika/ ta thA ya thA tsa la he tu hUM phaT/ sran ma rdog po re re la// brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas pa yi// 'bru bdun thum por byas pa zhig/ dri bzang bcas la mgul du
238b7(rgyud): thogs// yams nad kun dang 'brum na ga nad// shin tu gdug pa kun sal 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba mo// dpal phreng mas na 'di skad gsol// bdag gi rig sngags 'di zlos pa/ 
238b8(rgyud): rims nang kun dang bral bar 'gyur// na mo rat+na tra lA ya/ na ma sAr+yA ba la ko te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA sa/ na mo badz+ra mA ra bi dza mA sa ta thA ga tA ya ar+tha tes mya tha nga
239a1(rgyud): / drA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra dz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ sarba b+hI ra thA/ bAn han badz+ra/ sarba tre pra sha man ye swA hA// mi s+tha mi rus sde tres dang // gra gul yungs kar sgog sgra dang // shing kun gA rtsi 'khor/ 
239a2(rgyud): lo ni/ ta rtsibs brgyad phyogs bzhir hrIHyig bri// mtshams bzhir bris te dbus su ming // sngags 'di mu khyud dang po la// gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa yi sngags// bris nas lus sam mgul du
239a3(rgyud): thogs// nad rims thams cad sel ba dang // rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par 'gyur// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// 'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol// rang 'byung can gyis ras la ni// sen
239a4(rgyud): rtsis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri// / rtsibs bzhi hrIHla g.yon bskor du// hrIHgi wa shi ku ru hrI// mu khyud dang po mgon po ni// pad+ma gar dbang sngags bri'o// 
239a5(rgyud): gnyis pa ud pal dmar po phreng // gsum pa lcags kyu nyi shu/ gcig/ dbus su baM yig hIr bcas bri// lha ngam/ nyid kyang dam byed na// 'gro ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos// gsol/ 
239a6(rgyud): dang bkra shis brjod pa dang // bgegs kyi gnod pa sel 'dod pas// rtse gsum rdo rje rgya gram ste// dbus su spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon// pad+ma gtsug tor sngags dri'o// ra rnams kun la
239a7(rgyud): hA yig ni// bgegs ming u tsa ta yis bskor// mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs// ha la ha la'i sngags bri'o// gnyis pa khro bo rta skad sngags// gsum par bgegs dgra'i sngags
239a8(rgyud): bris la// de rgyab me yi phung po bri// gang zhig 'khor lo 'di bris pas// sred med bu ltar mthu che ba'i// gdug pa can yang 'thor byed na// phran tshegs 'byer pa smos ci dgos// gang la ser
239b1(rgyud): snga rnams chags shing // longs spyod 'phel bar mi 'gyur na// phun sum tshogs ldan dpal 'phel phyir// skyob pa'i phyag rgyab shad par bya// rgyal po'am ni dge 'dun la// gtsang ldan rab bzang
239b2(rgyud): blangs nas kyang // dag par bkrus te dri zangs byug/ legs par rgyan nas thib btab ste// gur gum dang ni gla rtsi yis// pad+ma 'dab bcu drug pa bri// phyogs bzhir 'dab mar dpal be'u ste/ 
239b3(rgyud): mtshams bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri// mtshams brgyad la ni yi ge gang // oM dang badz+rad ke hUM// yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya// mu khyud dang por mi bshol sngags// gnyis pa gdong bcu
239b4(rgyud): gcig pa'i sngags// gsum pa ud pal phreng ba ste// yang tog rtse 'am mdzod bzhag nas// gsol btab mtsho/ dad na longs spyod 'phel// bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas// de
239b5(rgyud): bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// phyogs bzhir hrIHbri mtshamasu drang / dbus su khye'u'i gzigs shig bri// phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri// sngags bu stsol bcas bri bar bya// 
239b6(rgyud): mtshams bzhir oM dang a ma ra// dzi wan te ye swA hAs bskor// mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags// gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gsum
239b7(rgyud): pa ud pal dmar po'i phreng // 'od 'phro rtog par mchod pa dang // phul du byung ba'i bstod pas bstod// gsol ba 'debs shing sngags bzlas na// bu stsol 'gyur la the tsom med// srung dang
239b8(rgyud): nor 'phel dbang byed dang // bu slong pa yi phyag rgya ni// smin drug sngar ma rgyal la bri// lhag ma rnams ni ci bder bri// gang zhig sems stor yid mi dga'// blo bur yi mug skye 'gyur na// pad+ma 'dang / 
240a1(rgyud): ma bzhi pa yi// dbus su rang gzugs mtshan ma bri// 'dab mar rdo rje mdog bzhi pa// gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mu khyud la ni spyan ras gzigs// don
240a2(rgyud): yod zhags pa'i sngags bri'o// gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba bri// de'i rgyab 'od kyi phreng ba bri// rtag par mchod cing gsol ba gdab// nad sel tshe ring bsod nams 'phel// gang zhig shes rab
240a3(rgyud): 'dod pas ni// dpal be'u rgyal po'i du mar ni// tri yig rgyab tu sngags 'dis bskor// oM dang kA la de ka la// ma ni swA hA zhes pa bri// de yi cha rgyab 'khor ba la// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtse sngags bri// 
240a4(rgyud): de rgyab 'od kyi ra ba bri// gang gis 'di 'chang mchod pa la// nad dang gnod pa kun bral te// dug dang rims nad 'joms dpa dang // shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur// yul du
240a5(rgyud): lo tog nyams pa dang // thog 'brug ser ba rgod pa dang // klu dang sa bdag gnod pa ste// de gsal sbyor ba bshad par bya// shing shun dkar po ma nyams pa// nyams dga'i nya
240a6(rgyud): rim sbyor ba la// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa// mig sman gyis ni bri bar bya// grwa rnams la ni hA yig la// oM dang dzi na ti ti te// hUM phaT ces pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mu khyud dang por mgon
240a7(rgyud): po tshod/ gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags phreng bri// gnyis pa thugs rje chen po mgon// mi bshol ba'i sngags kyis bskor// gsum par rdo rje phreng ba dang // me yi 'od dang ldan par bri/ 
240a8(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni bstan tsam gyis// klu'i rgyal po mthun ldan rnams// 'khor dang bcas te lus bskams 'gyur// gang gi khyim du gdong pa dang // ma he rta sogs yams nang can// bsal
240b1(rgyud): pa'i thabs kyi phyag rgya ni// brtan par drang srong tshogs rnams nyon// ko ba di ri'i shing la ni// khru gang khru gnyis dbyibs gru bzhi// gas grubs chag sogs med pa la// shin tu srab 'jam sor gaN+DI
240b2(rgyud): rngams// shing de la ni rta babs gzugs// 'khor lo gdugs dang bcas pa yi// brtsegs pa'i g.yas zur dang po ni// rdo rje sngon po rtso lnga ste// gnyis pa ud dpal dmar po'o// gsum par
240b3(rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser// bzhi par pad+ma dkar po'o// g.yon zur dang por pad+ma dmar// gnyis pa ud pal sngon po'o// gsum pa nor bu bzhi rgya gram// nang khong du ni pad+ma bya// 'dab ma
240b4(rgyud): brgyad pa 'od ldan pa'o// lte ba dang ni mdab brgyad la// yodo bi shA tsi bar+Na// sha ba ri sarba bA d+hi// pra sha ma ni swAhA zhes/ rapr-i yig la ni bskor ba bri/ mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs// 
240b5(rgyud): gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags bri'o// gnyis par chos kyi ga tsug tor gyi// rtsa ba'i phreng sngags bri bar bya// rgya skyeg/ sa dang ni mtshal yin te// de la shing sbyin thug par bya// 
240b6(rgyud): mchod dang gsol gdab sngags dag ni// bdun stong re re brjod byas nas// sgo gong la gdags 'byung 'jug tshe// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// rta phyugs yams nad ma lus la// 
240b7(rgyud): rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten mgon gyi rig sngags mthus// myur du sel bar mnan pa dang // bzlog dang bcings par brjod ces brjod// phyugs bdag chen po skyong ba
240b8(rgyud): ltarata/ glang po rta bong ma he tshogs// brtan zhing nad dang gnod pa med// shin tu 'phel zhing rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la// khyad
241a1(rgyud): bar du ni skyob pa yis// phyag rgya sbyor ba mnyan par gyis// yung bas ras sam shing la ni// pad dkar steng du kha T+wAM dang // ral gri 'od ma bri bar bya// de la gdub bu gsum gyis/ 
241a2(rgyud): bskor tata dang po gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gnyis pa seng ge sgra yi sngags// gsum par ha ya chen po'i sngags// de rgyab me yi ra ba bri// 'di la gsol ba btab nas ni// g.yul ngor khyer
241a3(rgyud): te zhugs pa gang // ngag dpung chen po 'bros 'gyur te// rang nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur// longs spyod spyir ni byang bltas bri// dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste// g.yul bzlog pa ni lhor bltas bri// 
241a4(rgyud): lhag ma rnams la shar bltas bri// dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba yi// dbye bas zas dang gos shes bya// 'dzum dang rngam dang / dgod dang khro// bzhin gyi rnam pa bshad pa yi// sngags dang
241a5(rgyud): sngags kyis 'od phreng dang // lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang // snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang // brgyan yang de ltar shes par bya// kun kyang rin chen pad+ma'i gdan// kha dog sna tshogs ldan par
241a6(rgyud): ni ha sngags kyi yig 'bru'i lha rnams bzhugs// sngags rdzogs nas ni sngagasu dmigs// gang gis phyag rgya 'chang byed la// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang // rig pa'i lha me'i tshogs
241a7(rgyud): rnams dang // 'jig rten 'dren pa'i tshogs bcas dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang // khro bo tshogs bcas ma lus dang // 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan rnams// ci 'dod las rnams
241a8(rgyud): ma lus pa'i// grogs dang dpung du byas nas ni// tshul bzhin du ni sgrub pa la// brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis kyang // the tsom du ni mi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud
241b1(rgyud): rgyal po pad+ma'i dra ba las phyag rgya la rten pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas mkha' la gshegs pa yi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i drang srong mchog/ mtshan dpe du ma rgyas pa che// nyi ma'i gong bu zhes bya ba// 
241b2(rgyud): drang srong rje dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ 'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can// spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po la// sangs rgyas tshig gis 'di skad gsol// oM 'od zer du mther zug gi/ srid 'dab stug
241b3(rgyud): po sel byed rgyal// yon tan ye shes kyis rgyan sku// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// gsung snyan yan lag brjod bral chos// bag chags ri bo snyil mdzad rgyal// skye 'gag bral ston sde snod
241b4(rgyud): gsum// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// skye 'gag gnod bral mnyam gzhag pa// ting 'dzin shes rab 'phel mdzad rgyal// ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas thugs// mgon
241b5(rgyud): po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs sman dang sngags sbyar nas// lha yi gong bu'i ril bu ni// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi// thugs
241b6(rgyud): rje'i nyi ma lham mdzad pa'i// mgon po pad+mas bshad du gsol// 'gro rnams ma rig 'dam la zhen// srid pa'i theg pas rgya gram bcings// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pas g.yogs// nga rgyal phrag
241b7(rgyud): dog chu bos g.yengs// ngan rtog log lam g.yang sar lhung // bag med ser sna'i dug gis myos// sdig pa'i grib mas rnam par rgyal// bag chags thum po'i ri bos mnan// mgon khyod thugs rjes
241b8(rgyud): ngal ba med// nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsal ba'i phyir// shes rab thabs 'byung bshad du gsol// de nas 'jig rten mgon po rje// thugs rje thugs dpag mnga' ba yi// thugs ngam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bur
242a1(rgyud): bcas te khyad par gzung 'di bka' stsal to// mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang // rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan sems shes// 'das dang ma 'ongs don shes dang // mtha'
242a2(rgyud): yas shes drug las spyod pa// dngos dang rtags dang cha 'thun gyis// rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur// phra dang yang dang mchod par bya ba dang // bdag por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur ba dang // gar yang
242a3(rgyud): byin yang 'dod dgur ldan pa dang // dga' mgur gnas te dbang phyug yon tan no// rnam pa brgyad kyi dpe bya yis// longs spyod dbang dang lus la dbang // che la dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang / 
242a4(rgyud): chu la mi bying mkha' la 'gro/ sa 'og 'gro dang mi snang ba// ni rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// dngos po gang da ga dang bsgrubs rnams// ril bu las ni 'byung 'gyur gyis// 
242a5(rgyud): gzhan ni myur du 'grub mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i ri/ la bu ni// mtshams med la sogs byed pas kyang // rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur// nye dang dbang ldan lha yi sras
242a6(rgyud): ma mos dbang du byas gyur na// 'byung po sha za lha min mi// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'byung po klu// dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can// sems can gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngos grub bzang
242a7(rgyud): po 'dod pa yis// khyad par ril bu 'di bsgrub bya// gi'u wang dang ni lig bu mig/ ldong ros bzang por sbyar ba yis// ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas// snod gtsang nang du bzhag par bya// 
242a8(rgyud): sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na// sngan chad ma mthong snang ba 'am// sgra thos sam ni bde gshegs gzugs// yid 'ong mngon du byung ba sogs// mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas
242b1(rgyud): zla ba gzas bzung tshe// ci 'byor mchod de snyim par bcug/ bzlas brjod byas nas nyi shar na// du bar 'thul dang dri can 'gyur// dung 'phrul lus la byugs pas kyang // snang ba dang 'od gzug/ 
242b2(rgyud): can dang tata 'dzam gling phyogs rnams rgyu ba dang // longs spyod tshe dang ldan 'gyur te// shi 'ophos dga' ldan gnas su skye// dri ma tsam gyis lus byugs kyang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang byed cing // thos pa 'dzin
242b3(rgyud): cing rgyu btsal mkhas// shi nas 'dzam gling 'di nyid du// lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin ni// 'khor ba gzhon nu'i rigs skye// yang na mi yi rgyal po 'am// glang po nyid du skye bar nges// 'bar ba lus la bskus na lha// 
242b4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang lus nyi shar mdog/ bskal par gnas te 'dod dgur spyod// 'jig rten kun tu thogs med rgyu// mkha' daldings 'og chu bran 'gro// sangs rgyas kun nas byin nas kyang / 
242b5(rgyud): dang por gnas te rgyal por gnas// sprul pa'i rdzas kyis bdeg shegs mchod// 'dod nas shi 'phos 'jig rten khams// gzhan 'das sangs rgyas dag tu skye// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das
242b6(rgyud): pa yi// bdag nyid yid du 'ong 'dod pas// gur gum ga pur bu rtsi dang // gi'u wang bsregs nas sngags stong bzlas// brdungs te phye mar byas nas kyang // sngags stong bzlas te chu gtsang gis// ril bu
242b7(rgyud): rgya sran tshad byas nas// re re la yang stong stong brjod// rlung dang nyi ma ma reg pas// bskams nas gnod gtsang bzhag par bya// ril bu tsam cig mur na yang // rgyal po blon po 'khor bcas kyis// mthong na
242b8(rgyud): bu bzhin gzigs 'gyur na// tha mal skye bo smos ci dgos// nor rnams gzhan gyis ster ba dang // bsgo ba la ni ngag btsan 'gyur// ga pur gu gul gi'u wang dang // tsan dan gan da brda dang // gla rtsi dag ste cha mnya/ 
243a1(rgyud): du/ re re sngags stong bzlas nas su// brdungs te ril bu byas pa dag/ g.yon pa'i zhal la gdags par bya// mdun nas nya yi bar du ni// sngags bzlas pa dang mchod par bya// 
243a2(rgyud): gdugs pas nad dang gdon rnams sel// mig la byugs pas rgyal po dang // rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang // blon po la sogs dbang du 'gyur// khar bcug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong // gdam/ 
243a3(rgyud): pa thams cad don yod 'gyur// spyi bor btags na byad stems dang // g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur// gal te phye mas bdugs pas kyang // sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te// kun
243a4(rgyud): gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang // gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis/ mchod// ga pur gla rtsi gur gum dang // tsan dan gla rtsi ka ko la// spos kyi rgyal po pad+ma dang // ud pal sngo dang tsan dan dam
243a5(rgyud): re re la yang stong bzlas nas// cha mnyam phye ba'i gi'u wang ba cas// ril bu tsa na ka tshad bya// grib bskams byas na sa lus la 'chang // gling bzhi kun khyab rgyal srid 'thob// kra ku/ 
243a6(rgyud): la yi thang chu dang // ldong ros bed dang ud dpal sngo// rgya mtsho dbu ba gi'u wang dang // yung dang skyer ba gur gum dang // ga pur dang ni gla rtsi gsum// re re la yang sngags stong bzla// de nas sku yi mgul btags/ 
243a7(rgyud): te stong bzlas dril nas ril bu bya// mig nad sel na chu dang sbyar// so nad la ni ka ka ru// rna ba'i nad la ru d+ha ste// ud pal mu tig mig nang la// gre ba'i nad la ba sha ka/ glo nang la ni ba li ka sha ka raM yi thang / 
243a8(rgyud): dang sbyar// rlung nad la ni mar dang sbyar// mkhris nad la ni tig ta dang // bad kan la ni skra dang sbyar// mdze nad la ni dug mo nyungs// ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa// spangs nad rnams la thug po che// bgegs dang yamra/ 
243b1(rgyud): nad sel ba la// gugul dang bcas bdag par bya// ril bu'i yon tan mtha' yas ni// nam yang brjod par mi nus so// gu gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i// ril bus bgegs tshogs sel bar byed/ 
243b2(rgyud): ke su rtsa dang sge'u gsher dang // ba la ta ka tsha ba gsum// ser po mu zi phye ma rnams// sbrang rtsi dang bsres ril bu byaM// pad+ma gar dbang sngags stong bzlas// zlos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te// nad dang
243b3(rgyud): gdon dang dgras mi tshugs// 'dod rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ta ka'i rtsa ba ba ru ra// sku rur dang til ti la// mnyam byas srin bya'i khrag dang ni// ril bu byas nas mig la byugs// klu dang
243b4(rgyud): yi dgas khang pa dang // sa 'og thams cad mthong bar nges// byis pa zla ba gsum pa'i lce// nyin gcig spos por nang du gzhug/ gnyis par 'o gsum dang 'byung // bzhi pa ril bu tshil chen gtso/ 
243b5(rgyud): lnga pa sbrang rtsi'i nang du ste// drug pa dngul chu'i nang du bzhag/ bdun pa/ rigs ngan thod par ni// byi la'i khrag gis bskus laM/ bzhag/ bskams nas bya dang spyang ku'i sha/ lhan cig rang gi khar
243b6(rgyud): bcug na// de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur// gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med// ldong ros gyen du bcas pa dang // dza ti lo ma sa bon bcas// ril bu sngags stong bzlas pa yi// bar snang la ni 'gro bar nges// 
243b7(rgyud): ban du ma dang ki ra dang // ma ka ri dang su mi ta ma// pra ban ta ma'i ril bu ni// nyi zla gzas bzung dus su mid// shes rab phul du 'byung ba ste// thos pa 'dzin 'gyur smos ci dgos// gi ru wang swA hA tsa ni nga
243b8(rgyud): sre ta sbrang gi ril bu bya// sngags stong bzlas nas khar bcug na// 'das pa'i don rnams shes par 'gyur// gi wang su ga pa yi dang // ba ra swa ta ha su ri// a ra hu ri sbrang rtsir bcas// ril bu byas na snga
244a1(rgyud): stong bkra// mi pas ma 'odzes don rnams shes// gzhan yang nang 'dod byed pa la// rim bu chen po bshad par bya// rgyal dang nam rgyal dgul// kan d+han gu li dang na// ru Ni a
244a2(rgyud): sa ba ni/ i ba yan ta ka ra// gan d+haka dang bri yang // 'khor lo tsha dang 'khor lo dang // bi ga Ti de bzhin du// so ma ran+da un na ti// re re la yang sngags phreng dang // brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya// 
244a3(rgyud): de nas brdzus te sbrang dang bcas// byis pa la ni dpung bar te// bu 'dod mo la mgul par gdags/ 'di btags pa yi de ma thag 'jigs pa brgyang dang nang las grol// ba mar shu dag pa khyer bcas
244a4(rgyud): lcags kyi snod du bcos pa yi// ril bu a mra'i 'bras bu tsam// sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod de// phyis ni nyi shu dgacig brjod nas// snga bar ming pas shes rab 'phel// nam
244a5(rgyud): rat+na tra yA yai/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ma/ bo d+his trA la/ mahA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ yo shud+d+he mr-it+tabal ba d+ha ni swA hA/ srong dang tho rangs dge sbyong dang // ngal sna
244a6(rgyud): gsong ba dul bag can// khrus la dga' zhing dri bzang sten// spyod lam rab ni khro ba med// rtag tu sngags brjod pa rtse sems can// spyan ras gzigs dbang la cher dang // gdung bag gdong la mchim can
244a7(rgyud): lung thob bla mar rab dga' ba'i// skyes mchog de la rab dag zhing // 'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang // 'byung po la sogs smos ci dgos// rtag par rang gi yid la ni// snying po gsang sngags bcang bar bya// 
244a8(rgyud): pa'i snying po lus dag pa'i// lha yang rang la nye bar byed// rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod mang ba// khri dang 'bum dang sa ya dang // sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de// kha cig la yang bzhi dang ni// lnga tsam gyis ni de
244b1(rgyud): grub yin// las la sbyar ba bdun dang ni// bcu pa ni nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // brgya dang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs// de ma thag tu chu'i yin te// cung zad pa ni mar gyis bya// brtan par 'gyur bkar ste// ches brta/ 
244b2(rgyud): pal srang bu yin// sman dang sngags kyis sel byed de// ril bus ring du skyong byed yin// sngags sgrub pa la mi mos pa'o// bdun du rtsom na de dag rnams// de skad gsungs pa'i dem thag/ rdo rje snying po nye'ang
244b3(rgyud): dang ta padakar rin chen snying po dang // pad spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang // ye shes dbang phyug pad dbang phyug/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams// rang rang sde dpung sdesngar bcas pa// 'khor gyi
244b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po rnams// 'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bkram byas te// rin che na rigs las 'khrungs pa yi// mchod pas na mkha'i gtor
244b5(rgyud): rab bkang // rol mo du ma lhab lhub dang // sil snyan lha y+r-i/ tshogs rnams kyis// sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'aldi gas ltar// bkod pa mtha' yas bsham byas te// de nas
244b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// mgon 'gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams// spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung snyan la// yi rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod
244b7(rgyud): rten che// 'jig rten dbang po dbang phyug che// pad+ma sems dpa' bad 'byung che// rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa chen po chos rgyal gtso// blo gros chen po sems dpa' che// / pad+ma 'chang dang pad+ma dpal// pad+ma
244b8(rgyud): mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma las byung dam pa'i yid// pad+ma gsal mdzad dga' mdzad po// pad+ma'i rdo rje dam pa'i sku// khyod mchog spyan la phyag 'tshal// snang ba kun chen thabs po che// tshe mnya
245a1(rgyud): dga' ba dgongs pa che// dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal// bde ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsam chen mkhyen chen theg chen po// rnal 'byor chen po mes chen po// bde stsol/ 
245a2(rgyud): bde mdzad dga' mdzad che// pad+ma rgyas zhal phyag 'tshal lo// chos mnga' don mnga' pad+ma rgyal// dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog 'dzin// rmad byung chen ldan chos rab 'chang // chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag
245a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog sems dpa'// rin chen sems dpa' chos sems dpa'// dam tshig sems dpa' las sems dpa'// kun mkhyen sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ 
245a4(rgyud): 'jig rten dpa' bo dpa' bo mchog/ rnam par gzigs gtso sgo dab mdzad che// 'jig rten gsal mdzad 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten yi ge kha
245a5(rgyud): dog che// yi ge che mtshungs yig drug mchog/ yi ge'i rang bzhin yi ge gzigs// yi ge 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i lag/ legs so sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin

245a7(rgyud): snang bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gtso mgon rgyal po pad+ma'i dpal// chos kyi dpal mgon 'dren mdzad pa// tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug mgon// tshangs pa'i sras khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 
245a8(rgyud): cher gsal gtso bo snang ba mchog/ 'od chen mdzad pa rang gsal mdzad// snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon// snang ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po che// chos kyi spyan ni
245b1(rgyud): gzigs pa che// ting nge 'dzin po ye shes mtsho// rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang bsgyur gtso// mkhan po chen po sangs rgyas sras// rgyal thabs brnyes pa khyu mchog che// 
245b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpag med phyag 'tshal lo// drag po chen po brtul chen po// ha la chen po seng ge sgra// mgrin sngon gar gyi dbang phyug gtso// ye shes gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar ming brgya rtsa brgyad
245b3(rgyud): gang tata 'chang la nad med bgegs med de// dpal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong // yang yang lhar skye mya ngan 'da'// de skad gsungs nas blo ldan rnams// rang rang gdan la rnam par 'khod// de tsha
245b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu rnam par g.yos// bdud rigs thams cad mog par gyur// de nas gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis// byang chub sem sa dpa'i tshogs rnams la// rtog pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid// nga yi/ 
245b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so// kun tu bzang po spyod tshul can// dkar lam bcu pa rnam spro ba// sems can gang du 'dod/ sbyor ba'i// rigs ni rigs chen thams cad pa'o// lus ngag
245b6(rgyud): yid bcu spyod bcu ni// rgyun mi 'chad du sbyor mod kyang // rags pa yi ni gzugs brnyan mthus// sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi// lha la goms pa lha mthong ngam// mngon shes dang po
245b7(rgyud): sems gsal bas// mkha' mnyam sems kyi rdzu 'phrul che// sems snang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa// mtshan ma phra mo la sogs pa'i// mngon shes 'jig rten gsal mthongs// 'jig rten 'das
245b8(rgyud): pa'i snying po ste// brtan pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o// dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam spyod// sems dang sems dpa' dbyer med dang // zhi lam sgro skur chad pa dang // sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa
246a1(rgyud): lam ta bani pa ni lhun gyis grub pa dang // rten 'brel zab don mngon gyur pa// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs kun mchog/ mtshan med ting 'dzin la gnas nas// rtsol bcas gzhan dam
246a2(rgyud): sgrub pa dang // rtsol med shugs kyis bde 'byung dang // nges tshig chos don spros pa'i mtha'// rdzu 'phrul du ma spyod yul la// rigs chen yongs su grub pa'i sa// mkhas spyod phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // 
246a3(rgyud): sems kyi snang ba du mar bsgyur// dngos rnams spos spang bsdu spyod pa// rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis// chos sku kun snang kun tu 'od// bde skur snang ba pad+ma'i spyan// yi ge 'khor lo sprul tshogs che//

246a5(rgyud): sems pa// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go// sems can so mas snyoms byang sems 'dzin// nges par sgrub pa'i rgyu/ so// sems can mi gtong tshul khrims srung // sngags don mi

246a7(rgyud): bsam zhing de don spyod// phyi rol sngags spong zhe sdang skyang // de dag sngags sgrub rgyu lnga'o// dad pa 'dun pa gi sol ba dang // phyi nang sngags la mi spyod dang // spros med ston pa'i gzhung 'jug dang // theg

246b1(rgyud): lha dang dbu mo po rol phyin yul lha// 'gro ba mi sku cho mi 'byed// theg dman mi len pa dang bdun// nyan thos rang rgyal blo ldan dang // rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tsom med// lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang //

246b3(rgyud): med cing bden par smra// bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste// brgyad pa de yang sgrub pa'i rgyu// rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid// gang zhig lcags kyu bzung bas gnyis re nas// klu phrug 'bum phrag 'dren ltar/

246b8(rgyud): de dang / rig pa'i lha mo dang / khro bo du ma dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
247a1(rgyud): par bstod do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bdA ba zhes bya ba las sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / 'phags

247a3(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gtsug khang chen por paN+Di ta chen po so ma shri b+ha ba zhes bya ba dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha bgyur dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha bA sha hr-i da yaM
247a4(rgyud): na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa 'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// 'phags pa don yo dad zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//

247b1(rgyud): nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas// zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/ bcom ldan

247b7(rgyud): spyod na bcom ldan 'das sI phyogs gcig po de mchod rten du 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur/ 
247b8(rgyud): ro totade bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa// sdig
248a1(rgyud): pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ga/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
248a2(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la smod pa pod/ gal te 'gyod par gyur cing sman chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das des re shig de nyid bsnyung bar gnas pa
248a3(rgyud): gcig gis de bzlas na de'i skye ba 'di'i las yongasu dag cing yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ de'i phyir

248a6(rgyud): par brjod pa 'am/ mdor bsdun bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha'am/ sems kyi sdug bsngal lam/ rmi lam ngan pa mthong bas de'i las yongasu dag cing zad par 'gyu ro// sngar nyid nas dag pa'i sems ca
248a7(rgyud): dad cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin tu yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang / rigs bzhi pos ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang mchod par byed/ gang 'dir don yod zhags pA/ 
248a8(rgyud): snying po nyan par byed pa dang / don 'dzin par byed pa/ 'chang bar byed pa/ klog par byed de/ 'dri bar byed pa/ 'drir 'jug par byed pa/ kun chub par byed pa/ sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par byed pa 'am/ tha na dud
248b1(rgyud): 'gro'i skye gnasu gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs te zlos par byed// sngags kyi tshig 'di sems par byed pa dang / dor ba med pa/ gzugs med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ yang dag par 'byung ba med pa/ yun ring du
248b2(rgyud): ba med pa/ rgyu med pa gos pa med pa/ mnyam pa'i sems g.yeng ba med pa phung po lnga dang bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dis ni sangs rgyas rjesu dran par bya'o// de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brgya stong gis zhal ston// 
248b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// khyed kyis bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro// ji snyed po ti ra bri bar byas nas khyim du bzhugasu gsol bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das mang pos ci bya ste/ phan tshun 'gran pas nyan pa
248b4(rgyud): 'am/ rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam/ gzhan gyi rjesu 'jug dpas sam/ gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni 'phags ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byin gyis brlabasu mkhas
248b5(rgyud): pas shes par bya'o// de dag gi rna bug tu de'i sgra grags par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gang la la'i skyes bus tsan dan/ nam/ ga pur ram/ gur gum mam/ gla rtsig nur zhing brgyad cing jog
248b6(rgyud): 'am sa la bzhibs nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ de la tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gur gum mam/ gla rtsi gnur ba'am brgyad pas de ltar dri 'pho bar mi 'gyu ro// yang bri nem po yang de nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de
248b7(rgyud): ltar kho nar bdag gis don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la yang gang la la zhig gis 'phya zhing smod pa dang / snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la rgyu dang g.yos mchod pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'angs mu rgod kyi sems can de
248b8(rgyud): dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// 'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod dbyi ma la yang ngo // gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi cho
249a1(rgyud): kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed do// gang yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
249a2(rgyud): bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i kha cig don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshad du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la bsnyung bar gnas par byas te/ lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod
249a3(rgyud): par yongasu bzlas na/ de la bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu tham pa so sor 'dod par bya'o// nyi shu po gang zhe na/ gang de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ba dang / las kyi dbang gis nad byung ba
249a4(rgyud): yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// snum zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dkar ba ngar yang 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// dbang po sbub su nub pa dang / nor rnyed par yang 'gyu ro// nor yod pa yang rkun
249a5(rgyud): pos khyer bar mi nuso// mes mi 'tshig go// chu yis mi khyero// rgyal po'i yid kyis kyang 'phrog par mi nuso// de'i las kyi mtha' rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 
249a6(rgyud): rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po chu 'am thal ba la yongasu bsngags te phyogs dang / mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og gi zhing la bcing ba byas na nye ba
249a7(rgyud): 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// mdangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus// sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// dgra yis 'jig pa byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi yis 'jig
249a8(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// khyab par na ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mkha' gro ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa drag po yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang chu dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed pa
249b1(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// lhas kyang rgyun du nye bar srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyu ro// gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang 'bral bar
249b2(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sor 'dod par bya'o// gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor thob ste/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ 'chi ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi
249b3(rgyud): gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// mthong bar 'khrul pa med do// lag pa g.yob pa med do// bshang ba med do// gci ba med do// rlung gi rnam pa med do// shin
249b4(rgyud): tu legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kha 'ogab tu bltas nas tshe'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi
249b5(rgyud): zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de dang der skye bar 'gyuraro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyu ro// nyin po na 'dus gsum du lan gsum bklag par bya'o// chang dang / sha
249b6(rgyud): dang rtagacong dang / sgog skya dang / bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma khyad par du srung bar 'dod pas de rnams spang bar bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la nus sam
249b7(rgyud): mi nus shes par byas la nyan du gzhug par bya'o// slob dpon gyis sar sna mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yin no// sems can gyi don gyi ched du sangs rgyas
249b8(rgyud): kyi byang chub thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du yang 'gyuraro// shes rab ni byang chub tu brjod la sems dpa' ni thabs te/ de gnyis dag gis sems can gyi don nyid thob par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan
250a1(rgyud): 'das gal te chos 'di rjesu zlos shing snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du brjod par byed pa ni 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang / sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams/ 
250a2(rgyud): kyi yang phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis
250a3(rgyud): bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
250a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan mi 'dzums par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gson cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang
250a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par tha ra pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjesu brtse ba dang / skye
250a6(rgyud): dgu'i tshogs chen po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i don gyi phyir yang ngo // // na mastai ya d+ha a nu ga ta pra tiSh+Ti tai b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha Ar+ya shra ba ka saM g+he b+h+yoH
250a7(rgyud): a tI ta a nA ga ta pra t+yuta ban+d+he b+h+yaHna maHsamyag+ha ta naM/ na maHsamyaka pra ti pan na nAM/ na maHshA ra dA ti pu tA ya ma hA ma ta ye/ na ma Ar+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yaHma hA bo d+hi satwa saM g+he b+h+yaHna maHsu pra tiShAM ta shai len+da rA
250a8(rgyud): dza pra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHa d+ha b+h+yaHsamyakl-i bud d+he b+h+yaHb+ha ga bang b+h+yaHna maHsu bar+N+Na bar+N+Na su pra ti b+hA sa bi nar ti te shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsiM ha bi kri Di ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a
250b1(rgyud): mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta ma Ni kA Ta ra dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta ra smAd ga ta shri kA Tu rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi ba sh+yi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ 
250b2(rgyud): namo bi shra b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tsha na dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya
250b3(rgyud): thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ oM sha mau sha me ma hA sha me rak+Sha rak+Sha mA sarba satwA sh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/ na maHsu pa ri kirti te nA ma d+he yA ya/ shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta a wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM
250b4(rgyud): grA ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma in+d+ra ke tu d+h+wa dza shri ye ta thA ga tA/ ya/ na mo rat+na pra b+ha se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a pra ti ha ta bai Sha dz+ha rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na me bi kAn+ta ga mi ne ta thA ga/ 
250b5(rgyud): tA yatan mo bud d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na mo any+dza ta a nA ga ta pra t+yAta ban+de b+h+yo/ sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yo/ b+ha ga da b+h+yaHtad+ya thA/ s+thi ti bar+d+ha ni/ ma ti bar+d+ha ni/ ga ti bar+d+ha ni/ d+hI ti bad+ha ni/ 
250b6(rgyud): pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ pra ti b+hA na bar+d+ha ni/ d+hu na bar+d+ha ni/ sA maR+tha bar+d+ha ni/ bi pa sh+ya na bar+d+ha ni/ sarba bi d+hi pak+Sha d+harma bar+d+ha ni/ sa ku la bud d+ha d+harma pa ri pU ra NI ye swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA a wa lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo
250b7(rgyud): d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prap+ta ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yo na maskr-i tA/ i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa ra mu khong gIdz+dza/ a mo g+ha pA sha ra dz+nyA nA ma hring
250b8(rgyud): yaM ta ta thA ga tA sa mu khe b+ha Shi taM/ ma hA ta pa ra Sha ma d+he a ha mi da ni mI brta ya Sh+ye mi/ sid d+h+ya ne tu me man+t+ra pa dAHsarba kAr+yA Ni/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nany+tsa rak+Sha b+hu ban+ta/ tad+ya thA/ a tsau ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ 
251a1(rgyud): tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mahA kA ru Ni kA/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ khi ri bi ri/ bi ri bo ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA padA haH/ ka la ka la/ 
251a2(rgyud): ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ bud+d+ha bu d+h+ya/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+tha ma prAb+ta/ 
251a3(rgyud): tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa le/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tai ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+he ra/ d+ha ra
251a4(rgyud): d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hA hA hI hI hU hU/ oM kA ra prah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ 
251a5(rgyud): sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ya ra ya ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ha ra ha ra/ rasmai sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maNI ta sha ri rA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha sa b+hA sa/ b+hU ma b+h+ra ma b+ha ga wan so ma/ A di t+ya/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be
251a6(rgyud): ra brah+men+na/ bA yu/ ag+ni / d+ha na da/ de ba/ ri Shi ga Na a b+hu ra tsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sa nata ku mA re/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Ta/ d+he na da/ bA yu/ ag+ni ri Shi/ nA ya ka/ bi nA ya ka bcu
251a7(rgyud): bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka/ sa man ta a wa lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ 
251a8(rgyud): ma he shwa ra/ tri b+hA ba ne shwa ra/ sarba gu Na sa ma a la kri ta/ a ba lo ki shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwA sh+tsa sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarbo pa dra be b+h+yaHsarbo ba sarge b+h+yaHsarba gra he/ 
251b1(rgyud): b+h+yaHsarba bA d+hi b+h+yaHsa rba bi'i b+h+yaHsarba dz+war b+h+yaHse ga/ ba d+ha ban d+han/ tA ran/ tardza na/ rAnga?/ taska ra/ ag+ni/ ud// bi Sha/ shasta pa ma tsaka/ kaN kaN/ ki/ ki Ni/ kANu ku Nu/ tsar car/ 6 car/ tsu durbaru/ 
251b2(rgyud): in+di ya/ ba la/ be dz+yo ga/ tsa tu ra Ar+ya satwa sa pra kA sha ka/ ta pa ta pe/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA ta mo an d+ha kA ra bi d+ha ma na/ ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ ma
251b3(rgyud): la ma la/ mi li mi li/ mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ maTha Sha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ Shi dzi Shi Shi/ wu 'u zhu dzu/ e na ya tsar+m+ma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hu ta ga Na sa
251b4(rgyud): b+han+daka/ ka ra/ rA/ ki gi ri/ ku ru ku ru/ bar bar/ har har/ dang bar/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ka pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ kiTi Ti/ kuT+Ta ku Ta/ ma Ta maT/ ma hA ba shud d+ha bi Sha ya ni ba sin/ 
251b5(rgyud): ma hA kA ru Ni ka shre ta yadz+nyo u pa bI ti/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra/ si kri ta dza Ta mu ku Ta/ ma hA ad b+hu ta/ ka ma la a la kr-i ta ka ra ta la/ d+hu na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha a pra kas+yA/ ba hu/ 
251b6(rgyud): satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karma A wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba d+hA dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba byA d+hi ba ri mo tsa ka/ sarba satwa a sha pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa sa mI shA sa ka ra na maHstu te swA hA/ a mo/ 
251b7(rgyud): g+ha ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a ba rA dz+ri tA ya swA hA/ e mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+ha su tra ya swA hA/ mA ra sai n+ya pra marda nA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yA ya swA hA/ a b+ha ya pra da ya swA hA/ 
251b8(rgyud): dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dza yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ ba ra pra dA ya sAhA/ e kA la mri t+yA pra sha mi nA ya swAhA/ oM da ny+tsa me karma ku ru na mo stu te swA hA/ a ra Na ra Na hU phaT swA hA/ a dzo ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM dza~M/ 
252a1(rgyud): / dz+ri dzas+'u hA/ oM dz+nyAdz+nyA ya swAhA/ a rbA trai lo kyo khings a mag+ho pA sha a pra ti sa ta wi haHthA phaT swAhA/ o ba su ba ti swAhA/ oM A ro li ka sA hA/ oM ba hu le bgu le swAhA/ oM A rol ka hrI gr-i dz+nyAg/ 
252a2(rgyud): swA hA/ ni ya ta a ni ya ta be da nA ya a shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wan karma No a she Sha taHk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/ oM pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya swA hA// bklags pas las thams cad grub pa yin no// dus
252a3(rgyud): gsum du bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// a ga ru'i bdug spos dang / thal ba dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur
252a4(rgyud): bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo // rims nad thams cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o// nad thams cad la mar ram/ mar nug gam/ chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// lus las
252a5(rgyud): khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas bcad cing srung skud kyang bya'o// lton pa la tshwa chus nyams par byed pa 'am/ 'jim bag gam/ chu/ sa kyang bya'o// mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar
252a6(rgyud): bya'o// so'i nid la ka ra bi ra'i so shing gis so// mtshams bcing ba la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings te phyogs bzhir gang / 
252a7(rgyud): par byas na mtshams bcings pa yin no// thams cad du srung skud dam/ chu 'am/ thal bas bya'o// bza' thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o// rims thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bya'o// sbrul dang / 
252a8(rgyud): srin bu dang / ba spu byi ba dang / lhog pa dang / gre ba 'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling dang ldan pas bya'o// mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu'am/ rgya skyegs kyi chu 'am/ sbrang rtsi'am/ shing mngar gyis bya'o// rtsod
252b1(rgyud): pa'i dus thams cad du rtsod pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa la tshul yongasu bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o// yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'che ba la yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par bzhag nas gtsang
252b2(rgyud): gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de yi chus kyang gtor bar byas nas sems can thams cad srung ba yin no// nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / yams rnam
252b3(rgyud): zhi ba yin no// phyag rgya tsan dan gyi thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongasu bzlas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par byed do// rtag tu bzlas na khyim srung ba'o// pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis sems can
252b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi srung ba'o// tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang / 'byung po dang / rgyu skar thams cad las srung ba'o// rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / na gu li
252b5(rgyud): dang ta dri rin gu li dang / d+ha ra ni dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang / dbang po'i lag pa dang / dri'i pri yang ku dang / ta ka ra dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / so ma ra dzI
252b6(rgyud): dang ta su nad da zhes bya ba ste/ de dag gang yang rung ba la brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongasu bzlas nas nor bu lta bur byas nas mgo bo dang / dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o// byis pa rnams kyi ni mgul du'o// bud med rnams
252b7(rgyud): kyi mdoms su bcangs na rang nyid mchog tu skal ba dang ldan par byed do// g.yang med pa nyams nas bu yang ster ro// nor bu 'di bcangs pas thams cad du srung ba byas pa yin no// dug dang mes mi tshugs so// 
252b8(rgyud): dug gis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyuraro// bza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang sprin dang thog ni chus rengs par byed do// ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas ni las thams cad
253a1(rgyud): byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed do// de nas sgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i cho ga ni tshon sna ma lus pas
253a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral ba'i cod pan 'chang ba ri dgas kyi lpags pas smad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba
253a3(rgyud): / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// lha bzo mkhan gzo sbyong dang ldan pas ri mo ri bri bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ dri zhim
253a4(rgyud): po'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o// nye bar spyod pa brgyad dang / nye bar mkho ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / khrag med pa'i gtor mra sha dang bcas pa bya'o// a ga ru'iri bdug spos bsregs la rig
253a5(rgyud): pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// nyin zhag gcig tu bsnyung bar gnas pa 'am/ dkar gsum za zhing dus gsum du khrus bya sa nas gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o// de nas
253a6(rgyud): sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid bris pa bltas te de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// ldong ros sam
253a7(rgyud): mig sman la yongasu bzlas te mig la bskus na de nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo// sgrub pa po gang
253a8(rgyud): 'dod pa de 'dis byed do zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang
253b1(rgyud): chu mas da dadag sa rgyas mams kyis dzu ga dang / skang ma dang / lham tshan dang /  mas pa la na pa das te bamam ldan pas kyis gangs pa la mngon par ma
253b2(rgyud): 'jigs padod mad nags para'i myong banas bya ba bag padzin pa ying dgaso// / rtag kyim khan po lam badz+ra du / da kyim na ba dge slong da chen grags pas brgyu chang dus
253b3(rgyud): // rgya na du/ sa rgyas po sto gatha~M la mang ma dad ba d+hA hU~M/ khongs du/ 'gas pa dan med dgas pa'i nga pa nas bya ba gsus/ sangs rgyas dang bya
253b4(rgyud): sems dpa' das gsum du gshegs shing btsugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'dres pa dang /  byod pa dang / pak+ta / da ba'i sangs rgyas dang / 'phags panyan thos thams cad la
253b5(rgyud): phyag la 'o// 'a dag par ma ba dang / yang dag par zhugs rnams pa phyag 'a la// khrugs chen po shA du ti'i dul bya/ 'cha'o// 'phags pa byams pa la sags pa byang chub ma
253b6(rgyud): khams sa kya nga// sags pade g+sa shegs pa mam pas sa par rdzogs pa ma sa rgyas 'od ga se sa phyag la la// na mchag gsums phyan 'as bya chu mas/ 
253b7(rgyud): dbang sems dpa chen po lags pa smrang sa gzugs dang drug suMpa chen po dang ldan pa la phyag la la/ sa du can po thob pa la phyag 'tshal// de dmas la phyag 'tshal nas 'chags pa stan sa
253b8(rgyud): gags dang thug mi 'das 'arjo ba bzhin gshegs par byed snga la kho sang pa'i dus su smras 'dod yang rigs pa ning bzhes pagyi ba dbyung bdagags pashad par bgyi'o// bdag gis sngags
254a1(rgyud): // kyi tshig dang dgos pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrungs shig/ tad+ya thA/ o tsar tsa ra/ tsi tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mar ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mahA
254a2(rgyud): kA ru Ni ka/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ pi ri bi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha satwA/ bud+hu bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ bo d+hi
254a3(rgyud): bo d+hi ti bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki NaM/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+tha ma prap+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsA sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ ai Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ 
254a4(rgyud): b+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru Ni// ma hA ba shu pa ti bi Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+huH// ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ 
254a5(rgyud): la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha hI hI hu hu/ oM kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+h+wa / d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ nar nar/ ba ra ba ra/ ha ra ha ra/ rasmai sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha ri ra/ dzaH/ 
254a6(rgyud): dz+wa lata ta ba ta pa/ b+hA sa b+hA sa/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+ha ga wan som/ A dit+ya/ ya ma/ ba ruH/ ku bai ra/ brad+yAn+tha/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ d+hA nad/ de ba/ r-i'i ga Na a b+h+yar tsi ta tsaraH/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru su ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sa na/ 
254a7(rgyud): ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa be/ biSh+Ti/ d+ha na da/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ ri Shi/ na ya ka/ bi nA ya ka ba hu pi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra
254a8(rgyud): sar ta ba rab ra/ ba ra dA ya ka/ sa man+ta a wa le ka ti/ bi lo ki ti/ la kau shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ tri b+hu ba ne shwa ra/ sarba gu Na sa ma a laM kr-i ta/ a wa lo ka te shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muN+Da muH
254b1(rgyud): shAm+b+ha shIk+Sh+Na/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nang 'gob thams cad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / dug thams cad dang / na thams cad las/ 
254b2(rgyud): bsrungs shig bsrungs shig/ de bzhin du bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / spyo ba dang / rgyal po dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongasu thar bar gyur cig/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku
254b3(rgyud): Nud tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la/ bo dz+yog// tsa tur Ar+yas t+ya sa pra kA sha ka/ ta pa ta pa/ ta ma tam/ dam dam/ sa ma sa ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA ta mo/ an d+ha kA ra bi d+ha ma na/ Sharba bA
254b4(rgyud): ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ ma la ma la/ mi li mi li/ mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta TaT/ Sha Sha Sha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu ku Tu Tu/ Shi dzi dzi dzi/ dzu'u lu'u/ e Ne ye tsar+m+ma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ I shwa ra/ ma he
254b5(rgyud): raHma hA b+hu ta ga Na saM b+hany+tsa ka/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma hA bi shud d+ha bi Sha ya ni
254b6(rgyud): bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shre ta ya dz+nyA u pa bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta dza TA ma ku Ta/ ma hA ad b+hu ta/ ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ka ra ta la/ d+hu na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha/ a pra kam+b+ha/ ba hu satwa san
254b7(rgyud): ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba A wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka/ sarba satwa A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shA sa na ka ra na mosta te swA hA/ a me g+ha ya
254b8(rgyud): swA hA/ a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pA ra dzI tA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+h+ya su tA ya swA hA/ mA ra saM n+ya pra mdza nA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yA ya swA hA/ a b+ha ya pra dwe ya swA hA/ dza yA ya/ 
255a1(rgyud): / swA hAHbi dzi yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bidze yA ya swAhA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ bar prad ya swA hA/ a kA la mri t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/ i dany+tsa me karma ku run mo stu te swA hA/ oM ro/ ShaHhU phaT/ 
255a2(rgyud): dza ya hUM phaT/ oM dz+ra dze dzu swA hA/ oM hU~M dza ya swA hA/ oM hriHtrai lo kyo bi dza ya a mo gA pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs bum pa la bzlas pas mi
255a3(rgyud): bgegs kyis brlams pa 'am/ 'dra gdon gyis zin pa 'am/ byad 'og tu chud pa 'am/ bud med byur dad cing bu med pa 'am/ bu mi 'tsho ba la sogs pa la phan par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bya na/ 'bab chu'i 'gram ma/ 
255a4(rgyud): shing gcig pa'i drung ngam/ lam gyi gzhi mdo'am/ khang sto/ la sogs pa'i dbus nas dkyil 'khor gyis blang bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ bsgo bzhi la/ nub phyogs sam/ byang bya/ 
255a5(rgyud): kyi sgo btod pa cig tshon rtsi dkar po sna gcig gis bris te/ dbus su yang pad+ma dkar po mdab ma brgyad pa cig bris la/ gser dngul lam zangs kyi bum pa mazhum pa/ mi 'jigs pa 'am/ 
255a6(rgyud): kham pa'i bum pa sar pa so btang ba'i nag po dang ra ri med pa gcig spos chus btang ste/ rin po che sna lnga/ 'bru sna lnga blugs la/ mgul ras dkar po sor pa kha tshar ma bcad pa dang / me tog gi phreng bas
255a7(rgyud): bcings te/ khar shug pa'am/ thang shing gi mgo lcogs bcug la me tog dang 'bras bus rgyan pa gcig pad+ma'i steng du bzhag la/ gzungs klog pa nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur
255a8(rgyud): bsgyur te/ bum pa de yang rin chen rdzing bu bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsams la/ chu de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po cig byung bar bsams te/ pad+ma de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po yi ge
255b1(rgyud): dkar po bsams te/ yi ge de las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu gyur par bsams la mchod pa dang / bstod pa byas te gang bsgrubs pa'i dngos po grub par gyur cig ces gsol ba/ 
255b2(rgyud): btab pas/ a mo g+ha bA sha'i gzungs mang pos bum pa de la lan bcu gsum du tshig gzhan mi smra bar bzlas te/ bum pa de'i chus de'i spyi bo nas blugs na bgegs dang gdon la sogs pa
255b3(rgyud): las thar par 'gyur ro// de la gos dang bcas par spyi bo nas blugs la/ blugs pa'i tshe yang gzungs klog pa dang / klog par bya ba gnyis kas kyang lus phyi nang gnyis dag pa dang / 'dre gdon las
255b4(rgyud): thar par sems rtse gcig tu sems shing bklag go// gos gsher ba da yang yugs dor ba'i thabasu bor la/ gos da// 8 bo sor pa gon te/ spos dang / me tog la sogs pas lus brgyan
255b5(rgyud): pa de nyid lan gcig bklags pas bsrungs te bkra shis kya daklag go// dkyil 'khor de'i kho ra khor yug tu 'jig rten skyong ba ra brgyad kyang so so'i ming smos te spyan drangs la mchod nas/ las
255b6(rgyud): gang bsgrub pa de grub par gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga pa gcig gis mchod la/ 'byung po phal rnams la yang gtor ma rgya cher sbyin no// bdag srung ba dang / mtshams bcad pa yang a mo g+ha
255b7(rgyud): pA sha'i gzungs de nyid kyis tshul bzhin du byas na/ de yang tshes brgyad la bya ba'i rig so// cho ga 'di bgegs kyis brlal kros gong du smos pa rnams la thar par 'gyur ba 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ mi tha mal pa la byas
255b8(rgyud): na yang byis bgegs dang / byang stems kyis mi tshugs/ nad 'go bas mi thebs/ dpal che zhing bsams so cog 'grub par 'gyuraro// rin po che sna lnga la gser byi ru/ mu tig dung / shel/ sman lnga la/ sing ha/ b+hA k+Shi/ 
256a1(rgyud): gi ri rni/ sa ha/ sa ha dag 'bru sna lnga la/ nas so ga// 'bras so ga/ til/ gro/ mon sran/ ma sha'o// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
256a2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha pA ra mi ta Sha TA ri pU ra ya na ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
256a3(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
256a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal// oM a mo g+ha pA sha ma hA dA na pA ra mi ta pa ri pU ra ya hUM/ da ra da ra/ bi bi d+ha ra/ bi tsi
256a5(rgyud): traMHsarba satwA u pa b+ho ga/ sarba ta thA ga te/ ma hA da na/ pU dza me g+ha pra brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ya ma hA pad+ma ma Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po
256a6(rgyud): chen po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam gyi sbyin pa yang byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin chen po rnam par 'phral pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
256a7(rgyud): phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras
256a8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha shI la/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ti/ b+hu dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a wa lo ki te hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan
256b1(rgyud): lag brgyad bzung nas bsrung bar gnas pa byas te mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dran pas brjod par bya'o// de nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis
256b2(rgyud): modado la tshul khrims dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags
256b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran par byed na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongasu dag par 'gyu ro// dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams par gyur pas bsnyung bar gnas pa
256b4(rgyud): byas te/ gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la tshul khrims yong su dag par 'gyur zhing tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca
256b5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po swA nga rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang ngaphyug la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha k+ShAn ti sarba bo d+hi satwak+Sha mi/ 
256b6(rgyud): Natak+Sha Na k+Sha Na ma hA mai tI ka ru Na/ sarba satwa bta sa la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba satwa k+Sha mi Na hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pas sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa dang / bzod pa chen po dang / snying brtse ba
256b7(rgyud): dang rtasnying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang / bya dang / ltos 'gro la sogs pa gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / 
256b8(rgyud): gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig gzungs 'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par byed na de sems can dmyal ba dang / yi
257a1(rgyud): dgas dang / dud 'gro thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur zhing / skye bo'i tshogs mang po sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// nam sangs rgyas
257a2(rgyud): kyi zhing yongasu dag pa la gnas par gyur gyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems
257a3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// oM ma hA bIr+ya a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ dr-i b+ha bIr+ya ma hA ba la/ ba la ba
257a4(rgyud): lata ma hA bo d+h+r-i ga/ ba la/ bo d+ha ni hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu dran pa 'am/ yongasu dag cing spro ba'i yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis modo la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
257a5(rgyud): dag par 'gyur ro// gang 'di yid la byed pa dang ldan pas da/ ge ba'i sna 'ga' tsam byas pa yang dpag tu med pa byasapar 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ myur bar 'gyur ro// 
257a6(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du brtson 'grus nyams par mi 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur// brtson pa chen por 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de
257a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma
257a8(rgyud): a mo g+ha ka ru Na/ d+h+ya na/ sa mA d+hi/ sar+b+ba bi mo k+Sha/ a pra ka s+yA ka/ tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT swA hA// gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du yid la byed pas rtse gcig tu dran par byas na dran
257b1(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mdo la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par
257b2(rgyud): 'gyu ro// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mdo la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyu ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
257b3(rgyud): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal// oM a mo g+ha ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta a ba b+hA sa swa b+hA ba/ sa maM s+pha ra Na/ bud d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man+ta bud d+hi/ a ba lo// 
257b4(rgyud): ki te/ b+ha ga bAn pradz+nyA a ba lo ki te tsak+Shu ShA ma hA pradz+nyA/ ba ra dA ma/ Ni ma hA pradz+nyA/ pad+ma d+ha ra Ni b+hu dze hUM phaT swA hA// gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mdo la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
257b5(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i blo chen po rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 
257b6(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i shes
257b7(rgyud): rab kyi blo dang / rab tu ldan par 'gyuraro// lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / 
257b8(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yong su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang rmongs par mi 'gyuraro// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yA
258a1(rgyud): dag par rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tham/ 
258a2(rgyud): cad kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i
258a3(rgyud): gzungs chen po rdzogaso// // paN+Di ta many+dzu shri warma dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// lats+tsha ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te
258a4(rgyud): gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ da she b+ha mi d+hA dA rA Ni/ bod skad du/ sa bcu pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de nas
258a5(rgyud): gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyis dgos pa thams cad so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba ni/ oM zhes bya ba don yod na gas pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad gsang
258a6(rgyud): sngags yi ge gcig po 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na sa dang po la gnas par 'gyuraro// sngon sdig pa bsags pa'i sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag
258a7(rgyud): thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ don thams cad rjesu 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang
258a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan yang dgyes par 'gyur la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do// gsang sngags oM zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams
258b1(rgyud): bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o// oM b+h+yaHyi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gnyis pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi
258b2(rgyud): spyan snga na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / mchog thams cad rjesu sbyin par mdzad do// sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi las ngan gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang
258b3(rgyud): po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas kyang ri gru 'dzin tu skye bar 'gyur/ don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob pa/ 
258b4(rgyud): 'gyu ro ta yi ge gnyis pa'o// oM pad+me/ gsang sngags yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang
258b5(rgyud): gsang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phag sa pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyuraro// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog
258b6(rgyud): rjesu sbyin par mdzad do// don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub
258b7(rgyud): rjesu sbyin par mdzad do// yi ge gsum pa'o// oM pad+ma hrIHgsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs bsku
258b8(rgyud): mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/ rig sngags 'chang la legaso zhes bya ba rjesu sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang tshur shog khyod
259a1(rgyud): kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongasu dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongasu dag go// mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rab
259a2(rgyud): dran par 'gyur ro// phyir zhing nams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// sa gzhi pa'o// oM pad+ma b+ha dze gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum
259a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad// sgrib pa thams cad yongasu zad par
259a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// tarig sngags 'chang la legaso zhes bya'i sgra sbyin par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legaso log so// khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod
259a5(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyed tshe 'phro sa nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyed par 'gyur
259a6(rgyud): zhing tanga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur// khyod kyis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po'i rim par phye ba 'grub cing rig sngags
259a7(rgyud): 'chang khyod sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du de dag thams cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro// sa lnga pa'o// 
259a8(rgyud): oM pad+ma lo ki te/ gzung sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig

259b2(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan des rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang khyod nga'i
259b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog/ las byas pa shin tu yongs su zad cing / khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad / khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi
259b4(rgyud): zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs dpa rnams kyi sa bon dang rigs spyi ni khong du chud/ khyod kyi sa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / 
259b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las
259b6(rgyud): thams cad byos shig/ oM pad+ma dz+wa la hUM hri ka/ yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas
259b7(rgyud): lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogasu 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
259b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dang gang du 'od zer chen po tshor 'bar ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
260a1(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi kha dog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag
260a2(rgyud): g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legaso zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legaso logs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bco ldan 'das kyi snying po gsang ba
260a3(rgyud): brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yi no// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba ces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o// rig sngags
260a4(rgyud): 'chang khyod kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad+ma ga tsug gtor gyi snying po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying por sprul pa grub kyis/ rig sngags 'chang ba tu rgyan
260a5(rgyud): ng+yas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig/ oM a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+ma gzungs kyi snying po maM ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongasu dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor
260a6(rgyud): bu rin po che me shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang lus yongasu dag par 'gyur sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
260a7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yong su dag pa rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bor ston cing / rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du gnas pa la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ 
260a8(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog pa mdzad/ legaso zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs leg so// rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dga' ba la zhugs so// 
260b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten rnam par lta bar tshur shog/ der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyuraro// khyod kyis don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug to/ 
260b2(rgyud): gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ oM pad+mo lo tsa ne hu ru hUM/ gzungs sngags yi ge dgu pa 'bum
260b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na sa dag pa la gnas par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
260b4(rgyud): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mdo na sum du ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pra sna tshogs ston par byed/ rig sngags 'chang spyi bor thams cad
260b5(rgyud): kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad de/ legaso zhes bya ba yang sbyin pa mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legaso log so// khyod kyis nga/ la zhing sbyangs pa'i las legs par sgrub par byaso// khyod kyis
260b6(rgyud): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa grub ste/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor sgrub pa dang / mdo sde dang / lung dang bcas pa sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
260b7(rgyud): 'dren pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dag grub pa yin no// oM pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ma le hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog par gyur nas sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha
260b8(rgyud): dang / mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// zhes brjod la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod nags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor los
261a1(rgyud): bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o// gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod nags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas badz+rad
261a2(rgyud): tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa gtsang ma/ gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje skyes pa/ bden par smra ba
261a3(rgyud): bla ma la gus pa dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to// sa bcu pa'i gzus
261a4(rgyud): pan yon dang rtog pa rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ sa mo g+ha pA sha ka wA rA dza b+hi d+hin ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i tshi ga zhes bya ba/ sa
261a5(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de na/ sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags kha spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la
261a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis shing bsngags pa don yod pa'i
261a7(rgyud): zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo zhes bgyi ba 'di nyid skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / rjesu brtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du brjod par bgyi yis
261a8(rgyud): gson cig/ oM pad+ma ha sta ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha sa hA yA sa ma ya hr-i da yA tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po zhes bgyi ste/ las thams cad kyang bgyid pa'o// oM byas hA/ 
261b1(rgyud): ran ge ba lo ki kA Ni hU~M/ mkhar bsil gyi rig pa ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na sgra grags pas sems can rnaMs ngan 'gro las thar par 'gyu ro// oM pat+ta pA ra ya a mo g+ha ba to sa man+ta pra b+he swA hA/ lhung /

261b3(rgyud): bgyis nas mdzub mo nor bu ltar bgyis te/ gung mo yod tsam bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste lag pa spyi bor kan nas bzhag pa spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i rig pa 'di
261b4(rgyud): lan bdun brjod do// oM t+yai ng+ga a nu ga ta a nug taM/ a b+hiShi n+yaHmA san trai ya d+hi ke pad+ma ma Ni su pad+me a mo g+hi sarba ta thA ga tAH a d+hiSh+Tha te hUM/ rig pa 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngag
