261b6(rgyud): chen por yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi gtso bo gcig pu'i gnas su yang 'gyur/ 
261b7(rgyud): the tsom ma mchis// oM pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ma le hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'di snying rje dang ldan par bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na
261b8(rgyud): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba nas sa bcu la gnas pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag gis 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
262a1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das
262a2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'di ni yon tan chen po tshad ma mchis pa rnams dang ldan par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
262a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags kyi snying po 'di dag ni yi ge 'bru re re tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu gang gis ched du gnyer te/ ches ngal
262a4(rgyud): zhing dub par bzlas brjod dang / sgrub pa dang / tsho gas tshul ba bzhin du rgyus par sgrub pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ don yo dra pa'i zhags pa'i pad ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po

262a6(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyis kyang sems can de'i mtshams med pa'i las byas pas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar gzhol ba tshe bskal par gnas par 'gyur ba yang las thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sdig
262a7(rgyud): pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyang rab tu zad par 'gyur/ lus yong su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshes 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'ja
262a8(rgyud): rten gyi khamasu pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ nam yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
262b1(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyu ro// sgrub pa'i tshi ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
262b2(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dri ma med pa gsang ba 'di rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
262b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la las lan cig tsam yang dran pas yid la byed cing / yong su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byams
262b4(rgyud): pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sems sa can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i blo dang / dmigs pa dang / ldan pas sems can gang yang rung ba'i rna khung du brjod na sems
262b5(rgyud): can de dag ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur te de ni gnas med do// sems can de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan pa ra 'gyuraro// lan gnyis brjod na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
262b6(rgyud): / 'gyu ro// lan gsum brjod na rims dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang / lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdzen thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan bzhi brjod na/ dug dang / dbyig

262b8(rgyud): thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan bdun brjod na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad
263a1(rgyud): kyi 'che ba dang / yams thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin de bzhin du tshig gzhan mi smra bar snying po 'di lan bdun bdun dran / 
263a2(rgyud): pas bzlas par bya'o// lag na rdo rje gang la la dag 'di ltar sdig pa mi dge ba bcu rab tu spyod pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa/ 'phags pa'i gang zag la rab tu bsnyas pas de
263a3(rgyud): ngag sems can dmyal bar gzhol pas tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong gang la la dag rang gi bslab pa'i sdom pa dral ba/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral cing zhig pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon
263a4(rgyud): la ma gus shi ra khu ba dang / dam pa'i chos la rma 'byin pas tshe/  dus byas par gyur nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur/ ra pa de dag gi don du bye ma gtsang ma la lan grangs bdun bdun bzlas
263a5(rgyud): nas dur khrod du bor ba'i ro dang / ro bsregs pa'i rus pa 'am/ dudu dadu bcug pa'i ro'am/ rus pa la bye ma des gtor bar bya'o// gang dang gang na sems can rnams kyi rus pa gang dag yod pa de dang de
263a6(rgyud): dag tu bya ma des gtor ma thag tu/ de dang der bye mas phog pa'i sems can de dag rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dung 'gro dang / sha za'i skye gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi skye gnasu skyes par gyur na yang
263a7(rgyud): de dag de'i med pa tshe rjes nas thams cad mthongs kyi 'jig rten lha dang mi rigan su rab tu gnol par 'gyur zhing / phyin cad nam yang sems can thams cad dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / nga 'gro gro ba rnam su
263a8(rgyud): bar mi 'gyuro// gzungs sngags yi ge bcu pa 'di nyid grog dang / ras sam shog bul bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/ gnas der srog chags dang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang mangs pa dang / dang / 
263b1(rgyud): med pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa tsam gyis de dag gi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing mtho risu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ri dgas dang / 
263b2(rgyud): bya dang / wa dang / khyi dang / ne'u la dang / grog sbur dang / sbrul dang / rus sbal dang / lag 'gro la sogs pa srog chags phra mo gang dag gis mchod rten de'i grib ma la 'grims pa thams cad kyang grig
263b3(rgyud): ma phogo pa tsam gyis de dag rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad kyang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gnol par 'gyu ro// bung dungu la sogs pa la lan
263b4(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon pa'i rtse ma nas du/ de bus na/ sems can gang dag gis dung de'i sgra thos pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ lha 'am/ yi dgra/ 
263b5(rgyud): sam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad brda 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i ye shes gnyen rnams dang phrad nas chos thos te rims kyis mya ngan
263b6(rgyud): las 'da' ba'i bar du 'gyuraro// sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum nye bar gzung ba dang / gang dag tshul khrims yongasu dag pa
263b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas yang dag par bsdams pa de dag gis sgra de thos na/ de dag thams cad byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
263b8(rgyud): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshe de rjes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyu ro// tsan dan dkar po la lan bdun
264a1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / dkor sa 'am/ skye bo'i dbus sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdug par byas na/ gang dag de'i dri la bsnams pa'i sems can de dag tham
264a2(rgyud): cad kyang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgya skye sku yongasu rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// chos gsol rab tu bdugs nas lus la gyon na gang zag 'i
264a3(rgyud): sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lus la bab pa tsam gyis bag chags kyi dri ma dang / ser sna dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyuraro// gos la 'dugs
264a4(rgyud): te bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// bdag gi gos la rab tu bdugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs dan rgyal po dang / btsun mor bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyu ro// kun gyi
264a5(rgyud): mchod gnas chen por 'gyuro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma ra 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhugs na dge 'dun thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyu ro// skye bor
264a6(rgyud): tshogs chen po'i nang du zhugs na nor dang / longs spyod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod gnas chen po'i 'osu yang 'gyuraro// tsan dan gyi bdug pa'i cho ga'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa las pad+ma'i gtsug
264a7(rgyud): tor dri ma med pa'i snying po'i le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po che'i// rtog pa rab tu bshad bya ste// don yong rgyal po rmad byung che// kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing // dkyil 'khor kun tu dbang
264a8(rgyud): bskur bas// sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// bdud dang bgegs dpung rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po bsang ba pa// 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros// bsam pa thams cad rab rdzogs byed// 
264b1(rgyud): oM b+ha g+ha Ti n+de la mo g+ha sa ma ye/ a b+hi'i n+ya mAM sarba bide a mo g+ha ya ga sa b+hi She/ hU/ mi li mi yi swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// de nas sku gzugs kyi chog ni dngul la khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi
264b2(rgyud): tshad shin tu mdzes shing tshad dang ldan pa/ gdong gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs can// rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pas spyi bor rgyan pa// zla ba tshes pa mgo la thogs pa// gdong gsum gyi dang po khro ga/ g.yas
264b3(rgyud): cung zad 'dzum pa/ g.yon gang mo dgod pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po na pad+ma/ 'og ma na ral gri 'byar ba/ g.yon dang po na nags pa/ 'og ma mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgya
264b4(rgyud): pa pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la rgyal po'i rol lhangs kyis 'dug / gcan zan khro bo'i lpags pas spang dkris pa'o// g.ya sa phyogs ni lha me sgrol ma ud pa la thogs pa rgyan thams cad
264b5(rgyud): kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// g.yon phyogasu ni lha mo rig sngags kyi rgya la po nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgya na pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi drung du rig sngags 'chang dbus me
264b6(rgyud): btsugs pa lag na spos por thogs shing bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das la gyen du blta ba'o// yang na ni ri mor bri bar bya ste cho ga bzhin no// gzugs brnyan de dag gi drang du ba'i lci bas byug pa byas pa/ 
264b7(rgyud): tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum gyis mchod yon bya ste/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhugasu gsol te/ de'i drung du bzlas
264b8(rgyud): brjod stong phrag brgyad bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyuraro// rkang pas phan tshun du 'chang bar 'gyur ro// gzugs las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ lagaso zhes
265a1(rgyud): sgra 'byin par 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsamaso cog thams cad dang / mchog thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 
265a2(rgyud): bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mdo la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyi mdo la dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// las
265a3(rgyud): thams cad kyang byed par 'gyu ro// bklags pas las thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / grub pa thams cad ston par 'gyuraro// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i zhags pa nas
265a4(rgyud): bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon chad bsags dpa'i bsod nams dang / las kyi sgo skal thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po
265a5(rgyud): thob pa dang / che ba nyam su myong bar 'gyur ro// gdong du bltas te ba zlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// pad+ma nas bzung ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad
265a6(rgyud): byas na nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ral gri nas bzung ste/ bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// rtse gsum
265a7(rgyud): pa nas bzung ste/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyu ro// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rked pa nas bzung ste bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rab
265a8(rgyud): dran par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ bdag nyid ji srid 'tshe'i bar du nor rnams nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khro/ 
265b1(rgyud): popo'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyuraro// 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// bzlas brjod dang / sgrub pa 'di dag gis ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
265b2(rgyud): dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzungs kyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du byon te/ ci dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga las phyung ba rdzog so// 
265b3(rgyud): paN+Di ta many+dza shrI warma dang / lots+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shas rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa ra e ka da sha mu kha ma na ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 
265b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyasbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems da dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de nas byang chub sems
265b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug riH/ sngags 'chang du mas yongasu bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
265b6(rgyud): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snying po gdong bcu
265b7(rgyud): gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa lags te/ de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / sdig pa dang / bkra mi
265b8(rgyud): shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / ma zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren
266a1(rgyud): rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di srung bar bgyi ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung bar bgyis pa dang / zhi ba dang
266a2(rgyud): bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyis pa dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / dug gzhil ba bgyis pa dang / gang la la zhig 'gal bar bgyid pa de ma mchis te/ de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcwa
266a3(rgyud): bta bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa na bdag grim mthong ste/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs lag so// snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
266a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa lag so// bcom ldan 'a dus bdag gi snying po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lag so// bcom ldan
266a5(rgyud): 'das bdag gis dran lags te/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye/ ma snyed kyi snga rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma brgya'i spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal
266a6(rgyud): po zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ bdag drang srong du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di mnos lags te/ thos ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa/ 
266a7(rgyud): yang thob ste/ de ltar bdag gi snying po 'di ni gces spras bgyid pa lag so// de lta lags pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// gzhan yid la
266a8(rgyud): mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o// nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad bton na/ tshe 'di la yon tan bcu yong su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na dron ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
266b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / des bsgrim mi 'tshal bar nor dang 'bru dang dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / dag thams cad khugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'i
266b2(rgyud): tshogs pa rnams gsong por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang / lus la dug gis mi tshugs pa dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang / rims kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / mtshon chas mi tshugs
266b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gram par dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur/ 
266b4(rgyud): lag so// gzhan yang yon tan bzhi yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur te// 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyurar ba dang / ngan song rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yang ba ma
266b5(rgyud): spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba ra 'gyur ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags
266b6(rgyud): te/ 'di nas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi yang ches snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa man da ra ba'i bsrung zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ de na bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di bzung nas bskal pa bzhi
266b7(rgyud): khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil lag so// bdag gis snying po 'di bton pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so// gang
266b8(rgyud): dag bcing bas bcings pa rnams dang / gang dag bcing ba la thug pa rnams dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po
267a1(rgyud): 'dis gnas pa dang / bskyab pa dang / skyabs dang dpung gnyen bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po sdang ba rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i semasu bgyi ste/

267a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/

267a7(rgyud): dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur lag so// gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba bgyid na de dag gi sug par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa
267a8(rgyud): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can thams cad la de ltar snying rje che pa legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu thabs 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang
267b1(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par nus te/ ngas kyang snying po 'di bzung zhing rje su yi rang ba byas kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags

268b8(rgyud): bgyis na gdon bgegs thams cad thag ring du spong bas nye bar mchi zhing grags rnyed par mi 'gyur lag so// rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bsngags pa brjod cing // mtshul
269a1(rgyud): / par rjesu thugs rangs par mdzad pa lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu bzung bar mdzad pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ bskal pa gang+gA'i
269a2(rgyud): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma brgya'i spyan thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i gtsug tor yon tan rab tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes
269a3(rgyud): bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bdag de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de las rig sngags 'dis mnos lags te/ rig sngags 'di thob pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar
269a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yang thob par gyur pas rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lag so// de lta bas na yongasu dang ba dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
269a5(rgyud): bu mo la sogs pa dag gis rig sngags 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don par 'tshal na gus pas sems rtse gcig tu dran pas bcangs te rtag par nang par langs nas chos
269a6(rgyud): bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/ rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la phan yon rnam pa bcu thob par 'gyur lag so// bcu gang zhe na/ rtag par lus la blo nad ma mchi
269a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongasu gzung bar 'gyur ba dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / zas bas pa ma mchis pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ba/ 
269a8(rgyud): dang / dgra thams cad rdul zhing / 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ya rabs btsun pa rnams kyis bskur zhing gsong bor smra bar 'gyur ba dang / dug dang 'dre gdon gyis mi tshugs shing gnod
269b1(rgyud): pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus
269b2(rgyud): bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lag so// gzhan yang yon tan gyi sman yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe sangs
269b3(rgyud): rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / nams kyang ngan 'gro rnamasu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yang ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
269b4(rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur ba dag lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi das mngon par dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal pa gang gi'iklung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol dag gis yang ches snga rol
269b5(rgyud): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas man da ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba 'dzi/ rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bdag khyim bdag chen po zhig tu gyur pas
269b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas de la rig sngags 'di mnos lags te/ rig sngags 'di thob ma thag tu bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil lag so// rig sngags 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dag gis gzhan yang sangs rgyas
269b7(rgyud): rnams kyi thugs rje chen po'i ye shes kyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi sgo thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis gang dag btson ra dam por chud pa/ 
269b8(rgyud): dang / btson char stsal pa dang / 'gum pa la thug pa dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / klung dang / chom rkun dang / dug dang / byang stems dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs
270a1(rgyud): / kyi bgegs thams cad las yongasu skyob par bgyid pa lag so// bdag ni 'di yi dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / skyabs dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs srung / 
270a2(rgyud): ba dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / gling dang / khang khyim du gyur pa lag so// rig sngags 'di'i mthus gnod sbyin dang / srin po ma rungs pa thams cad yongs su bsdu zhing bzung nas sngar byams pa'i sam/ 
270a3(rgyud): dang /  snying rje'i sems bskyed du bstsal nas/ de'i rjes la bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags 'di'i gzi byin
270a4(rgyud): chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas gang la la zhig gis lan cig tsam bzlas brjod bgyis na yang rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang / dmatshams ma mchis pa lnga yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur na/ jis
270a5(rgyud): bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang gsangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las da/ ba'i rtsa bskrun pa rnams kyis deng gdod rig sngags 'di thos
270a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ba lags ni len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ ging la la zhig gis gdugs mtshon du rig sngags 'di klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 
270a7(rgyud): 'dzin par bgyid na bdag gis de dag gi smon pa ci mchis pa yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid lag so// gang la la zhig gis zla ba phyed cing tshes bcu bzhi'am bco lnga la smyung ba bgyis te/ sdom pa yang dag
270a8(rgyud): parablangs nas chos bzhin du yong su dag par bgyis te/ sems kyi gcig ti bdag rjesu dran par bgyis nas rig sngags 'di ba zlas brjod bgyis na/ bskal pa ba ni khri'i lali rab bsnyil par 'gyur legs/ 
270b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag na rig sngags 'di dbang gis ming btsun ning thos pa dga' bar gyur lags te/ gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bye ba zlag khrig brgya slong dma'i mtshan nas brjod cing yid
270b2(rgyud): bsams pa dang / gzhan yang 'ga' zhig gis skad cig tsam du bsam pa thag nas/ bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjesu dran par gyur na de gnyis kyi yon tan mnyam shing mtshungs lag so// bdag gis
270b3(rgyud): ming nas brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyu ro// blo nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur/ 
270b4(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa cu byang bar 'gyur na bdag gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog ba dang / 'don pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos
270b5(rgyud): kyang ci 'tshal lags te/ gang zag de dag ni bla na ma mchis pa byang chub lag mthil na mchis pa bzhin du khong du chud kyi nga legs par 'gyur bar rig par bgyid lag so// de nas
270b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legaso legs zhes bsngags pa brjod naso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can thams cad la de lta bu'i byams pa dang / 
270b7(rgyud): snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed pa nas rig sngags chen po 'di rnam par phye ste bstan pa yin pas khyod thabs 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang / bgegs dang / 
270b8(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa las yongasu skyob pa thar bar byas nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rnam par 'jog pa yin te/ 
271a1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu nga yang rje su yi rang nas khyod kyi rig sngags yongasu bzung gis khyod kyis spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
271a2(rgyud): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mos g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rig sngags 'di 'don pa gang lags
271a3(rgyud): ba des 'di skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
271a4(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sem/ ngas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
271a5(rgyud): dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo zhes brjod pas bgyi lagaso// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ in+d+ri baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa la
271a6(rgyud): ku su ma ku su ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa li ma pa na ya shud d+ha tA swA hA/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rtse ba'i rig sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig gis rjesu dran zhing bzlas
271a7(rgyud): brjod bgyis na gong du bstan pa lta bu yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho
271a8(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshalo// byang chu sems dpa'
271b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha ha/ i li mi li/ tsi li pi li/ khi li hi le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'dri/ 
271b2(rgyud): chab dang gos la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'tshal na sngar khrus bgyis te/ de'i rjes la sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btab ste lus la gtor nas
271b3(rgyud): bsang bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis lan bdun btab ste bzod bgo bar bgyi lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
271b4(rgyud): rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus paraphyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par
271b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ 
271b6(rgyud): ha ha ha ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dogo spos dang / mar me la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas pogo bsregs mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshe sngags 'dis bgo spos la
271b7(rgyud): lan bdun btab ste gdod sreg par bgyi'o// mar me sbar bar 'tshal na yang sngar sngags 'dis 'bru mar la lan bdun ste gdod mar me sbar bar bgyi lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag
271b8(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
272a1(rgyud): thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya
272a2(rgyud): si ri si ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ si ri d+hi ri swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni me tog dang / byug spos dang / phreng ba la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas me tog dang / byug spos dang / phreng ba dag gi
272a3(rgyud): mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis me tog la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la gtor bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis byug spos la lan bdun btab ste/ sku gzugs la byug par bgyi'o// 
272a4(rgyud): gzhan yang sngags 'dis phreng ba la lan bdun btab ste skra ga/ zugs la rgyan par bgyi lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya
272a5(rgyud): mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag
272a6(rgyud): 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ sa tes te/ si ti si tau/ su d+hu su d+huswA
272a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas la mchod cing dbul ba'i zhal zas la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhal zas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pas sangs rgyas la mchod
272a8(rgyud): pa'i che sngar sngags 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btab nas de'i rjes la gdong mchod pa bgyi lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye
272b1(rgyud): shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshalo// byang chub
272b2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ ma si ta si/ hu ru hu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ 
272b3(rgyud): mu ru mu ru swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yam shing la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gal te la la zhig gong du bstan pa'i rig sngags kyis bgyi ba mchis te/ sngar sngags 'dis me tog sha
272b4(rgyud): ta'i shing la len gcig gdab par bgyi'o// zhugs 'bud par 'tshal na logs shig tu me tog sha ta'i shing blangs nas dum bu sum cur btubs te/ zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi'i
272b5(rgyud): nang du sbyangs nas zhag lon par bgyis te/ gdugs re bum bu re re blangs nas sngags lan btab ste zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o// de dag thams cad bas par bsregs lags nas
272b6(rgyud): de'i rjes la gdod bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyi lag so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tsha lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la
272b7(rgyud): gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
272b8(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ bi li ti li/ tsi li hi li swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mtshams dgum pa'i sngags lags/ 
273a1(rgyud): // te/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal na sngar sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// yang na yungs kar ram/ thal ba gtsang ma la lan
273a2(rgyud): bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor na sems kyi nye ring ji tsam bkum pa mtshamasu gyur nas yongasu srung bar 'gyur lagaso// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal
273a3(rgyud): lo/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
273a4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 
273a5(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ bi Te bi Te/ ti Te ti Te/ tsi Te tsi Te/ bin+d+hi biT+Te/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga bA na/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sa b+ha sa b+ha sa b+ha na swA hA/ btsu ma ldan 'das 'di ni bdag slar rang gi gan su mchi bar bskul ba
273a6(rgyud): sngags lags na bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyis lags na/ bdag slar rang gi gan su mchi bar bskul pa'i sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun sngags kyi btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor na bdag slar mchi bar 'gyu
273a7(rgyud): lag so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di ni dngos grub mngon du ma gyur lags kyis kyang las su bgyi ba rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pas sems rtse gcig tu bzlas brjod bgyis na smon pa rnams kyang
273a8(rgyud): mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lag so// gang zhig skyes nad gdugs ra lan re ldang ba'am/ gdags gnyis shing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs gsum zhing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs gzhi ning lan/ 
273b1(rgyud): re ldang ba'am/ gdon 'byung pos bgyis pa 'am/ mkha' 'gro mas bgyis pa 'am/ sha zas bgyis pa 'am/ lus srul pos bgyis pa 'am/ spyi khyod kyis bgyis pa 'am/ brjed byed kyis bgyis pa 'am/ 'dre gdon
273b2(rgyud): ma rungs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bgyis pa yang rung ste/ nad pa de dag la sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab na 'tsho bar 'gyur lagaso// gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags
273b3(rgyud): lan ra bzlas zhing re ra mdud de brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas nad pa'i mgul pa 'am dpung pa la btags na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa zhu byang zhing bro nad kyang sos par 'gyur lag so// gal te skrangs pa
273b4(rgyud): dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / shu ba dang / phol mig dang / rma'adzag pa dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi blo 'tshal bar gyur tam/ ral gri dang / mda' dang / 
273b5(rgyud): mdung la sogs pa phog ste smyos par gyur tam/ sbrul dang / sna ga pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / bung ba dang / gdug pa la so gas pas zin par gyur na sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te
273b6(rgyud): btab na sos par 'gyur lagaso// gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na dog sa ser po'i 'jims pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bro 'tshal ba'i dmigasu byugs na sel bar 'gyur lagaso// 
273b7(rgyud): gal te rlung nang na pa 'am/ phyogs gcig pa langs par gyur tam/ rna ba 'on pa 'am/ sna mtshubs pa 'am/ rlung gis zin pa'i nad la sogs pas bro 'tshal bar gyur na sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'dis
273b8(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa de dag la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab na nad sos par 'gyur lag so// gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na 'bru mar dang / chab mar dang / gro dang / ru rta rnam/ 
274a1(rgyud): bskol te sngags lan bdun btab nas lus la bskus sam/ rna ba dang / snar blugs sam/ 'tshal du stsal na bro nad sos par 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang bro nad gzhan rnam pasna
274a2(rgyud): tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur na sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di gdab par bgyi'o// yang na bdag nyid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na 'tsho bar 'gyur lagaso// gal te rig sngags 'di sgrub par
274a3(rgyud): 'tshal na sngar sra zhing 'phan skyon ma mchis pa'i tsan dan dkar po las byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs srid du mthe phyed dang de mchis pa sug pa lag pa gi yon pa na
274a4(rgyud): pad+ma leb rgan dang ril ba thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyanganas bgrang phreng thogs shing 'jigs pa ma mchis pa stsol ba'i lag tu ston pa gdong bcu gcig par bgyis te/ 
274a5(rgyud): mdun gyi gdong gsum ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang bcas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par bgyi'o// g.yon phyogs kyi gdong ga sum ni khro bo'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs kyi gdong
274a6(rgyud): gsum ni mche ba dkar po gyon du 'byung ba'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// rgyab kyi gdong gcig ni khro gtum che zhing rab tu dkon pa'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// spyi bo'i gdong gcig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal gyi gzugs
274a7(rgyud): can du bgyi'o// mgo rgyan de dag thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i lus ni do shal la sogs brgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang
274a8(rgyud): ldan par bgyi'o// gzugs bgyis lags nas smon pa rnams grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ bsnyung ba bgyis nas sdom pa yang dag par blangs te/ zla ba dkar po yar ngo/ 
274b1(rgyud): gcig nas tshes brgyad kyi bar du gdugs gcig la dus gsum du sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ yang na dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de slan chad gnas dben pa gcig tu stan gtsang
274b2(rgyud): ma bting ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs bgyis pa kha nub phyogasu bstan de bzhag la/ nyams kyis ci 'byor pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba dag gis mchod nas a ga ru dang / du ru
274b3(rgyud): 'da' shig sreg par bgyi'o// rnal 'byor pa de 'bru che dang 'o ma'i zas 'tshal nas snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gdugs gsum pa la bgyi'o// de slan chad mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa yang snga
274b4(rgyud): ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi'o// rnal 'byor pa de zas dkar gsum po 'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / 'bras can 'ab wa zhig 'tshal bar bgyi'o// byang chub kyi shing blangs nas gzugs
274b5(rgyud): de'i mdun du zhugs sbar bar bya'o// gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gdugs te du ru ka'i mar gyi nang du/ blangs nas gdugs gcig la dum bu gcig blangs te/ sngags
274b6(rgyud): lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas par gyur na de'i tshe sa chen po rnams rab tu g.yo bar gyur la/ de'i dbang gis sku gzugs bgyis pa de yang rab tu g.yo zhing nang gi gong
274b7(rgyud): na mchis pa'i gdong gi kha nas sgra phyung nas rnal 'byor pa de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu legaso legaso// khyod kyis 'di ltar nan tan brtson 'grus kyis smon pa rnams yongasu gnyer bas bdag gis khyod
274b8(rgyud): kyi smon pa yong su rdzogs par bgyi'o// khyod 'di nas na mkha' la 'phur te 'gro 'am/ yang na khyod rgyu ning 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa 'am/ yang na drang srong rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po byed par gyur pa 'am/ yang na bdag
275a1(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du rang dbang thogs pa med pa nyid du bya'o// zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo chos bco lnga la byang
275a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gdong bcu gcig pa de sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong
275a3(rgyud): dang sdom pa yang dag par blangs te/ gdugs mtshan gcig la rab tu bsnyung bar bgyis na su ma na'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ me tog re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste/ thams cad bas pa'i bar du
275a4(rgyud): bgyis na de'i tshe gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gdong gcig gi kha nas 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de'i dbang gis sa chen po yang rab tu g.yo bar gyur pas rnal 'byor pas de'i
275a5(rgyud): tshe rang gi sems bde bar bzhag nas skrag cing 'jigs pa mi skye dpar rig sngags dang / smon cing sgrub pa gang lags pa 'ba' shig rje su dran par bgyis te/ 'di skad du byang chub sems
275a6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'angags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo// bdag nam zhig na sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabasu gyur nas sems can
275a7(rgyud): / thams cad kyi sems kyi smon pa rnams yongasu stong bar 'gyur zhes brjod par gyur na/ de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ji ltar smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur te/ smon pa rnams rtsol ba'i tshe lha dang
275a8(rgyud): klu la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar chad dang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur lagaso// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba la gza' zhugs pa'i tshe chab mar srang gcig blangs te dngul gyi snod kyi nang du stsal nas
275b1(rgyud): gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du bzhag ste/ sngags 'dis bzlas brjod bgyis na zla ba yang snga ma kho bzhin du skyabs 'og tu gyur pas/ de nas blangs te 'tshal na lus kyi bro nad rnams mi 'byung ba gang
275b2(rgyud): yang ma mchis lag so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas ldong ros dang / gi'u wang cha mnyam par bgyis te/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab kyis spras
275b3(rgyud): nas dpral ba la thig le bgyis na don rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur lag so// sngar bstan pa bzhin du chab dron po dang sbyar te khrus bgyis na bgegs thams cad dang / bro nad ma rungs pa thams cad
275b4(rgyud): gsal zhing 'byang bar 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang gal te pa ro/ dal gyi dmag tshogs kyis g.yul 'phrog par 'gyur na u dan ci mar rtsi'i 'bras bu cig blangs te sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgya
275b5(rgyud): kyis btab nas gzugs bgyis pa de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bra 'i gdong la byugs te/ dgra'i phyogasu kha bstan na dgra'i ngan ga tshogs rnams drung du mchi bar mi 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang
275b6(rgyud): gal te yul phyogasu mi dang phyugs la rims nad byung bar gyur na gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du shing shug pa'i zhugs bus la/ gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du btubs te/ dum pug ni
275b7(rgyud): blangs nas yungs 'bru'i mar gyis bskus te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dmar po la mdud pa bdun mdud de/ mdud pa
275b8(rgyud): len re mdud cing sngags lan re bzlas nas nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gding gi spyi bo la btags na rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nang zhi nas sngags thag kyang 'grol bar 'bru
276a1(rgyud): lag so// gzhan yang blo bur du mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin te bro 'tshal bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud de/ sngags
276a2(rgyud): lan re bzlas shing mdud pa re re mdud nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la brtags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol la nad pa'i mgul du btags na bro nad sos par 'gyur
276a3(rgyud): lag so// gal te las kyi sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags te sos par ma gyur na sngags thag de blangs nas yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ snga ma'i gzugs kyi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar
276a4(rgyud): bkrol la nad pa'i mgul du btags na nges par 'tshe bar 'gyur ba lugaso// gzhan yang gang la la zhig bro nad rgyun rings kyis dbatab nas sdug bsngal zhing sos par ma gyur ta me/ 'dre gdon
276a5(rgyud): ma rungs pa khyim du zhugs par gyur na hun lug thang 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du 'brum bu re re blangs la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor
276a6(rgyud): pabar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud de sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdod
276a7(rgyud): gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul du btags na bro nad rnams 'byung zhing gdon bgegs ma rungs pa rnams 'byer zhing dgyes par 'gyur lagaso// gzhan yang mi mdza' ba dag gis
276a8(rgyud): glags tsal bar gyur tam/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / byang snyems kyis gnod pa bgyis par gyur na me tog dang pog spos la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs bgyis pa de la mchod cing bi na ya ka'i gzugs kyi mdun du
276b1(rgyud): zhugs sbar nas 'un ti 'bras bu 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re
276b2(rgyud): bzla zhing re re mdud nas gzugs de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag bzhi lon te slar bkrol la bskud pa dablangs te/ mi mdze' ba de'i ming nas brjod de mdud pa re re
276b3(rgyud): so so tha dad par sbas nas re re la yang sngags lan re bzla zhing re re nas btubs te/ thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na mi mdze' ba de dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal mi 'byor cing rang nyid skyabasu mchi ba
276b4(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig legs pa'i dngos po 'grub par 'tshal na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags ma dud brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re
276b5(rgyud): re mdud nas yang gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du lan bdun gyis da tab ste/ byams dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo/ btags nas zhag len te slar bkrol nas bdag nyid kyi lus
276b6(rgyud): la btags na smon pa rnams yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig sgrib pa'i bgegs dang ldan pas legs pa ringos po rnams phal cher smon pa yid bzhin du 'grub par mthu
276b7(rgyud): dkra mi shis pa'i dngos po dag dus dus su rgya ma mchis par 'gyur na spos chab kyis gzugs bgyis bde bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste bi na maka' gzug
276b8(rgyud): bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang tshab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ rang nyid kyi lus la gtor na sgrib pa dang bgegs thams cad du byang nas smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gru gas
277a1(rgyud): / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smras pa/ 'khor mang po thams cad kyis 'thun par skyes bu chen po lag so legaso// 
277a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di smras pas bdag cag kyang rje su yi ring zhing yongasu 'dzin par smon to zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas 'khor mang po thams
277a3(rgyud): cad dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyag byas te gyes par gyur to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzung
277a4(rgyud): rdzogs so// // zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// 1// byang chub sems dpa'
277a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong pa dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bad
277a6(rgyud): gis thos pa gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ rig 'dzin na byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs

277b1(rgyud): dgongos so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'

277b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub
277b5(rgyud): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ja/ ma dpal la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas
277b6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi sras sha stag dang thabs gcig/ 'od srung chen po la sogs gang dag gis nyan thos dag gis bcu spyad par gyur pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med
277b7(rgyud): pata/ grangs med pa/ tshangs pa dang la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dang / lha'i bu sa 'tsho la sogs pa lha'i bu du ma dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'phags skyes po la sogs pa du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / 
277b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma dang / klu'i rgyal po nus pa'i dra ba la sogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po du ma dang / lci'i bu
278a1(rgyud): mo gzhon nu mig la sogs pa/ 'do ba na spyod pa'i lung ma dang / dgon pa'i lga dus dang yang thabs gcig go/ 'babachu dang / mcho dang / maco bran dang // khron pa dang / chuklung dang / chuklu
278a2(rgyud): chen po dang / sman dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal dang / nags khrod dang / gtsug lag khang dang / khyim dang / chu dang / me dang / rdul gyi ri dang / sa dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / mchod rten dang / dro

278a7(rgyud): ltas rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ ltas sngon ma mthong ba la the tshom skyes te/ de stan las langs te thal mo sbyar te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i bltas 'di sus bgyis shes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
278a8(rgyud): la tshig su bcad pa nus pa/ deng sus byang chub yang dag mthar thug gyur// thams cad ldan pa'i 'od zer su yis btang // 'jig rten mgon po ci slang phyogs bcu yi// zhing rnams gser mchog 'dra bar gas
278b1(rgyud): par gyur// stong gsum 'di ni ci slad tshig pa 'dra// deng 'dir su zhig gis ni dbang thob lags// sngon chad ma byung rdzu 'phrul stobs sus bstan// su yis 'dir ni zhing mang g.yos par bgyis// ci slad lha dang klu rnams
278b2(rgyud): khyim 'khrugs shing // gzha med khang mchog dag kyang rab 'gul dang // thams cad skrag nas rnam par blta zhing mchis// ci'i srad du stong gsum g.yos pa dang // gang gis 'khor 'dir the tsom skyes gyur de'i// 
278b3(rgyud): rgyu dang su yi mthu lags ma 'tshal na// ci slad rdzu 'phrul mngon shes bstan bgyis pa// rgyal ba byams pa'i thugs can bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang
278b4(rgyud): phyug rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod la sogs 'di lta dar shes par gyis shig/ da ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming 'phags
278b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod de// 'di ni bskal pa du ma nas 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang thabs la mkhas pa/ bsgoms pas sgrub pa dang / 
278b6(rgyud): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la nus pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la zhi ba dang / bde bar 'dod pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po 'di byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
278b7(rgyud): de nas de'i tshe'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ gos legs par bgos nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces gsol
278b8(rgyud): totabatsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis gsang sngags snying ltar bzung ba mchis te/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis phan pa dang / bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / sdig
279a1(rgyud): pa'i las thams cad dang / las lci ba rnams 'byang bar bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang mi khom pa rnams yongasu spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba
279a2(rgyud): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad yongasu spang ba dang / mchog thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag
279a3(rgyud): dade brjod par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ thugs rje bdag la nges par gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu shin tu snying rje chen po
279a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa khyod/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyi da8/ gsang sngags gang brjod par 'dod pa 'di/ da ltar leg/ shes par khyod kyis dus la bab kyis myur du smos shig/ sangs rgyas

279a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa bskal pa du ma 'das par gyur pa na/ 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer stong gi rgyal po dag par gnas pa
279a7(rgyud): zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i bla ma des bdag la byams pas dran par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos snying lta bu 'di
279a8(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa dang / mi zlogs pa dang / rgyas par bshad de/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag bdag gi mgo la bzhag nas/ 'di skad ces kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa can gyi dus
279b1(rgyud): kyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ snying lta bu rigasang sngags 'di zung shig/ ces bka' stsal to// bdag ni de'i tshe thog ma nyid dus dang po la gnas par gyur to// 
279b2(rgyud): 'di ltar bdag gis gsang sngags 'di lan gcig thos pas de nyid na gnas bzhin du sa brgyad pa nges par rtogs par gyur to// bdag gis de'i tshe snying la bab pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba thob
279b3(rgyud): nas te de nyid du bdag gis smon lam 'di skad btab ste/ 'di ltar bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / zhi bar bgyid nus par 'gyur zhe na/ da nges par
279b4(rgyud): bdag gi lus la lag pa stong dang / mig stong yongasu rdzogs pa dar gyur cig ces bgyis pa dang / smon lam de skad btab ma thag tu de nyid na mchis bzhin du/ lag pa stong dang / mig stong yod
279b5(rgyud): su rdzogs par gyur to// phyogs bcu dag tu sa chen po yang rnam ba drug tu g.yos so// phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas brtse ma ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'od zer stong stong bdag gi steng du
279b6(rgyud): bkye nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa snang bar gyur to// de slan chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das du ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su yang dang yang du rnyed cing thos te/ de dag gi
279b7(rgyud): spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di bzung ngo // yang dga' ba dang mgu ba du ma skyes par gyur to// bdag gis bskal pa du mar skye ba dang / 'chi ba nges par rtogs pa phra mo thob par gyur to// de slan chad rtag tu brjod cing
279b8(rgyud): bzung ste/ bskyud par ma gyur to// gzungs sngags 'di gzung ba'i don du bdag gang dang gang du skyes par rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las brdzus te skyes nas/ ma'i mngal
280a1(rgyud): du skye ba gzung bar ma gyur to// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig brjod cing 'dzin par 'tshal ba des/ sem/ 
280a2(rgyud): can thams cad la byams pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o// thog mar bdag brjod pa'i 'og tu smon lam chen po 'di skad gdab par bgyi ste/ btsun pa spyan ras
280a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i ming thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges

280a7(rgyud): dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ro la 'dzeg par gyur cig/ btsun
280a8(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod
280b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bdag srung du chos kyi sku dang gcig tu gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri de la 'gro ba na ral gri'i ri de bsnyil zhing zhig par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du 'gro ba na/ 
280b2(rgyud): me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du 'gro ba na/ sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig
280b3(rgyud): rten du 'gro ba na/ yi dgas rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gan su 'gro ba na/ de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnamasu 'gro ba/ 
280b4(rgyud): na/ de dag ye shes chen po'i de kho na rang thob par gyur cig ces/ de ltar smon lam de skad btab nas/ dad pa ldan ni dang sems kyis dran bgyis la/ bdag gi ming brjod par bgyi/ 
280b5(rgyud): de nas yang bdag gi slob dpon 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rtag tu dran par bgyi'o// de nas gsang sngag sa 'di brjod par rigaso// nub gcig la 'di lan lnga brjod na
280b6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang / 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba stong phrag brgya dang / bye ba stong phrag bcu bsags pa rnams spong bar 'gyur/ byang bar 'gyur ro// yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun
280b7(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi thams cad snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di ji lta ba bzhin du brjod cing 'dzin na/ gal te de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe/ phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas
280b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i steng du phyag skyong zhing 'di skad ces khyod gang du skye bar 'dod/ gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa der song shig ces gsung ngo // yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
281a1(rgyud): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi 'am mi ma lags pa gang zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin la/ de gal te ngan song gsum du lhung bar
281a2(rgyud): gyur na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
281a3(rgyud): 'das thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye ba ma thob na bdag sangs rgya su ma gyur cig/ yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ des ting nge 'dzin dang / so so yang dag
281a4(rgyud): par rig pa du ma ma thob na/ bdag sangs rgyasu ma gyur cig/ yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ tshe gcig gis yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs
281a5(rgyud): na ta 'di snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i ming thob par mi 'gyur ro// su sdig pa bgyid pa dang / ma dad pa/ ni ma gtogs so// bud med su zhig bud med kyi chos la yid
281a6(rgyud): byung nas/ bdag skyes par gyur cig ces 'tshal te/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di brjod cing bzung la/ de bud med kyi lus las ma gyur cig/ skyes pa'i lus ma thob na/ bdag
281a7(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te 'dzin par bgyid pas/ de la the tshom cung zad tsam zhig bgyis na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mi 'gru bo// gang
281a8(rgyud): gis dge 'dun gyi bza' ba dang / thug pa dang / nor dang / 'bru phrogs sam/ chud gsan te/ gang la sangs rgyas stong gis bshagasu gnang bas bshagasu lags kyang bshags par ma gyur la/ 
281b1(rgyud): gal te gsang sngags 'di brjod kyang / sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar ma gyur na/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi rdzas ci spyad pa dang / chud gsan pa dang / phrogs pa des phyogs bcu dag na/ rab tu byung ba thams ca
281b2(rgyud): kyi so so'i mdun du mchis la bshags na/ de'i tshe de'i bshags par 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar gsang sngags 'di brjod par gyur na/ phyogs bcu dag tu gtogs pa'i rab tu byung ba'i 'dus pa rnams
281b3(rgyud): de la dbang yin no zhes smra zhing las thams cad kyang bshags par chud par 'gyur ro// sdig pa bcu po thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la mi snyan pa brjod pa/ 
281b4(rgyud): dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / dus ma lags par zas 'tshal ba dang / bslab pa nyams pa dang / mchod rten dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / dge 'dun gyi rdzas chud gzon pa dang / 
281b5(rgyud): tshul khrims yongs su dag par gnas pa'i sems can rnam/ sa kyi tshul khrims nyams par bgyid pa dang / de la so/ gas pa'i sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba thams cad dang / sdig/ 
281b6(rgyud): pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyuraro// gang the tshom 'tshal ba ni ma gtogs te/ de'i sdig pa chung ngu dang / las yang ba yang 'byang bar mi 'gyur na/ shin tu lci ba lta spos kyang ci 'tshal/ sdig pa lnga/ 
281b7(rgyud): shin tu lci ba rnams byang bar ma gyur du lags kyang / yun ring po zhig na/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bgyid nus par 'gyuraro// yang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te mi 'am
281b8(rgyud): mi ma lags pa zhig gis snying rje chen po rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod par gyur na/ de skye ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga thob par 'gyur ro// gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga ni myong bar mi 'gyur te/ 
282a1(rgyud): bco lnga gang zhe na/ dang po ni gang ltogs pas sdug bsngal te 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa ni gang chad pa ngan pas bcad pa'i tshor bas nyams thag pa'i gnod pa dag gis
282a2(rgyud): 'gum pa mi 'gyur ba'o// gsum pa ni dgra dang / kho na mchis pa dang / phyi bzlog pa rnams kyi dug dang / mtshon gyis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni gang dmag gi g.yul 'gyed par zhugs pa'i
282a3(rgyud): tshe 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// lnga pa ni gang stag dang / spyang ki la sogs pa gcan zan ma rungs pa rnams kyis bsad pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// drug pa gang sbrul gdug pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / 
282a4(rgyud): srog chags u tsi ligs zin nas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// // bdun pa ni gang me dang / chus 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// brgyad pa ni gang dug tu 'gyuraro 'tshal bas/ 'gum par mi 'gyur
282a5(rgyud): ba'o&tadagu pa ni gang srog chags sna tshogs kyis dug gis 'a/ gum par mi 'gyur ro// bcu pa ni gang rmongs pa dang / rnam par g.yengs pa dang / brjed pa dang / nyal bas 'gum par mi
282a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// bcu gcig pa ni gangs ri dang / shing dang / g.yang sa dang / gad pa las ltung bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu gnyis pa ni gang byed kyis 'gum pa mi 'gyur ro// bcu gsum pa ni
282a7(rgyud): gang dag lha g.yon can rnams dang / 'byung po sdig pa can rnams kyis bklags bltas pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu bzhi pa ni gang gser mi rung ba'i nad rnams kyis btab nas 'gum
282a8(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// bco lnga pa ni gang bdag la bdag gsod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba ste/ gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin can te/ gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin
282b1(rgyud): pa de la/ gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga yang thob par 'gyur te/ dang po ni gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du chos dang 'thun
282b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa ni gang 'phags pa'i yul du skye ba thob par 'gyur ba'o// gsum pa ni dus bzang po dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni gang
282b3(rgyud): rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// lnga pa ni gang dbang po mtha' dag tshang ba'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// drag pa ni gang dge ba'i phyogs la sems yongasu smin pa/ 
282b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// bdun pa ni gang tshul khrims nyams par mi 'a gyur pa'o// brgyad pa ni gang gnyen bshes rnams dang / bran g.yog rnams kyis bye brag shes shing 'thun par 'gyur ba'o// 
282b5(rgyud): dgu pa ni gang yo byad dang / nor dang / zas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa / ra rnyed par 'gyur ba'o// bcu pa ni gang gzhan gyis go 'phang bstod pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur ba'o// 
282b6(rgyud): bcu gcig pa ni gang nor dang / yo byad mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gnyis pa ni gang bsams pa sems dang 'thun par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gsum pa ni gang lha dang klu dang / lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rtag/ 
282b7(rgyud): tu srung bar 'gyur ba'o// bcu bzhi pa ni gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing chos kyang thob par 'gyur ba'o// bco lnga pa ni gang chos thos pa dang / don zab mo shes rab kyis rtogs par
282b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba ste/ gang la la zhig snying rje chen po'i ring bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa des gong du smos pa skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du lha dang mi thams cad kyis
283a1(rgyud): / rtag tu brjod cing bzung bar bgyi ste/ de la skyo ba bskyed par mi bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshig de skad smras nas/ de'i rjes la 'khon
283a2(rgyud): mang po'i dbus de nyid du 'dug ste/ lag pa gnyis mnyam par thal mo sbyar nas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin rgyas par byas nas/ rgyas pa chen po
283a3(rgyud): kun nas yongasu rdzogs pa thogs pa med pa snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po gzungs sngags chen po gzhi mdzes pa 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwa/ 
283a4(rgyud): yata ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban d+ha na dan ts+tshed na kA ra ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dron+do Sha Naka rA ya/ sarba b+h+ya da d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu pa dra ba be na sha na ka rA ya/ sarba
283a5(rgyud): b+ha ye ru tA ra NA ka rA ya/ ta s+ya na ma skr-i tA/ i daM Ar+ya a ba lo // ti shwa ra/ ta ba nI la kar+N+Na na ma pa ra ma hr-i da ya/ mA brta yaM/ Sh+yA mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAM/ shu b+ha tsi ta nAM/ sarba satwA nAM/ pA pa mArga bi/ 
283a6(rgyud): sho d+ha na/ tad+ya thA/ A ba lo ko/ lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/ e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwA/ he bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA ka ru Ne ka/ s+pha ra hr-i da yaM/ e h+ye hi/ Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ pa ra/ 
283a7(rgyud): ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru karma/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya bi d+yAn/ de hi da hi/ me a raM ga ma gi ma bi tsi ga ma/ sid d+ha yo gI shwa re/ du hu du hu ma hA bIr+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha rA Ni shwa ra dza la dz+wa la bi ma la mUr+Ne/ 
283a8(rgyud): Ad+ya saM pa li ki te shwa ra/ kr-i 'a dzi na dzaT su s+'uTA/ a la kr-i ta/ sha rI ra la m+ba pra la swa bi lam+ba/ ma hA sid d+ya shud d+ha d+ha / bal ba la/ ma hA ba laM/ ma la ma la mtham la/ tredwe la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ kr-in pa k+Sha\u0f89\u0fa4
283b1(rgyud): pad+ha/ kran pa sha/ mig+h+nAtan/ he pad+ma hasta/ dza ma kar/ ni shAtsa shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ma d+ho ba bI tra/ e h+ye hi ma hA bI / ma hA bar ma hA par ha mu kha/ tri pur h+ya \u0f7f ne shwa ra/ nA rA ya Na rAb/ ba la begaH
283b2(rgyud): ri he nI la kat+ta/ e h+ye hi mahA/ hA la ha la/ bi Sha ni dzi ta lo ke s+ya gu gi na shan/ dwe 'bi 'bin shan/ ma he bi 'ben shin/ ning mo kla hu lu hu lu/ muT+Ta suny+tsa/ mu hu~M mu hu/ tsa la hra la/ mahA
283b3(rgyud): pad+man b+h+r-i/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya bo d+ha yA mi/ ta ba ni la kiSh+Tha/ e h+ye hi/ bA ma s+t+rai te/ ma hA sing ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa suny+tsa/ ma hAn+daT+TA nirti de ne/ e h+ye/ 
283b4(rgyud): hi b+ho b+hi ma hA sid d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ba tsa na sa d+ha ya/ sa d+h+ya ya bid+yAn/ sma ra s+pha ra s+t+waM/ he b+ha ga bAn/ lo ki bi lo ki s+t+waM/ ta thA ga ta/ de hi de hi me dar sha na/ kA ma s+ya dar sha na/ pra sAd+ha/ 
283b5(rgyud): ya me swA hA/ sid d+ha ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha ya swAhA/ sid d+ha yo \u0f88\u0f90 shwa rA ya swA hA/ ni la kaN+DA ya swA hA/ ba rA hA mu khA ya sAH// sa~M hA mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra si hA mu khA ya swA hA/ badz+ra
283b6(rgyud): hastA ye swA hA/ ma hA badz+ra hastA ya swA hA/ sid d+ha bid+ya d+ha rA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha bid+ya d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma hAstA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyA pa bI tA yA swA hA/ ma hA mA lA ma ku Ta
283b7(rgyud): d+ha ra ya swA hA/ tsakra yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shang kha shab+da ni rnA da ne ka rA ya swA hA/ bo d+hi na ka rA ya swA hA/ bA ma s+thi ta skan+na de sha kr-iSh+Na dzi na ya swA hI/ bA ma hAsta b+hA g+ha tsarma Ni bA sa na ya swA hA/ lo ka shwa rA ya/ 
283b8(rgyud): swAhA/ ma hA lo shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mAr+t+ti nI swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ na me Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA duN+Di
284a1(rgyud): ya sid d+h+yan tu me/ man+ta pa da ni swAhA/ oM hriHtrai lo kya bi dzi ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha/ a pra tiH ta hriHha hUM phaT swA hA// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
284a2(rgyud): phyug gis/ snying po 'di brjod nas sa chen po ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// 'gul lo// 'ur 'ur ro// bar snang las rin po che dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char mngon par bab bo// phyog
284a3(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad rjes su thugs rang ngo // bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs thams cad sngangs skrag ste/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur to// 'khor de thams cad ni so sor
284a4(rgyud): 'bras bu thob ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'phya sra bu thob bo// kha cig ni sa dang po thob bo// kha cig ni sa gnyis pa
284a5(rgyud): kha cig ni sa gsum pa/ kha cig ni sa bzhi pa/ kha cig ni/ sa lnga pa nas/ kha cig ni sa bcu pa'i bar du thob bo// gang da/ ga gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
284a6(rgyud): bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dpag tu med do// de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/ gos legs par bgos nas/ gus pa'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa'
284a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// kye kye las mdzad pa chen po legaso legaso// bdag kyang 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dag gi 'khor gyi
284a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyur te/ bdag gis de dag tu chos kyi rnam grangs dang / gzungs kyi sgo sna tshogs dag kyang thob na/ bdag gis snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi
284b1(rgyud): thogs pa med pa rgya chen po 'di ma thos kyis/ dbyang chub sems dpa' las mdzad pa chen po de'i lus dang / rtags dang / tshul dang / mtshan nyid nges par bshad du gsol/ bdag la sogs pa
284b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'di thos par 'tshal zhing smos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye khyed kyis thabs
284b3(rgyud): mkhas pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dri ba 'di byas so// da nyon cig dang mdor cung zad cig kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras
284b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ni snying / rje chen po'i sems so// 'di ni mtshungs shing mnyam pa'i sems so// 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi sem so// 'di ni chags shi
284b5(rgyud): zhen pa med pa'i sems so// 'di ni stong pa nyid du blta ba'i sems// / 'di ni sti stang du byas shing gus pa'i semaso// 'di ni ma 'khru gas shing skyon med pa'i semaso// 'di ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
284b6(rgyud): sems te/ sems de dag la sogs pa ni snying po 'di'i mtshan nyid dang / tshul yin par de ltar zhes bya'o// de ltar tshul 'dis spyad par bya'o// bsgom par bya'o// tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so// bdag
284b7(rgyud): la sogs pa 'khor 'dis snying po 'di'i tshul dang / mtshan nyid de dang slan chad ma 'tshal to// nga slan chad ni blang ngo // mi bskyed par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
284b8(rgyud): de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/ des byang chub sems dpa' chen po yangs pa bskyed pa'o// de ltar yi dam bcas nas/ 
285a1(rgyud): / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus bzung bar bya'o// zas dus dus su bza' ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan par bya'o// sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems
285a2(rgyud): bskyed par bya'o// rtag par rgyun tu rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// gtsang mar gnas pas gnas par bya'o// khrus legs par bya'o// gos gtsang ma bgos la/ 
285a3(rgyud): lha'i ba dan dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / gtor ma la sogs pas mchod par bya'o// sems rtse gcig tu bzung bar bya'o// yang dag par ma yin pa la brtag par mi bya'o zhe
285a4(rgyud): de skad ces brjod par bya'o// de ltar gzung bar bya'o// 'on tang byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang / lha'i drang srong du ma yang der 'gro ste/ dbang byed cing / 
285a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyuraro// kho bo kyang de'i tshe mig stong / gis sgrub pa po de la blta'o// lag pa stong gis sba zhing bzung ngo // 'jig rten gyi mdo dang / yi ge rnams len cing 'dzin kyang nus
285a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stegs can thams cad kyi chos dbang du bya ba dang / rig byed rnams kyang nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pas ni 'jig rten na 'byung
285a7(rgyud): pos byung ba'i nad kyi rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gang su la byung yang rung sos par byed do// des zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i nad gang yang med do// yang 'byung po 'am/ lha rnams la yang rgol ba'i mthu yod par
285a8(rgyud): 'gyuro// bdud kyang pham par byed do// gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi phyogs kyang lkugs par byed do// gal te ri la gnas pa 'am/ dgon pa na gnas pa gang zhig kha ton byed dam/ bsam gtan
285b1(rgyud): byed pa la de na gnas pa sdig pa dang bgegs byed pa dang / gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang / 'byung po sna tshogs gang dag sems 'khrug par byed na/ snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas de dag thams cad bcings
285b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig tshul bzhin du gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/ sreg chags thams cad la snying rje bskyed par bya'o// de'i tshe khro bos kyang lha dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 
285b3(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brangs la srung ba gyis te/ phrad par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// mig gi 'bras bu dang / rang gi srog ji lta ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur// 
285b4(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa// gang zhig dad pas snying dpo 'di// kha yis rtag tu 'dzin pa yi// sgrub pa po la dus kun tu// sems la srung ba gyis shig ces// khung bu mig dang de
285b5(rgyud): bzhin du// stobs po che dang lu gu rgyud// lha yi dam pa lcags kyu dang // lag na rdo rje bsgo bar bya// kho bo'i snying po mchog 'a di ni// dad pas rtag tu 'dzin pa yi// sgrub pa sdig dang bral ba la/ 
285b6(rgyud): khyed cag bsrungs shig skyongs shig ces// dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // nor gyi bu dang drag po dang // kum bi ra dang ser skya dang // de dag rnams la kho bo bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// gsang sngags/ 
285b7(rgyud): 'di brjod 'dzin byed pa'i// rig sngags 'chang la mi g.yel bar// soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// lnga rtsen dang ni bde mchog dang // tsin da la dang su ma la// bing ga la dang gshin rje la// kho bos/ 
285b8(rgyud): lung gis bsgo bar bya// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// kho bo'i gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing // rtag brjod rig sngags 'chang ba la// bsam pa gyis shig srung ba gyis// sgrub pa po la bsrungs shig ces// 
286a1(rgyud): bden pa po dang so brtsegs dang // mi mjed bdag dang lha mo dpal// de dag kun la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig dad pas kho bo yi// gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing // brjod byed rig sngag
286a2(rgyud): 'chang ba la// soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// lha ma chen po dbyangs can dang // lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang // sum cu gsum dbang ro langs dang // mang po 'dzin la kho bos bsgo// kho bo'i rig sngags 'di
286a3(rgyud): 'chang la// soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// gnas lnga dag na gnas pa yi// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha rnams dang // yang dag shes dang nor bu bzang // de dag rnams la khe bos bsgo// gang zhig dad pa/ 
286a4(rgyud): kho bo yi// gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing // brjod byed rig ra sngags 'chang ba la// sems shig srung ba gyis shig ces/ rgyal po rnam thos bu dang ni// 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang / 
286a5(rgyud): yul 'khor srung dang skyong byed dang // mig mi bzang dang 'phags/ skyes dang // skems byed gzhon nur gyur pa dang // de dag rnam/ sa la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gas/ 
286a6(rgyud): sngags 'di 'dzin cing // brjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shog srung ba gyis shig ces// dga' bo nye dga' klu gnyis dang // stobs kyi lha dang rgya mtsho dang // drang srong nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // de dag rnams la
286a7(rgyud): kho bos bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing // brjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// sems shig srung ba gyis shig ces// klu yi rgyal po ud pal dang // 'phrul
286a8(rgyud): chen lto 'phye che rnams dang // lha min mi ci dri za dang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing // brjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// sems
286b1(rgyud): shig srung bgyis shig ces// chu dang me yi lha rnams dang // sha za rnams dang grog dang sprin// grul bum dag dang mkha' lding dang // de nas kun la kho bos bsgo// bde bar byed pa'i lha g.yog 'khor lnga brgya
286b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa khyed thams cad dang // de bzhin du lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rnams dang / lha dang / lha'i bu mo la sogs pa dang gnod sbyin stobs dang ldan pa rnams kyang gang snying rje chen po'i ring bzhin gyi snying po
286b3(rgyud): 'di bzlas brjod byed pa de'i phyi bzhin du 'brengs shig/ gnod pa sol cig/ srung bgyis shig/ gal te sngags pa mi zhig ri dang / nags tshal stong pa thibs po dag na/ gcig pur grogs med par
286b4(rgyud): nyal na yang // bde bar byed pa'i lha de dag rang gi 'khor dang / bcas te srung bar byed do// yams kyi nad rnams dang / bgegs rnams kyang zhi bar byed do// gal te ri khrod du lam
286b5(rgyud): stor bar gyur na/ gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas pa dang / bde bar byed pa'i lha dang / klu'i rgyal po de dag mi gzugs kyis de la lam ston par byed do// gal te ri dang / nags dang
286b6(rgyud): dgon par son la chu dang me med par gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de la srung ba'i phyir chu dang mi ston par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang
286b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang de la yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa gzhig cing bsal ba'i phyir/ zhi bar byed pa'i tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gal te 'brog dang ri khrod rnams shig tu// stag dang spyang ki gcan zan
286b8(rgyud): khro rnams dang // sbrul dang tshangs pa dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// 'ong yang 'di thos sngags mthus ldog par 'gyur// rgya mtsho chu klung mtsho bran 'gram gnas na// dug ldan sbrul dang sbrul 'dzin byed pa dang // chu srin
287a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin nya dang ku bir// 'ongs na'ang gsang sngags thos na 'jigs par 'gyur// dmag dung chen po'i dgra dang 'thab pa dang // nor 'phrog chom kun rnams dang phrad na yang // dad pas
287a2(rgyud): rtse gcig sems dang byams pa yis// gsang sngags bzlas na sdig byed mi nus ldog/ rgyal po'i khrid can go rar bcug pa dang // btson rar lcags dang shig sgrog bcug na yang // dad pas gsang sngags
287a3(rgyud): 'di ni brjod byas na// rgyal po bdag nyid de la dga' bar 'gyur// gal te dug can nags sam khyim gang na// dug can zas yod der ni son gyur la// dad dang ldan pas gsang sngags mchog brjod na// dug
287a4(rgyud): rnams thams cad gyur nas bdud rtsir 'gyur// gal te bud me du bus thogs mi phyin cing // g.yon can bgegs kyis na bar byed na yang // dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na/ 
287a5(rgyud): 'byung po 'bros shing bde bar btsal bar 'gyur// 'byung po/ sdang dang gnod sems klu rnams kyis// bsad pa'i ched du gnod pa byas na yang // dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod
287a6(rgyud): byas na// tshe yang 'phel zhing nad rnams 'byang bar 'gyur// gal te 'byung pos skrangs nad byas pa dang // bas bldags nad dang shu ba rnag khrag can// dad pas rtag tu gsang sngags 'di bzlas na// 
287a7(rgyud): gsang sngags mthu yis thams cad med par 'gyur// sems can rab tu sdang bas bsad pa'i phyir// g.yo dang rgyu yi las rnams byed na yang // dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na// de drung / 
287a8(rgyud): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gro mi 'gyur// dam pa'i chos nyams sems can rnyog pa can// 'dod chags bcings shing log pas rmongs rnams dang // nyin mtshan mi drang ma zhi rtog ldan zhing // khyo dang lhan cig mo nga/ 
287b1(rgyud): bud med rnams// gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pas 'byin nus te// 'dod chags mi ni sems ni drang por 'gyur// gal te snying po 'di mi mthu brjod na// bskul pa gcig gi mthar mar phyin mi 'gyur// chon
287b2(rgyud): skud sna lnga pa la snying po 'di lan lnga brgyas brjod byas te// mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa mgul du bdags so// snying po 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma
287b3(rgyud): snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o// gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed la yong su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de dag la/ myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsung
287b4(rgyud): so// gang dag sangs rgyas nyid du sem ma bskyed pa de dag kyang // byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do// gang nyan thos kyi 'bras dbu ma thob pa de dag kyang myur du thob par byed do// stong gsum gyi
287b5(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sem sa bskyed par byed do// gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dbang po
287b6(rgyud): rnams dad pa rnyed pa de dag kyang thob par byed do// snying po 'di'i mthus theg pa chen po la thar pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gal te dgos pa zhig yod na yang kho bo'i snying rje dang thabs la
287b7(rgyud): mkhas pas thams cad 'grub bo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na/ sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams kyang / gal te snying
287b8(rgyud): po 'di thos na/ sdug bsngal rnams las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa de dag kyang / sa bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// skyes bu chen
