335b3(rgyud): gang dag bdud gdul bar 'tshal na yum gyi gzungs 'di bzlas te/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing lan gcig sreg par byas nas lan
335b4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na yongasu bsal bar 'gyur lag so// gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bur 'tshal na rtag par lcang ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa
335b5(rgyud): gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khar bcas na thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lagaso// gang / dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang / shes rab dang ldan par
335b6(rgyud): 'tshal na shu dag srang gcig phye mar btags te/ chab mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu bgyis te/ yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta ste/ drod dang / dud pa dang / 'od byung
335b7(rgyud): gi bar du sngags kyi gdab par bgyi'o// mtshan ma de dag thob nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi ril bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying kar yang yang byug par bgyi ste/ de ltar zhag brgya'i bar
335b8(rgyud): du 'tshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur bas/ bdag nyid kyi lus srung ba'i slad du gdugs re zhing yum gyi gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa
336a1(rgyud): bcu gnyis kyang bgyi'o// de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun tu bsdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar langs nas 'greng ste/ lus/ 
336a2(rgyud): drang por bsrang nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te// rkang pa g.yas pa chung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o// sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste/ 
336a3(rgyud): lag mthil du bzhag la mthe'u chung dang / mdzub mo dang / mthe bong ni yan par brkyang ste/ lag mthil bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin
336a4(rgyud): du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste/ phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyis nas lag mthil mdun du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// gal te bdud dang / 
336a5(rgyud): mu stegs can log par blta ba'i thibs po bcom nas ya/ nga dag pa'i lam du gzung bar 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'di/ bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas gdon mi
336a6(rgyud): 'tshal bar smon pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur lagaso// gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA yo/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ 
336a7(rgyud): a bat+ta a bat+ta/ ba ri bat+te/ e hi e hi swA hA/ de la gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya
336a8(rgyud): bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying kar bzhag nas sor mo lnga snol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por sgreng ste/ rtse mo phrad par bgyis la/ mthe bo gnyis
336b1(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'di bgyis par gyur na bskal pa tshad ma
336b2(rgyud): mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa thams cad dus gcig tu yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhang yongasu dag pa dag tu
336b3(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos glags btsal ba dang / kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad

336b6(rgyud): gcig tu gzar nas pus mos g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du bkan pA
336b7(rgyud): bgyi ste/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang chos 'di mngon par bsgrub/ 
336b8(rgyud): pas/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba brnyes pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma dang 'thun lag so// gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du phyag rgya 'di bgyis te mchod pa
337a1(rgyud): bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams myur du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs
337a2(rgyud): nas 'greng ste rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar gang mo dang / srin lags dang / mthe'u chung rnams rgyab sprad la mdzub mo gnyis 'greng ste rtse mo sprad nas mthe bong gnyis mdzub me'i tshigs gis
337a3(rgyud): gnyis pa'i steng mnan te/ lags pa gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phye nas smin mtsham su bzhags par bgyis ste/ 'di ni mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// phyag rgya'i chos kyi
337a4(rgyud): sgo 'di bgyis par gyur na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gya nom pa bye ba phrag brgya stong snyed mthong bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas
337a5(rgyud): kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnama'abyor pa de'i grogs bgyid par 'gyur lagaso// gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa de dag/ 
337a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di mthong du yang mi rungs la cho ga 'di yang bgyir mi rung lag so// rtag mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang / ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba cig lags
337a7(rgyud): na ni ci dang ci smon pa de dag thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur lag so// gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ oM sarba tsak+ShuHka rA ya/ d+hA ra Ni/ in+d+ra ya swA hA/ de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong
337a8(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lags pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil bkang nas sor mo lnga so sor
337b1(rgyud): phan tshun du bsnyen te/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i lag mthil g.yas pa'i steng du mnan nas snying kar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni lags stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste/

337b4(rgyud): pa g.yon pa'i sor mo 'greng ste gung mo bkug nas mdun du pu/ ngal la/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ gung mo bkug ste nang log su phul ba 'di ni ting
337b5(rgyud): 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba lags te/ 'dis ting 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa da/ nga / chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur/ 
337b6(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lagaso// rig sngags 'di snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o// de la bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas lha klu sde
337b7(rgyud): brgyad dang / 'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lags gis mthe bong sen mo la reg par
337b8(rgyud): bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa de bzhin du bgyis te/ mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis drang por sgreng nas rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyis la/ lag ngar gyi tshig gnyis sbyar nas
338a1(rgyud): mdzub mon phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o// rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oMsar+b+ba de pa nA ga an ri swAhA/ de la brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang / 
338a2(rgyud): brgya byin lha'i dbang po g.yar dran nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te phyag rgya snga ma'i steng du lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis phye nas/ sug pa lag pa'i zur sprad de/ lag mthil bkan la

338a4(rgyud): grangs ma mchis pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar bgyi'o// gal te nyi zla la gza' zhu gas par gyur na/ chab ma ra la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis/ 
338a5(rgyud): gdab par bgyi'o// yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngag/ sa bzla bar bgyi'o// chab mar phyag rgyas btabaste 'tshal na dbang po rno bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la

338a7(rgyud): de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i bar tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas snying kar thal mo sbyar te/ mthe bong gnyis ka lag mthil du

338b7(rgyud): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo lnga drang por sgreng ste thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'di ni bdag

339a7(rgyud): tu brgyud par mi bgyi'o// yongasu dang ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag nas skad cig tsam du yang rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyi'o// gal te khe la gdugs slad rol tu gzhan dag la tha
339a8(rgyud): dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na/ sdig pa'i las sbyong bar 'tshal yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lag so// gal te yang dag pa'i yongasu dang ba dang / chos kyi bsam pa gang lags pa

339b7(rgyud): ba dang / las gcig la gnas pa dang / gtan tu skyabs ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags pas/ 'phags pa rnams kyi yongasu skyob par mi mdzad cing / rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang /

340a2(rgyud): lags te/ de ltar mi 'grub pa de yang bdag gis nongs par ma lags kyi/ de dag rang nyid kyi nongs skyon lags pas don de'i slad du gzungs 'di'i cho ga dang / glegs bam de dag gis

340b1(rgyud): chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ slob dpon gyi bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems rtse gcig tu sgrub par bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di
340b2(rgyud): ni slad ma'i dus tha ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang / blta bas

340b4(rgyud): ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pag// dkyil 'khor de yang gtsug lagakhang gi nang ngam/ ri 'am/ chab mig 'bab pa 'am/ na gus tshal gyi drung du yang rung ste/ nyen 'khor kun tu khru gang
340b5(rgyud): yan chad na shing gi rtsa ba dang / dog sa ngan pa dang / gyo mo dang // gor ma dang / rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos/ te bsal nas/ dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam
340b6(rgyud): du blangs te/ brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang gi lci ba dang / spos cha ba dogs ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar
340b7(rgyud): bgyi'o// de la dbus kyi gling ni zheng du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te/ dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhir lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa cig bri bar bya'o// 
340b8(rgyud): gzhan yang 'khor lo dbusu rin po che'i pad+ma kha phye ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang ba cig bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// de'i
341a1(rgyud): rjes la gling gi grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bya'o// gzhan yang pad+ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas/ nor bu bzhi po'i steng 'od 'bar 'bri bar bya'o// 
341a2(rgyud): gzhan yang 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i pad+ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan dan dkar po las bgyis pa cig bzhag par bgyi'o// 
341a3(rgyud): nas gling gnyis pa ni zheng du khru gang bar bgyis nas/ sngar grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim pa gsum mchis pa gsum
341a4(rgyud): gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la dbang phyug che/ na bo'i lha bri'o// shar lho'i mtshams kyi stan la ni lha ma thu chen po bri'o// lho nub mtshams kyi stan la ni tshangs pa chen de
341a5(rgyud): bri'o// nub byang mtshams kyi stan la ni brgya byin bri bar bya/ 'o// gzhan yang ngos bzhir ni rin po che'i me tog dang / phreng ba bcu drug bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gling gsum pa ni zhe
341a6(rgyud): du khru do bri bar bgyis te/ sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkye ba 'ba' shig bri bar bgyi'o// de nas glings bzhi pa ni zheng du khru gang bar bgyi ste/ ngos bzhi spyil bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas
341a7(rgyud): nas bar chad dum bu re re nang du yang pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang go rim bzhin du pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du yang rdo rje tho ba dang / rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang / dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang / 
341a8(rgyud): gri'i phyag rgya dang / ral gri'i phyag rgya dang / dung gi phyag rgya dang / chu gri'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa thog pa'i phyag rgya dang / gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
341b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / gshin rje'i dbyigs pa'i phyag rgya dang / bin ya ka'i phyag rgya dang / mtshon tsha'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams so sor
341b2(rgyud): bris nas/ phyag rgya de dag kun la yang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lha bri'o// nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad
341b3(rgyud): bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu lnga bri'o// byang phyogs kyi chabasgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni ku be ra bri'o// shar phyogs kyi chabasgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhonu bri bar bya'o// de nas gru bzhi'i
341b4(rgyud): gnas so sor ni rgyal po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khord dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang ba ngar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi kun tu 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog
341b5(rgyud): gi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang gru bzhi kun tu rin po che'i ri/ rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o// chab sgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen
341b6(rgyud): po'i cha ba bri bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyi sa gzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o// gzhan yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lho'i ngos kyi zur la sngags
341b7(rgyud): mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus sbyangs te kha shar phyogasu
341b8(rgyud): blta bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glegs bam gcig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhags nas/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i
342a1(rgyud): mdun du gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po'i dri chab zhal bu bcu drug dang / zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang / shing tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i
342a2(rgyud): gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / spos chab bre gang dang / bum pa dar sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / ljon shing gi yal ga la sogs pas kha rgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / me tog dang / phreng ba sna sna nas
342a3(rgyud): nyi shu nyi shu dang / mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / byug spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang / dar tshon

343a8(rgyud): thams cad bsams pa bzhin du 'grub cing yong su rdzogs par 'gyur lagaso// gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga
343b1(rgyud): ma bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'brul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par bgyi'o// yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas/ lan re zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis

343b8(rgyud): lag so// sngon yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas/ gang rims kyis btab pa de dag gdugs zhag gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur to// 
344a1(rgyud): de'i tshe bram ze cin ti zhes bgyi ba zhig snying rje chen po skyes nas/ cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams gcig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas/ thams
344a2(rgyud): cad zhi bar gyur te/ rims gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rgyal po yang de'i tshe yul nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad du sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lagaso// gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis btses par

344a4(rgyud): gis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lagaso// rigs kyi bum rigs kyi dbu mo gang la la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gi tshe rab dasu nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snga

344a7(rgyud): bco lnga lon pa dang / khyim bdag khyo shug mya mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgo kun tu rgyu zhing zas slong ba las/ khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces/

344b8(rgyud): du longs spyod khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur lag so// sems can gang la la zhig mig nad kyis thebs te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bar gyur na/ sngags mkhan gyis byang

345b7(rgyud): 'dri ba'i gnas khang nye 'khor kun tu tsan dan dkar po'i chab kyis dogs la byugs te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// gzhan yang ri mo mkhan 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus bgyis nas/ gos sar
345b8(rgyud): pa gtsang ma bgos te/ nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag par blang bar bar bgyi'o// chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags nas kyang / ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par/ 
346a1(rgyud): dogs par gyur na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa gcig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bgyis te/ ba dan dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dang / zas dkar gsum dang

346a3(rgyud): dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams 'thol bshags na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung
346a4(rgyud): nas/ nyi zla zil gyis mnan te/ 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i ste/ rang gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang 8/ tshad ma mchis pa tham cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyis pas/ 
346a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang / sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cadashin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang
346a6(rgyud): nas yongasu dag par 'gyur lagaso// cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa des sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang
346a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang phyag stong dang spyan stong po 'di dag bstan nas/ bdud chen po rnams gdul ba
346a8(rgyud): mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul ba lags te/ sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor
346b1(rgyud): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po re re mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po rabs stong gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur la mig stong pa de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon
346b2(rgyud): par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs par 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i nang nas mchog tu
346b3(rgyud): gyur pa lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ leg so legs so// ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus bskal
346b4(rgyud): pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi lum gyi gzungs 'di phyi na gyis brlabs par bya'o// // byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i
346b5(rgyud): thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongasu rdzogs pa'i gzungs/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'aspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags
346b6(rgyud): pa brjod pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig stong lag
346b7(rgyud): stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas kyang rje su yi rang gis khyod kyis shod cig/ de nas byang
346b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gos smras pa dang / nam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rigs sngags 'di smras pa na stong gsum gyis stong / 
347a1(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyis lha'i gnas thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// 'og
347a2(rgyud): min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to// 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur pas/ ko tso 'don cing shar nub tu
347a3(rgyud): byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gis rig sngags kyi rjesu mi 'brang
347a4(rgyud): zhing 'gal bar byas par gyur na mgo tshal bar 'gas par 'gyu ro zhes bsgo'o// bcom ldan 'das rig sdugangs 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyis shing rgya mtsho chen po
347a5(rgyud): bskams par bgyid// rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin rgya dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams srung bar bgyid// rig sngags 'dis ni 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / 
347a6(rgyud): nad thams cad dang mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid// rig sngags 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lag so// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig
347a7(rgyud): rig sngags 'di 'don cing yong su 'dzin par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi ling ngo // rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang / yong su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang
347a8(rgyud): ldan pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du 'chi ba dang / smon pa rnams yongs rdzogs par bgyid do// gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal ni spos su
347b1(rgyud): gul bsregs te/ bdag gi lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la byams par 'tshal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
347b2(rgyud): sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khang bcas na byams shing bkur bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na/ shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis
347b3(rgyud): btab ste/ snying kar bskas na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/ yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
347b4(rgyud): phyug gi thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lag das te/ sug pa lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas/ dathe bong gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'dis ni
347b5(rgyud): bdag kyang srung zhing gzhan yang srung bar bgyi'o// phyogs ga nga du mchi yang rung ste/ mtshams dgum par 'al bas/ chab gcing ma 'am thal ba gtsang ma la lan
347b6(rgyud): bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ gang du mchis pa'i gnas der cha ba 'am/ thal ba snyim pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas/ de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/ de
347b7(rgyud): nyid mtsham su 'grub par 'gyur lag so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rung ba dang / log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis gtses par gyur na bal po se'u'i
347b8(rgyud): yal ga dang / grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te/ rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gzhus na nad gang yang rung ste mi 'tshe ba ma mchis lag so// rig sngags
348a1(rgyud): ni 'di lta ste/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha/ d+harma saM g+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ b+ho d+hi satwA ya/ na mo badz+ra pa Na ye/ bo d+hi sa twa ye/ tad+ya thA/ bi si bi si/ kA ya si bi/ pa
348a2(rgyud): la sha pa la sha ni swA hA/ rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log par blta ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs
348a3(rgyud): dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang / gdugs kyi gung dang / gdugs pas pa'i tshe/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis
348a4(rgyud): pa dang / bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam du yang bud me dad med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur tshe 'das nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan du 'bral zhing / de bzhin
348a5(rgyud): gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongasu dag par skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis spyi bo la byug sa te/ khyod nga'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'jigs
348a6(rgyud): shig ces bka' stsal par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la yang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lagaso// de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
348a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho ba yongasu skyong ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/ 
348a8(rgyud): sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char sgreng ngo // de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug ste/ sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du bcangs nas/ 
348b1(rgyud): rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya ni gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgyi 'tshal bas/ dus gcig gi
348b2(rgyud): tshe yang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur lag so// sems can thams cad byams pa dang / snying rje
348b3(rgyud): bskyed par gyur na kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsregs nas/ tshe 'das pa'i rjes la yang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du yang 'khor los bsgyur
348b4(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas pa ma ma chis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang / ye shes ma nyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzhan
348b5(rgyud): yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce/ la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing / lus kyi nad
348b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang yongasu 'byang bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi las dang / kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lagaso// gal te than pa byung bar gyur na til 'bru yog po'i 'bras bu mar dang
348b7(rgyud): sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste char rdzing du bor nas/ dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lagaso// gal te char ches na 'bras sa lu brngos pa'i me tog
348b8(rgyud): yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing bur bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lagaso// de la byang chub sems dpa'
349a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sor mo snol mar bta
349a2(rgyud): ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te/ khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis na mkhon pa'i ngag thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lagaso// tshe/ 
349a3(rgyud): ga 'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo tsan dan dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sna tshogs
349a4(rgyud): bkram nas yongasu dag par khrus te/ gos gsar pa gtsa nga ma bgos nas sug par pog phor thogs te/ a ga da ru bsregs la kha shar phyogasu bltas te/ skyil mo krung
349a5(rgyud): bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang/ nga phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan
349a6(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lagaso// gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar
349a7(rgyud): bgyis te/ phog gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ zhugasu 'dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis la gdugs re la yang lan brgya tsa brgyad tshang
349a8(rgyud): bgyis na/ slad kyis ci bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lag so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i
349b1(rgyud): phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ sngar sug pa lags pa g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis
349b2(rgyud): te/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ myur du sems can la mi
349b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang shing kun dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / ta ta pa'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi nang
349b4(rgyud): du bor te sreg par bgyi'o// 'di dag sreg pa yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i
349b5(rgyud): sngags bzlas te/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re bsregs pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas spos dang me to// ga dag gis rig sngags la mchod pa bgyis na/ ci dang
349b6(rgyud): ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lagaso// gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis mthub pa dag sngags 'dis btab nas thams cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags
349b7(rgyud): so// gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te/ mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal de dag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags
349b8(rgyud): so// bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o// 'tshal yid bzhin du 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs re bzhin rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun
350a1(rgyud): du tshang bar gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i rgyal ba rgya tsho sa rgya co lo 'dus sar chos ston pa
350a2(rgyud): na/ klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying btse nas de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can mang po rnams
350a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal dang bral zhing mkhon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
350a4(rgyud): ri ba cig phul ba dang / bdag gis de la yum gzung ngas 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rna dmas dang bral bar gyur lagaso// de nas byang chub sems
350a5(rgyud): dpa' chu shel gyis rig sngags 'di yongasu 'dzin pa da ga la phan gdags shing bgegs yongasu srung ba'i/ phyir sngags 'di smras so// bi ma le/ ma hA bi ma le/ u
350a6(rgyud): le/ ma hA u ha le/ shu ma le/ ma hA hu ma le/ sa hA le/ ma hA sa hA le/ tsi le te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ byang chub
350a7(rgyud): sems dpa' mig stong dang lag pa steng dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongasu 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi rjes su 'brang ste/ yongasu srung bar bgyid pas bdud
350a8(rgyud): kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lag so// gang la la zhig brel zhing phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol dgras gtses sam/ chom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgyid par
350b1(rgyud): 'gyur na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzlo zhing mdud pa re re bdud nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'o// 
350b2(rgyud): gzhan yang sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lags dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ sngags
350b3(rgyud): 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ thams cad rang gyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la
350b4(rgyud): gnas te chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po de'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyis sha khrag 'ba' shig 'tshal zhing / dge ba'i sems ci
350b5(rgyud): yang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang / de'i tshe byang chub sa mas dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i ched du rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus
350b6(rgyud): de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/ mig snang dang lag stong dang ldan pa'i sa bdud gdul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bkyis
350b7(rgyud): pa dang / de'i tshe srin po'i yum gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas/ nongs pa 'brel bshags te phyag bgyis pa dang / bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas btab
350b8(rgyud): pas/ de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 
351a1(rgyud): 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ snying kar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis snol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po
351a2(rgyud): che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/ thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lag so// de la byang chub sems dpa'
351a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongasu skyob pa'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs
351a4(rgyud): su skyobs par 'tshal na/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs dang / lag mthil ni dbye
351a5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// sor mo rnams kyi bar yang tshon gang tsam mchis par bgyi ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'/ de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs
351a6(rgyud): las yongs su bzlas pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur pas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang
351a7(rgyud): ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas/ sngar sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga car bkan nas/ pus mo g.yon pa'i
351a8(rgyud): steng du bzhag go/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang te/ sor mo lnga car kha sbub nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o// 'di ni 'gogs pa'i snyoms par
351b1(rgyud): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'as mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur
351b2(rgyud): ba lags pas/ phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do// rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du ma gyur na gdugs mtshan
351b3(rgyud): bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i gnas su ma mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing / sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas
351b4(rgyud): mig mngar mngon sum du bzhugs pa yid la bgyis te/ da gdugs mtshan gcig la lan drug du 'thol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du
351b5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lagaso// de la byang
351b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur gtsang bar
351b7(rgyud): bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bong khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag pa g.yas pa'i chang ba'i gong
351b8(rgyud): du rtse mo phyung nas/ sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM ku tsi ku tsi/ ku tsi ya ri/ tsa ri tsa ri/ tsa ri le swA hA/ gzungs
352a1(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te sngags 'di lan
352a2(rgyud): re bzlas shing / snying kar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar gyur na/ sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gang
352a3(rgyud): la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems steng par mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de mtshan mo
352a4(rgyud): mchis nyal ba'i tshe g.ya ra lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing ba dkra shis par 'gyur/ g.yar lam na de bzhin ga/ shegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston
352a5(rgyud): pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/ ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis
352a6(rgyud): nas/ rim gro bgyid cing yongs su srung bar 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas/ lha dang / klu dang / 'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag
352a7(rgyud): brgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug parkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mithe bong lag mtha'i du bkug nas/ sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcings te snying
352a8(rgyud): kar bzhag go// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yab yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas/ mdzub mo phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags ni
352b1(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ na mo nI la kaN+Tha/ na ma Ar+ya sha pa ta swA hA/ na ma Ar+ya sha la swA hA/ e hi e hi swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang / phyag rgya
352b2(rgyud): 'di len tam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ 'don par bgyis na/ myur du tshe rabs bdun tshun chad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyis dngos po rjesu dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas zin
352b3(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// dug gi mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur/ rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
352b4(rgyud): bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lagaso// gang la la zhig/ gdugs re bzhin du rigs sngags 'di 'don par rab dgyid na/ 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don
352b5(rgyud): pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis
352b6(rgyud): zin par gyur na/ skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud de/ mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshangs par bgyis nas/ de'i mgul du
352b7(rgyud): btags na de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so// gal te yul gang du ltas ngan pa dang / rims na byung ste/ yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/ rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba
352b8(rgyud): dang / rdzing dag tu pad ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ pad ma re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas pa raM bsregs na rims nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
353a1(rgyud): lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug
353a2(rgyud): pa lags pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhags par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa
353a3(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis na/ sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha sbub tu bzhags par bgyi'o// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas lus
353a4(rgyud): po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsagacig bzlas brjod pa dgyis na/ smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dar 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par grol
353a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos sdig phun sum tshogs
353a6(rgyud): par bgyis pas 'dzam bu'i gling gis sa ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rab de re re yang bskal pa re re mngon par byung bar gyur na/ gang dag de dngos
353a7(rgyud): sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan tu 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig
353a8(rgyud): lags na yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo tshes bco lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig
353b1(rgyud): zas bkum ste/ phyag brgya mdud nas/ rigs sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ gal te byang bar mi
353b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhe na/ de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa bya
353b3(rgyud): rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas 'grengs sngar sug pa g.yon pas sug pa rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa
353b4(rgyud): g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag par gyis steng du btsir nas/ lus po che'i sngags lan bdun par bgyis denas/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na yang
353b5(rgyud): dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar mi bgyi'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang
353b6(rgyud): dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung gi sen mo'i steng du reg par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de
353b7(rgyud): bzhin du bgyis nas/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yan par sgreng ste/ lag par gyi tshigs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par
353b8(rgyud): bgyid na/ drang srong 'phur te mchi dag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lag so// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di
